trans-unit.source: And how could you take it while you have gone in unto each other and they have taken from you a solemn covenant?
trans-unit.target: I com podria vostè pren-lo mentre que ha entrat a l'altre i s'han pres de vostè un pacte solemne?

trans-unit.source: And do not marry those [women] whom your fathers married, except what has already occurred. Indeed, it was an immorality and hateful [to Allah] and was evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: I no casar-se amb aquells [dona] qui va casar vostres pares, excepte el que ja s'ha produït. De fet, era una immoralitat i odiós [a Allah] i va ser mal com una forma.

trans-unit.source: Prohibited to you [for marriage] are your mothers, your daughters, your sisters, your father's sisters, your mother's sisters, your brother's daughters, your sister's daughters, your [milk] mothers who nursed you, your sisters through nursing, your wives' mothers, and your step-daughters under your guardianship [born] of your wives unto whom you have gone in. But if you have not gone in unto them, there is no sin upon you. And [also prohibited are] the wives of your sons who are from your [own] loins, and that you take [in marriage] two sisters simultaneously, except for what has already occurred. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Prohibit [matrimoni] són les seves mares, seves filles, les seves germanes, germanes del seu pare, germanes de la seva mare, filles del seu germà, filles de la seva germana, el seu mares [llet], que vostè, el seu germanes a través d'Infermeria, el seu pas-filles sota la seva tutela [nascuda] de les seves esposes i mares dels vostres dones criat a qui que ha entrat. Però si que ha entrat no unto ells, hi ha cap pecat a vostè. I [també prohibeix els] les mullers dels seus fills que són dels seus [propi] lloms, i que vostè prendre [en matrimoni] dues germanes simultàniament, excepte per què ja ha ocorregut. De fet, Allah és alguna vegada Clement i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: And [also prohibited to you are all] married women except those your right hands possess. [This is] the decree of Allah upon you. And lawful to you are [all others] beyond these, [provided] that you seek them [in marriage] with [gifts from] your property, desiring chastity, not unlawful sexual intercourse. So for whatever you enjoy [of marriage] from them, give them their due compensation as an obligation. And there is no blame upon you for what you mutually agree to beyond the obligation. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I [també prohibit a vostè són tots] es va casar amb dones excepte els posseeixen les mans de la dreta. [És] el decret d'al là sobre tu. I legal ets [tothom] més enllà d'aquests, [sempre] que vostè buscar-los [en matrimoni] amb [regals de] seu immoble, que desitgen castedat, relacions sexuals no il·legal. Així que per a qualsevol cosa que t'agrada [del matrimoni] d'ells, donar-los la indemnització deguda com una obligació. I no hi ha cap culpa de per què vostè mútuament es compromet a més enllà de l'obligació. En efecte, Allah és mai saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: And whoever among you cannot [find] the means to marry free, believing women, then [he may marry] from those whom your right hands possess of believing slave girls. And Allah is most knowing about your faith. You [believers] are of one another. So marry them with the permission of their people and give them their due compensation according to what is acceptable. [They should be] chaste, neither [of] those who commit unlawful intercourse randomly nor those who take [secret] lovers. But once they are sheltered in marriage, if they should commit adultery, then for them is half the punishment for free [unmarried] women. This [allowance] is for him among you who fears sin, but to be patient is better for you. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I qui entre vosaltres no [] els mitjans per casar-se amb dones lliures, que creien, llavors [es pot casar amb] d'aquells qui tenen les mans dreta de creure esclaves. I Allah està saber més sobre la seva fe. [Creients] ets de l'altra. Així casaran amb el permís del seu poble i donar-los la seva indemnització deguda segons allò que és acceptable. [Haurien de ser] castos, ni [de] aquells que cometen les relacions sexuals il·lícites fortuïtament ni aquells que prenen amants [secret]. Però una vegada que està protegida en el matrimoni, si poguessin cometre adulteri, llavors per ells és mig el càstig per a les dones [solters] lliures. Aquesta franquícia [d] és per a ell entre vosaltres que tem pecat, però per ser pacient és millor per a vostè. I Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: Allah wants to make clear to you [the lawful from the unlawful] and guide you to the [good] practices of those before you and to accept your repentance. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Allah vol deixar ben clar que [la legal de l'il·legal] i guiar a les pràctiques [bones] dels abans i d'acceptar el seu penediment. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Allah wants to accept your repentance, but those who follow [their] passions want you to digress [into] a great deviation.
trans-unit.target: Allah vol acceptar el seu penediment, però aquells que segueixen [seves] passions vull que divagant [en] una gran desviació.

trans-unit.source: And Allah wants to lighten for you [your difficulties]; and mankind was created weak.
trans-unit.target: I Allah vol aclarir que [el seu dificultats]; i la humanitat es va crear feble.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not consume one another's wealth unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, no consumeixen un altre riquesa injustament però només [en legal] empresarial per mutu. I no matar vosaltres [o un altre]. De fet, Allah és a vostè alguna vegada Clement.

trans-unit.source: And whoever does that in aggression and injustice - then We will drive him into a Fire. And that, for Allah, is [always] easy.
trans-unit.target: I qui fa que en l'agressió i la injustícia - llavors ens conduirà a un incendi. I que, per Allah, [sempre] fàcil.

trans-unit.source: If you avoid the major sins which you are forbidden, We will remove from you your lesser sins and admit you to a noble entrance [into Paradise].
trans-unit.target: Si vostè evitar els principals pecats que està prohibit, anem a eliminar de vostres pecats menor i admetre que una entrada noble [a paradís].

trans-unit.source: And do not wish for that by which Allah has made some of you exceed others. For men is a share of what they have earned, and for women is a share of what they have earned. And ask Allah of his bounty. Indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I no vol que els que Allah ha fet alguns de vostès superior a altres. Per als homes és una porció de què han guanyat, i per a les dones és una porció de què s'han guanyat. I demanar Allah de la seva generositat. De fet Allah és mai, de totes les coses, saber.

trans-unit.source: And for all, We have made heirs to what is left by parents and relatives. And to those whom your oaths have bound [to you] - give them their share. Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, a Witness.
trans-unit.target: I per a tots, hem fet hereus al que queda per pares i familiars. I per a aquells que han lligat seus juraments [te] - dóna la seva porció. De fet Allah és mai, sobre totes les coses, un testimoni.

trans-unit.source: Men are in charge of women by [right of] what Allah has given one over the other and what they spend [for maintenance] from their wealth. So righteous women are devoutly obedient, guarding in [the husband's] absence what Allah would have them guard. But those [wives] from whom you fear arrogance - [first] advise them; [then if they persist], forsake them in bed; and [finally], strike them. But if they obey you [once more], seek no means against them. Indeed, Allah is ever Exalted and Grand.
trans-unit.target: Els homes són a càrrec de dones per [dreta] Què Allah un sobre l'altre i el que passen [per manteniment] ha donat de la seva riquesa. Perquè les dones justos són obedients devotament, que vigila en absència de [del marit] quin Allah hauria guàrdia. Però aquells [esposes] de qui té por arrogància - [primer] assessorar-los; [llavors si persisteixen], els abandonarà al llit; i [finalment], vaga. Però si que obeir [més] vostè, buscar cap mitjà contra ells. De fet, Allah és mai exaltat i gran.

trans-unit.source: And if you fear dissension between the two, send an arbitrator from his people and an arbitrator from her people. If they both desire reconciliation, Allah will cause it between them. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Acquainted [with all things].
trans-unit.target: I si vostè por dissensió entre els dos, enviar un àrbitre de la seva gent i un àrbitre del seu poble. Si tots dos desitgen la reconciliació, Allah farà que entre ells. De fet, Allah és mai conèixer i familiaritzar-se [amb totes les coses].

trans-unit.source: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good, and to relatives, orphans, the needy, the near neighbor, the neighbor farther away, the companion at your side, the traveler, and those whom your right hands possess. Indeed, Allah does not like those who are self-deluding and boastful.
trans-unit.target: Culte Allah i associat res amb ell i als pares fer bé i per familiars, orfes, als necessitats, el veí a prop, el veí més lluny, el company al teu costat, el viatger i aquells qui tenen les mans de la dreta. De fet, Allah no semblants a les que són auto-enganyant i fanfarró.

trans-unit.source: Who are stingy and enjoin upon [other] people stinginess and conceal what Allah has given them of His bounty - and We have prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment -
trans-unit.target: Que són garrepes i demanen a [altre] avarícia persones i ocultar el que Allah ha donat de la seva generositat - i hem preparat per disbelievers un càstig humiliant-

trans-unit.source: And [also] those who spend of their wealth to be seen by the people and believe not in Allah nor in the Last Day. And he to whom Satan is a companion - then evil is he as a companion.
trans-unit.target: I [també] aquells que passin de la seva riquesa per ser vistos per les persones i creuen no en Allah ni a l'últim dia. I a qui Satanàs és un company - llavors mal va com a company.

trans-unit.source: And what [harm would come] upon them if they believed in Allah and the Last Day and spent out of what Allah provided for them? And Allah is ever, about them, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I què [mal vindria] sobre ells si que creia en Allah i el darrer dia i passat de què Allah proporcionada per a ells? I Allah és mai, sobre ells, saber.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not do injustice, [even] as much as an atom's weight; while if there is a good deed, He multiplies it and gives from Himself a great reward.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah no injustícia, [encara] tant com el pes d'un Àtom; mentre que si hi ha una bona acció, es multiplica i dóna de si mateix una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: So how [will it be] when We bring from every nation a witness and we bring you, [O Muhammad] against these [people] as a witness?
trans-unit.target: Llavors, com [serà] quan portem de totes les Nacions un testimoni i ens portarà, [O Muhammad] contra aquestes [persones] com a testimoni?

trans-unit.source: That Day, those who disbelieved and disobeyed the Messenger will wish they could be covered by the earth. And they will not conceal from Allah a [single] statement.
trans-unit.target: Aquell dia, els que dubtaven i desobeir el Missatger desitjarà que podria ser coberta per la terra. I no va a ocultar des d'Allah una [sola] declaració.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not approach prayer while you are intoxicated until you know what you are saying or in a state of janabah, except those passing through [a place of prayer], until you have washed [your whole body]. And if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from the place of relieving himself or you have contacted women and find no water, then seek clean earth and wipe over your faces and your hands [with it]. Indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, no s'acosten oració mentre esteu intoxicat fins que sàpiga el que està dient o en un estat de janabah, excepte aquells passant per [un lloc d'oració], fins que li han rentat [tot el teu cos]. I si vostè està malalt o un viatge o un de vosaltres ve des del lloc de alleujar a si mateix o que han contactat amb dones i trobar sense aigua, llavors buscar terra neta i eixugar sobre la cara i les mans [amb això]. En efecte, Allah és mai perdó i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture, purchasing error [in exchange for it] and wishing you would lose the way?
trans-unit.target: ¿No has vist qui va donar una part de l'escriptura, compra d'error [a canvi que] i li desitgem perdria el camí?

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of your enemies; and sufficient is Allah as an ally, and sufficient is Allah as a helper.
trans-unit.target: I Allah és saber la majoria dels seus enemics; i prou és Allah com aliada, i prou és Allah com un ajudant.

trans-unit.source: Among the Jews are those who distort words from their [proper] usages and say, "We hear and disobey" and "Hear but be not heard" and "Ra'ina," twisting their tongues and defaming the religion. And if they had said [instead], "We hear and obey" and "Wait for us [to understand]," it would have been better for them and more suitable. But Allah has cursed them for their disbelief, so they believe not, except for a few.
trans-unit.target: Entre els jueus són els que distorsionar paraules des dels seus usos [correcte] i dir, "escoltar i desobeir" i "sentir però no ser escoltats" i "Ra'ina," torsió seves llengües i difamar la religió. I si que havia dit [lloc], "escoltar i obeir" i «Espera [fer comprendre],» hauria estat millor per a ells i més adequat. Però Allah ha maleït-los per la seva incredulitat, perquè creuen no, excepte uns pocs.

trans-unit.source: O you who were given the Scripture, believe in what We have sent down [to Muhammad], confirming that which is with you, before We obliterate faces and turn them toward their backs or curse them as We cursed the sabbath-breakers. And ever is the decree of Allah accomplished.
trans-unit.target: O qui se'ls l'escriptura, creus en el que ens han enviat [a Muhammad], confirmant el que és amb vostè, abans que destrueixen cares i convertir-los cap a l'esquena o maleir-los com ens va maleir el dissabte trencadors. I mai és el decret d'Allah acomplert.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not forgive association with Him, but He forgives what is less than that for whom He wills. And he who associates others with Allah has certainly fabricated a tremendous sin.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah no perdona associació amb ell, però ell perdona què és menor que per a qui ell voluntats. I certament el que altres associa Allah ha fabricat un gran pecat.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who claim themselves to be pure? Rather, Allah purifies whom He wills, and injustice is not done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside a date seed].
trans-unit.target: ¿No has vist aquells que afirmen que ells mateixos per ser pur? Més aviat, Allah purifica qui ell voluntats i injustícia no es fa per a ells, [encara] tant com un fil [dins una llavor data].

trans-unit.source: Look how they invent about Allah untruth, and sufficient is that as a manifest sin.
trans-unit.target: Mira com van inventar sobre mentida Allah, i suficient és que com un pecat manifesta.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture, who believe in superstition and false objects of worship and say about the disbelievers, "These are better guided than the believers as to the way"?
trans-unit.target: ¿No has vist qui va donar una part de l'escriptura, que creuen en la superstició i les falses objectes de culte i dir sobre els disbelievers, "Aquests són millor guiada que els creients com per la forma"?

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones whom Allah has cursed; and he whom Allah curses - never will you find for him a helper.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els quals Allah ha maleït a cinc; i ell qui malediccions Allah - mai es per a ell un ajudant.

trans-unit.source: Or have they a share of dominion? Then [if that were so], they would not give the people [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
trans-unit.target: O que tenen una porció de domini? Llavors si que eren tan], no donaria la gent [encara més] la palla en una llavor de data.

trans-unit.source: Or do they envy people for what Allah has given them of His bounty? But we had already given the family of Abraham the Scripture and wisdom and conferred upon them a great kingdom.
trans-unit.target: L'enveja o la gent per què Allah ha donat de la seva generositat? Però ja havia donat la família d'Abraham les escriptures i saviesa i confereix-los un gran Regne.

trans-unit.source: And some among them believed in it, and some among them were averse to it. And sufficient is Hell as a blaze.
trans-unit.target: I alguns entre ells creien en ell, i alguns entre ells eren reticent a ella. I l'infern com un incendi és suficient.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve in Our verses - We will drive them into a Fire. Every time their skins are roasted through We will replace them with other skins so they may taste the punishment. Indeed, Allah is ever Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: De fet, els que dubten en nostres versos - impulsarem en un incendi. Cada vegada es torren seves pells a través anem a substituir-los amb altres pells per la qual cosa es pot degustar el càstig. De fet, Allah mai és exaltat en força i savi.

trans-unit.source: But those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide forever. For them therein are purified spouses, and We will admit them to deepening shade.
trans-unit.target: Però qui creure i fer els justos fets - anem a admetre els jardins sota rius que flueixen, en què van complir per sempre. Per a ells inclosos en els cònjuges purificada, i anem a admetre-les a l'ombra d'aprofundiment.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah commands you to render trusts to whom they are due and when you judge between people to judge with justice. Excellent is that which Allah instructs you. Indeed, Allah is ever Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah mana a rendir fideïcomisos de qui són causa i quan vostè jutjar entre persones per jutjar amb justícia. Excel·lent és el que l'instrueix Allah. De fet, Allah és mai auditives i veient.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and those in authority among you. And if you disagree over anything, refer it to Allah and the Messenger, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. That is the best [way] and best in result.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, obeir Allah i obeir el Missatger i els de l'autoritat entre vosaltres. I en cas de discrepància sobre tot, es refereixen a Allah i el Messenger, si vostè ha de creure en Allah i el darrer dia. Que és el millor [camí] i millor resultat.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who claim to have believed in what was revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you? They wish to refer legislation to Taghut, while they were commanded to reject it; and Satan wishes to lead them far astray.
trans-unit.target: No has vist aquells que afirmen haver cregut en el que es va revelar a vostè, [O Muhammad], i el que va ser revelat abans? Desitgen referir-se a la legislació Taghut, mentre que eren comandades per rebutjar-lo; i Satan vol porten lluny per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Come to what Allah has revealed and to the Messenger," you see the hypocrites turning away from you in aversion.
trans-unit.target: I quan es diu que, "Arribat Allah ha revelat i el Messenger," veieu els hipòcrites inflexió de tu en aversió.

trans-unit.source: So how [will it be] when disaster strikes them because of what their hands have put forth and then they come to you swearing by Allah, "We intended nothing but good conduct and accommodation."
trans-unit.target: Així com [serà] Quan vagues de desastre-los per què les seves mans han posat endavant i després vénen a tu jurar per Allah, "Hem pensat res però bona conducta i allotjament."

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones of whom Allah knows what is in their hearts, so turn away from them but admonish them and speak to them a far-reaching word.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els de qui Allah sap el que està en els seus cors, així allunyar-los però amonestar-los i parlar-los d'una paraula de gran abast.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send any messenger except to be obeyed by permission of Allah. And if, when they wronged themselves, they had come to you, [O Muhammad], and asked forgiveness of Allah and the Messenger had asked forgiveness for them, they would have found Allah Accepting of repentance and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I no enviar un Missatger excepte al ser obeïdes per permís d'Allah. I si, quan ells mateixos injustament, havien vingut a vostè, [O Muhammad], i demanava el perdó d'Allah i Missatger havia demanat perdó per a ells, haurien trobat Allah acceptar de penediment i Clement.

trans-unit.source: But no, by your Lord, they will not [truly] believe until they make you, [O Muhammad], judge concerning that over which they dispute among themselves and then find within themselves no discomfort from what you have judged and submit in [full, willing] submission.
trans-unit.target: Però no, pel seu Senyor, no ho faran creure [veritablement] fins que et fan, [O Muhammad], jutjar pel que fa a que sobre el qual disputa entre ells i llavors trobar dins seu cap molèstia de què t'han jutjat i presentar en el submissió [plena, disposat].

trans-unit.source: And if We had decreed upon them, "Kill yourselves" or "Leave your homes," they would not have done it, except for a few of them. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and a firmer position [for them in faith].
trans-unit.target: I si ens han decretat sobre ells, "Maten" o "Deixar casa seva", no hauria fet, excepte per a algunes d'elles. Però si que havien fet el que s'instruïen, hauria estat millor per a ells i una posició més ferma [per a ells en fe].

trans-unit.source: And then We would have given them from Us a great reward.
trans-unit.target: I llavors ens hauria donat ells de nosaltres una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And We would have guided them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: I vols tenir guiàvem al camí recte.

trans-unit.source: And whoever obeys Allah and the Messenger - those will be with the ones upon whom Allah has bestowed favor of the prophets, the steadfast affirmers of truth, the martyrs and the righteous. And excellent are those as companions.
trans-unit.target: I qui obeeix a Allah i el Missatger - els serà amb aquells a qui Allah ha obsequiat favor dels profetes, el ferms affirmers de veritat, els màrtirs i justos. I són excel·lents els com a companys.

trans-unit.source: That is the bounty from Allah, and sufficient is Allah as Knower.
trans-unit.target: Que és la generositat des d'Allah, i prou és Allah com a coneixedor.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, take your precaution and [either] go forth in companies or go forth all together.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, pren la precaució i [o] passar endavant en empreses o anar endavant tots junts.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, there is among you he who lingers behind; and if disaster strikes you, he says, "Allah has favored me in that I was not present with them."
trans-unit.target: I de fet, hi ha entre vosaltres que perdura darrere; i si vagues de desastre, diu, "Allah ha afavorit me en que no estava present amb ells."

trans-unit.source: But if bounty comes to you from Allah, he will surely say, as if there had never been between you and him any affection. "Oh, I wish I had been with them so I could have attained a great attainment."
trans-unit.target: Però si la recompensa ve a tu des d'Allah, segurament dirà, com si mai no hi havia hagut entre vostè i li cap afecte. "Oh, m'agradaria que havia estat amb ells tan podria haver assolit una gran consecució."

trans-unit.source: So let those fight in the cause of Allah who sell the life of this world for the Hereafter. And he who fights in the cause of Allah and is killed or achieves victory - We will bestow upon him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Així que aquells lluita en la causa d'Allah que venen la vida d'aquest món per la d'ara endavant. I el que lluita en la causa d'Allah i és assassinat o aconsegueix la victòria - podem atorgar a ell una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And what is [the matter] with you that you fight not in the cause of Allah and [for] the oppressed among men, women, and children who say, "Our Lord, take us out of this city of oppressive people and appoint for us from Yourself a protector and appoint for us from Yourself a helper?"
trans-unit.target: I què és [la matèria] amb vostè que lluita no en la causa d'Allah i [per a] l'oprimit entre homes, dones i nens que diuen, "Nostre Senyor, ens porten d'aquesta ciutat de les persones opressives i nomenar per a nosaltres de tu mateix un protector i nomenar per a nosaltres de tu mateix un ajudant?"

trans-unit.source: Those who believe fight in the cause of Allah, and those who disbelieve fight in the cause of Taghut. So fight against the allies of Satan. Indeed, the plot of Satan has ever been weak.
trans-unit.target: Aquells que creuen que lluita en la causa d'Allah i els que dubten lluita en la causa de Taghut. Tan lluitar contra els aliats de Satanàs. De fet, la trama de Satanàs mai ha estat feble.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who were told, "Restrain your hands [from fighting] and establish prayer and give zakah"? But then when fighting was ordained for them, at once a party of them feared men as they fear Allah or with [even] greater fear. They said, "Our Lord, why have You decreed upon us fighting? If only You had postponed [it for] us for a short time." Say, The enjoyment of this world is little, and the Hereafter is better for he who fears Allah. And injustice will not be done to you, [even] as much as a thread [inside a date seed]."
trans-unit.target: ¿No has vist qui va dir, "Frenar les mans [de la lluita] i establir l'oració i donar zakah"? Però llavors quan la lluita va ser ordenat per a ells, a la vegada una festa d'ells temia als homes por Allah o amb por [encara] més gran. Deien, "nostre Senyor, per què han decretat sobre nosaltres lluita? Si només vostè havia ajornat [-d] ens per un curt temps. " Dir, el gaudi d'aquest món és petit, i el més enllà és millor per a ell qui tem Allah. I injustícia no es farà per a vostè, [encara] tant com un fil [dins una llavor data]."

trans-unit.source: Wherever you may be, death will overtake you, even if you should be within towers of lofty construction. But if good comes to them, they say, "This is from Allah "; and if evil befalls them, they say, "This is from you." Say, "All [things] are from Allah." So what is [the matter] with those people that they can hardly understand any statement?
trans-unit.target: Allà on sigueu, mort protèsics superarà, fins i tot si vostè ha de ser dins de Torres de construcció elevada. Però si bé arriba a ells, diuen, "Aquest és des d'Allah"; i si mal sobrevingui ells, diuen: "això és de vostè." Dir, "[tot] és des d'Allah". Així què és [la matèria] amb aquelles persones que difícilment es pot comprendre qualsevol declaració?

trans-unit.source: What comes to you of good is from Allah, but what comes to you of evil, [O man], is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.
trans-unit.target: El que ve a vostè bé és d'Allah, però el que ve a vostè del mal, [Oh home], és de tu mateix. I ens han enviat, [O Muhammad], a la gent com a Missatger i prou és Allah com a testimoni.

trans-unit.source: He who obeys the Messenger has obeyed Allah; but those who turn away - We have not sent you over them as a guardian.
trans-unit.target: Qui obeeix el Missatger ha d'obeir Allah; però els que s'allunyen - ens han no enviat sobre ells com a guardià.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "[We pledge] obedience." But when they leave you, a group of them spend the night determining to do other than what you say. But Allah records what they plan by night. So leave them alone and rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: I van dir, "[ens comprometem] obediència." Però quan et surten, un grup d'ells passen la nit determinació a fer res més que el que dius. Però Allah enregistra el que planegen de nit. Així, deixar-los sols i confiar en Allah. I prou és Allah com triturador d'Afers.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an? If it had been from [any] other than Allah, they would have found within it much contradiction.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ells no reflecteixen en el Qur ' an? Si hagués estat de [qualsevol] altre que Allah, haurien trobat dins d'ella molt contradicció.

trans-unit.source: And when there comes to them information about [public] security or fear, they spread it around. But if they had referred it back to the Messenger or to those of authority among them, then the ones who [can] draw correct conclusions from it would have known about it. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, you would have followed Satan, except for a few.
trans-unit.target: I quan arriba a ells informació sobre seguretat [pública] o por, s'estenen al voltant. Però si que havia remès tornar al Missatger o d'autoritat entre ells, llavors els que [es] treure conclusions correctes d'ella hagués sabut sobre això. I si no fos pel favor d'Allah i la seva misericòrdia, hagués perseguit Satan, excepte uns pocs.

trans-unit.source: So fight, [O Muhammad], in the cause of Allah; you are not held responsible except for yourself. And encourage the believers [to join you] that perhaps Allah will restrain the [military] might of those who disbelieve. And Allah is greater in might and stronger in [exemplary] punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tan lluitar, [O Muhammad], en la causa d'Allah; vostè no es fa responsable excepte tu mateix. I animava els creients [uniran] que potser Allah es frenar el poder [militar] d'aquells que no creuen. I Allah és superior en força i més fort en càstig [exemplar].

trans-unit.source: Whoever intercedes for a good cause will have a reward therefrom; and whoever intercedes for an evil cause will have a burden therefrom. And ever is Allah, over all things, a Keeper.
trans-unit.target: Qui intercedes per una bona causa tindrà una recompensa originin i qui intercedes per una causa mal tindrà una càrrega dels mateixos. I mai és Allah, sobre totes les coses, un guarda.

trans-unit.source: And when you are greeted with a greeting, greet [in return] with one better than it or [at least] return it [in a like manner]. Indeed, Allah is ever, over all things, an Accountant.
trans-unit.target: I quan vostè són rebuts amb una salutació, saludar amb un millor que això o retorn [almenys] [a canvi]-[d'una manera com]. De fet, Allah és mai, sobre totes les coses, un comptador.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. He will surely assemble you for [account on] the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt. And who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
trans-unit.target: Allah - no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell. Es muntarà segurament vostè [compte en] dia de resurrecció, sobre el qual no hi ha dubte. I qui és el més veraç que Allah en la declaració.

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you [that you are] two groups concerning the hypocrites, while Allah has made them fall back [into error and disbelief] for what they earned. Do you wish to guide those whom Allah has sent astray? And he whom Allah sends astray - never will you find for him a way [of guidance].
trans-unit.target: Què és [la matèria] amb vostè [que són] dos grups sobre els hipòcrites, mentre Allah ha fet caure [en l'error i la incredulitat] per què van guanyar. Voleu orientar aquells que Allah ha enviat per mal camí? I ell a qui envia Allah per mal camí - mai no serà vostè trobar per a ell una manera [d'orientació].

trans-unit.source: They wish you would disbelieve as they disbelieved so you would be alike. So do not take from among them allies until they emigrate for the cause of Allah. But if they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them and take not from among them any ally or helper.
trans-unit.target: Desitgen que vols no creuen ja que dubtaven perquè seria igual. Així no es fan entre ells aliats fins que van emigrar per la causa d'Allah. Però si s'allunyen, llavors capturar-los i matar-los allà on trobar-los i prendre no entre ells cap aliat o ajudant.

trans-unit.source: Except for those who take refuge with a people between yourselves and whom is a treaty or those who come to you, their hearts strained at [the prospect of] fighting you or fighting their own people. And if Allah had willed, He could have given them power over you, and they would have fought you. So if they remove themselves from you and do not fight you and offer you peace, then Allah has not made for you a cause [for fighting] against them.
trans-unit.target: Excepte les que refugiar-se amb un poble entre vosaltres i qui és un tractat o aquells que vénen a tu, seus cors tenses a [la Perspectiva de] lluitant vostè o lluita contra el seu propi poble. I si Allah tenia willed, ell podria haver donat ells poder sobre vosaltres, i han lluitat vostè. Tan si apartar-se de vostè i no lluiten amb vostè i oferir-vos la pau, llavors Allah no ha fet per a vostè una causa [per lluitar] contra ells.

trans-unit.source: You will find others who wish to obtain security from you and [to] obtain security from their people. Every time they are returned to [the influence of] disbelief, they fall back into it. So if they do not withdraw from you or offer you peace or restrain their hands, then seize them and kill them wherever you overtake them. And those - We have made for you against them a clear authorization.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha altres que vulguin obtenir la seguretat de vostè i [a] obtenir la seguretat de la seva gent. Cada vegada que els retornaven a [la influència de] incredulitat, van caure en ella. Així si no retirar de vostè o oferir-vos la Pau o frenar les seves mans, llavors capturar-los i matar-los allà on vostè assolir-los. I aquells - han fet per tu contra ells una autorització clar.

trans-unit.source: And never is it for a believer to kill a believer except by mistake. And whoever kills a believer by mistake - then the freeing of a believing slave and a compensation payment presented to the deceased's family [is required] unless they give [up their right as] charity. But if the deceased was from a people at war with you and he was a believer - then [only] the freeing of a believing slave; and if he was from a people with whom you have a treaty - then a compensation payment presented to his family and the freeing of a believing slave. And whoever does not find [one or cannot afford to buy one] - then [instead], a fast for two months consecutively, [seeking] acceptance of repentance from Allah. And Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I mai no és per a un creient matar un creient excepte per equivocació. I qui mata un creient per equivocació - llavors l'alliberament d'un esclau que creien i un pagament d'indemnitzacions presentat per la família del difunt [cal] llevat que donen [el seu dret com] caritat. Però si el difunt era d'un poble en guerra amb vostè i va ser un creient - llavors [només] l'alliberament d'un creient que esclau; i si era d'un poble amb qui té un tractat - llavors una paga de compensació presentaran a la seva família i l'alliberament d'un esclau que creien. I qui no troba [un o no pot permetre el luxe de comprar un]- llavors [en], un ràpid durant dos mesos consecutivament, [buscar] acceptació de penediment d'Allah. I Allah és mai saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: But whoever kills a believer intentionally - his recompense is Hell, wherein he will abide eternally, and Allah has become angry with him and has cursed him and has prepared for him a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Però qui mata un creient intencionalment - la seva recompensa és l'infern, en la qual ell es queda eternament, i Allah ha s'enfaden amb ell i ell ha maleït i ha preparat per a ell un gran càstig.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you go forth [to fight] in the cause of Allah, investigate; and do not say to one who gives you [a greeting of] peace "You are not a believer," aspiring for the goods of worldly life; for with Allah are many acquisitions. You [yourselves] were like that before; then Allah conferred His favor upon you, so investigate. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, quan vostè vagi endavant [a combatre] en la causa d'Allah, investigar; i no dic a qui li [una salutació de] dóna pau "vostè no és un creient," aspirants dels béns de la vida mundana; per amb Allah són moltes adquisicions. [Vosaltres] fos com allò abans; llavors Allah que confereix el favor a vostè, així que investigar. Realment Allah és mai, amb el que fas, conèixer.

trans-unit.source: Not equal are those believers remaining [at home] - other than the disabled - and the mujahideen, [who strive and fight] in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives. Allah has preferred the mujahideen through their wealth and their lives over those who remain [behind], by degrees. And to both Allah has promised the best [reward]. But Allah has preferred the mujahideen over those who remain [behind] with a great reward -
trans-unit.target: No igual són els creients restants [a casa] - que les persones amb discapacitat - i mujahidins, [que esforçar-se i lluitar] en la causa d'Allah amb el seu patrimoni i les seves vides. Allah ha preferit mujahidins a través del seu patrimoni i les seves vides sobre els que es queden [darrere], per graus. I per tant Allah ha promès el millor [recompensa]. Però Allah ha preferit mujahidins sobre els que es queden [darrere] amb una gran recompensa-

trans-unit.source: Degrees [of high position] from Him and forgiveness and mercy. And Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Graus [d'alta posició] d'ell i el perdó i la misericòrdia. I Allah és alguna vegada Clement i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those whom the angels take [in death] while wronging themselves - [the angels] will say, "In what [condition] were you?" They will say, "We were oppressed in the land." The angels will say, "Was not the earth of Allah spacious [enough] for you to emigrate therein?" For those, their refuge is Hell - and evil it is as a destination.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells a qui els àngels prendre [a mort] mentre que wronging-se - [àngels] dirà, "en què [condició] era?" Es dirà, "Que estaven oprimits de la terra". Àngels dirà, "No era la terra d'Allah [prou] espaioses per a emigrar en ell?" Per a aquells, seu refugi és l'infern - i mal és com a destinació.

trans-unit.source: Except for the oppressed among men, women and children who cannot devise a plan nor are they directed to a way -
trans-unit.target: Excepció de l'oprimit entre homes, dones i nens que no pot idear un pla ni es dirigirien a una forma -

trans-unit.source: For those it is expected that Allah will pardon them, and Allah is ever Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Per a aquells que s'espera que Allah es perdoni-los, i Allah és mai perdó i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: And whoever emigrates for the cause of Allah will find on the earth many [alternative] locations and abundance. And whoever leaves his home as an emigrant to Allah and His Messenger and then death overtakes him - his reward has already become incumbent upon Allah. And Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I qui EMIGRA per la causa d'Allah es troba sobre la terra moltes localitzacions [alternatius] i l'abundància. I qui surt de casa seva com a immigrant a Allah i el seu Missatger i després la mort li arriba - la seva recompensa ja ha esdevingut incumbeixen Allah. I Allah és alguna vegada Clement i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: And when you travel throughout the land, there is no blame upon you for shortening the prayer, [especially] if you fear that those who disbelieve may disrupt [or attack] you. Indeed, the disbelievers are ever to you a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: I quan viatges per tota la terra, no hi ha cap culpa a vostè per escurçar l'oració, [especialment] si té por que els que dubten pot interrompre [o atacar]. De fet, els disbelievers són mai a vostè un clar enemic.

trans-unit.source: And when you are among them and lead them in prayer, let a group of them stand [in prayer] with you and let them carry their arms. And when they have prostrated, let them be [in position] behind you and have the other group come forward which has not [yet] prayed and let them pray with you, taking precaution and carrying their arms. Those who disbelieve wish that you would neglect your weapons and your baggage so they could come down upon you in one [single] attack. But there is no blame upon you, if you are troubled by rain or are ill, for putting down your arms, but take precaution. Indeed, Allah has prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: I quan estan entre ells i els porten a la pregària, deixar que un grup d'ells peu [en l'oració] amb vostè i deixar-los a portar els braços. I quan ells han postrat, deixar-los estar [en posició] darrere de tu i l'altre grup arribat cap endavant que ha no [encara] pregat i deixar-los pregar amb vostè, tenint la precaució i portar els braços. Els que dubten desitgem que vols descuidat les seves armes i el seu equipatge així que podien baixar a vostè en un atac [sol]. Però hi ha cap culpa a vostè, si vostè està preocupat per la pluja o estan malalts, per posar les seves armes, però precaucions. De fet, Allah ha preparat pels disbelievers un càstig humiliant.

trans-unit.source: And when you have completed the prayer, remember Allah standing, sitting, or [lying] on your sides. But when you become secure, re-establish [regular] prayer. Indeed, prayer has been decreed upon the believers a decree of specified times.
trans-unit.target: I quan hagueu completat l'oració, recordeu Allah de peu, asseguts o [sent] en els seus costats. Però quan et converteixes en segura, restablir l'oració [regular]. De fet, oració ha estat decretat sobre els creients un decret de especificat vegades.

trans-unit.source: And do not weaken in pursuit of the enemy. If you should be suffering - so are they suffering as you are suffering, but you expect from Allah that which they expect not. And Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I no debilitar l'enemic en la recerca. Si vostè ha estar patint - així que estan patint com vostè està patint, però esperar des d'Allah que no esperen. I Allah és mai saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], the Book in truth so you may judge between the people by that which Allah has shown you. And do not be for the deceitful an advocate.
trans-unit.target: De fet, ens han revelat a vostè, [O Muhammad], el llibre en veritat així vostè pot jutjar entre les persones per el que Allah ha mostrat. I no ser per a l'enganyosa un defensor.

trans-unit.source: And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I demanar perdó d'Allah. De fet, Allah és alguna vegada Clement i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: And do not argue on behalf of those who deceive themselves. Indeed, Allah loves not one who is a habitually sinful deceiver.
trans-unit.target: I no discutir en nom d'aquells que enganyar-se. De fet, Allah estima no un que és un pecat habitualment enganyador.

trans-unit.source: They conceal [their evil intentions and deeds] from the people, but they cannot conceal [them] from Allah, and He is with them [in His knowledge] when they spend the night in such as He does not accept of speech. And ever is Allah, of what they do, encompassing.
trans-unit.target: Amaguen [seves intencions mals i escriptures] de la gent, però no pot amagar [que] des d'Allah, i és amb ells [en el seu coneixement] Quan van passar la nit en com ell no accepta d'expressió. I mai és Allah, del que van fer, que abasta.

trans-unit.source: Here you are - those who argue on their behalf in [this] worldly life - but who will argue with Allah for them on the Day of Resurrection, or who will [then] be their representative?
trans-unit.target: Aquí ets - aquells que argumenten en nom seu en [aquesta] vida mundana - sinó que argumenten amb Allah per a ells el dia de resurrecció o [llavors] qui serà el seu representant?

trans-unit.source: And whoever does a wrong or wrongs himself but then seeks forgiveness of Allah will find Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I qui fa un mal o wrongs mateix però llavors busca el perdó d'Allah ha perdonar a Allah i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And whoever commits a sin only earns it against himself. And Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I només el qui comet un pecat guanya contra si mateix. I Allah és mai saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: But whoever earns an offense or a sin and then blames it on an innocent [person] has taken upon himself a slander and manifest sin.
trans-unit.target: Però qui guanya un delicte o un pecat i llavors culpa de un innocent [persona] ha considerat a si mateix un pecat calúmnia i manifest.

trans-unit.source: And if it was not for the favor of Allah upon you, [O Muhammad], and His mercy, a group of them would have determined to mislead you. But they do not mislead except themselves, and they will not harm you at all. And Allah has revealed to you the Book and wisdom and has taught you that which you did not know. And ever has the favor of Allah upon you been great.
trans-unit.target: I si no era pel favor d'Allah, [O Muhammad], i la seva misericòrdia, un grup d'ells vols han determinat enganyar-vos. Però no indueixi a error excepte si mateixos, i farà no mal en absolut. I Allah ha revelat a vostè el llibre i saviesa i t'ha ensenyat que no Sabíeu. I mai té el favor d'al là sobre tu ha gran.

trans-unit.source: No good is there in much of their private conversation, except for those who enjoin charity or that which is right or conciliation between people. And whoever does that seeking means to the approval of Allah - then We are going to give him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: No bo hi ha en gran part de la seva conversa privada, excepte per a aquells que demanen la caritat o el que és dret o conciliació entre les persones. I qui fa aquell mitjà que busquen a l'aprovació d'Allah - llavors anem a donar-li una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And whoever opposes the Messenger after guidance has become clear to him and follows other than the way of the believers - We will give him what he has taken and drive him into Hell, and evil it is as a destination.
trans-unit.target: I qui s'oposa el Missatger després orientació ha quedat clar per ell i segueix que no sigui a la manera dels creients - anem donar-li el que ha tingut i portar-lo a l'infern, i mal és com a destinació.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not forgive association with Him, but He forgives what is less than that for whom He wills. And he who associates others with Allah has certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah no perdona associació amb ell, però ell perdona què és menor que per a qui ell voluntats. I certament el que altres associa Allah ha anat molt per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: They call upon instead of Him none but female [deities], and they [actually] call upon none but a rebellious Satan.
trans-unit.target: Convoquen seu lloc cap però dona [Déu] i ells [en realitat] crida a cap excepte un rebel Satan.

trans-unit.source: Whom Allah has cursed. For he had said, "I will surely take from among Your servants a specific portion.
trans-unit.target: Qui Allah ha maleït. Per a ell havia dit, "jo segurament tindrà entre els teus servents una part específica.

trans-unit.source: And I will mislead them, and I will arouse in them [sinful] desires, and I will command them so they will slit the ears of cattle, and I will command them so they will change the creation of Allah." And whoever takes Satan as an ally instead of Allah has certainly sustained a clear loss.
trans-unit.target: Es enganyar-los i despertarà en ells [pecaminós] desitjos i es Mano ells així que es qui les orelles de bestiar, i es comanda-los així que canviarà la creació d'Allah." I qui es faci amb Satan com un aliat en comptes d'Allah certament ha mantingut una pèrdua evident.

trans-unit.source: Satan promises them and arouses desire in them. But Satan does not promise them except delusion.
trans-unit.target: Satanàs promet-los i desperta desig en ells. Però Satanàs no prometo ells excepte engany.

trans-unit.source: The refuge of those will be Hell, and they will not find from it an escape.
trans-unit.target: El refugi d'aquells serà l'infern, i no es troba d'ella una fuita.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who believe and do righteous deeds - We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. [It is] the promise of Allah, [which is] truth, and who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
trans-unit.target: Però els que creuen i fer els justos fets - anem a admetre-les als jardins sota quin cabal de rius, on es queda per sempre. [És] la promesa d'Allah, [que] veritat i qui és el més veraç que Allah en la declaració.

trans-unit.source: Paradise is not [obtained] by your wishful thinking nor by that of the People of the Scripture. Whoever does a wrong will be recompensed for it, and he will not find besides Allah a protector or a helper.
trans-unit.target: Paradís no és [obtinguts] els seus lusions ni per la de la gent de l'escriptura. Qui fa un mal es recompensava per a això, i no trobarem a més d'Allah un protector o un ajudant.

trans-unit.source: And whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer - those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged, [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
trans-unit.target: I qui fa justos fets, ja sigui masculí o femení, mentre que un creient - aquells voluntat entrar en paradís i es no ser tractat injustament, [encara més] la palla en una llavor de data.

trans-unit.source: And who is better in religion than one who submits himself to Allah while being a doer of good and follows the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth? And Allah took Abraham as an intimate friend.
trans-unit.target: I qui és el millor en la religió que qui se sotmet a Allah mentre que un faci el bé i segueix la religió d'Abraham, inclinant cap a la veritat? I Allah agafava Abraham com un amic íntim.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And ever is Allah, of all things, encompassing.
trans-unit.target: I per Allah pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. I mai Allah, de totes les coses, que abasta.

trans-unit.source: And they request from you, [O Muhammad], a [legal] ruling concerning women. Say, "Allah gives you a ruling about them and [about] what has been recited to you in the Book concerning the orphan girls to whom you do not give what is decreed for them - and [yet] you desire to marry them - and concerning the oppressed among children and that you maintain for orphans [their rights] in justice." And whatever you do of good - indeed, Allah is ever Knowing of it.
trans-unit.target: I demanen de vostè, [O Muhammad], [legal] dictamen sobre les dones. Dir: "Allah li dóna una sentència sobre ells i [sobre] que ha estat recitat a vostè en el llibre sobre les nenes orfes a qui no els donis el que es va decretar per a ells - i [encara] desitja casar-se amb ells - i pel que fa a l'oprimit entre nens i que es mantenen per a orfes [els drets] en justícia." I el que faci de bo - de fet, Allah està saber d'ella.

trans-unit.source: And if a woman fears from her husband contempt or evasion, there is no sin upon them if they make terms of settlement between them - and settlement is best. And present in [human] souls is stinginess. But if you do good and fear Allah - then indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: I si un temors de la dona del seu marit menyspreu o l'evasió, hi ha cap pecat a ells si fan condicions d'assentament entre ells - i liquidació és millor. I actualment en ànimes [humans] és remarcable avarícia. Però si fer el bé i la por d'Allah - llavors fet Allah és mai, amb el que fas, conèixer.

trans-unit.source: And you will never be able to be equal [in feeling] between wives, even if you should strive [to do so]. So do not incline completely [toward one] and leave another hanging. And if you amend [your affairs] and fear Allah - then indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I vostè mai serà capaç de ser d'igual [sentiment] entre les dones, fins i tot si vostè ha d'aspirar [-ho]. Així no inclinem completament [cap a una] i deixar penjant d'un altre. I si modificar [el assumptes] i por d'Allah - de fet, llavors Allah és alguna vegada Clement i perdonant.

trans-unit.source: But if they separate [by divorce], Allah will enrich each [of them] from His abundance. And ever is Allah Encompassing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Però si que separar [el divorci], Allah enriquiran cadascuna [] des de la seva abundància. I mai és Allah que abasta i savi.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And We have instructed those who were given the Scripture before you and yourselves to fear Allah. But if you disbelieve - then to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And ever is Allah Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: I per Allah pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. I ens han encomanat els que van rebre les escriptures abans que i vosaltres mateixos per por d'Allah. Però si vostè no creuen - llavors a Allah pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. I mai és Allah lliures de necessitat i Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: I per Allah pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. I prou és Allah com triturador d'Afers.

trans-unit.source: If He wills, He can do away with you, O people, and bring others [in your place]. And ever is Allah competent to do that.
trans-unit.target: Si es vol, pot acabar amb vostè, O gent i portar a altres [en el seu lloc]. I mai és competent per fer que Allah.

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires the reward of this world - then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And ever is Allah Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Qui vol tenir la recompensa d'aquest món - llavors amb Allah és la recompensa d'aquest món i el més enllà. I mai és Allah escoltar i veure.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm in justice, witnesses for Allah, even if it be against yourselves or parents and relatives. Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is more worthy of both. So follow not [personal] inclination, lest you not be just. And if you distort [your testimony] or refuse [to give it], then indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, ser persistentment firma dempeus en justícia, testimonis per Allah, encara seria contra vosaltres mateixos o als pares i familiars. Si un és ric o pobre, al là és més digne d'ambdós. Per seguir no inclinació [personal], no sigui que no es només. I si vostè distorsionar [el seu testimoni] o refusar [es], llavors en efecte Allah és mai, amb el que fas, conèixer.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Book that He sent down upon His Messenger and the Scripture which He sent down before. And whoever disbelieves in Allah, His angels, His books, His messengers, and the Last Day has certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, creuen en Allah i el seu Missatger i el llibre que va enviar sobre seu Missatger i l'escriptura que ell empresonat abans. I qui disbelieves en Allah, seus Àngels, els seus llibres, seus missatgers i l'últim dia sens dubte ha anat molt per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed then disbelieved, then believed, then disbelieved, and then increased in disbelief - never will Allah forgive them, nor will He guide them to a way.
trans-unit.target: De fet, qui han cregut llavors dubtaven, llavors es creia, llavors dubtaven i llavors va augmentar amb incredulitat - mai Allah perdonin-los, ni va guiïn cap a una manera.

trans-unit.source: Give tidings to the hypocrites that there is for them a painful punishment -
trans-unit.target: Donar la noticia als hipòcrites que hi ha per a ells un dolor càstig-

trans-unit.source: Those who take disbelievers as allies instead of the believers. Do they seek with them honor [through power]? But indeed, honor belongs to Allah entirely.
trans-unit.target: Aquells que prenen disbelievers com aliats en lloc de creients. Tracten amb ells honor [a través de poder]? Però de fet, honor pertany a Allah totalment.

trans-unit.source: And it has already come down to you in the Book that when you hear the verses of Allah [recited], they are denied [by them] and ridiculed; so do not sit with them until they enter into another conversation. Indeed, you would then be like them. Indeed Allah will gather the hypocrites and disbelievers in Hell all together -
trans-unit.target: I té ja es redueixen a vostè en el llibre quan sent els versos d'Allah [recitat], que són negats [per] i ridiculitzat; Així que no se sentin amb ells fins que entri en una altra conversa. De fet, que llavors seria com ells. Realment Allah reunirà els hipòcrites i disbelievers a l'infern tots junt-

trans-unit.source: Those who wait [and watch] you. Then if you gain a victory from Allah, they say, "Were we not with you?" But if the disbelievers have a success, they say [to them], "Did we not gain the advantage over you, but we protected you from the believers?" Allah will judge between [all of] you on the Day of Resurrection, and never will Allah give the disbelievers over the believers a way [to overcome them].
trans-unit.target: Qui esperi [veure] vostè. Llavors si guanyes una victòria d'Allah, diuen, "no fossin amb vostè?" Però si els disbelievers té un èxit, diuen [amb ells], "no va guanyar l'avantatge sobre vosaltres, però hem protegit els creients?" Allah considerarà entre [tots] en el dia de resurrecció i mai serà Allah li disbelievers sobre els creients forma [per superar-los].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hypocrites [think to] deceive Allah, but He is deceiving them. And when they stand for prayer, they stand lazily, showing [themselves to] the people and not remembering Allah except a little,
trans-unit.target: De fet, els hipòcrites [crec que] enganyar d'Allah, però ell està enganyant a ells. I quan van posar per a la pregària, es paren mandrosament, [si] mostrant la gent i no recordant Allah excepte una mica,

trans-unit.source: Wavering between them, [belonging] neither to the believers nor to the disbelievers. And whoever Allah leaves astray - never will you find for him a way.
trans-unit.target: Vacil lacions entre ells, [de] ni els creients ni els disbelievers. I qui Allah deixa per mal camí - mai es trobarà per a ell un camí.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not take the disbelievers as allies instead of the believers. Do you wish to give Allah against yourselves a clear case?
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, no prengueu disbelievers com aliats en lloc de creients. Voleu donar Allah contra vosaltres mateixos un cas clar?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Fire - and never will you find for them a helper -
trans-unit.target: De fet, els hipòcrites estarà en les profunditats més baix del foc - i mai es trobarà per a ells un ajudant-

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent, correct themselves, hold fast to Allah, and are sincere in their religion for Allah, for those will be with the believers. And Allah is going to give the believers a great reward.
trans-unit.target: A excepció d'aquells que penedir-se, corregir-se, mantenir ràpid a Allah i és sincer en la seva religió d'Allah, per a aquells serà amb els creients. I Allah va a donar els creients una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: What would Allah do with your punishment if you are grateful and believe? And ever is Allah Appreciative and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Què Allah faria amb el seu càstig si estem agraïts i creure? I mai és Allah agraïda i saber.

trans-unit.source: Allah does not like the public mention of evil except by one who has been wronged. And ever is Allah Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Allah no li agrada el públic menció de mal excepte per qui ha estat tractat injustament. I mai és oïda d'Allah i saber.

trans-unit.source: If [instead] you show [some] good or conceal it or pardon an offense - indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Si [lloc] Mostra [alguns] bona o ocultar o perdó un delicte - de fet, Allah és mai perdó i Competent.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve in Allah and His messengers and wish to discriminate between Allah and His messengers and say, "We believe in some and disbelieve in others," and wish to adopt a way in between -
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que no creuen en Allah i el seu missatgers i desig a discriminar entre Allah i el seu missatgers i dir: "Creiem en alguns i dubten en d'altres," i volen adoptar una manera entre-

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, truly. And We have prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Aquells són disbelievers, realment. I hem preparat per disbelievers un càstig humiliant.

trans-unit.source: But they who believe in Allah and His messengers and do not discriminate between any of them - to those He is going to give their rewards. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Però es que creuen en Allah i els seus missatgers i discrimina entre qualsevol d'ells - els va donar la seva recompensa. I mai és perdonar a Allah i Clement.

trans-unit.source: The People of the Scripture ask you to bring down to them a book from the heaven. But they had asked of Moses [even] greater than that and said, "Show us Allah outright," so the thunderbolt struck them for their wrongdoing. Then they took the calf [for worship] after clear evidences had come to them, and We pardoned that. And We gave Moses a clear authority.
trans-unit.target: La gent de l'escriptura haureu de baixar-los un llibre del cel. Però havien demanat de Moses [encara] més gran que i va dir, "Ens mostren Allah descarades," perquè el llamp colpejat per les seves irregularitats. Llavors van prendre el vedell [per al culte] després de clear evidències havia arribat a ells, i hem perdonat que. I hem donat Moses una autoritat clar.

trans-unit.source: And We raised over them the mount for [refusal of] their covenant; and We said to them, "Enter the gate bowing humbly", and We said to them, "Do not transgress on the sabbath", and We took from them a solemn covenant.
trans-unit.target: I hem plantejat sobre ells el Puig de [denegació de] seu pacte; i ens va dir a ells, "Entrar a la porta d'inclinar-se humilment" i ens va dir: "no transgredir el dissabte", i ens prenien d'ells un pacte solemne.

trans-unit.source: And [We cursed them] for their breaking of the covenant and their disbelief in the signs of Allah and their killing of the prophets without right and their saying, "Our hearts are wrapped". Rather, Allah has sealed them because of their disbelief, so they believe not, except for a few.
trans-unit.target: I [hem maleït ells] per la seva ruptura del Pacte i la seva incredulitat en els senyals d'Allah i seu assassinat dels profetes sense dret i diu, "nostres cors s'embolica". Més aviat, Allah ha segellat-los per la seva incredulitat, perquè creuen no, excepte uns pocs.

trans-unit.source: And [We cursed them] for their disbelief and their saying against Mary a great slander,
trans-unit.target: I [hem maleït ells] per la seva incredulitat i la seva dient contra Mary una calúmnia gran,

trans-unit.source: And [for] their saying, "Indeed, we have killed the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, the messenger of Allah." And they did not kill him, nor did they crucify him; but [another] was made to resemble him to them. And indeed, those who differ over it are in doubt about it. They have no knowledge of it except the following of assumption. And they did not kill him, for certain.
trans-unit.target: I [per] seu dient: "de fet, ens han matat el Messiah, Jesús, el fill de Mary, el Missatger d'Allah." I no matar-lo, ni feia van crucificar-lo; però [un altre] es va fer a assemblar-se-li a ells. I de fet, són aquells que difereixen sobre això en dubte. Tenen cap coneixement de, excepte el seguiment de l'Assumpció. I no matar-lo, per a determinats.

trans-unit.source: Rather, Allah raised him to Himself. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Més aviat, Allah criar a si mateix. I mai és Allah exaltat en força i savi.

trans-unit.source: And there is none from the People of the Scripture but that he will surely believe in Jesus before his death. And on the Day of Resurrection he will be against them a witness.
trans-unit.target: I hi ha cap de la gent de l'escriptura però que sens dubte va a creure en Jesús abans de morir. I el dia de resurrecció serà contra ells un testimoni.

trans-unit.source: For wrongdoing on the part of the Jews, We made unlawful for them [certain] good foods which had been lawful to them, and for their averting from the way of Allah many [people],
trans-unit.target: Per irregularitats per part dels jueus, hem fet il·legal per a ells [certa] aliments bons, que havia estat legals per a ells, i per d'evitar de la manera d'Allah moltes [persones],

trans-unit.source: And [for] their taking of usury while they had been forbidden from it, and their consuming of the people's wealth unjustly. And we have prepared for the disbelievers among them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: I [per] la presa d'usura mentre que havia estat prohibida des d'això, i de consumir de la riquesa de la gent injustament. I hem preparat per disbelievers entre ells un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: But those firm in knowledge among them and the believers believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you. And the establishers of prayer [especially] and the givers of zakah and the believers in Allah and the Last Day - those We will give a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Però aquells firma en coneixement entre ells i els creients creuen en què ha estat revelat a vostè, [O Muhammad], i el que es va revelar abans. I la establishers de l'oració [especialment] i donants del zakah i creients en Allah i el darrer dia - els donarem una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], as We revealed to Noah and the prophets after him. And we revealed to Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, the Descendants, Jesus, Job, Jonah, Aaron, and Solomon, and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].
trans-unit.target: De fet, ens han revelat, [O Muhammad], com ens va revelar a Noè i els profetes després d'ell. I ens va revelar a Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, els descendents, Jesús, feina, Jonàs, Aaron i Salomó i a David ens va regalar el llibre [de Salms].

trans-unit.source: And [We sent] messengers about whom We have related [their stories] to you before and messengers about whom We have not related to you. And Allah spoke to Moses with [direct] speech.
trans-unit.target: I [hem enviat] missatgers sobre qui ens han relacionat amb [seves històries] abans i missatgers sobre qui que no explico a vostè. I Allah va parlar a Moses amb discurs [en directe].

trans-unit.source: [We sent] messengers as bringers of good tidings and warners so that mankind will have no argument against Allah after the messengers. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: [Hem enviat] missatgers com a missatgers de la bona nova i última de manera que la humanitat haurà cap argument contra Allah després de missatgers. I mai és Allah exaltat en força i savi.

trans-unit.source: But Allah bears witness to that which He has revealed to you. He has sent it down with His knowledge, and the angels bear witness [as well]. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.
trans-unit.target: Però Allah testimonia allò que ell ha revelat a vostè. Ell ha enviat cap avall amb el seu coneixement, i els àngels són testimoni [també]. I prou és Allah com a testimoni.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah have certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que dubten i evitar [persones] de la manera d'Allah certament han anat molt per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and commit wrong [or injustice] - never will Allah forgive them, nor will He guide them to a path.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que dubten i cometre malament [o injustícia] - mai es Allah perdonar, ni es va guiar a un camí.

trans-unit.source: Except the path of Hell; they will abide therein forever. And that, for Allah, is [always] easy.
trans-unit.target: Excepte el camí de l'infern; es queda aquí per sempre. I que, per Allah, [sempre] fàcil.

trans-unit.source: O Mankind, the Messenger has come to you with the truth from your Lord, so believe; it is better for you. But if you disbelieve - then indeed, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. And ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O la humanitat, el Missatger ha arribat a vostè amb la veritat del seu Senyor, així cregui; és millor per a vostè. Però si vostè no creuen - de fet, llavors a Allah pertany el que està en el cel i la terra. I mai és assenyat i sabent Allah.

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, do not commit excess in your religion or say about Allah except the truth. The Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, was but a messenger of Allah and His word which He directed to Mary and a soul [created at a command] from Him. So believe in Allah and His messengers. And do not say, "Three"; desist - it is better for you. Indeed, Allah is but one God. Exalted is He above having a son. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: O gent de l'escriptura, no cometre l'excés en la seva religió o diuen sobre Allah excepte la veritat. El Messiah, Jesús, el fill de Mary, era excepte un Missatger d'Allah i la seva paraula que dirigeix a Maria i una ànima [creada a una comanda] d'ell. Així cregui en Allah i els seus missatgers. I no diuen, "Tres"; desistir - és millor per a vostè. De fet, Allah és però un Déu. Exaltat és ell damunt tenir un fill. A ell pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. I prou és Allah com triturador d'Afers.

trans-unit.source: Never would the Messiah disdain to be a servant of Allah, nor would the angels near [to Him]. And whoever disdains His worship and is arrogant - He will gather them to Himself all together.
trans-unit.target: Vols mai el menyspreu Messies ser servent d'Allah, ni vols els àngels a prop [a ell]. I el que disdains la seva adoració i és orgullós - va reunir-se ells a si mateix tots junts.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, He will give them in full their rewards and grant them extra from His bounty. But as for those who disdained and were arrogant, He will punish them with a painful punishment, and they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: I pel que fa a aquells que creien i feien actes justos, donar-los en la seva totalitat doctrines i concedir-los supletoris des de la seva generositat. Però els que menyspreava i eren arrogants, va va a castigar-los amb un dolor càstig, i no trobarà per si mateixos a més d'Allah qualsevol protector o ajudant.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, there has come to you a conclusive proof from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.
trans-unit.target: O la humanitat, hi ha vingut a vostè una prova concloent del seu Senyor, i hem enviat a vostè una llum clara.

trans-unit.source: So those who believe in Allah and hold fast to Him - He will admit them to mercy from Himself and bounty and guide them to Himself on a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Així que aquells que creuen en Allah i agafador ràpid li - va admetre-los Mercè de si mateix i recompenses i guiar-los a si mateix en un camí directe.

trans-unit.source: They request from you a [legal] ruling. Say, "Allah gives you a ruling concerning one having neither descendants nor ascendants [as heirs]." If a man dies, leaving no child but [only] a sister, she will have half of what he left. And he inherits from her if she [dies and] has no child. But if there are two sisters [or more], they will have two-thirds of what he left. If there are both brothers and sisters, the male will have the share of two females. Allah makes clear to you [His law], lest you go astray. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Demanen de vostè una sentència [legal]. Dir: "Allah li dóna una sentència que concernia un haver descendents ni ascendants [com hereus]." Si un home mor, deixant cap nen però [només] una germana, ella té la meitat de què va deixar. I va heretar del seu si ella [mor i] té cap fill. Però si hi ha dues germanes [o més], tindrà dos terços dels que va deixar. Si hi ha dos germans i germanes, el mascle tindrà la quota de dues femelles. Allah deixa clar a vostè [el dret], perquè no s'extravien. I Allah està saber de totes les coses.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fulfill [all] contracts. Lawful for you are the animals of grazing livestock except for that which is recited to you [in this Qur'an] - hunting not being permitted while you are in the state of ihram. Indeed, Allah ordains what He intends.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, compleixes [tots] contractes. Legals per a tu són els animals de pastura del bestiar excepte que es recita a vostè [en aquest Alcorà] - caça no està permès mentre esteu en l'estat de ihram. De fet, Allah estableix què pensa.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not violate the rites of Allah or [the sanctity of] the sacred month or [neglect the marking of] the sacrificial animals and garlanding [them] or [violate the safety of] those coming to the Sacred House seeking bounty from their Lord and [His] approval. But when you come out of ihram, then [you may] hunt. And do not let the hatred of a people for having obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram lead you to transgress. And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, no violen els ritus d'Allah o [la santedat de] mes sagrat o [descuidar el marcat de] els animals de sacrificis i garlanding [ells] o [violar la seguretat de] aquells que vénen a la casa Sagrada buscant recompensa del seu Senyor i [seva] aprovació. Però quan vostè surt ihram, llavors [poden] caçar. I no deixi que l'odi d'un poble per a vostè haver obstruït des d'al-Masjid al-Haram portar a transgredir. I cooperar en la justícia i de pietat, però no cooperar en el pecat i l'agressió. I la por d'Allah; de fet, Allah és greu en pena.

trans-unit.source: Prohibited to you are dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah, and [those animals] killed by strangling or by a violent blow or by a head-long fall or by the goring of horns, and those from which a wild animal has eaten, except what you [are able to] slaughter [before its death], and those which are sacrificed on stone altars, and [prohibited is] that you seek decision through divining arrows. That is grave disobedience. This day those who disbelieve have despaired of [defeating] your religion; so fear them not, but fear Me. This day I have perfected for you your religion and completed My favor upon you and have approved for you Islam as religion. But whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Prohibit els animals morts, sang, la carn de porcí i que s'ha dedicat a altre que Allah, i [els animals] assassinats per estrangulament o per un cop violent o per una caiguda de responsable de llarg o per l'enganxada de banyes i aquells que ha menjat un animal salvatge, excepte el que esteu [capaç] matança [abans de la seva mort] i els que siguin sacrificats en pedra altars i [prohibit és] que busqueu decisió mitjançant divining fletxes. Thats desobediència greu. Aquest dia els que dubten han va desesperar de [derrotar] la religió; així por ells no, però la por de mi. Aquest dia tinc perfeccionat per a vostè la seva religió i completar el meu favor a vostè i han aprovat per a vostè l'Islam com a religió. Però qui es veu obligat per la greu fam amb cap inclinació al pecat - llavors fet, Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], what has been made lawful for them. Say, "Lawful for you are [all] good foods and [game caught by] what you have trained of hunting animals which you train as Allah has taught you. So eat of what they catch for you, and mention the name of Allah upon it, and fear Allah." Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Demanen que, [O Muhammad], el que s'ha fet legal per a ells. Dir, "legal ets aliments bons [tot] i [joc atrapat per] què vostè haver entrenat de caça d'animals que entrenar com Allah ha ensenyat. Així que menjar de què van agafar per a vostè, esmentar el nom d'Allah sobre ella i por d'Allah." De fet, Allah és ràpida en compte.

trans-unit.source: This day [all] good foods have been made lawful, and the food of those who were given the Scripture is lawful for you and your food is lawful for them. And [lawful in marriage are] chaste women from among the believers and chaste women from among those who were given the Scripture before you, when you have given them their due compensation, desiring chastity, not unlawful sexual intercourse or taking [secret] lovers. And whoever denies the faith - his work has become worthless, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Aquest dia [tot] bé els aliments s'han fet legals, i el menjar d'aquells que van rebre l'escriptura és legal per a vostè i el seu aliment és legal per a ells.
