trans-unit.target: O profeta, dir a qui estigui a les seves mans dels captius, "si Allah sap [qualsevol] bona en els seus cors, aquest li donarà [una mica] millor que el que es va prendre de vostè, i ell et perdonarà; i Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: But if they intend to betray you - then they have already betrayed Allah before, and He empowered [you] over them. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Però si tenen la intenció de trair-llavors ja han traït Allah abans, i va facultar [que] sobre ells. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and emigrated and fought with their wealth and lives in the cause of Allah and those who gave shelter and aided - they are allies of one another. But those who believed and did not emigrate - for you there is no guardianship of them until they emigrate. And if they seek help of you for the religion, then you must help, except against a people between yourselves and whom is a treaty. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han cregut i emigrar i va lluitar amb la seva riquesa i vida a la causa d'Allah i qui va donar refugi i ajudats - són aliats de l'altra. Però els que creien i no emigrar - per no hi ha cap tutela d'ells fins que van emigrar. I si que busquen l'ajuda de vostè per la religió, llavors vostè ha d'ajudar, excepte contra un poble entre vosaltres i qui és un tractat. I Allah és veure del que fas.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved are allies of one another. If you do not do so, there will be fitnah on earth and great corruption.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven són aliats de l'altra. Si no ho fa, no hi haurà fitnah a la terra i la gran corrupció.

trans-unit.source: But those who have believed and emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah and those who gave shelter and aided - it is they who are the believers, truly. For them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: Però aquells que han cregut i emigrar i va lluitar en la causa d'Allah i qui va donar refugi i ajudats - són ells que estan veritablement creients,. Per a ells és el perdó i la prestació noble.

trans-unit.source: And those who believed after [the initial emigration] and emigrated and fought with you - they are of you. But those of [blood] relationship are more entitled [to inheritance] in the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: I els que creien després de [l'emigració inicial] i van emigrar i van lluitar amb vostè - són vostès. Però aquells de relació [sang] tenen més dret [a herència] en el decret d'Allah. De fet, Allah està saber de totes les coses.

trans-unit.source: [This is a declaration of] disassociation, from Allah and His Messenger, to those with whom you had made a treaty among the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: [Això és una declaració de] desvinculació, des d'Allah i el seu Missatger, a aquells amb qui li havia fet un tractat entre els politeistes.

trans-unit.source: So travel freely, [O disbelievers], throughout the land [during] four months but know that you cannot cause failure to Allah and that Allah will disgrace the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Així viatjar lliurement, [O disbelievers], per tota la terra [en] quatre mesos però saber que vostè no pot causar falla a Allah i que Allah es vergonya disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And [it is] an announcement from Allah and His Messenger to the people on the day of the greater pilgrimage that Allah is disassociated from the disbelievers, and [so is] His Messenger. So if you repent, that is best for you; but if you turn away - then know that you will not cause failure to Allah. And give tidings to those who disbelieve of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: I [és] un anunci d'Allah i el seu Missatger al poble el dia de la Romeria més que Allah és dissociades de disbelievers i [és] seu Missatger. Així que si vostè es penedeix, que és millor per a vostè; però si que s'allunyen - llavors sap que vostè no causar insuficiència a Allah. I donar noticia per aquells que dubten d'un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: Excepted are those with whom you made a treaty among the polytheists and then they have not been deficient toward you in anything or supported anyone against you; so complete for them their treaty until their term [has ended]. Indeed, Allah loves the righteous [who fear Him].
trans-unit.target: Exceptuats són aquells amb qui es va signar un tractat entre el politeistes, i llavors no tenen estat deficient cap a vostè en qualsevol cosa o recolzat qualsevol contra tu; tan complet per a ells de tractat fins el mandat [ha acabat]. De fet, Allah estima els justos [que li tinc por].

trans-unit.source: And when the sacred months have passed, then kill the polytheists wherever you find them and capture them and besiege them and sit in wait for them at every place of ambush. But if they should repent, establish prayer, and give zakah, let them [go] on their way. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I quan els mesos sagrats hagin superat, llavors matar la politeistes allà on vostè trobar i capturar-los i assetjar-los i seure a l'espera per a ells en cada lloc d'emboscada. Però si cal penedir-se, establir l'oració i donar zakah, deixar-los [anar] en el seu camí. En efecte, Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And if any one of the polytheists seeks your protection, then grant him protection so that he may hear the words of Allah. Then deliver him to his place of safety. That is because they are a people who do not know.
trans-unit.target: I si un qualsevol de les politeistes busca la seva protecció, llavors concedir-li protecció per tal que es pot escoltar les paraules d'Allah. Després lliurar-lo al seu lloc de seguretat. Això és perquè són un poble que no sap.

trans-unit.source: How can there be for the polytheists a treaty in the sight of Allah and with His Messenger, except for those with whom you made a treaty at al-Masjid al-Haram? So as long as they are upright toward you, be upright toward them. Indeed, Allah loves the righteous [who fear Him].
trans-unit.target: Com pot haver per la politeistes un tractat en la vista d'Allah i amb el seu Missatger, a excepció d'aquells amb qui es va signar un tractat al-Masjid al-Haram? Així, mentre són verticals cap a vostè, ser vertical cap a ells. De fet, Allah estima els justos [que li tinc por].

trans-unit.source: How [can there be a treaty] while, if they gain dominance over you, they do not observe concerning you any pact of kinship or covenant of protection? They satisfy you with their mouths, but their hearts refuse [compliance], and most of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Com [hi pot haver un tractat] mentre que, si adquireixen dominació sobre tu, no van observar pel que fa qualsevol pacte de parentiu o pacte de protecció? A satisfer amb la boca, però seus cors refusar [compliment], i la majoria són desafiant desobedient.

trans-unit.source: They have exchanged the signs of Allah for a small price and averted [people] from His way. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Han intercanviat els senyals d'Allah per a un preu petit i evitat [persones] del seu camí. De fet, va ser mal que ho feien.

trans-unit.source: They do not observe toward a believer any pact of kinship or covenant of protection. And it is they who are the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Que no compleixin cap un creient qualsevol pacte de parentiu o pacte de protecció. I és que són els transgressors.

trans-unit.source: But if they repent, establish prayer, and give zakah, then they are your brothers in religion; and We detail the verses for a people who know.
trans-unit.target: Però si que penedir-se, establir l'oració i donar zakah, llavors són teus germans en religió; i a continuació detallem els versos per a un poble que sap.

trans-unit.source: And if they break their oaths after their treaty and defame your religion, then fight the leaders of disbelief, for indeed, there are no oaths [sacred] to them; [fight them that] they might cease.
trans-unit.target: I si van trencar els seus juraments després de la seva tractat i difamar la seva religió, llavors lluitar contra els líders d'incredulitat, de fet, no hi ha cap juraments [sagrat] [lluitar contra ells que] podria deixen.

trans-unit.source: Would you not fight a people who broke their oaths and determined to expel the Messenger, and they had begun [the attack upon] you the first time? Do you fear them? But Allah has more right that you should fear Him, if you are [truly] believers.
trans-unit.target: No vols lluitar un poble que trencava els seus juraments i decidit a expulsar el Missatger, i havia començat a [l'atac al] es la primera vegada? Tem-los? Però Allah té més dret que ha por ell, si ets [veritablement] creients.

trans-unit.source: Fight them; Allah will punish them by your hands and will disgrace them and give you victory over them and satisfy the breasts of a believing people
trans-unit.target: Lluitar contra ells; Allah es castigar-los per les mans i ells vergonya i li donarà victòria sobre ells i satisfer els pits d'un poble creient

trans-unit.source: And remove the fury in the believers' hearts. And Allah turns in forgiveness to whom He wills; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I treure la fúria en els cors dels creients. I Allah es converteix en el perdó a qui ell vol; i Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Do you think that you will be left [as you are] while Allah has not yet made evident those among you who strive [for His cause] and do not take other than Allah, His Messenger and the believers as intimates? And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Creus que li quedarà [com ets] mentre que Allah no encara fet evidents aquells entre vosaltres que esforçar-se [per a la seva causa] i no es fan diferents Allah, seu Missatger i els creients com insinua? I Allah estigui familiaritzat amb el que fas.

trans-unit.source: It is not for the polytheists to maintain the mosques of Allah [while] witnessing against themselves with disbelief. [For] those, their deeds have become worthless, and in the Fire they will abide eternally.
trans-unit.target: No és per la politeistes mantenir les mesquites d'Allah [mentre] testimoni contra si mateixos amb incredulitat. [Per a] aquells, els fets s'han tornat inútils, i en l'incendi respectarà eternament.

trans-unit.source: The mosques of Allah are only to be maintained by those who believe in Allah and the Last Day and establish prayer and give zakah and do not fear except Allah, for it is expected that those will be of the [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Les mesquites d'Allah són només per ser mantingut per aquells que creuen en Allah i el darrer dia i establir la pregària i donar zakah i no por excepte Allah, perquè s'espera que els serà de la [raó] guiada.

trans-unit.source: Have you made the providing of water for the pilgrim and the maintenance of al-Masjid al-Haram equal to [the deeds of] one who believes in Allah and the Last Day and strives in the cause of Allah? They are not equal in the sight of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Ha fet vostè la prestació d'aigua pel Pelegrí i el manteniment d'al-Masjid al-Haram [els fets de] igual que creu en Allah i el darrer dia i s'esforça en la causa d'Allah? No són iguals en la vista d'Allah. I Allah guia no la gent d'irregularitats.

trans-unit.source: The ones who have believed, emigrated and striven in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives are greater in rank in the sight of Allah. And it is those who are the attainers [of success].
trans-unit.target: Els que han cregut, va emigrar i esforçat en la causa d'Allah amb el seu patrimoni i les seves vides són superior en rang a la vista d'Allah. I és qui són els attainers [d'èxit].

trans-unit.source: Their Lord gives them good tidings of mercy from Him and approval and of gardens for them wherein is enduring pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Seu Senyor els dóna bona nova de la misericòrdia d'ell i l'aprovació i de jardins per a ells que és durador plaer.

trans-unit.source: [They will be] abiding therein forever. Indeed, Allah has with Him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: [Ls] romandre aquí per sempre. De fet, Allah té amb ell una gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not take your fathers or your brothers as allies if they have preferred disbelief over belief. And whoever does so among you - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, no prengueu vostres pares o els teus germans com a aliats si que han preferit la incredulitat sobre la creença. I qui ho fa entre vosaltres - llavors és qui són els malfactors.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If your fathers, your sons, your brothers, your wives, your relatives, wealth which you have obtained, commerce wherein you fear decline, and dwellings with which you are pleased are more beloved to you than Allah and His Messenger and jihad in His cause, then wait until Allah executes His command. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people."
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "si els vostres pares, el seu fills, teus germans, vostres dones, el seu parents, riquesa que heu obtingut, comerç on por declivi i habitatges amb què et complau són més estimats per a vostè que Allah i el seu Missatger i jihad en la seva causa, llavors esperi fins que Allah executa el seu comandament. I Allah guia no la gent desafiant desobedient."

trans-unit.source: Allah has already given you victory in many regions and [even] on the day of Hunayn, when your great number pleased you, but it did not avail you at all, and the earth was confining for you with its vastness; then you turned back, fleeing.
trans-unit.target: Allah ja ha donat la victòria a moltes regions i [encara] dia de Hunayn, quan el seu gran nombre li complau, però ho no fer ús en absolut i la terra va ser limitant per a vostè amb la seva immensitat; llavors es va tornar, fugint.

trans-unit.source: Then Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and sent down soldiers angels whom you did not see and punished those who disbelieved. And that is the recompense of the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Llavors Allah enviat la seva tranquil·litat seu Missatger i els creients i enviat àngels soldats qui no veia i castiga els que dubtaven. I aquesta és la recompensa dels disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will accept repentance after that for whom He wills; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Llavors Allah acceptarà penediment després d'això per a qui ell vol; i Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, indeed the polytheists are unclean, so let them not approach al-Masjid al-Haram after this, their [final] year. And if you fear privation, Allah will enrich you from His bounty if He wills. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, de fet la politeistes són brut, així que anem a no aproximació al-Masjid al-Haram després d'això, seu any [final]. I si vostè por privacions, Allah us enriquirà a nivell de la seva generositat si Ell voluntats. De fet, Allah està saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Fight those who do not believe in Allah or in the Last Day and who do not consider unlawful what Allah and His Messenger have made unlawful and who do not adopt the religion of truth from those who were given the Scripture - [fight] until they give the jizyah willingly while they are humbled.
trans-unit.target: Lluiti amb els que no creuen en Allah o en l'últim dia i que no consideren il·legal que Allah i el seu Missatger han fet il·legal i que no adopten la religió de la veritat d'aquells que van rebre l'escriptura - [lluita] fins que doni el jizyah voluntàriament mentre estan humiliats.

trans-unit.source: The Jews say, "Ezra is the son of Allah "; and the Christians say, "The Messiah is the son of Allah." That is their statement from their mouths; they imitate the saying of those who disbelieved [before them]. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded?
trans-unit.target: Els jueus diuen, "Ezra és el fill d'Allah"; i els cristians diuen, "el Messies és el fill d'Allah". Que és la seva declaració de la boca; van imitar la dita d'aquells que dubtaven [abans d'ells]. Allah poden destruir-los; com es enganyat?

trans-unit.source: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah, and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary. And they were not commanded except to worship one God; there is no deity except Him. Exalted is He above whatever they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: S'han pres els estudiosos i monjos com a senyors a més d'Allah i [també] el Messies, el fill de Mary. I no eren comandades excepte que veneren un Déu; no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell. Exaltat és ell damunt qualsevol cosa que es relacionen amb ell.

trans-unit.source: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah refuses except to perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.
trans-unit.target: Volen extingir la llum d'Allah amb la boca, però Allah es nega excepte perfeccionar la seva llum, encara que els disbelievers no els agrada.

trans-unit.source: It is He who has sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although they who associate others with Allah dislike it.
trans-unit.target: És qui ha enviat seu Missatger amb l'orientació i la religió de la veritat per manifestar sobre religió, encara que altres associar Allah no els agrada.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, indeed many of the scholars and the monks devour the wealth of people unjustly and avert [them] from the way of Allah. And those who hoard gold and silver and spend it not in the way of Allah - give them tidings of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, de fet molts dels becaris i monjos devorar la riquesa de gent injustament i evitar [ells] de la manera d'Allah. I qui acaparar l'or i plata i passar-lo no en el camí d'Allah - dono noticia de un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: The Day when it will be heated in the fire of Hell and seared therewith will be their foreheads, their flanks, and their backs, [it will be said], "This is what you hoarded for yourselves, so taste what you used to hoard."
trans-unit.target: Serà el dia quan serà climatitzada a l'incendi de l'infern i daurada amb ella els seus fronts, els flancs i l'esquena, [es diu], "això és el que vostè acumulat per vosaltres mateixos, tan tastar què solia acaparar."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the number of months with Allah is twelve [lunar] months in the register of Allah [from] the day He created the heavens and the earth; of these, four are sacred. That is the correct religion, so do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the disbelievers collectively as they fight against you collectively. And know that Allah is with the righteous [who fear Him].
trans-unit.target: De fet, el nombre de mesos amb Allah és dotze mesos [lunars] en el registre d'Allah [des] del dia que va crear el cel i la terra; d'aquests, quatre són sagrats. Que és la religió correcte, perquè no fan mal vosaltres durant-los. I la lluita contra els disbelievers col·lectivament lluiten contra tu col·lectivament. I saber que Allah és amb els justos [que li tinc por].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the postponing [of restriction within sacred months] is an increase in disbelief by which those who have disbelieved are led [further] astray. They make it lawful one year and unlawful another year to correspond to the number made unlawful by Allah and [thus] make lawful what Allah has made unlawful. Made pleasing to them is the evil of their deeds; and Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: De fet, l'ajornament [de restricció en mesos sagrats] és un augment de la incredulitat, per la qual els que dubtaven tenen els portar [més] per mal camí. Sigui legítim un any i il. legals un altre any corresponen al nombre il·legal per Allah i [que] fer legal que Allah ha fet il·legal. Fer agradable per a ells és el mal dels seus actes; i Allah guia no un poble incrèdul.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, what is [the matter] with you that, when you are told to go forth in the cause of Allah, you adhere heavily to the earth? Are you satisfied with the life of this world rather than the Hereafter? But what is the enjoyment of worldly life compared to the Hereafter except a [very] little.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, què és [la matèria] amb vostè que quan vostè se diu d'anar endavant en la causa d'Allah, que s'adhereixi fortament a la terra? Està satisfet amb la vida d'aquest món més que la d'ara endavant? Però el que és gaudir de la vida mundana, en comparació amb el d'ara endavant excepte un [molt] poc.

trans-unit.source: If you do not go forth, He will punish you with a painful punishment and will replace you with another people, and you will not harm Him at all. And Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Si no vas cap endavant, es castigarà amb un dolor càstig i substituirà amb una altra gent, i es farà no mal ell en absolut. I Allah sobre totes les coses competents.

trans-unit.source: If you do not aid the Prophet - Allah has already aided him when those who disbelieved had driven him out [of Makkah] as one of two, when they were in the cave and he said to his companion, "Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us." And Allah sent down his tranquillity upon him and supported him with angels you did not see and made the word of those who disbelieved the lowest, while the word of Allah - that is the highest. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Si vostè no ajuda el Profeta - Allah ja ha ajudat a ell quan els que dubtaven havia impulsat ell [de Makkah] com un dels dos, quan eren a la cova i va dir al seu company, "no plorar; realment Allah és amb nosaltres". I Allah enviat la seva tranquil·litat a ell i li donaven suport amb àngels que no veia i feta la paraula d'aquells que dubtaven de la més baixa, mentre que la paraula d'Allah - que és el més alt. I Allah és exaltat en força i savi.

trans-unit.source: Go forth, whether light or heavy, and strive with your wealth and your lives in the cause of Allah. That is better for you, if you only knew.
trans-unit.target: Seguir endavant, ja sigui pesat o lleuger i s'esforcen amb la seva riquesa i la seva vida a la causa d'Allah. Que és millor per a vostè, si vostè sabés.

trans-unit.source: Had it been an easy gain and a moderate trip, the hypocrites would have followed you, but distant to them was the journey. And they will swear by Allah, "If we were able, we would have gone forth with you," destroying themselves [through false oaths], and Allah knows that indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Si hagués estat un guany fàcil i un viatge moderat, els hipòcrites vols seguit, però distants a ells era el viatge. I es juren per Allah, "si fóssim capaços, ens hauria anat endavant amb tu," destruir-se [a través de falsos juraments] i Allah sap que de fet són mentiders.

trans-unit.source: May Allah pardon you, [O Muhammad]; why did you give them permission [to remain behind]? [You should not have] until it was evident to you who were truthful and you knew [who were] the liars.
trans-unit.target: Pot Allah vostè, [O Muhammad]; perdó per què donar-los permís [a romandre darrere]? [No hauria de tenir] fins que va ser evident per a vostès que van ser veraç i sabia que eren] mentiders.

trans-unit.source: Those who believe in Allah and the Last Day would not ask permission of you to be excused from striving with their wealth and their lives. And Allah is Knowing of those who fear Him.
trans-unit.target: Aquells que creuen en Allah i el darrer dia no els demano permís de vostè que es dispensa de lluita amb el seu patrimoni i les seves vides. I Allah està saber de qui li tinc por.

trans-unit.source: Only those would ask permission of you who do not believe in Allah and the Last Day and whose hearts have doubted, and they, in their doubt, are hesitating.
trans-unit.target: Només els demano permís de vostès que no creuen en Allah i el darrer dia i els cors han dubtat, i que, al seu dubte, estan dubtant.

trans-unit.source: And if they had intended to go forth, they would have prepared for it [some] preparation. But Allah disliked their being sent, so He kept them back, and they were told, "Remain [behind] with those who remain."
trans-unit.target: I si tenien la intenció d'anar endavant, han preparat per a la preparació de TI [alguns]. Però Allah no li agradava seu ésser enviat, així que ells mantinguts, i els va dir, "Segueixen [darrere] amb qui sent."

trans-unit.source: Had they gone forth with you, they would not have increased you except in confusion, and they would have been active among you, seeking [to cause] you fitnah. And among you are avid listeners to them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Haguessin anat endavant amb vostè, no han augmentat vostè, excepte en la confusió, i hauria estat actiu entre vosaltres, que busquen [fer] es fitnah. I entre siguin oients fervents a ells. I Allah està saber de la malfactors.

trans-unit.source: They had already desired dissension before and had upset matters for you until the truth came and the ordinance of Allah appeared, while they were averse.
trans-unit.target: Ells ja havien desitjat dissensió abans i havia molesta matèries per tu fins que la veritat i l'Ordenança d'Allah, mentre eren aversió al risc.

trans-unit.source: And among them is he who says, "Permit me [to remain at home] and do not put me to trial." Unquestionably, into trial they have fallen. And indeed, Hell will encompass the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I entre ells és que diu: "Permeti'm [de romandre a casa] i no posar-me a prova". Sens dubte, en el judici que han caigut. I de fet, l'infern abastarà els disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: If good befalls you, it distresses them; but if disaster strikes you, they say, "We took our matter [in hand] before," and turn away while they are rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Si bé li sobrevingui, això angoixa; però si vagues de desastre, diuen, "Preníem nostra matèria [a mà] abans de" i s'allunyen mentre ells són alegrant.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector." And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Dir, "mai serà ens colpejada excepte per què Allah ha decretat per a nosaltres; Ell és nostre protector". I en Allah deixar que els creients es basen.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Do you await for us except one of the two best things while we await for you that Allah will afflict you with punishment from Himself or at our hands? So wait; indeed we, along with you, are waiting."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "fer que esperen per a nosaltres excepte un de les dues millors coses mentre ens esperen per a vostè que Allah es afecten amb càstig de si mateix o a les nostres mans? Així esperar; de fet, juntament amb vostè, els esperem."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Spend willingly or unwillingly; never will it be accepted from you. Indeed, you have been a defiantly disobedient people."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "passar voluntària o involuntàriament; mai no s'admet de vostè. De fet, ha estat un poble desafiant desobedient."

trans-unit.source: And what prevents their expenditures from being accepted from them but that they have disbelieved in Allah and in His Messenger and that they come not to prayer except while they are lazy and that they do not spend except while they are unwilling.
trans-unit.target: I Què impedeix que les seves despeses de ser acceptat d'ells, però que tenen dubtaven en Allah i el seu Missatger i que vénen no a la pregària excepte mentre que són ganduls i que no gasten excepte mentre estan disposats.

trans-unit.source: So let not their wealth or their children impress you. Allah only intends to punish them through them in worldly life and that their souls should depart [at death] while they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Així que no la seva riquesa o impressionarà als seus fills. Allah només pretén castigar-los a través d'ells en la vida mundana i que l'ànima ha surten [a mort] mentre que són disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah that they are from among you while they are not from among you; but they are a people who are afraid.
trans-unit.target: I juren per Allah que són entre vostè mentre no estan entre però són persones que tenen por.

trans-unit.source: If they could find a refuge or some caves or any place to enter [and hide], they would turn to it while they run heedlessly.
trans-unit.target: Si podria trobar un refugi o algunes coves o qualsevol lloc per introduir [i amagar], al seu torn-hi mentre corren heedlessly.

trans-unit.source: And among them are some who criticize you concerning the [distribution of] charities. If they are given from them, they approve; but if they are not given from them, at once they become angry.
trans-unit.target: I entre ells hi ha alguns que criticar sobre les organitzacions benèfiques [distribució de]. Si se ls dóna d'ells, van aprovar; però si no se ls dóna d'ells, a la vegada també s'enfaden.

trans-unit.source: If only they had been satisfied with what Allah and His Messenger gave them and said, "Sufficient for us is Allah; Allah will give us of His bounty, and [so will] His Messenger; indeed, we are desirous toward Allah," [it would have been better for them].
trans-unit.target: Si només havien estat satisfets amb què Allah i el seu missatger va donar-los i dir, "Sufficient per a nosaltres és Allah; Allah es donar-nos de la seva generositat i [així] seu Missatger; de fet, estem desitjosos cap a Allah,"[hauria estat millor per a ells].

trans-unit.source: Zakah expenditures are only for the poor and for the needy and for those employed to collect [zakah] and for bringing hearts together [for Islam] and for freeing captives [or slaves] and for those in debt and for the cause of Allah and for the [stranded] traveler - an obligation [imposed] by Allah. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Zakah les despeses són només per als pobres i per als necessitats i per als empleats per recollir [zakah] i per portar els cors junts [per a l'Islam] i per alliberar captius [o esclaus] i per a aquells en deute i per la causa d'Allah i per al viatger [encallats] - una obligació [imposades] per Allah. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who abuse the Prophet and say, "He is an ear." Say, "[It is] an ear of goodness for you that believes in Allah and believes the believers and [is] a mercy to those who believe among you." And those who abuse the Messenger of Allah - for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: I entre ells hi ha els que abusen del Profeta i dir, "ell és una orella". Dir, "[és] una orella de bondat per a vostè que creu en Allah i creu que els creients i [és] una Misericòrdia a aquells que creuen entre vosaltres." I els que abusen del Missatger d'Allah - per a ells és un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: They swear by Allah to you [Muslims] to satisfy you. But Allah and His Messenger are more worthy for them to satisfy, if they should be believers.
trans-unit.target: Juren per Allah li [musulmans] per a satisfer. Però Allah i el seu Missatger són més digna per a ells satisfer, si haurien de ser creients.

trans-unit.source: Do they not know that whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger - that for him is the fire of Hell, wherein he will abide eternally? That is the great disgrace.
trans-unit.target: No saben que qui s'oposa a Allah i el seu Missatger - que per a ell és el foc d'infern, on va sotmetre eternament? Aquesta és la gran desgràcia.

trans-unit.source: They hypocrites are apprehensive lest a surah be revealed about them, informing them of what is in their hearts. Say, "Mock [as you wish]; indeed, Allah will expose that which you fear."
trans-unit.target: Hipòcrites són aprensius perquè no un surah es revelava sobre ells, informant-los del que és en els seus cors. Dir, "maqueta [com vulgui]; de fet, Allah a exposar el que té por."

trans-unit.source: And if you ask them, they will surely say, "We were only conversing and playing." Say, "Is it Allah and His verses and His Messenger that you were mocking?"
trans-unit.target: I si els preguntes, segurament es dirà, "van ser només conversant i jugant." Dir, "És Allah i seus versos i el seu Missatger que es van burlar-se?"

trans-unit.source: Make no excuse; you have disbelieved after your belief. If We pardon one faction of you - We will punish another faction because they were criminals.
trans-unit.target: Fer cap excusa; vostè té dubtaven després de la seva creença. Si ens perdoni una facció de vostès - ens castigarà una altra facció perquè eren els criminals.

trans-unit.source: The hypocrite men and hypocrite women are of one another. They enjoin what is wrong and forbid what is right and close their hands. They have forgotten Allah, so He has forgotten them [accordingly]. Indeed, the hypocrites - it is they who are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Els homes d'hipòcrita i hipòcrita dones són de l'altra. Demanen el que està malament i prohibeixen el que està bé i tancar les mans. S'han oblidat de Allah, perquè s'ha oblidat ells [consegüentment]. De fet, els hipòcrites - són ells els que estan desafiant desobedients.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the disbelievers the fire of Hell, wherein they will abide eternally. It is sufficient for them. And Allah has cursed them, and for them is an enduring punishment.
trans-unit.target: Allah ha promès la hipòcrita homes i dones hipòcrita i disbelievers el foc d'infern, en què van complir eternament. És suficient per a ells. I Allah ha maleït-los i per a ells és un càstig perdurable.

trans-unit.source: [You disbelievers are] like those before you; they were stronger than you in power and more abundant in wealth and children. They enjoyed their portion [of worldly enjoyment], and you have enjoyed your portion as those before you enjoyed their portion, and you have engaged [in vanities] like that in which they engaged. [It is] those whose deeds have become worthless in this world and in the Hereafter, and it is they who are the losers.
trans-unit.target: [Disbelievers ets] com les abans; eren més forts que tu en el poder i més abundant en la riquesa i els nens. Gaudeixen seva part [de gaudi mundana], i que hagin gaudit de la porció que abans gaudia de part, i han participat [en vanitats] com allò en que feien. [És] aquells les escriptures han tornat inútils en aquest món i en el futur i són ells els que són els perdedors.

trans-unit.source: Has there not reached them the news of those before them - the people of Noah and [the tribes of] 'Aad and Thamud and the people of Abraham and the companions of Madyan and the towns overturned? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. And Allah would never have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Allà no ha arribat a ells la notícia d'aquells abans d'ells - la gent de Noè i [les tribus de] ' Aad i Thamud i la gent d'Abraham i els companys de Madyan i els pobles va bolcar? Els seus missatgers venien a ells amb proves clares. I Allah vols mai han perjudicat, però es van wronging-se.

trans-unit.source: The believing men and believing women are allies of one another. They enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Those - Allah will have mercy upon them. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Creient que homes i dones són aliats de l'altra. Es demanen el que està bé i prohibeixen el que està malament i establir l'oració i donar zakah i obeir a Allah i el seu Missatger. Aquells - Allah tindrà Misericòrdia sobre ells. De fet, Allah és exaltat en força i savi.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised the believing men and believing women gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally, and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence; but approval from Allah is greater. It is that which is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Allah ha promès el creient homes i creient jardins de dones sota quin cabal de rius, en què van complir eternament, i agradables habitatges en jardins de domicili perpetu; però l'aprovació d'Allah és més gran. És la que és la gran consecució.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, fight against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: O profeta, lluitar contra els disbelievers i els hipòcrites i ser forts a ells. Seva refugi és l'infern i miserable és el destí.

trans-unit.source: They swear by Allah that they did not say [anything against the Prophet] while they had said the word of disbelief and disbelieved after their [pretense of] Islam and planned that which they were not to attain. And they were not resentful except [for the fact] that Allah and His Messenger had enriched them of His bounty. So if they repent, it is better for them; but if they turn away, Allah will punish them with a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And there will not be for them on earth any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: Juren per Allah que no dir [res contra el Profeta] mentre que havien dit la paraula d'incredulitat i dubtaven després de la seva [la pretensió de] l'Islam i que havien d'assolir no previstes. I no eren ressentit excepte [de fet] aquell Allah i el seu Missatger havia enriquit-los de la seva generositat. Així si que es penedeixin, és millor per a ells; però si s'allunyen, Allah va a castigar-los amb un dolor càstig en aquest món i el més enllà. S'hi no ser per a ells en terra cap protector o ajudant.

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who made a covenant with Allah, [saying], "If He should give us from His bounty, we will surely spend in charity, and we will surely be among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: I entre ells els qui van fer un pacte amb Allah, [dir], "Si va hauria de donar-nos de la seva generositat, segurament passarem a caritat, i segurament estarem entre els justos."

trans-unit.source: But when he gave them from His bounty, they were stingy with it and turned away while they refused.
trans-unit.target: Però quan va donar-los de la seva generositat, van ser garrepa amb ell i s'allunyaven mentre es van negar.

trans-unit.source: So He penalized them with hypocrisy in their hearts until the Day they will meet Him - because they failed Allah in what they promised Him and because they [habitually] used to lie.
trans-unit.target: Així que ells penalitzat amb hipocresia als seus cors fins al dia coneixeran ell - perquè no Allah què van prometre i perquè ells [habitualment] solia mentir.

trans-unit.source: Did they not know that Allah knows their secrets and their private conversations and that Allah is the Knower of the unseen?
trans-unit.target: No es sabia que Allah sap els secrets i les seves converses privades i que Allah és el coneixedor del invisibles?

trans-unit.source: Those who criticize the contributors among the believers concerning [their] charities and [criticize] the ones who find nothing [to spend] except their effort, so they ridicule them - Allah will ridicule them, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Els que critiquen els contribuents entre els creients relatives a [el seu] caritat i [criticar] els que trobar res [a passar] excepte d'esforç, així que ridiculitzar-los - Allah es ridiculitzar-los, i tindran un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: Ask forgiveness for them, [O Muhammad], or do not ask forgiveness for them. If you should ask forgiveness for them seventy times - never will Allah forgive them. That is because they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger, and Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: Demanar perdó per ells, [O Muhammad], o bé no demanar perdó. Si demanar perdó per ells setanta vegades - mai Allah perdona'ls. Això és perquè els dubtaven en Allah i el seu Missatger, i Allah guia no la gent desafiant desobedient.

trans-unit.source: Those who remained behind rejoiced in their staying [at home] after [the departure of] the Messenger of Allah and disliked to strive with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah and said, "Do not go forth in the heat." Say, "The fire of Hell is more intensive in heat" - if they would but understand.
trans-unit.target: Aquells que van quedar s'alegraven en seva queden [a casa] després [d] el Missatger d'Allah i no li agradava per esforçar-se amb el seu patrimoni i les seves vides en la causa d'Allah i deia, "no anar endavant en la calor". Dir, "l'incendi de l'infern és més intensiu en calor" - si vols però entenen.

trans-unit.source: So let them laugh a little and [then] weep much as recompense for what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Així que anem a riure una mica i [llavors] plorar tant com recompensa pel que es va guanyar.

trans-unit.source: If Allah should return you to a faction of them [after the expedition] and then they ask your permission to go out [to battle], say, "You will not go out with me, ever, and you will never fight with me an enemy. Indeed, you were satisfied with sitting [at home] the first time, so sit [now] with those who stay behind."
trans-unit.target: Si Allah ha retornar-vos a una facció d'ells [després de l'expedició] i llavors van demanar permís per sortir [per batalla], diuen, "vostè no sortirà amb mi, mai, i mai a lluitar amb mi un enemic. Fet, estaven satisfets amb estar [a casa] la primera vegada, així que segui [ara] amb qui quedar-se enrere."

trans-unit.source: And do not pray [the funeral prayer, O Muhammad], over any of them who has died - ever - or stand at his grave. Indeed, they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger and died while they were defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: I no ensenya [funeral, O Muhammad], sobre qualsevol d'ells que ha mort - mai - o estand a la seva tomba. De fet, que dubtaven en Allah i el seu Missatger i va morir mentre eren desafiant desobedients.

trans-unit.source: And let not their wealth and their children impress you. Allah only intends to punish them through them in this world and that their souls should depart [at death] while they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I que no la seva riquesa i impressionarà als seus fills. Allah només pretén castigar-los a través d'ells en aquest món i que l'ànima ha surten [a mort] mentre que són disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And when a surah was revealed [enjoining them] to believe in Allah and to fight with His Messenger, those of wealth among them asked your permission [to stay back] and said, "Leave us to be with them who sit [at home]."
trans-unit.target: I quan un surah es revelava [ordenant-los] a creure en Allah i lluita amb el seu Missatger, aquells de la riquesa entre ells va demanar el seu permís [per quedar-se enrere] i va dir, "Deixa'ns per estar amb ells que es sentin [a casa]."

trans-unit.source: They were satisfied to be with those who stay behind, and their hearts were sealed over, so they do not understand.
trans-unit.target: Van ser satisfets d'estar amb els que es queden, i seus cors segellades, així que no entenc.

trans-unit.source: But the Messenger and those who believed with him fought with their wealth and their lives. Those will have [all that is] good, and it is those who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Però el Missatger i qui creu que amb ell va lluitar amb el seu patrimoni i les seves vides. Aquells [tot el que és] tindran bones i són els que tenen l'èxit.

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Allah ha preparat per a ells jardins sota quin cabal de rius, en què van complir eternament. Aquesta és la gran consecució.

trans-unit.source: And those with excuses among the bedouins came to be permitted [to remain], and they who had lied to Allah and His Messenger sat [at home]. There will strike those who disbelieved among them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Aquells amb excuses entre els beduïns van arribar a ser permès [sent] i que havia mentit en Allah i el seu Missatger asseure [a casa]. Allà a la vaga els que dubtaven entre ells un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the weak or upon the ill or upon those who do not find anything to spend any discomfort when they are sincere to Allah and His Messenger. There is not upon the doers of good any cause [for blame]. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha no en febles o malalts o en aquells que no trobo res passar les incomoditat quan estan sincers a Allah i el seu Missatger. No hi ha en els autors de bo qualsevol causa [per culpa]. I Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: Nor [is there blame] upon those who, when they came to you that you might give them mounts, you said, "I can find nothing for you to ride upon." They turned back while their eyes overflowed with tears out of grief that they could not find something to spend [for the cause of Allah].
trans-unit.target: Ni [allà és culpa] sobre aquells que, quan van arribar al que vostè podria donar-los puigs, vostè va dir, "jo pot trobar res per tu per cavalcar pujats." Es va tornar enrere mentre els seus ulls es va desbordar amb llàgrimes de dolor que no podria trobar alguna cosa per passar [per la causa d'Allah].

trans-unit.source: The cause [for blame] is only upon those who ask permission of you while they are rich. They are satisfied to be with those who stay behind, and Allah has sealed over their hearts, so they do not know.
trans-unit.target: La causa [per culpa] és només a aquells qui ho demanen permís de vostè mentre són rics. Estan satisfets d'estar amb els que es queden, i Allah ha segellat sobre les seves ànimes, així que no sé.

trans-unit.source: They will make excuses to you when you have returned to them. Say, "Make no excuse - never will we believe you. Allah has already informed us of your news. And Allah will observe your deeds, and [so will] His Messenger; then you will be taken back to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you of what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Es farà excuses a vostè quan li han tornat a ells. Dir, "fer cap excusa - mai no creurà vostè. Allah ha ja ens informa de les notícies. I Allah es observar els seus actes i [tan] seu Missatger; llavors li serà retornada a la coneixedor del invisibles i va ser el testimoni, i ell us informarà del que vostè va fer."

trans-unit.source: They will swear by Allah to you when you return to them that you would leave them alone. So leave them alone; indeed they are evil; and their refuge is Hell as recompense for what they had been earning.
trans-unit.target: Es juren per Allah a vostè quan torni a ells que tu vols deixar sol. Deixar-los tan sola; de fet són dolents; i d refugi és l'infern com a recompensa per què havia estat guanyant.

trans-unit.source: They swear to you so that you might be satisfied with them. But if you should be satisfied with them - indeed, Allah is not satisfied with a defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: Juren a vostè perquè vostè podria estar satisfet amb ells. Però si vostè ha de ser satisfet amb ells - de fet, Allah no està satisfet amb un poble desafiant desobedient.

trans-unit.source: The bedouins are stronger in disbelief and hypocrisy and more likely not to know the limits of what [laws] Allah has revealed to His Messenger. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Els beduïns són més forts en la incredulitat i hipocresia i més probable no conèixer els límits de quines [lleis] Allah ha revelat al seu Missatger. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: And among the bedouins are some who consider what they spend as a loss and await for you turns of misfortune. Upon them will be a misfortune of evil. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I entre els beduïns alguns que consideren que passen com una pèrdua i esperen per torns de la desgràcia. En ells serà una desgràcia del mal. I Allah és sentir i saber.

trans-unit.source: But among the bedouins are some who believe in Allah and the Last Day and consider what they spend as means of nearness to Allah and of [obtaining] invocations of the Messenger. Unquestionably, it is a means of nearness for them. Allah will admit them to His mercy. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Però entre els beduïns hi ha alguns que creuen en Allah i el darrer dia i considerar el que gasten com mitjà de proximitat a Allah i [obtenir] invocacions del Missatger. Sens dubte, és un mitjà de proximitat per a ells. Allah a admetre-les a la seva misericòrdia. En efecte, Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And the first forerunners [in the faith] among the Muhajireen and the Ansar and those who followed them with good conduct - Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him, and He has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: I primers precursors [en la fe] entre el Muhajireen i l'Ansar i qui va seguir-los amb bona conducta - Allah es complau amb ells i que estan contents amb ell, i ell ha preparat per a ells jardins sota quin cabal de rius, on es queda per sempre. Aquesta és la gran consecució.

trans-unit.source: And among those around you of the bedouins are hypocrites, and [also] from the people of Madinah. They have become accustomed to hypocrisy. You, [O Muhammad], do not know them, [but] We know them. We will punish them twice [in this world]; then they will be returned to a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: I entre els qui l'envolten d'els beduïns són hipòcrites i [també] de la gent de Madinah. Ells han acostumat a la hipocresia. [O Muhammad], no saps-los, [però] les coneixem. Ens va a castigar-los dues vegades [en aquest món]; llavors ells serà retornat a un càstig gran.

trans-unit.source: And [there are] others who have acknowledged their sins. They had mixed a righteous deed with another that was bad. Perhaps Allah will turn to them in forgiveness. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I [hi] altres que han reconegut els seus pecats. Ells havia barrejat un justos fets amb un altre que era dolent. Potser Allah convertirà per a ells en el perdó. En efecte, Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: Take, [O, Muhammad], from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase, and invoke [Allah 's blessings] upon them. Indeed, your invocations are reassurance for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Prenguem, [O, Muhammad], des de la seva riquesa una caritat pel qual purificar-los i fer augmentar i invocar [benediccions de Allah] sobre ells. De fet, el seu invocacions són garanties per a ells. I Allah és sentir i saber.

trans-unit.source: Do they not know that it is Allah who accepts repentance from His servants and receives charities and that it is Allah who is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful?
trans-unit.target: No saben que és Allah qui accepta el penediment dels seus servents i rep la caritat i que es tracta d'Allah que és el Accepting de penediment, el Clement?

trans-unit.source: And say, "Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds, and [so, will] His Messenger and the believers. And you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you of what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: I dir, "fer [com que], per Allah veuran els seus actes i [així, es] seu Missatger i els creients. I seran retornats a la coneixedor del invisibles i va ser el testimoni, i ell us informarà del que vostè va fer."

trans-unit.source: And [there are] others deferred until the command of Allah - whether He will punish them or whether He will forgive them. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I [hi] altres diferits fins a l'ordre d'Allah - si ell va a castigar-los o si ell et perdonarà-los. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: And [there are] those [hypocrites] who took for themselves a mosque for causing harm and disbelief and division among the believers and as a station for whoever had warred against Allah and His Messenger before. And they will surely swear, "We intended only the best." And Allah testifies that indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: I [hi] aquells [hipòcrites] que va tenir per si mateixos una mesquita per causar danys i la incredulitat i la divisió entre els creients i com a estació per qui havia warred contra Allah i el seu Missatger abans. I serà segurament juren, "Hem pensat només els millors". I Allah dóna testimoni que de fet són mentiders.

trans-unit.source: Do not stand [for prayer] within it - ever. A mosque founded on righteousness from the first day is more worthy for you to stand in. Within it are men who love to purify themselves; and Allah loves those who purify themselves.
trans-unit.target: No toleraria [oració] dins d'ella - mai. Una mesquita fundada en justícia des del primer dia és més digne perquè posi. Dins es són els homes que estimen a purificar-se; i Allah estima els que purifica a si.

trans-unit.source: Then is one who laid the foundation of his building on righteousness [with fear] from Allah and [seeking] His approval better or one who laid the foundation of his building on the edge of a bank about to collapse, so it collapsed with him into the fire of Hell? And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Llavors és un que assentar les bases del seu edifici en justícia [amb por] des d'Allah i [buscar] seva aprovació millor o que assentar les bases del seu edifici a la vora d'un banc punt de col. lapse, així que es va desplomar amb ell en l'incendi de l'infern? I Allah guia no la gent d'irregularitats.

trans-unit.source: Their building which they built will not cease to be a [cause of] skepticism in their hearts until their hearts are stopped. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: D'edifici que van construir no deixarà de ser un escepticisme [causa de] als seus cors fins que els seus cors s'aturen. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah has purchased from the believers their lives and their properties [in exchange] for that they will have Paradise. They fight in the cause of Allah, so they kill and are killed. [It is] a true promise [binding] upon Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an. And who is truer to his covenant than Allah? So rejoice in your transaction which you have contracted. And it is that which is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah ha comprat els creients les seves vides i les seves propietats [a canvi] per a que tindran paradís. Van lluitar en la causa d'Allah, així que maten i moren. [És] un veritable promesa [enllaç] a ell en el Torah i l'Evangeli i l'Alcorà. I qui és més cert seu pacte que Allah? Així s'alegren en la transacció que li han contractat. I és que és la gran consecució.

trans-unit.source: [Such believers are] the repentant, the worshippers, the praisers [of Allah], the travelers [for His cause], those who bow and prostrate [in prayer], those who enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong, and those who observe the limits [set by] Allah. And give good tidings to the believers.
trans-unit.target: [Aquests creients són] el penedit, els adoradors, la praisers [d'Allah], els viatgers [per a la seva causa], qui arc i postrar [en oració], aquells que demanen el que està bé i prohibeixen el que està malament i aquells que observen els límits [conjunt per] Allah. I donar la bona nova als creients.

trans-unit.source: It is not for the Prophet and those who have believed to ask forgiveness for the polytheists, even if they were relatives, after it has become clear to them that they are companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: No és pel Profeta i qui he cregut a demanar perdó per les politeistes, fins i tot si eren parents, després ha quedat clar per a ells que són companys de Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: And the request of forgiveness of Abraham for his father was only because of a promise he had made to him. But when it became apparent to Abraham that his father was an enemy to Allah, he disassociated himself from him. Indeed was Abraham compassionate and patient.
trans-unit.target: I la petició de perdó per al seu pare Abraham era només per una promesa que havia fet a ell. Però quan es va fer evident a Abraham que el seu pare era un enemic a Allah, ell mateix dissociades d'ell. De fet va ser Abraham compassiu i pacient.

trans-unit.source: And Allah would not let a people stray after He has guided them until He makes clear to them what they should avoid. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: I Allah no deixaria una gent perduda després que ell ha guiat fins que deixa clar que el que han d'evitar. De fet, Allah està saber de totes les coses.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and causes death. And you have not besides Allah any protector or any helper.
trans-unit.target: De fet, a Allah pertany el dominion dels cels i la terra; Ell dóna vida i causa la mort. I té a més de no Allah cap protector o cap d'ajuda.

trans-unit.source: Allah has already forgiven the Prophet and the Muhajireen and the Ansar who followed him in the hour of difficulty after the hearts of a party of them had almost inclined [to doubt], and then He forgave them. Indeed, He was to them Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Allah ja ha perdonat el Profeta i la Muhajireen i l'Ansar que succeí a l'hora de dificultat després els cors d'una part d'ells havia inclinat gairebé [a dubtar], i després va perdonar-los. De fet, va ser a ells tipus i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And [He also forgave] the three who were left behind [and regretted their error] to the point that the earth closed in on them in spite of its vastness and their souls confined them and they were certain that there is no refuge from Allah except in Him. Then He turned to them so they could repent. Indeed, Allah is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I [ell també perdonava] les tres que van deixar [i es va penedir d'error] fins al punt que la terra tancat en ells tot i la seva immensitat i l'ànima es limita a ells i van ser segur que no hi ha cap refugi d'Allah excepte en ell. Llavors es va tornar a ells així que podria penedir. De fet, Allah és el Accepting de penediment, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and be with those who are true.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, por d'Allah i amb aquells que són veritables.

trans-unit.source: It was not [proper] for the people of Madinah and those surrounding them of the bedouins that they remain behind after [the departure of] the Messenger of Allah or that they prefer themselves over his self. That is because they are not afflicted by thirst or fatigue or hunger in the cause of Allah, nor do they tread on any ground that enrages the disbelievers, nor do they inflict upon an enemy any infliction but that is registered for them as a righteous deed. Indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: No [propi] per a les persones de Madinah i qui els envolten els beduïns que romanen darrere després [d] el Missatger d'Allah o que ells mateixos prefereixen sobre el seu propi. Allò és perquè ells no estan afectades per set o fatiga o la fam en la causa d'Allah, ni fer trepitjarem en qualsevol planta que s'enfurisma disbelievers, ni fer infligeixen un enemic infringir qualsevol sinó que està registrat per a ells com un justos fets. De fet, Allah no permet que es perd la recompensa dels autors de bo.

trans-unit.source: Nor do they spend an expenditure, small or large, or cross a valley but that it is registered for them that Allah may reward them for the best of what they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Ni fer passar una despesa, petit o gran, o creuar una vall, sinó que està registrat per a ells que Allah pot recompensar-los el millor de el que estaven fent.

trans-unit.source: And it is not for the believers to go forth [to battle] all at once. For there should separate from every division of them a group [remaining] to obtain understanding in the religion and warn their people when they return to them that they might be cautious.
trans-unit.target: I no és per als creients anar endavant [per batalla] tots alhora. Perquè hi haurà de separar de cada divisió d'ells un grup [restants] obtenir comprensió en la religió i advertir a la seva gent quan tornin a ells que podrien ser cautelós.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fight those adjacent to you of the disbelievers and let them find in you harshness. And know that Allah is with the righteous.
trans-unit.target: O que he cregut, lluitar contra aquells adjacents a vostè dels disbelievers i deixar-los trobar en vostè la duresa. I saber que Allah és amb els justos.

trans-unit.source: And whenever a surah is revealed, there are among the hypocrites those who say, "Which of you has this increased faith?" As for those who believed, it has increased them in faith, while they are rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: I cada vegada es revela un surah, hi ha entre els hipòcrites que diuen, "Qui de vosaltres té aquest augment fe?" Pel que fa a qui creu, ha augmentat-los en la fe, mentre que els alegrant.

trans-unit.source: But as for those in whose hearts is disease, it has [only] increased them in evil [in addition] to their evil. And they will have died while they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a aquells als cors del qual és malaltia, [només] incrementa-los en mal [a més] al seu mal. I es va morir mentre ells són disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that they are tried every year once or twice but then they do not repent nor do they remember?
trans-unit.target: No veuen que intentaren cada any una o dues vegades però llavors ells no penedir-se ni recordes?

trans-unit.source: And whenever a surah is revealed, they look at each other, [saying], "Does anyone see you?" and then they dismiss themselves. Allah has dismissed their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
trans-unit.target: I cada vegada es revela un surah, es veuen a l'altre, [dir], "Fa ningú ens veiem?" i llavors van acomiadar-se. Allah ha acomiadat seus cors perquè són persones que no entenen.

trans-unit.source: There has certainly come to you a Messenger from among yourselves. Grievous to him is what you suffer; [he is] concerned over you and to the believers is kind and merciful.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha sens dubte vénen a tu un Missatger entre vosaltres. Grievous li és que pateixes; [és] preocupat sobre vostè i els creients és misericordiós i amable.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad], say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne."
trans-unit.target: Però si s'allunyen, [O Muhammad], diuen, "Sufficient per a mi és Allah; no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell. En ell han confiat, i és el Senyor del gran tron."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the wise Book
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, ra. Aquests són els versos del llibre savi

trans-unit.source: Have the people been amazed that We revealed [revelation] to a man from among them, [saying], "Warn mankind and give good tidings to those who believe that they will have a [firm] precedence of honor with their Lord"? [But] the disbelievers say, "Indeed, this is an obvious magician."
trans-unit.target: Les persones han estat sorprès que ens va revelar [revelació] a un home entre ells, [dir], "Advertir la humanitat i donar la bona nova a aquells que creuen que tindran una prioritat [empresa] d'honor amb el seu senyor"? [Però] disbelievers dir, "de fet, això és un mag obvi".

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and the earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne, arranging the matter [of His creation]. There is no intercessor except after His permission. That is Allah, your Lord, so worship Him. Then will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: De fet, el seu senyor és Allah, que creava els cels i la terra en sis dies i després s'establí per sobre el tron, l'organització de la matèria [de la seva creació]. No hi ha cap intercesor excepte després de la seva autorització. Allah, el seu Senyor, tan adorar-lo. Llavors vostè no recordarà?

trans-unit.source: To Him is your return all together. [It is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. Indeed, He begins the [process of] creation and then repeats it that He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds, in justice. But those who disbelieved will have a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to deny.
trans-unit.target: A ell és el seu retorn tots junts. [És] la promesa d'Allah [que] veritat. De fet, comença la creació [procés de] i després repeteix-lo que ell pot premiar aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos, en justícia. Però els que dubtaven tindrà una beguda d'escaldat de l'aigua i un dolor càstig pel que es va negar.

trans-unit.source: It is He who made the sun a shining light and the moon a derived light and determined for it phases - that you may know the number of years and account [of time]. Allah has not created this except in truth. He details the signs for a people who know
trans-unit.target: És el que va fer el sol un brillant llum i la lluna un derivat clara i decidida per això fases - que vostè pot saber el nombre d'anys i compte [de temps]. Allah no ha creat aquest excepte en veritat. Detalla els signes per a un poble que sap

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in the alternation of the night and the day and [in] what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth are signs for a people who fear Allah
trans-unit.target: De fet, en l'alternança de la nit i el dia i [a] Què Allah ha creat en el cel i la terra són signes d'un poble que la por d'Allah

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not expect the meeting with Us and are satisfied with the life of this world and feel secure therein and those who are heedless of Our signs
trans-unit.target: De fet, qui no esperar que la reunió amb nosaltres i estan satisfets amb la vida d'aquest món i sentir-vos segurs aquí i els que són despreocupats de rètols

trans-unit.source: For those their refuge will be the Fire because of what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Per als seu refugi serà el foc a causa de què utilitzaven per guanyar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - their Lord will guide them because of their faith. Beneath them rivers will flow in the Gardens of Pleasure
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos - seva voluntat Senyor guiar-los a causa de la seva fe. Sota ells rius correrà en el jardins de plaer

trans-unit.source: Their call therein will be, "Exalted are You, O Allah," and their greeting therein will be, "Peace." And the last of their call will be, "Praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds!"
trans-unit.target: Seva convocatòria s'hi serà, "Exaltat ets, oh Allah", i la salutació en això serà, "Pau." I serà l'últim de la seva trucada, "Lloança a Allah, Senyor dels mons!"

trans-unit.source: And if Allah was to hasten for the people the evil [they invoke] as He hastens for them the good, their term would have been ended for them. But We leave the ones who do not expect the meeting with Us, in their transgression, wandering blindly
trans-unit.target: I si Allah va accelerar per a la gent el mal [invocaven] com ell accelera per a ells el bo, el mandat haurien estat acabat per a ells. Però deixem els que no esperava la reunió amb nosaltres, en la seva transgressió, vagant cegament

trans-unit.source: And when affliction touches man, he calls upon Us, whether lying on his side or sitting or standing; but when We remove from him his affliction, he continues [in disobedience] as if he had never called upon Us to [remove] an affliction that touched him. Thus is made pleasing to the transgressors that which they have been doing
trans-unit.target: I quan aflicció toca home, ell anomena sobre nosaltres, si estirat sobre el costat o assegut o de peu; però quan ens treuen d'ell la seva aflicció, continua [en desobediència] com si mai havia cridat sobre nosaltres [treure] una nafra que li va tocar. Així es fa agradable pels transgressors que ho estan fent

trans-unit.source: And We had already destroyed generations before you when they wronged, and their messengers had come to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe. Thus do We recompense the criminal people
trans-unit.target: I ja ens havia destruït generacions abans quan van injustament i els seus missatgers havia arribat a ells amb proves clares, però no es creu. Així ens recompensa la gent penal

trans-unit.source: Then We made you successors in the land after them so that We may observe how you will do.
trans-unit.target: Llavors vam fer vostè els successors en la terra després d'ells per tal que es pot observar com ho faràs.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Bring us a Qur'an other than this or change it." Say, [O Muhammad], "It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
trans-unit.target: I quan els nostres versos són recita'ls evidències clares, aquells que no esperen la reunió amb nosaltres diu: "ens porten un Alcorà tret o canviar-lo." Dir, [O Muhammad], "no és per a mi per canviar-lo en la meva pròpia voluntat. Que només seguir el que es revela a mi. De fet em temo, si jo hauria desobeir el meu Senyor, el càstig d'un gran dia."

trans-unit.source: Say, "If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had remained among you a lifetime before it. Then will you not reason?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, "si Allah tenia willed, vols no han recitat a vostè, ni va hauria fet es conegut, perquè havia quedat entre vosaltres abans que tota la vida. Llavors ho faràs no raó?"

trans-unit.source: So who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah or denies His signs? Indeed, the criminals will not succeed
trans-unit.target: Així que és més injust que el que s'inventa una mentida Allah o nega els seus signes? De fet, els criminals no reeixirà

trans-unit.source: And they worship other than Allah that which neither harms them nor benefits them, and they say, "These are our intercessors with Allah " Say, "Do you inform Allah of something He does not know in the heavens or on the earth?" Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him
trans-unit.target: I altre que Allah que qual ni perjudica-los ni beneficis-los, i dir, "Aquests són nostres desvirtuïn amb Allah" veneren diuen, "Vostè informa Allah d'alguna cosa no sap al cel o a la terra?" Exaltat és ell i alta sobre el que es relacionen amb ell

trans-unit.source: And mankind was not but one community [united in religion], but [then] they differed. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them [immediately] concerning that over which they differ.
trans-unit.target: I la humanitat no era més que una comunitat [Regne en religió], però [llavors] que diferien. I si no fos per una paraula que precedida del seu Senyor, vols han estat jutjat entre ells [immediatament] sobre que sobre les quals difereixen.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why is a sign not sent down to him from his Lord?" So say, "The unseen is only for Allah [to administer], so wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
trans-unit.target: I diuen, "per què és un signe no enviat a ell del seu senyor?" Diu així: "invisibles és només per a Allah [gestionar], així que espera; de fet, estic amb tu entre aquells que esperar. "

trans-unit.source: And when We give the people a taste of mercy after adversity has touched them, at once they conspire against Our verses. Say, "Allah is swifter in strategy." Indeed, Our messengers record that which you conspire
trans-unit.target: I quan donem la gent un gust de la misericòrdia després de l'adversitat ha tocat a ells, a la vegada van conspirar contra nostres versos. Dir: "Allah és eixamplada en estratègia". De fet, nostres missatgers enregistrar allò que vostè conspirar

trans-unit.source: It is He who enables you to travel on land and sea until, when you are in ships and they sail with them by a good wind and they rejoice therein, there comes a storm wind and the waves come upon them from everywhere and they assume that they are surrounded, supplicating Allah, sincere to Him in religion, "If You should save us from this, we will surely be among the thankful."
trans-unit.target: És el que li permet viatjar per terra i mar fins que, quan ets en vaixells i van navegar amb ells per un bon vent i s'alegren, arriba un vent de tempesta i vinguda a ells per les onades de tot arreu i assumeixen que les envolta, súplica Allah, sincer a ell en la religió, "si que ha de salvar-nos d'aquesta segurament estarem entre el agraïts. "

trans-unit.source: But when He saves them, at once they commit injustice upon the earth without right. O mankind, your injustice is only against yourselves, [being merely] the enjoyment of worldly life. Then to Us is your return, and We will inform you of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Però quan ell guarda, a la vegada cometre injustícia a la terra sense dret. O la injustícia de la humanitat, és només contra vosaltres, [ser merament] el gaudi de la vida mundana. Llavors ens és el seu retorn, i et mantindrem informat de què solia fer.

trans-unit.source: The example of [this] worldly life is but like rain which We have sent down from the sky that the plants of the earth absorb - [those] from which men and livestock eat - until, when the earth has taken on its adornment and is beautified and its people suppose that they have capability over it, there comes to it Our command by night or by day, and We make it as a harvest, as if it had not flourished yesterday. Thus do We explain in detail the signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: És l'exemple de [aquesta] vida mundana però com pluja que ens han enviat del cel que les plantes de la terra absorbeix - [els] de menjar que els homes i bestiar - fins, la terra ha pres el seu guarniment i és embellint i la gent suposa que tenen capacitat sobre ella, arriba al nostre comanda de nit o de dia , i podem fer-ho com una collita, com si ahir no havia florit. Així expliquem amb detall els signes per a persones que donar idea.

trans-unit.source: And Allah invites to the Home of Peace and guides whom He wills to a straight path
trans-unit.target: I Allah convida a la casa de pau i guies qui ell voluntats per un camí dret

trans-unit.source: For them who have done good is the best [reward] and extra. No darkness will cover their faces, nor humiliation. Those are companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally
trans-unit.target: Per a ells el que han fet bé és el millor [recompensa] i extres. No hi ha foscor cobrirà els rostres, ni la humiliació. Aquells són companys del paradís; es s'atinguin eternament en el mateix

trans-unit.source: But they who have earned [blame for] evil doings - the recompense of an evil deed is its equivalent, and humiliation will cover them. They will have from Allah no protector. It will be as if their faces are covered with pieces of the night - so dark [are they]. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Però que han guanyat [culpa] mal fets - la recompensa d'una acció mal és el seu equivalent i humiliació a cobrir-los. Hauran d'Allah cap protector. Serà com si els rostres estan cobertes amb trossos de la nit - tan fosc [són]. Aquells són companys del foc; es queda aquí eternament.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will gather them all together - then We will say to those who associated others with Allah, "[Remain in] your place, you and your 'partners.' " Then We will separate them, and their "partners" will say, "You did not used to worship us,
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit, O Muhammad], el dia ens recollirà-los tots junts - llavors direm als que altres associats a Allah, "[romanen en] el seu lloc, vostè i el seu"socis". "Llavors podem separar-los, i dirà seus"socis","no solia venerar nosaltres,

trans-unit.source: And sufficient is Allah as a witness between us and you that we were of your worship unaware."
trans-unit.target: I prou és Allah com a testimoni entre nosaltres i que estàvem de vostra mercé conscient."

trans-unit.source: There, [on that Day], every soul will be put to trial for what it did previously, and they will be returned to Allah, their master, the Truth, and lost from them is whatever they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Allà, [en aquell dia], cada ànima es posarà a prova per el que va fer anteriorment, i es va tornar a Allah, el seu amo, la veritat i perdut d'ells és el que utilitzaven per inventar.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who provides for you from the heaven and the earth? Or who controls hearing and sight and who brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and who arranges [every] matter?" They will say, "Allah," so say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, "que proporciona per tu el cel i la terra? O qui controla l'oïda i vista i porta els vius dels morts i ressuscita els morts fora de la seva vida i que organitza [cada] matèria? Ells es diuen, "Allah," així que dir, "llavors vostè por no es ell?"

trans-unit.source: For that is Allah, your Lord, the Truth. And what can be beyond truth except error? So how are you averted?
trans-unit.target: Per això és Allah, el seu Senyor, la veritat. I què pot ser més enllà de veritat excepte error? Llavors, com vostè són evitats?

trans-unit.source: Thus the word of your Lord has come into effect upon those who defiantly disobeyed - that they will not believe.
trans-unit.target: Així la paraula del seu Senyor ha entrat en efecte en qui desafiant desobeir - que no creuran.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who begins creation and then repeats it?" Say, "Allah begins creation and then repeats it, so how are you deluded?"
trans-unit.target: Diuen, "S'ha de"socis"qualsevol que comença la creació i després repeteix-lo?" Dir: "Allah comença creació i després repeteix-lo, així com els que enganyat?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who guides to the truth?" Say, "Allah guides to the truth. So is He who guides to the truth more worthy to be followed or he who guides not unless he is guided? Then what is [wrong] with you - how do you judge?"
trans-unit.target: Diuen, "S'ha de"socis"qualsevol que governa a la veritat?" Dir, "guies d'Allah a la veritat. Així és el que guia a la veritat més digne de ser seguit o qui guies no menys que ell és guiat? Llavors què és [malament] amb vostè - com vol jutjar?"
