trans-unit.source: And most of them follow not except assumption. Indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: I la majoria d'ells seguir no excepte suposició. De fet, Assumpció compta no contra la veritat en absolut. De fet, Allah està saber de què fan.

trans-unit.source: And it was not [possible] for this Qur'an to be produced by other than Allah, but [it is] a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of the [former] Scripture, about which there is no doubt, from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no [possible] per aquesta Qur ' an ser produïts per diferents Allah, però [és] una confirmació del que era abans i una explicació detallada de l'escriptura [ex], sobre el qual no hi ha dubte, des del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [about the Prophet], "He invented it?" Say, "Then bring forth a surah like it and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: O fer diuen [sobre el Profeta], "va inventar-ho?" Dir, "llavors portar endavant una surah com això i crida a [d'assistència] qui pot a més d'Allah, si vostè ha de ser veraç".

trans-unit.source: Rather, they have denied that which they encompass not in knowledge and whose interpretation has not yet come to them. Thus did those before them deny. Then observe how was the end of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Més aviat, han negat que que abasten no en el coneixement i la interpretació encara no ha arribat a ells. Així, aquells abans d'ells ho va negar. Llavors observar com era el final de la malfactors.

trans-unit.source: And of them are those who believe in it, and of them are those who do not believe in it. And your Lord is most knowing of the corrupters
trans-unit.target: I d'ells són els que hi creuen, i ells són els que no creuen en això. I el seu senyor és saber la majoria de les corrupters

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad], then say, "For me are my deeds, and for you are your deeds. You are disassociated from what I do, and I am disassociated from what you do."
trans-unit.target: I si el neguen, [O Muhammad], llavors diuen, "per a mi els meus actes i per a els seus actes. Estan dissociades de què fer, i jo estic dissociades de què fer."

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who listen to you. But can you cause the deaf to hear, although they will not use reason?
trans-unit.target: I entre ells són els que escoltar-lo. Però poden causar el sord a escoltar, encara que no vagin a utilitzar raó?

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who look at you. But can you guide the blind although they will not [attempt to] see?
trans-unit.target: I entre ells són els que miren. Però pot guiar els cecs encara que es no [intentar] veure?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all, but it is the people who are wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah no malament la gent gens, però és la gent que estan wronging-se.

trans-unit.source: And on the Day when He will gather them, [it will be] as if they had not remained [in the world] but an hour of the day, [and] they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided
trans-unit.target: I en el dia quan va reunir-se, [es] com si no havia quedat [en el món] però una hora del dia, [i] sabran mútuament. Els hauran perdut que nega la reunió amb Allah i no es van regir

trans-unit.source: And whether We show you some of what We promise them, [O Muhammad], or We take you in death, to Us is their return; then, [either way], Allah is a witness concerning what they are doing
trans-unit.target: I si et mostrem algunes de què ens comprometem-los, [O Muhammad], o ens portarà a la mort, ens és seu retorn; llavors, [qualsevol manera], Allah és un testimoni sobre el que estan fent

trans-unit.source: And for every nation is a messenger. So when their messenger comes, it will be judged between them in justice, and they will not be wronged
trans-unit.target: I per a cada nació és un Missatger. Així quan seu Missatger arriba, seran jutjats entre ells en justícia, i no ser injustament

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: I van dir: "quan és [el compliment de] Aquesta promesa, si vostè ha de ser veraç?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "I possess not for myself any harm or benefit except what Allah should will. For every nation is a [specified] term. When their time has come, then they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it]."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "tenen no per mi algun mal o beneficiar excepte Allah ha es. Per a cada nació és un terme [especificat]. Quan ha arribat la seva hora, llavors no quedarà darrere d'una hora, ni precedirà []."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if His punishment should come to you by night or by day - for which [aspect] of it would the criminals be impatient?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, "has considerat: si el seu càstig hauria d'arribar a vostè de nit o de dia - per a quin [aspecte] de la mateixa els criminals seria impacients?"

trans-unit.source: Then is it that when it has [actually] occurred you will believe in it? Now? And you were [once] for it impatient
trans-unit.target: Llavors, és que quan això ha ocorregut [en realitat] pensarà en ella? Ara? I tenien [una vegada] impacient

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said to those who had wronged, "Taste the punishment of eternity; are you being recompensed except for what you used to earn?"
trans-unit.target: Llavors es diu a qui havia injustament, "tastar el càstig de l'eternitat; són vostè recompensada excepte què vas guanyar?"

trans-unit.source: And they ask information of you, [O Muhammad], "Is it true?" Say, "Yes, by my Lord. Indeed, it is truth; and you will not cause failure [to Allah]."
trans-unit.target: I demanen informació de vostès, [O Muhammad], "és cert?" Dir, "Sí, Senyor. De fet, és veritat; i no farà falta [a Allah]."

trans-unit.source: And if each soul that wronged had everything on earth, it would offer it in ransom. And they will confide regret when they see the punishment; and they will be judged in justice, and they will not be wronged
trans-unit.target: I si cada ànima que injustament tenia tot a la terra, oferia en rescat. I es confien remordiment quan veuen el càstig; i seran jutjats en justícia, i no ser injustament

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. Unquestionably, the promise of Allah is truth, but most of them do not know
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte, a Allah pertany el que està en els cels i la terra. Sens dubte, la promesa d'Allah és veritat, però la majoria d'ells no saben

trans-unit.source: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you will be returned
trans-unit.target: Ell dóna vida i causa la mort, i a ell li serà retornat

trans-unit.source: O mankind, there has to come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers.
trans-unit.target: O la humanitat, hi ha arribat a instrucció vostè del seu Senyor i curació per què és en els pits i orientació i Misericòrdia per als creients.

trans-unit.source: Say, "In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "a la generositat d'Allah i en la seva misericòrdia - en la que anem a alegrar-se; és millor que el que s'acumulen."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you seen what Allah has sent down to you of provision of which you have made [some] lawful and [some] unlawful?" Say, "Has Allah permitted you [to do so], or do you invent [something] about Allah?"
trans-unit.target: Dir: "Has vist què Allah ha enviat a vostè de la prestació del qual ha fet legal [alguns] i [alguns]?" Dir: "Allah ha permès que [ho] o [quelcom] fer inventar Allah?"

trans-unit.source: And what will be the supposition of those who invent falsehood about Allah on the Day of Resurrection? Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of them are not grateful."
trans-unit.target: I quin serà el supòsit d'aquells que inventar falsedat sobre Allah el dia de resurrecció? De fet, Allah és plena de generositat a les persones, però la majoria no són agraït."

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], you are not [engaged] in any matter or recite any of the Qur'an and you [people] do not do any deed except that We are witness over you when you are involved in it. And not absent from your Lord is any [part] of an atom's weight within the earth or within the heaven or [anything] smaller than that or greater but that it is in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: I, [O Muhammad], no [participen] en qualsevol assumpte o recitar qualsevol de l'Alcorà i que [la gent] no fer qualsevol fet excepte que som testimoni sobre vostè quan vostè està involucrat en això. I no absent del seu senyor és qualsevol [part] del pes de de un Àtom dins la terra o dins el cel o [tot] major sinó que és de manera clara o més petit que el registre.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, [for] the allies of Allah there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte, [per] els aliats d'Allah hi haurà cap por sobre ells, ni es ells grieve

trans-unit.source: Those who believed and were fearing Allah
trans-unit.target: Els que creien i van ser tement Allah

trans-unit.source: For them are good tidings in the worldly life and in the Hereafter. No change is there in the words of Allah. That is what is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Per a ells són la bona nova a la vida mundana i en el futur. Cap canvi hi ha en paraules d'Allah. Això és què és la gran consecució.

trans-unit.source: And let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, honor [due to power] belongs to Allah entirely. He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I deixar no seu discurs plorar. De fet, honor [per poder] pertany a Allah totalment. És l'audiència, el saber.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth. And those who invoke other than Allah do not [actually] follow [His] "partners." They follow not except assumption, and they are not but falsifying
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte, a Allah pertany qui és en els cels i qui és a la terra. I qui l'invoquen altre que Allah no seguir [en realitat] [seva] "socis". Segueixen no excepte suposició, i no són sinó falsificació

trans-unit.source: It is He who made for you the night to rest therein and the day, giving sight. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: És el que va fer per a vostè la nit a descansar aquí i el dia, donant la vista. Fet que són signes d'una gent que escolta.

trans-unit.source: They have said, "Allah has taken a son." Exalted is He; He is the [one] Free of need. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth. You have no authority for this [claim]. Do you say about Allah that which you do not know?
trans-unit.target: Han dit, "Allah ha tingut un fill". Exaltat és ell; És el lliure [un] de necessitat. A ell pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. Teniu cap autoritat per aquest [demanda]. Et diuen sobre Allah que no saps?

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "De fet, aquells que inventar falsedat sobre Allah no tindrà èxit."

trans-unit.source: [For them is brief] enjoyment in this world; then to Us is their return; then We will make them taste the severe punishment because they used to disbelieve
trans-unit.target: [Per a ells és breu] gaudi en aquest món; llavors ens és seu retorn; llavors hem farà degustar el càstig greu donat que solien dubten

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the news of Noah, when he said to his people, "O my people, if my residence and my reminding of the signs of Allah has become burdensome upon you - then I have relied upon Allah. So resolve upon your plan and [call upon] your associates. Then let not your plan be obscure to you. Then carry it out upon me and do not give me respite.
trans-unit.target: I recitar-los la notícia de Noè, quan va dir al seu poble, "O poble meu, si la meva residència i meu recordant dels senyals d'Allah ha esdevingut oneroses sobre tu - llavors jo haver invocat Allah. Així resoldre en el seu pla i [invocarà] seus col • laboradors. Llavors que no el seu pla es obscura per a vostè. Llavors realitzar sobre mi i no em dóna respir.

trans-unit.source: And if you turn away [from my advice] then no payment have I asked of you. My reward is only from Allah, and I have been commanded to be of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: I si es gira fora [del meu consell] llavors cap pagament han vaig preguntar de vostès. Meva recompensa és només d'Allah, i jo he estat manat per ser dels musulmans.

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so We saved him and those with him in the ship and made them successors, and We drowned those who denied Our signs. Then see how was the end of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: I, li va negar perquè ens guarden ell i aquells amb ell en el vaixell i els va fer seus successors, i els que negaven rètols ofegat. Després de veure com era el final d'aquells que eren avisats.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent after him messengers to their peoples, and they came to them with clear proofs. But they were not to believe in that which they had denied before. Thus We seal over the hearts of the transgressors
trans-unit.target: Llavors hem enviat després d'ell missatgers als seus pobles, i van arribar a ells amb proves clares. Però eren de no creure en la qual s'havia negat abans. Així vam segellar en els cors dels transgressors

trans-unit.source: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment with Our signs, but they behaved arrogantly and were a criminal people
trans-unit.target: Llavors hem enviat després d'ells Moses i Aaron faraó i el seu establiment amb rètols, però es va comportar arrogantment no i eren un poble penal

trans-unit.source: So when there came to them the truth from Us, they said, "Indeed, this is obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Així que quan va venir a ells la veritat, ens van dir, "De fet, això és obvi màgia."

trans-unit.source: Moses said, "Do you say [thus] about the truth when it has come to you? Is this magic? But magicians will not succeed."
trans-unit.target: Moses va dir: "dius [així] sobre la veritat quan ha arribat a vostè? Això és màgia? Sinó mags no tindrà èxit."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us to turn us away from that upon which we found our fathers and so that you two may have grandeur in the land? And we are not believers in you."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "faci venir a nosaltres per convertir-nos de que en el qual trobem nostres pares i de manera que els dos poden tenir grandesa a la terra? I no som creients en tu."

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh said, "Bring to me every learned magician."
trans-unit.target: I el Faraó va dir, "Portar a mi cada mag après."

trans-unit.source: So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Throw down whatever you will throw."
trans-unit.target: Així que quan els mags van, Moses va dir a ells, "tirar avall tot el llançarà"

trans-unit.source: And when they had thrown, Moses said, "What you have brought is [only] magic. Indeed, Allah will expose its worthlessness. Indeed, Allah does not amend the work of corrupters.
trans-unit.target: I quan ells havia tirat, Moses va dir, "què t'han portat [només] màgic. De fet, Allah exposarà la seva inutilitat. De fet, Allah no modificar l'obra de corrupters.

trans-unit.source: And Allah will establish the truth by His words, even if the criminals dislike it."
trans-unit.target: I Allah establirà la veritat per les seves paraules, fins i tot si els criminals no els agrada.

trans-unit.source: But no one believed Moses, except [some] youths among his people, for fear of Pharaoh and his establishment that they would persecute them. And indeed, Pharaoh was haughty within the land, and indeed, he was of the transgressors
trans-unit.target: Però ningú creia Moses, excepte [alguns] joves entre la seva gent, per por al faraó i el seu establiment que vols perseguir-los. I de fet, faraó era altiva dins la terra, i de fet, va ser dels transgressors

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "O my people, if you have believed in Allah, then rely upon Him, if you should be Muslims."
trans-unit.target: I Moses va dir, «Poble meu, si han cregut en Allah, i després confiar en ell, si hauria de ser musulmans O.»

trans-unit.source: So they said, "Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people
trans-unit.target: Així que va dir, "a Allah comptem. Nostre Senyor, ens fan no [objectes de] judici per a la gent d'irregularitats

trans-unit.source: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: I salvar-nos per la seva pietat del poble incrèdul."

trans-unit.source: And We inspired to Moses and his brother, "Settle your people in Egypt in houses and make your houses [facing the] qiblah and establish prayer and give good tidings to the believers."
trans-unit.target: I ens va inspirar a Moses i el seu germà, "establir-se a la seva gent a Egipte en cases i fer el seu cases [davant la] Qiblah arreu i establir l'oració i donar la bona nova als creients."

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "Our Lord, indeed You have given Pharaoh and his establishment splendor and wealth in the worldly life, our Lord, that they may lead [men] astray from Your way. Our Lord, obliterate their wealth and harden their hearts so that they will not believe until they see the painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: I Moses va dir, "nostre Senyor, fet que ha donat faraó i el seu establiment esplendor i riquesa a la vida mundana, nostre Senyor, que es pot enredarà [homes] del seu camí. Nostre Senyor, esborrar el seu patrimoni i s'endureixin seu cor perquè no creuran fins que veuen el dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Your supplication has been answered." So remain on a right course and follow not the way of those who do not know."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] deia, "teva súplica ha estat contestada." Així romanen en un curs adequat i seguir no la manera d'aquells que no ho sé."

trans-unit.source: And We took the Children of Israel across the sea, and Pharaoh and his soldiers pursued them in tyranny and enmity until, when drowning overtook him, he said, "I believe that there is no deity except that in whom the Children of Israel believe, and I am of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Prenem nens d'Israel a través del mar i faraó i els seus soldats perseguit-los en tirania i l'enemistat fins que, quan l'ofegament li va arribar, va dir, "Crec que no hi ha cap Déu excepte que a qui creure els nens d'Israel, i jo sóc dels musulmans."

trans-unit.source: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?
trans-unit.target: Ara? I [ell] va desobeir abans i estaven de la corrupters?

trans-unit.source: So today We will save you in body that you may be to those who succeed you a sign. And indeed, many among the people, of Our signs, are heedless
trans-unit.target: Així que avui ens li estalviarà en el cos que pot estar a qui vostè tenir èxit un senyal. I de fet, molts entre la gent, dels nostres signes, són despreocupats

trans-unit.source: And We had certainty settled the Children of Israel in an agreeable settlement and provided them with good things. And they did not differ until [after] knowledge had come to them. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ
trans-unit.target: I vam tenir la certesa es va establir a nens d'Israel en un assentament agradable i proveït amb coses bones. I no difereixen fins [després] coneixement havia arribat a ells. De fet, el seu Senyor considerarà entre ells el dia de resurrecció que sobre les quals solien difereixen sobre

trans-unit.source: So if you are in doubt, [O Muhammad], about that which We have revealed to you, then ask those who have been reading the Scripture before you. The truth has certainly come to you from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
trans-unit.target: Així que si vostè està en dubte, [O Muhammad], sobre allò que ens ha revelat a vostè, llavors demanar aquells que han estat llegint abans de l'escriptura. La veritat ha arribat certament a vostè del seu Senyor, així que mai estar entre la callin.

trans-unit.source: And never be of those who deny the signs of Allah and [thus] be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: I mai no serà d'aquells que neguen els senyals d'Allah i [] que entre els perdedors.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those upon whom the word of your Lord has come into effect will not believe,
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells a qui la paraula del seu Senyor ha entrat en efecte no creurà,

trans-unit.source: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Fins i tot si cada signe hauria d'arribar a ells, fins que veuen el dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: Then has there not been a [single] city that believed so its faith benefited it except the people of Jonah? When they believed, We removed from them the punishment of disgrace in worldly life and gave them enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: Llavors no hi ha hagut una ciutat [sol] que creia perquè la seva fe beneficiat excepte la gent de Jonàs? Quan creien, hem tret d'ells el càstig de vergonya en la vida mundana i els va donar gaudi per un temps.

trans-unit.source: And had your Lord willed, those on earth would have believed - all of them entirely. Then, [O Muhammad], would you compel the people in order that they become believers?
trans-unit.target: I tenia el seu willed de Senyor, que a la terra hauria cregut - tots ells totalment. Llavors, [O Muhammad], vostè obligaria a la gent per tal que siguin creients?

trans-unit.source: And it is not for a soul to believe except by permission of Allah, and He will place defilement upon those who will not use reason.
trans-unit.target: I no és per a una ànima creure excepte per permís d'Allah, i es posarà a la corrupció a aquells que no utilitzarà la raó.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Observe what is in the heavens and earth." But of no avail will be signs or warners to a people who do not believe
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Observar el que està en el cel i la terra." Però de debades serà signes o lesprimeres a un poble que no creuen

trans-unit.source: So do they wait except for like [what occurred in] the days of those who passed on before them? Say, "Then wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
trans-unit.target: Així fer esperen excepte com [que va passar a] els dies dels que passaven davant d'ells? Dir, "i després esperar; de fet, estic amb tu entre aquells que esperar. "

trans-unit.source: Then We will save our messengers and those who have believed. Thus, it is an obligation upon Us that We save the believers
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens salvarà nostres missatgers i aquells que han cregut. Per tant, és una obligació sobre nosaltres que podem salvar els creients

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "O people, if you are in doubt as to my religion - then I do not worship those which you worship besides Allah; but I worship Allah, who causes your death. And I have been commanded to be of the believers
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "gent O, si vostè està en dubte pel que fa a la meva religió - llavors jo no veneren els que adoren a més d'Allah; però veneren Allah, que provoca la mort. I jo he estat manat per ser dels creients

trans-unit.source: And [commanded], 'Direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth, and never be of those who associate others with Allah;
trans-unit.target: [Comandant], ' dirigir la cara cap a la religió, inclinant la veritat i no ser d'aquells que associen altres amb Allah;

trans-unit.source: And do not invoke besides Allah that which neither benefits you nor harms you, for if you did, then indeed you would be of the wrongdoers.'"
trans-unit.target: I no invoquen a més d'Allah que qual ni beneficia ni fa mal, perquè si ho fes, fet després que seria de la malfactors.'"

trans-unit.source: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him; and if He intends for you good, then there is no repeller of His bounty. He causes it to reach whom He wills of His servants. And He is the Forgiving, the Merciful
trans-unit.target: I si Allah li toca amb l'adversitat, no hi ha cap transportista d'ell, excepte ell; i si pensa que bo, llavors hi ha cap repeller de la seva generositat. Ell fa que arribar a qui ell voluntats dels seus servents. I ell és l'indulgent, el Clement

trans-unit.source: Say, "O mankind, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray [in violation] against it. And I am not over you a manager."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "la humanitat O, la veritat ha arribat a vostè del seu Senyor, així qui està guiat només està guiat per [el benefici de] l'ànima, i qui es perd només passa per mal camí [en violació] contra d'ella. I no estic per tu un gestor."

trans-unit.source: And follow what is revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and be patient until Allah will judge. And He is the best of judges.
trans-unit.target: I seguir el que es revela a vostè, [O Muhammad], i ser pacient fins que Allah jutjarà. I el millor dels jutges.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book whose verses are perfected and then presented in detail from [one who is] Wise and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, ra. [és] un llibre del qual versos són perfeccionat i llavors presentaran en detall de [qui és] savi i Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: [Through a messenger, saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings,"
trans-unit.target: [A través d'un Missatger, dient], "no veneren excepte Allah. De fet, estic a vostè d'ell un Avisador i un portador de la bona nova "

trans-unit.source: And [saying], "Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him, [and] He will let you enjoy a good provision for a specified term and give every doer of favor his favor. But if you turn away, then indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a great Day.
trans-unit.target: I [dir], "buscar el perdó del seu Senyor i penedir-se a ell, [i] li permetrà gaudir d'una bona provisió d'un terme especificat i donar cada faci el favor de favor. Però si que allunyen, llavors, de fet, em temo que el càstig d'un gran dia.

trans-unit.source: To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent."
trans-unit.target: A Allah és el seu retorn, i és sobre totes les coses competents".

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, they the disbelievers turn away their breasts to hide themselves from Him. Unquestionably, [even] when they cover themselves in their clothing, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Indiscutiblement, ells els disbelievers allunyen seus pits per amagar-se d'ell. Sens dubte, [encara] Quan van cobrir-se en la seva roba, Allah sap què amaguen i què manifesten. De fet, és saber que dins els pits.

trans-unit.source: And there is no creature on earth but that upon Allah is its provision, and He knows its place of dwelling and place of storage. All is in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: I no hi ha cap criatura en terra, però que a Allah és la prestació, i sap seu lloc d'habitatge i lloc d'emmagatzematge. Tot està en un registre clar.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days - and His Throne had been upon water - that He might test you as to which of you is best in deed. But if you say, "Indeed, you are resurrected after death," those who disbelieve will surely say, "This is not but obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: I és ell qui creava els cels i la terra en sis dies - i havia estat seu tron a l'aigua - que ell podria provar vostè com a qui de vosaltres és el millor a l'escriptura. Però si vostè diu, "De fet, que són ressuscitat després de la mort," els que dubten diuen segurament, "Això no és màgia més que obvi."

trans-unit.source: And if We hold back from them the punishment for a limited time, they will surely say, "What detains it?" Unquestionably, on the Day it comes to them, it will not be averted from them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: I si tenim nou d'ells el càstig per un temps limitat, segurament dirà, "el que deté això?" Sens dubte, el dia es tracta d'ells, no poden evitar d'ells, i es veurà embolicat per què van utilitzar el ridícul.

trans-unit.source: And if We give man a taste of mercy from Us and then We withdraw it from him, indeed, he is despairing and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: I si donem home un gust de la misericòrdia de nosaltres i llavors podem retirar-lo d'ell, de fet, ell és desesperats i ingrat.

trans-unit.source: But if We give him a taste of favor after hardship has touched him, he will surely say, "Bad times have left me." Indeed, he is exultant and boastful -
trans-unit.target: Però si podem donar-li un gust de favor després dificultats ha commogut, segurament dirà, "mals temps m'ha deixat." En efecte, ell és exultant i fanfarró-

trans-unit.source: Except for those who are patient and do righteous deeds; those will have forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: Excepte els que són pacients i fer els justos fets; aquells tindran el perdó i la gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: Then would you possibly leave [out] some of what is revealed to you, or is your breast constrained by it because they say, "Why has there not been sent down to him a treasure or come with him an angel?" But you are only a warner. And Allah is Disposer of all things.
trans-unit.target: Llavors vostè possiblement deixaria [n] alguns dels què és revelat a vostè, o és el pit limitats per ella perquè diuen, "Per què hi ha no hagi estat enviat a ell un tresor o venir amb ell un àngel?" Però és només un Avisador. I Allah triturador de totes les coses.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Say, "Then bring ten surahs like it that have been invented and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: O diuen, "Va inventar-lo"? Dir, "llavors portar deu surahs com això que haver estat inventat i crida [per assistència] qui pot a més d'Allah, si vostè ha de ser veraç."

trans-unit.source: And if they do not respond to you - then know that the Qur'an was revealed with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no deity except Him. Then, would you [not] be Muslims?
trans-unit.target: I si no van respondre a vostè - llavors sap que el Qur ' an es revelava amb el coneixement d'Allah i que no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell. Llavors, [no] seria musulmans?

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires the life of this world and its adornments - We fully repay them for their deeds therein, and they therein will not be deprived.
trans-unit.target: Qui desitja la vida d'aquest món i els seus guarniments - estem plenament pagar-los per les seves accions en el mateix, i aquí es no veuran privats.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones for whom there is not in the Hereafter but the Fire. And lost is what they did therein, and worthless is what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els que per qui no hi ha en el futur però el foc. Perdut és el que van fer en el mateix i és inútil el que acostumaven a fer.

trans-unit.source: So is one who [stands] upon a clear evidence from his Lord [like the aforementioned]? And a witness from Him follows it, and before it was the Scripture of Moses to lead and as mercy. Those [believers in the former revelations] believe in the Qur'an. But whoever disbelieves in it from the [various] factions - the Fire is his promised destination. So be not in doubt about it. Indeed, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Així que és un que [es] en una evidència clara del seu Senyor [com l'esmentada]? I segueix un testimoni d'ell, i abans era l'escriptura de Moses liderar i com misericòrdia. [Els creients en les revelacions ex] creuen que al Qur ' an. Però qui disbelieves en això de les faccions [diversos] - el foc és la seva destinació promès. Així no que hi ha dubte sobre això. De fet, és la veritat del seu Senyor, però no crec que la majoria de les persones.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah? Those will be presented before their Lord, and the witnesses will say, "These are the ones who lied against their Lord." Unquestionably, the curse of Allah is upon the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: I qui és més injust que el que s'inventa una mentida Allah? Aquells es presentarà davant seu Senyor, i els testimonis dirà, "Aquests són els que mentir contra el seu senyor". Sens dubte, la maledicció d'Allah és sobre els malfactors.

trans-unit.source: Who averted [people] from the way of Allah and sought to make it [seem] deviant while they, concerning the Hereafter, were disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Qui evitat [persones] de la manera d'Allah i buscat fer-ho [semblar] anormals mentre que, pel que fa a la d'ara endavant, estaven disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Those were not causing failure [to Allah] on earth, nor did they have besides Allah any protectors. For them the punishment will be multiplied. They were not able to hear, nor did they see.
trans-unit.target: Aquells no estan causant insuficiència [a Allah] a la terra, ni tenien a més d'Allah qualsevol protectores. Per a ells el càstig es multiplicarà. No van poder escoltar, ni es veu.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones who will have lost themselves, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els que s'han perdut-se i perdre d'ells és el que es va inventar.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they in the Hereafter who will be the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: Cert, és en el futur que seran els grans perdedors.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds and humbled themselves to their Lord - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide eternally therein.
trans-unit.target: De fet, ells els que creu i fet escriptures justos i humiliat a si mateixos al seu Senyor - són companys del paradís; s complir eternament en el mateix.

trans-unit.source: The example of the two parties is like the blind and deaf, and the seeing and hearing. Are they equal in comparison? Then, will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: L'exemple de les dues parts és com els cecs i sords i el veure i escoltar. Són iguals en comparació? Llavors, vostè no recordarà?

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Indeed, I am to you a clear warner
trans-unit.target: I hem tingut sens dubte enviat Noah al seu poble, [dir], "de fet, jo sóc per a tu un Avisador clar

trans-unit.source: That you not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a painful day."
trans-unit.target: Que no et veneren excepte Allah. De fet, em temo que el càstig d'un dolor dia."

trans-unit.source: So the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "We do not see you but as a man like ourselves, and we do not see you followed except by those who are the lowest of us [and] at first suggestion. And we do not see in you over us any merit; rather, we think you are liars."
trans-unit.target: Així els eminents entre els que dubtaven del seu poble, va dir, "no ens veiem però com un home com nosaltres mateixos, i que no veiem seguia excepte per aquells que són els més baixos de nosaltres [i] al primer suggeriment. I no veiem en tu sobre nosaltres algun mèrit; més aviat, pensem que són mentiders."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord while He has given me mercy from Himself but it has been made unapparent to you, should we force it upon you while you are averse to it?
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "O meu poble ha considerat: si hauria de ser en evidència clara del meu Senyor mentre ell m'ha donat Misericòrdia d'ell mateix però s'ha fet unapparent per a vostè, hauria ens força a vostè mentre és reticent a això?

trans-unit.source: And O my people, I ask not of you for it any wealth. My reward is not but from Allah. And I am not one to drive away those who have believed. Indeed, they will meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people behaving ignorantly.
trans-unit.target: I Oh poble meu, ho no de vostè qualsevol riquesa. La meva recompensa no és sinó des d'Allah. I jo no sóc un d'allunyar els qui he cregut. De fet, coneixeran el seu Senyor, però veig que ets un poble comportant ignorància.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: I O poble meu, que em protegeixi d'Allah si em va conduir-los fora? Llavors es vostè no pot recordar?

trans-unit.source: And I do not tell you that I have the depositories [containing the provision] of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel, nor do I say of those upon whom your eyes look down that Allah will never grant them any good. Allah is most knowing of what is within their souls. Indeed, I would then be among the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: I no et dic que tinc els dipòsits [que conté la disposició] d'Allah o que sé invisibles, ni fer et dic que sóc un àngel, ni ho dic d'aquells a qui els teus ulls contemplen que Allah no concedirà-los cap bé. Allah està saber més del que és dins l'ànima. De fet, llavors estaria entre els malfactors."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Noah, you have disputed us and been frequent in dispute of us. So bring us what you threaten us, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O Noah, ens discutida i estat freqüents en disputa de nosaltres. Així ens porten el ens amenacen si hauria de ser de la veritat."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause [Him] failure.
trans-unit.target: Va dir: "Allah només portarà-lo a vostè si Ell voluntats, i no farà que [ell] fracàs.

trans-unit.source: And my advice will not benefit you - although I wished to advise you - If Allah should intend to put you in error. He is your Lord, and to Him you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: I el meu consell no beneficiarà a vostè - encara que desitjava assessorar-lo - si Allah ha la intenció de posar-te en l'error. Ell és el seu Senyor, i a ell li serà retornat."

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [about Prophet Muhammad], "He invented it"? Say, "If I have invented it, then upon me is [the consequence of] my crime; but I am innocent of what [crimes] you commit."
trans-unit.target: O fer diuen [sobre Prophet Muhammad], "va inventar-lo"? Dir, "si he inventat això, llavors em és [la conseqüència de] el meu crim; però jo sóc innocent dels quin crims] cometre. "

trans-unit.source: And it was revealed to Noah that, "No one will believe from your people except those who have already believed, so do not be distressed by what they have been doing.
trans-unit.target: I es va revelar a Noah, que "ningú va a creure des de la seva gent excepte aquells que ja han cregut, perquè no ser afligit per el he estat fent.

trans-unit.source: And construct the ship under Our observation and Our inspiration and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are [to be] drowned."
trans-unit.target: I construir el vaixell sota la nostra observació i la nostra inspiració i no abordar mi sobre qui han tractat injustament; de fet, són [ser] ofegat. "

trans-unit.source: And he constructed the ship, and whenever an assembly of the eminent of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him. He said, "If you ridicule us, then we will ridicule you just as you ridicule.
trans-unit.target: I va construir el vaixell, i quan sigui que una Assemblea de la eminents de la seva gent va passar per ell, ell ridiculitzat. Va dir, "si que se'ns riuran, llavors es ridícul igual que ridiculitzar.

trans-unit.source: And you are going to know who will get a punishment that will disgrace him [on earth] and upon whom will descend an enduring punishment [in the Hereafter]."
trans-unit.target: I has de saber que rebrà un càstig que li serà vergonya [de terra] i a qui baixar una duradora càstig [en el futur]."

trans-unit.source: [So it was], until when Our command came and the oven overflowed, We said, "Load upon the ship of each [creature] two mates and your family, except those about whom the word has preceded, and [include] whoever has believed." But none had believed with him, except a few.
trans-unit.target: [Tant és], fins quan va arribar el nostre domini i el forn va desbordar, ens va dir, "Càrrega en el vaixell de cada dos companys de [criatura] i la seva família, excepte aquells sobre els quals la paraula ha precedit i [són] qui ha cregut." Però cap havia cregut amb ell, excepte algun.

trans-unit.source: And [Noah] said, "Embark therein; in the name of Allah is its course and its anchorage. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: I [Noah] deia, "embarcar-se en ell; en nom d'Allah és el seu curs i el seu ancoratge. De fet, el meu Senyor és indulgent i Clement."

trans-unit.source: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains, and Noah called to his son who was apart [from them], "O my son, come aboard with us and be not with the disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: I navegat amb ells a través de les ones com muntanyes i Noah diu al seu fill que era [d], "O el meu fill, Vine a bord amb nosaltres i no ser amb els disbelievers."

trans-unit.source: [But] he said, "I will take refuge on a mountain to protect me from the water." [Noah] said, "There is no protector today from the decree of Allah, except for whom He gives mercy." And the waves came between them, and he was among the drowned.
trans-unit.target: [Però] va dir, "Vaig a prendre refugi en una muntanya per protegir-me de l'aigua." [Noah], va dir, "No hi ha cap protector d'avui el decret d'Allah, excepte qui imparteix misericòrdia." I les ones va entre ells, i va ser entre el ofegada.

trans-unit.source: And it was said, "O earth, swallow your water, and O sky, withhold [your rain]." And the water subsided, and the matter was accomplished, and the ship came to rest on the [mountain of] Judiyy. And it was said, "Away with the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: I es va dir, "O terra, empassar l'aigua i O cel, retenir [la pluja]." I calmar l'aigua i l'assumpte va ser acomplert, i el vaixell va venir a descansar a la [muntanya de] Judiyy. I va dir: "Lluny amb la gent d'irregularitats".

trans-unit.source: And Noah called to his Lord and said, "My Lord, indeed my son is of my family; and indeed, Your promise is true; and You are the most just of judges!"
trans-unit.target: I Noè diu al seu Senyor i va dir: "Senyor, de fet el meu fill és de la meva família; i de fet, la seva promesa és cert; i són la majoria de jutges!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "O Noah, indeed he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge. Indeed, I advise you, lest you be among the ignorant."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "O Noah, fet que no és de la seva família; de fet, ell és [un del qual] obra era diferent justos, així que em demanen no que sobre la qual teniu cap coneixement. De fet, li aconsello que, perquè no es entre els ignorants. "

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers."
trans-unit.target: [Noah], va dir, "el meu Senyor, vaig buscar refugi en tu de demanar que dels quals vaig tenir cap coneixement. I llevat que em perdoni i tenir pietat sobre mi, vaig a estar entre els perdedors.

trans-unit.source: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you and upon nations [descending] from those with you. But other nations [of them] We will grant enjoyment; then there will touch them from Us a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Es va dir, "O Noah, desembarquen en seguretat de nosaltres i benediccions a vostè i a les Nacions [descendent] d'aquells amb vostè. Però altres nacions [ells] ens concedirà gaudi; llavors hi tocarà ells de nosaltres un dolor càstig."

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, [O Muhammad]. You knew it not, neither you nor your people, before this. So be patient; indeed, the [best] outcome is for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Que és de les notícies d'invisibles que podem revelar a vostè, [O Muhammad]. Vostè sabia que no, ni tu ni el teu poble, abans d'això. Així sigui pacient; de fet, el resultat [millor] és per al recte.

trans-unit.source: And to 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors [of falsehood].
trans-unit.target: I ' Aad [hem enviat] seu germà Hud. Va dir, "O poble meu, venerar Allah; teniu cap deïtat diferent d'ell. No ets però inventors [de falsedat].

trans-unit.source: O my people, I do not ask you for it any reward. My reward is only from the one who created me. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Oh poble meu, no li demano això cap recompensa. La meva recompensa és només de qui em creat. Llavors es vostè raó no?

trans-unit.source: And O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in showers and increase you in strength [added] to your strength. And do not turn away, [being] criminals."
trans-unit.target: I O poble meu, demana perdó del seu Senyor i llavors penedir-se a ell. Ell enviarà [pluja àcida] el cel sobre tu a les dutxes i major força [afegeix] a la seva força. I no allunyen, [ser] delinqüents."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Hud, you have not brought us clear evidence, and we are not ones to leave our gods on your say-so. Nor are we believers in you.
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O Hud, no ens han donat proves clares, i no som els nostres déus de deixar el seu say-so. Ni som creients en tu.

trans-unit.source: We only say that some of our gods have possessed you with evil." He said, "Indeed, I call Allah to witness, and witness [yourselves] that I am free from whatever you associate with Allah
trans-unit.target: Només diem que alguns dels nostres déus tenien potes amb mal." Va dir, "de fet, d'anomenar Allah testimoni i presenciar [vosaltres] que estic lliure de qualsevol cosa associem amb Allah

trans-unit.source: Other than Him. So plot against me all together; then do not give me respite.
trans-unit.target: Altre que ell. Així complot contra mi tots junts; llavors no em donen respir.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock. Indeed, my Lord is on a path [that is] straight."
trans-unit.target: De fet, haver invocat Allah, Senyor i el seu Senyor. No hi ha cap criatura però que exerceix el seu forelock. De fet, el Senyor és sobre un camí [que] recta. "

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [say], "I have already conveyed that with which I was sent to you. My Lord will give succession to a people other than you, and you will not harm Him at all. Indeed my Lord is, over all things, Guardian."
trans-unit.target: Però si s'allunyen, [dir], "em tenen ja va transmetre que amb la qual vaig ser enviat a vostè. Senyor donarà successió a una gent que no sigui vostè, i vostè no perjudicarà ell gens. Fet meu Senyor és sobre totes les coses, Guardian."

trans-unit.source: And when Our command came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us; and We saved them from a harsh punishment.
trans-unit.target: I quan va arribar la nostra comanda, hem salvat Hud i aquells que creu amb ell, per misericòrdia de nosaltres; i ens salvava de un càstig dur.

trans-unit.source: And that was 'Aad, who rejected the signs of their Lord and disobeyed His messengers and followed the order of every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: I que va ser ' Aad, que va rebutjar els senyals del seu Senyor i desobeir els seus missatgers i seguir l'ordre de cada tirà obstinada.

trans-unit.source: And they were [therefore] followed in this world with a curse and [as well] on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, 'Aad denied their Lord; then away with 'Aad, the people of Hud.
trans-unit.target: I [per això] s'han seguit en aquest món amb una maledicció i [també] en el dia de resurrecció. Sens dubte, ' Aad nega el seu Senyor; llavors fora amb ' Aad, la gent de Hud.

trans-unit.source: And to Thamud [We sent] their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. He has produced you from the earth and settled you in it, so ask forgiveness of Him and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive."
trans-unit.target: I Thamud [hem enviat] seu germà Salih. Va dir, "O poble meu, venerar Allah; teniu cap deïtat diferent d'ell. Ha produït des de la terra i es va establir en ella, així que demana perdó d'ell i llavors penedir-se a ell. De fet, senyor és a prop i sensible".

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Salih, you were among us a man of promise before this. Do you forbid us to worship what our fathers worshipped? And indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O Salih, eres entre nosaltres un home de la promesa abans d'això. Que els prohibeixen nos a adorar el que nostres pares adorat? I en efecte, sobre allò que vostè, ens conviden a dubte inquietant."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has given me mercy from Himself, who would protect me from Allah if I disobeyed Him? So you would not increase me except in loss.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "O poble meu, has considerat: si hauria de ser en evidència clara del meu Senyor, i ell m'ha donat Misericòrdia d'ell mateix, que em protegeixi d'Allah si vaig desobeir-lo? Així que vostè no augmentaria mi excepte pèrdua.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, this is the she-camel of Allah - [she is] to you a sign. So let her feed upon Allah 's earth and do not touch her with harm, or you will be taken by an impending punishment."
trans-unit.target: I el meu poble, O això és el camell ell d'Allah - [és] a vostè un senyal. Així que ella menjar a terra d'Allah i no tocar-la amb dany o que es prendran per un càstig imminent."

trans-unit.source: But they hamstrung her, so he said, "Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days. That is a promise not to be denied."
trans-unit.target: Però ella, hamstrung així deia, "gaudeix-ne en les seves llars durant tres dies. Això és una promesa de negar".

trans-unit.source: So when Our command came, We saved Salih and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us, and [saved them] from the disgrace of that day. Indeed, it is your Lord who is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Així que quan va arribar la nostra comanda, hem salvat Salih i aquells que creu amb ell, per misericòrdia de nosaltres i [salvava] de la desgràcia d'aquell dia. De fet, és el seu Senyor, que és l'abast, l'exaltat en podria.

trans-unit.source: And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
trans-unit.target: I al sortir van confiscar qui havia injustament, i esdevingueren dins casa [cadàvers] caigut propens

trans-unit.source: As if they had never prospered therein. Unquestionably, Thamud denied their Lord; then, away with Thamud.
trans-unit.target: Com si mai no havia prosperat aquí. Sens dubte, Thamud va negar el seu Senyor; llavors, amb Thamud.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did Our messengers come to Abraham with good tidings; they said, "Peace." He said, "Peace," and did not delay in bringing [them] a roasted calf.
trans-unit.target: I certament nostres missatgers venia a Abraham amb bona nova; deien, "Pau". Va dir, "La Pau" i arribà a [ells] portant un vedell rostit.

trans-unit.source: But when he saw their hands not reaching for it, he distrusted them and felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not. We have been sent to the people of Lot."
trans-unit.target: Però quan va veure les seves mans no assolir-ho, inspiraven i sentir d'ells l'aprehensió. Deien, "no tinguis por. Hem estat enviat a la gent de Lot."

trans-unit.source: And his Wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob.
trans-unit.target: I la seva dona estava de peu, i ella va somriure. Després ens va donar la bona nova d'Isaac i després Isaac, Jacob.

trans-unit.source: She said, "Woe to me! Shall I give birth while I am an old woman and this, my husband, is an old man? Indeed, this is an amazing thing!"
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, «Ai a mi! Seran vaig parir mentre jo sóc una dona vella i això, el meu marit, és un home vell? De fet, això és una cosa sorprenent!"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Are you amazed at the decree of Allah? May the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon you, people of the house. Indeed, He is Praiseworthy and Honorable."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "són vostè sorprès el decret d'Allah? Pot ser la pietat d'Allah i la seva benedicció sobre vosaltres, gent de la casa. De fet, ell és Praiseworthy i Honorable".

trans-unit.source: And when the fright had left Abraham and the good tidings had reached him, he began to argue with Us concerning the people of Lot.
trans-unit.target: I quan l'ensurt havia deixat d'Abraham i la bona nova s'havia arribat a ell, va començar a discutir amb nosaltres pel que fa a la gent del Lot.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Abraham was forbearing, grieving and [frequently] returning [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: De fet, Abraham va ser forbearing, dol i tornar [sovint] [a Allah].

trans-unit.source: [The angels said], "O Abraham, give up this [plea]. Indeed, the command of your Lord has come, and indeed, there will reach them a punishment that cannot be repelled."
trans-unit.target: [Els àngels deia], "O Abraham, renunciar a aquest [petició]. De fet, l'ordre del seu Senyor ha arribat i de fet, hi arribarà-los un càstig que no pot ser rebutjat."

trans-unit.source: And when Our messengers, [the angels], came to Lot, he was anguished for them and felt for them great discomfort and said, "This is a trying day."
trans-unit.target: I quan nostres missatgers, [àngels], arribar a molt, va ser violentat per a ells i sentir-los gran malestar i deia, "Aquest és un dia tractant".

trans-unit.source: And his people came hastening to him, and before [this] they had been doing evil deeds. He said, "O my people, these are my daughters; they are purer for you. So fear Allah and do not disgrace me concerning my guests. Is there not among you a man of reason?"
trans-unit.target: Seu poble va accelerar a ell, i abans [això] que havia estat fent males obres. Va dir, "la meva gent, O són les meves filles; són més pur per a vostè. Així tingui por d'Allah i vergonya no mi sobre els meus convidats. Hi ha no entre vosaltres, un home de raó? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "You have already known that we have not concerning your daughters any claim, and indeed, you know what we want."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Ja ha conegut que tenim no relatives a les seves filles qualsevol reclamació, i de fet, vostè sap el que volem."

trans-unit.source: He said, "If only I had against you some power or could take refuge in a strong support."
trans-unit.target: Va dir: "Si només em tenia contra algun poder o poder refugiar-se en un fort suport."

trans-unit.source: The angels said, "O Lot, indeed we are messengers of your Lord; [therefore], they will never reach you. So set out with your family during a portion of the night and let not any among you look back - except your wife; indeed, she will be struck by that which strikes them. Indeed, their appointment is [for] the morning. Is not the morning near?"
trans-unit.target: Àngels va dir, "O molt, de fet estem missatgers del seu Senyor; [doncs], ells mai arribaran a vostè. Tan assenyalades amb la seva família durant una part de la nit i deixar que no qualsevol entre vosaltres mirar enrere - excepte la seva muller; de fet, ella serà colpejada per allò que ells vagues. De fet, el seu nomenament és [per] al matí. No és a prop de matí?"

trans-unit.source: So when Our command came, We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of layered hard clay, [which were]
trans-unit.target: Així que quan va arribar la nostra comanda, vam fer la major part [de la ciutat] seu més baix i rained sobre ells pedres de fang per capes dur, [que]

trans-unit.source: Marked from your Lord. And Allah 's punishment is not from the wrongdoers [very] far.
trans-unit.target: Marcat del seu Senyor. I càstig d'Allah no és de la malfactors [molt] lluny.

trans-unit.source: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. And do not decrease from the measure and the scale. Indeed, I see you in prosperity, but indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.
trans-unit.target: I a Madyan [hem enviat] seu germà Shu'ayb. Va dir, "O poble meu, venerar Allah; teniu cap deïtat diferent d'ell. I no disminució de la mesura i l'escala. De fet, veig que en la prosperitat, però de fet, em temo que el càstig d'un dia que abasta.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, give full measure and weight in justice and do not deprive the people of their due and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption.
trans-unit.target: I O poble meu, donar completa mesura i pes en la justícia i no privar a la gent de la seva causa i no cometre abusos a la terra, divulgació corrupció.

trans-unit.source: What remains [lawful] from Allah is best for you, if you would be believers. But I am not a guardian over you."
trans-unit.target: El que queda [legal] des d'Allah és millor per a vostè, si vols ser creients. Però jo no sóc un tutor sobre tu."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Shu'ayb, does your prayer command you that we should leave what our fathers worship or not do with our wealth what we please? Indeed, you are the forbearing, the discerning!"
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O Shu'ayb, fa la pregària Mano que hem de deixar el que nostres pares culte o no fer amb la nostra riquesa, què podem complaure? De fet, és la forbearing, les exigències!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I am upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me with a good provision from Him...? And I do not intend to differ from you in that which I have forbidden you; I only intend reform as much as I am able. And my success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "O poble meu, has considerat: si estic en evidència clara del meu Senyor, i ell m'ha donat amb una bona provisió d'ell...? I no pretén difereixen en la qual vaig tenir prohibit Només pretenc reforma tant com puc. I el meu èxit no és sinó a través d'Allah. Li han confiat, i li vaig tornar.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, let not [your] dissension from me cause you to be struck by that similar to what struck the people of Noah or the people of Hud or the people of Salih. And the people of Lot are not from you far away.
trans-unit.target: I O poble meu, no [el seu] dissensió de mi fer de ser colpejat per que semblant al que va sorprendre la gent de Noè o el poble d'Hud o la gent de Salih. I la gent de molts no són de vostè lluny.

trans-unit.source: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate."
trans-unit.target: I demanar perdó del seu Senyor i llavors penedir-se a ell. De fet, el meu Senyor és Clement i Affectionate".

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Shu'ayb, we do not understand much of what you say, and indeed, we consider you among us as weak. And if not for your family, we would have stoned you [to death]; and you are not to us one respected."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O Shu'ayb, no entenem molt del que dius, i de fet, considerem entre nosaltres com feble. I si no per la seva família, vols tenir lapida li [a mort]; i no per a nosaltres un respectat."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, is my family more respected for power by you than Allah? But you put Him behind your backs [in neglect]. Indeed, my Lord is encompassing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "la meva gent, O és la meva família més respectada pel poder per vostè que Allah? Però posar-lo darrere seu esquena [en abandonament]. De fet, el meu Senyor és que abasta del que fas.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, work according to your position; indeed, I am working. You are going to know to whom will come a punishment that will disgrace him and who is a liar. So watch; indeed, I am with you a watcher, [awaiting the outcome]."
trans-unit.target: I la meva gent, O treballar segons la seva posició; de fet, estic treballant. Vas a saber a qui vindrà un càstig que li serà vergonya i que és un mentider. Així que vigila; de fet, estic amb tu un observador, [l'espera del resultat]. "

trans-unit.source: And when Our command came, We saved Shu'ayb and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us. And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
trans-unit.target: I quan va arribar la nostra comanda, hem salvat Shu'ayb i aquells que creu amb ell, per misericòrdia de nosaltres. I al sortir van confiscar qui havia injustament, i esdevingueren dins casa [cadàvers] caigut propens

trans-unit.source: As if they had never prospered therein. Then, away with Madyan as Thamud was taken away.
trans-unit.target: Com si mai no havia prosperat aquí. Llavors, distància amb Madyan com Thamud hi van portar.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: I certament ens va enviar Moses amb rètols i una autoritat clar

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they followed the command of Pharaoh, and the command of Pharaoh was not [at all] discerning.
trans-unit.target: Faraó i el seu establiment, però van seguir les ordres del faraó, i el comandament del faraó no era [gens] més exigents.

trans-unit.source: He will precede his people on the Day of Resurrection and lead them into the Fire; and wretched is the place to which they are led.
trans-unit.target: Va precedir la seva gent el dia de resurrecció i porten a la foguera; i miserable és el lloc al qual són dirigits.

trans-unit.source: And they were followed in this [world] with a curse and on the Day of Resurrection. And wretched is the gift which is given.
trans-unit.target: I s'han seguit en aquest [món] amb una maledicció i el dia de resurrecció. I el regal que es dóna és miserable.

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the cities, which We relate to you; of them, some are [still] standing and some are [as] a harvest [mowed down].
trans-unit.target: Que és de les notícies de les ciutats, que ens relacionem amb tu; d'ells, alguns són [encara] peu i alguns són [com] una collita [tallat].

trans-unit.source: And We did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves. And they were not availed at all by their gods which they invoked other than Allah when there came the command of your Lord. And they did not increase them in other than ruin.
trans-unit.target: I no podem fer malament-los, però ells mateixos injustament. I no van ser aprofitat en tots els seus déus que invocaven altre que Allah quan va venir l'ordre del seu Senyor. I no es va incrementar en diferents de ruïna.

trans-unit.source: And thus is the seizure of your Lord when He seizes the cities while they are committing wrong. Indeed, His seizure is painful and severe.
trans-unit.target: I així és la confiscació del teu Senyor, quan ell aprofita les ciutats, mentre que estan cometent malament. De fet, la seva confiscació és dolorosa i greu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for those who fear the punishment of the Hereafter. That is a Day for which the people will be collected, and that is a Day [which will be] witnessed.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal per a aquells que temen el càstig de la d'ara endavant. És un dia per a que la gent es farà un recull i que és un dia [que] va ser testimoni.

trans-unit.source: And We do not delay it except for a limited term.
trans-unit.target: I no podem retardar excepte per un període limitat.

trans-unit.source: The Day it comes no soul will speak except by His permission. And among them will be the wretched and the prosperous.
trans-unit.target: El dia que es no tracta ànima parlarà excepte amb el seu permís. I entre ells serà el pròsper i condemnats.

trans-unit.source: As for those who were [destined to be] wretched, they will be in the Fire. For them therein is [violent] exhaling and inhaling.
trans-unit.target: Pel que fa a aquells que estaven [destinats a ser] miserable, estaran en el foc. Per a ells en el mateix és una exhalar [violents] i inhalació.

trans-unit.source: [They will be] abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord is an effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: [Ls] romandre aquí mentre suportar els cels i la terra, excepte el que cal es teu Senyor. De fet, el seu senyor és una effecter de què pensa.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who were [destined to be] prosperous, they will be in Paradise, abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will - a bestowal uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: I pel que fa a aquells que estaven [destinat a ser] pròsper, estaran en paradís, romandre aquí tant de temps com els cels i la terra suportar, excepte el seu Senyor hauria es - una concessió ininterrompuda.

trans-unit.source: So do not be in doubt, [O Muhammad], as to what these [polytheists] are worshipping. They worship not except as their fathers worshipped before. And indeed, We will give them their share undiminished.
trans-unit.target: Manera que no sigui en dubte, [O Muhammad], pel que fa a què aquestes [politeistes] estan adorant. Veneren no excepte com els seus pares adorat abans. I de fet, els donarem seva porció minvava.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.
trans-unit.target: I certament havia donat Moses l'escriptura, però es tractava en desacord. I si no fos per una paraula que precedida del seu Senyor, vols han estat jutjat entre ells. I el fet són, pel que fa a l'Alcorà, en dubte inquietant.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, each [of the believers and disbelievers] - your Lord will fully compensate them for their deeds. Indeed, He is Acquainted with what they do.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, cada [dels creients i disbelievers] - el seu Senyor totalment compensarà els seus actes. De fet, ell és conèixer què fan.

trans-unit.source: So remain on a right course as you have been commanded, [you] and those who have turned back with you [to Allah], and do not transgress. Indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Així que romandre en un curs de dret com t'he manat, [que] i aquells que s'han convertit de nou amb vosaltres [a Allah] i no transgredir. De fet, està veient del que fas.

trans-unit.source: And do not incline toward those who do wrong, lest you be touched by the Fire, and you would not have other than Allah any protectors; then you would not be helped.
trans-unit.target: I no inclinació cap a aquells que s'equivoca, perquè no et ser tocat pel foc, i no tindria que Allah qualsevol protectores; llavors et vols no ser ajudat.

trans-unit.source: And establish prayer at the two ends of the day and at the approach of the night. Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds. That is a reminder for those who remember.
trans-unit.target: I establir la pregària en els dos extrems del dia i a l'enfocament de la nit. De fet, bones accions a fer amb malifetes. Això és un recordatori per a aquells que recorden.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.
trans-unit.target: I ser pacient, de fet, Allah no permet que es perd la recompensa d'aquells que fer el bé.

trans-unit.source: So why were there not among the generations before you those of enduring discrimination forbidding corruption on earth - except a few of those We saved from among them? But those who wronged pursued what luxury they were given therein, and they were criminals.
trans-unit.target: Per què eren allà no entre les generacions abans els de discriminació perdurable que prohibia la corrupció a la terra - excepte algun d'aquells som estalvis entre ells? Però aquells que injustament perseguit quin luxe que se'ls aquí, i eren delinqüents.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord would not have destroyed the cities unjustly while their people were reformers.
trans-unit.target: I el seu Senyor no han destruït les ciutats injustament mentre que la seva gent van ser reformadors.

trans-unit.source: And if your Lord had willed, He could have made mankind one community; but they will not cease to differ.
trans-unit.target: I si el Senyor tenia willed, podria haver fet comunitat de la humanitat un; però no deixarà de ser diferents.

trans-unit.source: Except whom your Lord has given mercy, and for that He created them. But the word of your Lord is to be fulfilled that, "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and men all together."
trans-unit.target: Excepte qui el Senyor ha donat misericòrdia i per això va crear-los. Però la paraula del seu senyor és ser complert que, "Jo segurament omplirà l'infern amb jinn i tots junts homes."

trans-unit.source: And each [story] We relate to you from the news of the messengers is that by which We make firm your heart. And there has come to you, in this, the truth and an instruction and a reminder for the believers.
trans-unit.target: I cada [història] us relacionem de les notícies dels missatgers que pel qual fem ferm el seu cor. I hi ha arribat, en aquesta, la veritat i una instrucció i un recordatori per als creients.

trans-unit.source: And say to those who do not believe, "Work according to your position; indeed, we are working.
trans-unit.target: I dir a aquells que no creuen, "treballar segons la seva posició; de fet, estem treballant.

trans-unit.source: And wait, indeed, we are waiting."
trans-unit.target: I espera, en efecte, estem esperant."

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belong the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth and to Him will be returned the matter, all of it, so worship Him and rely upon Him. And your Lord is not unaware of that which you do.
trans-unit.target: I per Allah pertanyen invisibles [aspectes] dels cels i la terra i li serà retornat l'assumpte, tot això, tan veneren i confiar en ell. I el seu Senyor no és conscient del que fas.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the clear Book.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, ra. Aquests són els versos del llibre clar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.
trans-unit.target: De fet, hem enviat-lo com un Alcorà àrab que es comprengui.

trans-unit.source: We relate to you, [O Muhammad], the best of stories in what We have revealed to you of this Qur'an although you were, before it, among the unaware.
trans-unit.target: Ens relacionem amb tu, [O Muhammad], el millor d'històries en què ens han revelat a vostè d'aquest Alcorà encara que eres, abans, entre l'inconscient.

trans-unit.source: [Of these stories mention] when Joseph said to his father, "O my father, indeed I have seen [in a dream] eleven stars and the sun and the moon; I saw them prostrating to me."
trans-unit.target: [D'aquestes històries esmenten] Quan Joseph va dir al seu pare, "O el meu pare, de fet he vist [en un somni] onze estrelles i el sol i la lluna; Jo els vaig veure postrant-me. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my son, do not relate your vision to your brothers or they will contrive against you a plan. Indeed Satan, to man, is a manifest enemy.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "O el meu fill, no es relacionen amb la visió teus germans o idearan contra un pla. Fet Satanàs, home, és un enemic manifesta.

trans-unit.source: And thus will your Lord choose you and teach you the interpretation of narratives and complete His favor upon you and upon the family of Jacob, as He completed it upon your fathers before, Abraham and Isaac. Indeed, your Lord is Knowing and Wise."
trans-unit.target: I així es teu Senyor vostè triar i ensenyar la interpretació de narratives i completar el favor a vostè i a la família de Jacob, que va completar en vostres pares abans, Abraham i Isaac. De fet, el seu senyor és saber i assenyat".

trans-unit.source: Certainly were there in Joseph and his brothers signs for those who ask,
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte hi eren en Josep i els seus germans signes per a aquells qui ho demanen,

trans-unit.source: When they said, "Joseph and his brother are more beloved to our father than we, while we are a clan. Indeed, our father is in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Quan va dir, "Joseph i el seu germà són més estimades al nostre pare que nosaltres, mentre ens trobem un clan. De fet, el nostre pare és clar error.

trans-unit.source: Kill Joseph or cast him out to [another] land; the countenance of your father will [then] be only for you, and you will be after that a righteous people."
trans-unit.target: Joseph de matar o van fer a terra [un altre]; el rostre del seu pare [llavors] serà només per vostè, i vostè serà després d'això un poble just."

trans-unit.source: Said a speaker among them, "Do not kill Joseph but throw him into the bottom of the well; some travelers will pick him up - if you would do [something]."
trans-unit.target: Va dir un orador entre ells, "no matar Joseph però tirar-lo al fons del pou; Alguns viatgers recollirà ell - si vols fer [quelcom]."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O our father, why do you not entrust us with Joseph while indeed, we are to him sincere counselors?
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O nostre pare, per què vostè no confiar-nos Joseph mentre que, en efecte, estem li consellers sincers?

trans-unit.source: Send him with us tomorrow that he may eat well and play. And indeed, we will be his guardians.
trans-unit.target: Enviar-lo amb nosaltres demà que pot menjar bé i jugar. I efectivament, estarem seus guardians.

trans-unit.source: [Jacob] said, "Indeed, it saddens me that you should take him, and I fear that a wolf would eat him while you are of him unaware."
trans-unit.target: [Jacob] deia, "De fet, m'entristeix que vostè ha de prendre-li, i em temo que un llop menjaria ell mentre esteu d'ell inconscient".

trans-unit.source: They said, "If a wolf should eat him while we are a [strong] clan, indeed, we would then be losers."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Si un llop ha de menjar-lo mentre ens trobem un clan [fort], en efecte, llavors seríem perdedors."

trans-unit.source: So when they took him [out] and agreed to put him into the bottom of the well... But We inspired to him, "You will surely inform them [someday] about this affair of theirs while they do not perceive [your identity]."
trans-unit.target: Així que quan portaven [fins] ell i van acordar posar al fons del pou... Però ens va inspirar-li, "segurament els informarem [algun dia] sobre aquest assumpte d'ells mentre no perceben [seva identitat]."

trans-unit.source: And they came to their father at night, weeping.
trans-unit.target: I van arribar al seu pare a la nit plorant.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O our father, indeed we went racing each other and left Joseph with our possessions, and a wolf ate him. But you would not believe us, even if we were truthful."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O nostre pare, de fet ens vam anar curses mútuament i Joseph l'esquerra amb les nostres possessions, i un llop es va menjar-lo. Però vostè no creuria nosaltres, fins i tot si estiguéssim veraces".

trans-unit.source: And they brought upon his shirt false blood. [Jacob] said, "Rather, your souls have enticed you to something, so patience is most fitting. And Allah is the one sought for help against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: I van portar a la seva sang falsa de camisa. [Jacob], va dir, "més aviat, seves ànimes han atret a vostè a alguna cosa, així que paciència és més apropiat. I Allah és el de buscar ajuda contra el que vostè descriu. "

trans-unit.source: And there came a company of travelers; then they sent their water drawer, and he let down his bucket. He said, "Good news! Here is a boy." And they concealed him, [taking him] as merchandise; and Allah was knowing of what they did.
trans-unit.target: I va venir una empresa de viatgers; llavors van enviar el seu calaix de l'aigua i va decebre la galleda. Va dir, «bones notícies! Aquí és un noi". I ell, [que ell] amagaven com a mercaderia. i Allah va saber de què feien.

trans-unit.source: And they sold him for a reduced price - a few dirhams - and they were, concerning him, of those content with little.
trans-unit.target: I li van vendre per un preu reduït - uns pocs dirhams - i eren, en relació amb ell, d'aquells continguts amb poc.

trans-unit.source: And the one from Egypt who bought him said to his wife, "Make his residence comfortable. Perhaps he will benefit us, or we will adopt him as a son." And thus, We established Joseph in the land that We might teach him the interpretation of events. And Allah is predominant over His affair, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: I l'únic d'Egipte que va comprar li va dir a la seva dona, "fan seva residència confortable. Potser ens beneficiarà, o li adoptarem com a un fill". I així, hem establert Joseph a la terra que ens podria ensenyar-li la interpretació d'esdeveniments. I Allah és predominant sobre la seva relació, però la majoria de la gent no sap.

trans-unit.source: And when Joseph reached maturity, We gave him judgment and knowledge. And thus We reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: I quan Joseph va arribar a la maduresa, li donàvem judici i el coneixement. I així vam premiar els autors de bo.

trans-unit.source: And she, in whose house he was, sought to seduce him. She closed the doors and said, "Come, you." He said, "[I seek] the refuge of Allah. Indeed, he is my master, who has made good my residence. Indeed, wrongdoers will not succeed."
trans-unit.target: I ella, a la casa era, desitjava seduir a ell. Ella va tancar les portes i va dir: "Vine, vostè." Va dir, "[busco] el refugi d'Allah. De fet, és el meu mestre, que ha fet bo el meu residència. De fet, malfactors no tindrà èxit."
