trans-unit.source: And she certainly determined [to seduce] him, and he would have inclined to her had he not seen the proof of his Lord. And thus [it was] that We should avert from him evil and immorality. Indeed, he was of Our chosen servants.
trans-unit.target: I certament va decidit [a seduir] ell i ell vols tenir inclinats a ella no havia vist la prova del seu Senyor. I així [va ser] que ens cal evitar d'ell maldat i immoralitat. De fet, va ser dels nostres servidors escollides.

trans-unit.source: And they both raced to the door, and she tore his shirt from the back, and they found her husband at the door. She said, "What is the recompense of one who intended evil for your wife but that he be imprisoned or a painful punishment?"
trans-unit.target: I tots dos van afanyar a la porta i va trencar la camisa de l'esquena, i van trobar el seu marit a la porta. Ella va dir, "què és la recompensa de qui destinats mal a la seva dona, però que va ser empresonat o un dolor càstig?"

trans-unit.source: [Joseph] said, "It was she who sought to seduce me." And a witness from her family testified. "If his shirt is torn from the front, then she has told the truth, and he is of the liars.
trans-unit.target: [Joseph] va dir: "Va ser ella qui va intentar seduir-me." I va declarar un testimoni de la seva família. "Si la camisa és trencada des del front, llavors ella ha dit la veritat, i és de mentiders.

trans-unit.source: But if his shirt is torn from the back, then she has lied, and he is of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Però si la camisa és trencada per l'esquena, llavors ella ha mentit, i és de la veritat."

trans-unit.source: So when her husband saw his shirt torn from the back, he said, "Indeed, it is of the women's plan. Indeed, your plan is great.
trans-unit.target: Així que quan el seu marit va veure la camisa provinents de l'esquena, va dir, "de fet, és del pla de la dona. De fet, el seu pla és gran.

trans-unit.source: Joseph, ignore this. And, [my wife], ask forgiveness for your sin. Indeed, you were of the sinful."
trans-unit.target: Josep, ignorar això. I, la [meva dona], demana perdó pel seu pecat. De fet, li eren dels pecadors".

trans-unit.source: And women in the city said, "The wife of al-'Azeez is seeking to seduce her slave boy; he has impassioned her with love. Indeed, we see her [to be] in clear error."
trans-unit.target: I dones de la ciutat, va dir, "la dona d'al-'Azeez està buscant seduir el seu nen esclau; ell li ha apassionades amb amor. De fet, podem veure-la [que] clar error."

trans-unit.source: So when she heard of their scheming, she sent for them and prepared for them a banquet and gave each one of them a knife and said [to Joseph], "Come out before them." And when they saw him, they greatly admired him and cut their hands and said, "Perfect is Allah! This is not a man; this is none but a noble angel."
trans-unit.target: Perquè quan es va assabentar de la seva intrigant, enviat per a ells i preparat per a ells un banquet i va donar a cada un d'ells un ganivet i va dir [a Josep], "Venir fora abans d'ells." I quan el van veure, en gran mesura l'admiraven i tallar les mans i va dir: "Allah perfecte és! Aquest no és un home; Això és cap excepte un àngel noble".

trans-unit.source: She said, "That is the one about whom you blamed me. And I certainly sought to seduce him, but he firmly refused; and if he will not do what I order him, he will surely be imprisoned and will be of those debased."
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, "que és la sobre qui em culpava. I certament que tractava de seduir a ell, però va refusar fermament; i si no ho farà què puc demanar-lo, segurament es ser empresonat i serà d'aquells degradat."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, prison is more to my liking than that to which they invite me. And if You do not avert from me their plan, I might incline toward them and [thus] be of the ignorant."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "el meu Senyor, presó és més al meu gust que això a la qual van convidar-me. I si vostè evitar no de mi el seu pla, podria inclinar cap a ells i ser [així] de la ignorància".

trans-unit.source: So his Lord responded to him and averted from him their plan. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Així seu Senyor va respondre per ell i evitat d'ell el seu pla. De fet, ell és l'audiència, el saber.

trans-unit.source: Then it appeared to them after they had seen the signs that al-'Azeez should surely imprison him for a time.
trans-unit.target: Llavors va aparèixer a ells després que havien vist els signes que al-"Azeez segurament hauria d'empresonar-lo per un temps.

trans-unit.source: And there entered the prison with him two young men. One of them said, "Indeed, I have seen myself [in a dream] pressing wine." The other said, "Indeed, I have seen myself carrying upon my head [some] bread, from which the birds were eating. Inform us of its interpretation; indeed, we see you to be of those who do good."
trans-unit.target: I hi ha entrat a la presó amb ell dos joves. Un d'ells va dir, "De fet, he vist jo mateix [en un somni] prement vi." L'altre va dir: "de fet, he vist jo mateix portant en el meu pa responsable [alguns], des d'on estàvem menjant les aus. Informar-nos de la seva interpretació; de fet, podem veure que d'aquells que fer el bé."

trans-unit.source: He said, "You will not receive food that is provided to you except that I will inform you of its interpretation before it comes to you. That is from what my Lord has taught me. Indeed, I have left the religion of a people who do not believe in Allah, and they, in the Hereafter, are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Va dir: "vostè no rebrà menjar que és proporcionat per a vostè excepte que jo us informarà de la seva interpretació abans arriba a vostè. Això és del senyor m'ha ensenyat. De fet, he deixat la religió de les persones que no creuen en Allah, i que, en el futur, són disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And I have followed the religion of my fathers, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob. And it was not for us to associate anything with Allah. That is from the favor of Allah upon us and upon the people, but most of the people are not grateful.
trans-unit.target: I he seguit la religió dels meus pares, Abraham, Isaac i Jacob. I no era per a nosaltres res associar amb Allah. Que és la desgràcia d'Allah sobre nosaltres i sobre les persones, però la majoria de les persones no estem agraït.

trans-unit.source: O [my] two companions of prison, are separate lords better or Allah, the One, the Prevailing?
trans-unit.target: O [meus] dos companys de presó, és millor separats senyors o al là, l, l Prevailing?

trans-unit.source: You worship not besides Him except [mere] names you have named them, you and your fathers, for which Allah has sent down no authority. Legislation is not but for Allah. He has commanded that you worship not except Him. That is the correct religion, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Adoren no a més ell excepte [simples] noms que han anomenat ells, vostè i el seu pare, que Allah ha enviat cap autoritat. La legislació no és sinó per Allah. Ell ha manat que es veneren no excepte ell. Que és la religió correcte, però la majoria de la gent no sap.

trans-unit.source: O two companions of prison, as for one of you, he will give drink to his master of wine; but as for the other, he will be crucified, and the birds will eat from his head. The matter has been decreed about which you both inquire."
trans-unit.target: O dos companys de presó, pel que fa a un de vosaltres, ell donarà beguda al seu mestre de vi; però pel que fa a l'altre, ell es ser crucificat, i els ocells mengen del seu cap. La matèria ha estat decretat sobre que tots dos preguntar."

trans-unit.source: And he said to the one whom he knew would go free, "Mention me before your master." But Satan made him forget the mention [to] his master, and Joseph remained in prison several years.
trans-unit.target: I va dir a aquell qui sabia vols anar lliure, "Esmentar-me abans el mestre." Però Satanàs fet oblidar la menció [al] seu mestre, i Joseph va romandre a la presó uns quants anys.

trans-unit.source: And [subsequently] the king said, "Indeed, I have seen [in a dream] seven fat cows being eaten by seven [that were] lean, and seven green spikes [of grain] and others [that were] dry. O eminent ones, explain to me my vision, if you should interpret visions."
trans-unit.target: I [posteriorment] el rei va dir, "de fet, he vist [en un somni] set greix vaques ser menjats pels set [que] magra i set pics verds [de gra] i altres [que] sec. O els eminents, explicar-me la meva visió, si t'hauria interpretar visions. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "[It is but] a mixture of false dreams, and we are not learned in the interpretation of dreams."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "[és però] una barreja de falsos somnis, i no s'aprenen en la interpretació dels somnis."

trans-unit.source: But the one who was freed and remembered after a time said, "I will inform you of its interpretation, so send me forth."
trans-unit.target: Però qui va ser alliberat i recordat després una vegada va dir, "jo us informarà de la seva interpretació, així enviar-me endavant."

trans-unit.source: [He said], "Joseph, O man of truth, explain to us about seven fat cows eaten by seven [that were] lean, and seven green spikes [of grain] and others [that were] dry - that I may return to the people; perhaps they will know [about you]."
trans-unit.target: [Va dir], "Joseph, Oh home de veritat, explicar-nos sobre les set vaques grasses menjats pels set [que] magra i set pics verds [de gra] i altres [que] sec - que em pot tornar a la gent; potser sabran [de tu]."

trans-unit.source: [Joseph] said, "You will plant for seven years consecutively; and what you harvest leave in its spikes, except a little from which you will eat.
trans-unit.target: [Joseph] va dir, "sembrar durant set anys consecutivament; i el que vostè collita deixar a les espigues, excepte una mica del que vostè va a menjar.

trans-unit.source: Then will come after that seven difficult [years] which will consume what you saved for them, except a little from which you will store.
trans-unit.target: Llavors es vénen després que set [anys] difícils que consumirà el que heu desat per a ells, excepte una mica del que s'emmagatzemarà.

trans-unit.source: Then will come after that a year in which the people will be given rain and in which they will press [olives and grapes]."
trans-unit.target: Després vindrà després que un any en el qual la gent li donarà pluja i en el qual es premsa [olives i raïm]."

trans-unit.source: And the king said, "Bring him to me." But when the messenger came to him, [Joseph] said, "Return to your master and ask him what is the case of the women who cut their hands. Indeed, my Lord is Knowing of their plan."
trans-unit.target: I el rei va dir, "Portar-lo a mi." Però quan el missatger va venir a ell, [Joseph] va dir, "tornar al seu mestre i li pregunto què és el cas de les dones que tallar les mans. De fet, el meu Senyor és saber del seu pla".

trans-unit.source: Said [the king to the women], "What was your condition when you sought to seduce Joseph?" They said, "Perfect is Allah! We know about him no evil." The wife of al-'Azeez said, "Now the truth has become evident. It was I who sought to seduce him, and indeed, he is of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: Va dir [el rei a les dones], "El que era el seu estat quan es va intentar seduir Joseph?" Deien, "perfecte és Allah! Sabem d'ell cap mal." L'esposa d'al-'Azeez va dir, "ara la veritat s'ha fet evident. Era jo el que va seduir a ell, i de fet, és de la veritat.

trans-unit.source: That is so al-'Azeez will know that I did not betray him in [his] absence and that Allah does not guide the plan of betrayers.
trans-unit.target: És així que al-'Azeez saber que jo no trair a [seva] absència i que Allah no guia el pla de betrayers.

trans-unit.source: And I do not acquit myself. Indeed, the soul is a persistent enjoiner of evil, except those upon which my Lord has mercy. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: I no vaig absoldre a mi mateix. De fet, l'ànima és un enjoiner persistent del mal, excepte aquells sobre els quals Senyor té pietat. De fet, el meu Senyor és indulgent i Clement."

trans-unit.source: And the king said, "Bring him to me; I will appoint him exclusively for myself." And when he spoke to him, he said, "Indeed, you are today established [in position] and trusted."
trans-unit.target: I el rei va dir, "portar-lo a mi; Jo nomenarà li exclusivament per a mi." I quan va parlar amb ell, va dir, "De fet, avui estableix [en posició] i de confiança."

trans-unit.source: [Joseph] said, "Appoint me over the storehouses of the land. Indeed, I will be a knowing guardian."
trans-unit.target: [Joseph] va dir, «m nomenar sobre els magatzems de la terra. De fet, jo seré un tutor conèixer."

trans-unit.source: And thus We established Joseph in the land to settle therein wherever he willed. We touch with Our mercy whom We will, and We do not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.
trans-unit.target: I així hem establert Joseph a la terra per establir-se en el mateix allà on va voluntat. Toquem amb les nostre Misericòrdia qui ho farem i no permetem que es perd la recompensa d'aquells que fer el bé.

trans-unit.source: And the reward of the Hereafter is better for those who believed and were fearing Allah.
trans-unit.target: I la recompensa de la d'ara endavant és millor per a aquells que creien i van ser tement Allah.

trans-unit.source: And the brothers of Joseph came [seeking food], and they entered upon him; and he recognized them, but he was to them unknown.
trans-unit.target: Els germans de Josep venien [buscant menjar] i entraven a ell; i va reconèixer que, però era per a ells desconeguts.

trans-unit.source: And when he had furnished them with their supplies, he said, "Bring me a brother of yours from your father. Do not you see that I give full measure and that I am the best of accommodators?
trans-unit.target: I quan havia armat-los amb els seus subministraments, va dir, "porta'm un germà seu del seu pare. No veus que vaig donar mesura completa i que sóc el millor de accommodators?

trans-unit.source: But if you do not bring him to me, no measure will there be [hereafter] for you from me, nor will you approach me."
trans-unit.target: Però si no portar-lo a mi, cap mesura hi haurà [s] per a vostè de mi, ni es t'acostes a mi."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will attempt to dissuade his father from [keeping] him, and indeed, we will do [it]."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "mirarem de dissuadir el seu pare de [tenint] ell i fet, ens farà [es]."

trans-unit.source: And [Joseph] said to his servants, "Put their merchandise into their saddlebags so they might recognize it when they have gone back to their people that perhaps they will [again] return."
trans-unit.target: I [Joseph] va dir als seus servents, "posar la mercaderia a seva alforges així que podria reconèixer quan ells han tornat al seu poble que potser [nou] retornaran."

trans-unit.source: So when they returned to their father, they said, "O our father, [further] measure has been denied to us, so send with us our brother [that] we will be given measure. And indeed, we will be his guardians."
trans-unit.target: Així que quan van tornar al seu pare, va dir, "O nostre pare, [més] mesura ha estat negada a nosaltres, així que envia amb nosaltres el nostre germà [que] ens donaran mesura. I efectivament, estarem seus guardians.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Should I entrust you with him except [under coercion] as I entrusted you with his brother before? But Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "hauria jo us encomano amb ell excepte [sota coacció] com que he confiat amb el seu germà abans? Però Allah és el guardià millor, i és la més misericordiós de les almoines".

trans-unit.source: And when they opened their baggage, they found their merchandise returned to them. They said, "O our father, what [more] could we desire? This is our merchandise returned to us. And we will obtain supplies for our family and protect our brother and obtain an increase of a camel's load; that is an easy measurement."
trans-unit.target: I quan es va obrir el seu equipatge, es van trobar a tornat a la seva gamma de productes. Deien, "O nostre pare, què [més] podria desitgem? Aquesta és la nostra mercaderia tornar-nos. I obtenir els subministraments per a la nostra família i protegir el nostre germà i obtenir un augment de la càrrega de un camell; Això és una mesura fàcil".

trans-unit.source: [Jacob] said, "Never will I send him with you until you give me a promise by Allah that you will bring him [back] to me, unless you should be surrounded by enemies." And when they had given their promise, he said, "Allah, over what we say, is Witness."
trans-unit.target: [Jacob] deia, "Mai vaig enviarà-lo amb vostè fins que em doni una promesa per Allah que vostè li [altra vegada] portarà a mi, a menys que vostè hauria de ser envoltat per enemics." I quan se'ls havia donat seva promesa, va dir, "Allah, sobre el que diem, és testimoni".

trans-unit.source: And he said, "O my sons, do not enter from one gate but enter from different gates; and I cannot avail you against [the decree of] Allah at all. The decision is only for Allah; upon Him I have relied, and upon Him let those who would rely [indeed] rely."
trans-unit.target: I va dir, "O fills meus, no entrar d'una porta però introduir diferents portes d'entrada; i jo no debades contra [el decret de] Allah en absolut. La decisió és només per a Allah; amb ell he confiat i li deixi els que podria invocar es basen [fet]. "

trans-unit.source: And when they entered from where their father had ordered them, it did not avail them against Allah at all except [it was] a need within the soul of Jacob, which he satisfied. And indeed, he was a possessor of knowledge because of what We had taught him, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: I quan van entrar des d'on el seu pare havia ordenat-los, es no aprofitar-los contra Allah gens excepte [va ser] un necessitat dins l'ànima de Jacob, que va satisfet. I de fet, va ser un posseïdor dels coneixements per què ens havia ensenyat ell, però la majoria de la gent no sap.

trans-unit.source: And when they entered upon Joseph, he took his brother to himself; he said, "Indeed, I am your brother, so do not despair over what they used to do [to me]."
trans-unit.target: I quan van entrar a Joseph, va prendre el seu germà a si mateix; va dir, "De fet, jo sóc el teu germà, així que no desespereu sobre el que acostumaven a fer [per mi]."

trans-unit.source: So when he had furnished them with their supplies, he put the [gold measuring] bowl into the bag of his brother. Then an announcer called out, "O caravan, indeed you are thieves."
trans-unit.target: Així que quan ells havia armat amb els seus subministraments, va posar el bol [or mesurar] a la bossa del seu germà. Llavors un locutor anomenat, "caravana O, fet són lladres."

trans-unit.source: They said while approaching them, "What is it you are missing?"
trans-unit.target: Es deia acostant-los, "què és el que li falten?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We are missing the measure of the king. And for he who produces it is [the reward of] a camel's load, and I am responsible for it."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "estem perdent la mesura del rei. I per el que produeix és [la recompensa de] càrrega de un camell i sóc responsable d'això. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, you have certainly known that we did not come to cause corruption in the land, and we have not been thieves."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Per Allah, vostè té certament conegut que no hem vingut a causa de la corrupció a la terra, i no hem els lladres."

trans-unit.source: The accusers said, "Then what would be its recompense if you should be liars?"
trans-unit.target: Els acusadors, va dir, "llavors què seria bonifica si hauria de ser mentiders?"

trans-unit.source: [The brothers] said, "Its recompense is that he in whose bag it is found - he [himself] will be its recompense. Thus do we recompense the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: [Els germans] va dir, "bonifica és que ell en la borsa es troba - ell [] es bonifica. Així ens recompensa els malfactors."

trans-unit.source: So he began [the search] with their bags before the bag of his brother; then he extracted it from the bag of his brother. Thus did We plan for Joseph. He could not have taken his brother within the religion of the king except that Allah willed. We raise in degrees whom We will, but over every possessor of knowledge is one [more] knowing.
trans-unit.target: Així va començar a [cerca] amb les seves bosses abans la bossa del seu germà; llavors va extret de la bossa del seu germà. Així tenim previst per Joseph. Ell podria no haver pres el seu germà dins de la religió del rei excepte que al là volgués. Podem plantejar en graus qui ho farem, però sobre tot posseïdor del coneixement és un [més] saber.

trans-unit.source: They said, "If he steals - a brother of his has stolen before." But Joseph kept it within himself and did not reveal it to them. He said, "You are worse in position, and Allah is most knowing of what you describe."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Si roba - un germà del seu ha robat abans." Però Josep va mantenir dins el mateix i no va revelar a ells. Va dir, "vostè és pitjor en posició, i Allah és més sabent el que descriu".

trans-unit.source: They said, "O 'Azeez, indeed he has a father [who is] an old man, so take one of us in place of him. Indeed, we see you as a doer of good."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O ' Azeez, en efecte, ell té un pare [qui és] un home vell, així que prengui un de nosaltres en lloc d'ell. De fet, podem veure com un faci el bé."

trans-unit.source: He said, "[I seek] the refuge of Allah [to prevent] that we take except him with whom we found our possession. Indeed, we would then be unjust."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "[busco] el refugi d'Allah [per evitar] que prenem excepte ell amb qui hem trobat la nostra possessió. De fet, hem llavors seria injust".

trans-unit.source: So when they had despaired of him, they secluded themselves in private consultation. The eldest of them said, "Do you not know that your father has taken upon you an oath by Allah and [that] before you failed in [your duty to] Joseph? So I will never leave [this] land until my father permits me or Allah decides for me, and He is the best of judges.
trans-unit.target: Així que quan ells havien va desesperar d'ell, es apartada ells mateixos en consulta privada. El més gran d'ells va dir: "no saps que el teu pare té assumits un jurament per Allah i [que] abans que no a [el seu deure de] Joseph? Així mai deixarà [aquesta] terra fins el meu pare em permet o Allah decideix per a mi, i és el millor dels jutges.

trans-unit.source: Return to your father and say, "O our father, indeed your son has stolen, and we did not testify except to what we knew. And we were not witnesses of the unseen,
trans-unit.target: Tornar al seu pare i dir, "nostre pare, de fet que ha robat el seu fill, i nosaltres no testificar excepte per què sabíem O. I no hem estat testimonis d'invisibles,

trans-unit.source: And ask the city in which we were and the caravan in which we came - and indeed, we are truthful,"
trans-unit.target: I demanar la ciutat en què estàvem i la caravana on arribem - i fet, són vertaderes "

trans-unit.source: [Jacob] said, "Rather, your souls have enticed you to something, so patience is most fitting. Perhaps Allah will bring them to me all together. Indeed it is He who is the Knowing, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: [Jacob], va dir, "més aviat, seves ànimes han atret a vostè a alguna cosa, així que paciència és més apropiat. Potser Allah que els portarà a mi tots junts. De fet és el que és el saber, el savi".

trans-unit.source: And he turned away from them and said, "Oh, my sorrow over Joseph," and his eyes became white from grief, for he was [of that] a suppressor.
trans-unit.target: I ell va deixar-los i va dir: "Oh, la meva tristesa sobre Joseph," i els seus ulls es va convertir en blancs de dol, perquè ell era [del] un supressor.

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, you will not cease remembering Joseph until you become fatally ill or become of those who perish."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Per Allah, que no deixarà recordant Joseph fins que fatalment emmalalteixen o ser dels qui perdi."

trans-unit.source: He said, "I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "només queixar-se del meu sofriment i el meu dolor a Allah, i sé que des d'Allah que no saps.

trans-unit.source: O my sons, go and find out about Joseph and his brother and despair not of relief from Allah. Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: O fills meus, aneu i esbrinar sobre Joseph i el seu germà i desesperació no d'alleujament des d'Allah. De fet, ningú es desespera d'alleujament des d'Allah excepte la gent incrèdula."

trans-unit.source: So when they entered upon Joseph, they said, "O 'Azeez, adversity has touched us and our family, and we have come with goods poor in quality, but give us full measure and be charitable to us. Indeed, Allah rewards the charitable."
trans-unit.target: Així que quan entraven en Joseph, deien, "O ' Azeez, l'adversitat ha tocat nosaltres i la nostra família, i han arribat amb béns pobres en qualitat, però ens donen completa mesura i ser caritatiu a nosaltres. De fet, Allah premia la beneficència."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do you know what you did with Joseph and his brother when you were ignorant?"
trans-unit.target: Va dir: "¿saps què feia amb Joseph i el seu germà quan eres ignorants?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Are you indeed Joseph?" He said "I am Joseph, and this is my brother. Allah has certainly favored us. Indeed, he who fears Allah and is patient, then indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Estàs fet Joseph?" Va dir "sóc Joseph, i això és el meu germà. Allah ha afavorit certament ens. De fet, el que tem Allah i és pacient, llavors realment, Allah no permet que es perd la recompensa d'aquells que fer el bé."

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, certainly has Allah preferred you over us, and indeed, we have been sinners."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "per Allah, certament ha Allah preferit sobre nosaltres, i de fet, hem estat els pecadors".

trans-unit.source: He said, "No blame will there be upon you today. Allah will forgive you; and He is the most merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "cap culpa hi haurà a vostè avui. Allah et perdonarà; i és la més misericordiós de les almoines."

trans-unit.source: Take this, my shirt, and cast it over the face of my father; he will become seeing. And bring me your family, all together."
trans-unit.target: Fer això, la meva camisa i llençar-lo sobre la cara del meu pare; ell es tornarà a veure. I portar-me la seva família, tots junts.

trans-unit.source: And when the caravan departed [from Egypt], their father said, "Indeed, I find the smell of Joseph [and would say that he was alive] if you did not think me weakened in mind."
trans-unit.target: I quan la caravana es va apartar [Egipte], va dir el seu pare, "de fet, trobo l'olor de Josep [i diria que va ser vives] si vostè no crec que em afeblit en ment."

trans-unit.source: They said, "By Allah, indeed you are in your [same] old error."
trans-unit.target: Es diu, "Per Allah, fet que està en el seu error vell [mateix]."

trans-unit.source: And when the bearer of good tidings arrived, he cast it over his face, and he returned [once again] seeing. He said, "Did I not tell you that I know from Allah that which you do not know?"
trans-unit.target: I quan va arribar el portador de la bona nova, va llençar-lo sobre la seva cara, i va tornar [nou] veient. Va dir, "feia no et dic que jo sé d'Allah que no saps?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "O our father, ask for us forgiveness of our sins; indeed, we have been sinners."
trans-unit.target: Es va dir, "nostre pare, O demanar-nos el perdó dels nostres pecats; de fet, hem estat els pecadors.»

trans-unit.source: He said, "I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "vaig a demanar perdó al del meu Senyor. De fet, és el que és l'indulgent, el Clement."

trans-unit.source: And when they entered upon Joseph, he took his parents to himself and said, "Enter Egypt, Allah willing, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: I quan van entrar a Joseph, va prendre els seus pares a si mateix i va dir, "Enter Egipte, Allah disposat, segur [i segur]."

trans-unit.source: And he raised his parents upon the throne, and they bowed to him in prostration. And he said, "O my father, this is the explanation of my vision of before. My Lord has made it reality. And He was certainly good to me when He took me out of prison and brought you [here] from bedouin life after Satan had induced [estrangement] between me and my brothers. Indeed, my Lord is Subtle in what He wills. Indeed, it is He who is the Knowing, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: I va criar als seus pares en el tron, i es va inclinar a ell en la prostració. I va dir, "O el meu pare, això és l'explicació de la meva visió d'abans. Senyor ha fet realitat. I va ser sens dubte bé per a mi quan em va portar a sortir de la presó i el portava [aquí] de beduïns vida després Satan havia induït [estranyament] entre mi i els meus germans. De fet, el meu Senyor és Subtle en què ell voluntats. De fet, és el que és el saber, el savi.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, You have given me [something] of sovereignty and taught me of the interpretation of dreams. Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Senyor, vostè té m [quelcom] de sobirania donat i ensenyar-me de la interpretació dels somnis. Creador del cel i terra, ets el meu protector en aquest món i en el futur. Que em causa a morir un musulmà i unir-se a mi amb els justos."

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal, [O Muhammad], to you. And you were not with them when they put together their plan while they conspired.
trans-unit.target: Que és de les notícies d'invisibles que ens revelen, [O Muhammad], a vostè. I que no van amb ells quan es posen junts el seu pla mentre que van conspirar.

trans-unit.source: And most of the people, although you strive [for it], are not believers.
trans-unit.target: I la majoria de la gent, encara que t'esforces [doncs], no els creients.

trans-unit.source: And you do not ask of them for it any payment. It is not except a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I ho no demana d'ells cap pagament. No és excepte un recordatori als mons.

trans-unit.source: And how many a sign within the heavens and earth do they pass over while they, therefrom, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: I quants un senyal dins del cel i terra fer que passen més mentre que, dels mateixos, s'estan convertint fora.

trans-unit.source: And most of them believe not in Allah except while they associate others with Him.
trans-unit.target: I la majoria d'ells creuen no en Allah excepte mentre que altres van associar amb ell.

trans-unit.source: Then do they feel secure that there will not come to them an overwhelming [aspect] of the punishment of Allah or that the Hour will not come upon them suddenly while they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: A continuació, senten segurs que no arribarà a ells un aclaparador [aspecte] del càstig d'Allah o que l'hora no vindrà sobre ells de sobte mentre no perceben?

trans-unit.source: Say, "This is my way; I invite to Allah with insight, I and those who follow me. And exalted is Allah; and I am not of those who associate others with Him."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "això és la meva manera; Convido a Allah amb perspicàcia, jo i els que em segueixen. I exaltat és Allah; i jo no sóc d'aquells que associen altres amb ell."

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you [as messengers] except men to whom We revealed from among the people of cities. So have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? And the home of the Hereafter is best for those who fear Allah; then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: I hem enviat no abans [com a missatgers] excepte els homes a qui ens revela des del poble de les ciutats. Així tenen que no va viatjar a través de la terra i observar com era el final d'aquestes davant d'ells? I la casa de la d'ara endavant és millor per a aquells que temen Allah; llavors es vostè raó no?

trans-unit.source: [They continued] until, when the messengers despaired and were certain that they had been denied, there came to them Our victory, and whoever We willed was saved. And Our punishment cannot be repelled from the people who are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [Van continuar] fins que, quan els missatgers va desesperar i es certs que que havia estat negada, va venir a ells la nostra victòria i a qui hem volgut s'ha desat. I el nostre càstig no pot ser repel les persones que són delinqüents.

trans-unit.source: There was certainly in their stories a lesson for those of understanding. Never was the Qur'an a narration invented, but a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of all things and guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha sens dubte les històries una lliçó per a aquells de la comprensió. Mai va ser el Qur ' an una narració, inventar, però una confirmació del que era abans i una explicació detallada de totes les coses i orientació i Misericòrdia per persones que creuen.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. These are the verses of the Book; and what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem, ra. Aquests són els versos del llibre; i el que ha estat revelat a vostè del seu senyor és la veritat, però no crec que la majoria de les persones.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who erected the heavens without pillars that you [can] see; then He established Himself above the Throne and made subject the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. He arranges [each] matter; He details the signs that you may, of the meeting with your Lord, be certain.
trans-unit.target: És Allah que va erigir el cel sense pilars que [es] veu; després es va establir per sobre el tron i subordinar el sol i la Lluna, cada corrent [camp] per a un termini especificat. Va organitza [cada] importa; Detalla els signes que vostè pot, de la reunió amb el seu Senyor, estar segur.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who spread the earth and placed therein firmly set mountains and rivers; and from all of the fruits He made therein two mates; He causes the night to cover the day. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: I és ell qui difondre la terra i es col loquen en el mateix fermament conjunt de muntanyes i rius; i des de tots els fruits s'hi va fer dos companys; Provoca la nit cobrir el dia. Fet que els signes per a un poble que dóna pensar.

trans-unit.source: And within the land are neighboring plots and gardens of grapevines and crops and palm trees, [growing] several from a root or otherwise, watered with one water; but We make some of them exceed others in [quality of] fruit. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: I dins de la terra són veïns parcel. les i jardins de vinyes i conreus i palmeres, [creixent] diverses d'una arrel o en cas contrari, regades amb una aigua; però podem fer algunes d'elles superi altres en [de] fruites. Fet que són signes d'un poble que la raó.

trans-unit.source: And if you are astonished, [O Muhammad] - then astonishing is their saying, "When we are dust, will we indeed be [brought] into a new creation?" Those are the ones who have disbelieved in their Lord, and those will have shackles upon their necks, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: I si vostè és sorprès, [O Muhammad] - llavors sorprenent és seu dient: "quan som pols, hem fet seran [portada] a una nova creació?" Aquests són els que tenen dubtaven del seu Senyor, i aquells tindran grillons a coll, i els són companys del foc; es queda aquí eternament.

trans-unit.source: They impatiently urge you to bring about evil before good, while there has already occurred before them similar punishments [to what they demand]. And indeed, your Lord is full of forgiveness for the people despite their wrongdoing, and indeed, your Lord is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Amb impaciència instar a provocar mal abans de bona, mentre que allà ja s'ha produït davant d'ells càstigs semblants [a què demanen]. De fet, el seu senyor és ple de perdó per la gent, malgrat les seves irregularitats i de fet, el seu senyor és greu en pena.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" You are only a warner, and for every people is a guide.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven dir, "Per què un signe no hagi estat enviat li del seu senyor?" Vostè és només un Avisador, i per cada poble és una guia.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what every female carries and what the wombs lose [prematurely] or exceed. And everything with Him is by due measure.
trans-unit.target: Allah sap què porta cada femella i què els úters perdre [prematurament] o superior. I tot amb ell és per due mesura.

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted.
trans-unit.target: [És] Coneixedor del invisibles i el va ser testimoni, el gran, l'exaltat.

trans-unit.source: It is the same [to Him] concerning you whether one conceals [his] speech or one publicizes it and whether one is hidden by night or conspicuous [among others] by day.
trans-unit.target: És el mateix [a ell] pel que fa a un amaga [el seu] discurs o un divulgar-lo i si un està ocult de nit o conspicu [entre d'altres] per dia.

trans-unit.source: For each one are successive [angels] before and behind him who protect him by the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves. And when Allah intends for a people ill, there is no repelling it. And there is not for them besides Him any patron.
trans-unit.target: Per a cada un els successius [àngels] davant i darrere d'ell que protegir-lo pel Decret d'Allah. De fet, Allah no canviarà la condició de les persones fins que van canviar el que és en si mateixos. I quan Allah té la intenció d'una gent malalta, no hi ha cap repel·lir-lo. I no per a ells a més ell qualsevol patró.

trans-unit.source: It is He who shows you lightening, [causing] fear and aspiration, and generates the heavy clouds.
trans-unit.target: És el que mostra un llamp, [causant] por i aspiració i genera el núvols pesades.

trans-unit.source: And the thunder exalts [Allah] with praise of Him - and the angels [as well] from fear of Him - and He sends thunderbolts and strikes therewith whom He wills while they dispute about Allah; and He is severe in assault.
trans-unit.target: I el tro exalta [Allah] amb elogi d'ell - i els Àngels [també] de por d'ell - i li envia llamps i vagues amb qui ell vol mentre es disputaria sobre Allah; i ell és greu en l'assalt.

trans-unit.source: To Him [alone] is the supplication of truth. And those they call upon besides Him do not respond to them with a thing, except as one who stretches his hands toward water [from afar, calling it] to reach his mouth, but it will not reach it [thus]. And the supplication of the disbelievers is not but in error [i.e. futility].
trans-unit.target: Ell [sol] és la súplica de la veritat. I aquells convoquen a més ell no respon amb una cosa, excepte com algú que s'estén les mans cap a l'aigua [des de lluny, anomenant-lo] per arribar a la boca, però no arribaran a això [que]. I la súplica dels disbelievers no és sinó en l'error [és a dir, futilitat].

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whoever is within the heavens and the earth, willingly or by compulsion, and their shadows [as well] in the mornings and the afternoons.
trans-unit.target: I per Allah prostrates qui és en els cels i la terra, voluntàriament o per obligació i d'ombres [també] en els matins i les tardes.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the heavens and earth?" Say, "Allah." Say, "Have you then taken besides Him allies not possessing [even] for themselves any benefit or any harm?" Say, "Is the blind equivalent to the seeing? Or is darkness equivalent to light? Or have they attributed to Allah partners who created like His creation so that the creation [of each] seemed similar to them?" Say, "Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the One, the Prevailing."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Que és Senyor del cel i terra?" Dir, "Allah". Dir, "vostè llavors tenen a més li aliats no posseir [encara] per si mateixos cap benefici o cap mal?" Dir, "és la persiana equivalent a veure'l? O és equivalent a la llum la foscor? O han atribuït a socis d'Allah que ha creat com la seva creació per tal que la creació [de cada] semblava similar a ells? Dir: "Allah és el creador de totes les coses, i és l'un, el Prevailing".

trans-unit.source: He sends down from the sky, rain, and valleys flow according to their capacity, and the torrent carries a rising foam. And from that [ore] which they heat in the fire, desiring adornments and utensils, is a foam like it. Thus Allah presents [the example of] truth and falsehood. As for the foam, it vanishes, [being] cast off; but as for that which benefits the people, it remains on the earth. Thus does Allah present examples.
trans-unit.target: Envia cap avall de la cel, pluja i cabal valls segons la seva capacitat, i el torrent porta una escuma de pujada. I des d'aquell [mena] que van escalfar al foc, desitjant guarniments i estris, és una escuma com ell. Així Allah presenta [l'exemple de] veritat i falsedat. Pel que fa a l'escuma, això desapareix, [ser] emesos però pel que fa a allò que beneficia les persones, roman en la terra. Així Allah presentar exemples.

trans-unit.source: For those who have responded to their Lord is the best [reward], but those who did not respond to Him - if they had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby. Those will have the worst account, and their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Per a aquells que han respost al seu senyor és el millor [recompensa], però qui no ha respost a ell - si tenien tot el que és totalment diferent a la terra i similars que amb ell, que [intentaria] rescatar-se així. Aquells tindrà el compte pitjor, seu refugi és l'infern i miserable és el lloc.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who knows that what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth like one who is blind? They will only be reminded who are people of understanding -
trans-unit.target: Llavors és ell qui sap que el que ha estat revelat a vostè del seu senyor és la veritat com el que és cec? Que es només es va recordar que són gent d'entesa-

trans-unit.source: Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,
trans-unit.target: Aquells que complir el Pacte d'Allah i no trencar el contracte,

trans-unit.source: And those who join that which Allah has ordered to be joined and fear their Lord and are afraid of the evil of [their] account,
trans-unit.target: I aquells que unir-se a allò que Allah ha ordenat a unir-se i por el seu Senyor i són por del mal de [el seu] compte,

trans-unit.source: And those who are patient, seeking the countenance of their Lord, and establish prayer and spend from what We have provided for them secretly and publicly and prevent evil with good - those will have the good consequence of [this] home -
trans-unit.target: I els que són pacients, buscant el rostre del seu Senyor i establir l'oració i passar de què hem proporcionat per a ells en secret i públicament i prevenir el mal amb el bé - els tindrà bona conseqüència de [aquesta] casa-

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants. And the angels will enter upon them from every gate, [saying],
trans-unit.target: Jardins de domicili perpetu; ells entrarà-los amb qui eren justos entre els seus pares, els seus cònjuges i els seus descendents. I els àngels entrarà en ells de cada porta, [dir],

trans-unit.source: "Peace be upon you for what you patiently endured. And excellent is the final home."
trans-unit.target: "La pau sigui amb tu per què vostè suportat pacientment. I la casa final és excel·lent."

trans-unit.source: But those who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and spread corruption on earth - for them is the curse, and they will have the worst home.
trans-unit.target: Però aquells que trencar el Pacte d'Allah després de contractar-lo i tallar-la que Allah ha ordenat per unir-se i difondre la corrupció de la terra - per a ells és la maledicció, i tindran la llar pitjor.

trans-unit.source: Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. And they rejoice in the worldly life, while the worldly life is not, compared to the Hereafter, except [brief] enjoyment.
trans-unit.target: Allah s'estén disposició per a qui ell voluntats i restringeix [es]. I alegren la vida mundana, si bé no és la vida mundana, en comparació amb el més enllà, excepte [breu] gaudi.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] -
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven dir, "Per què un signe no hagi estat enviat li del seu senyor?" Dir, [O Muhammad], "de fet, Allah deixa per mal camí qui ell voluntats i guies a ell mateix qui fa la volta [a ell]-

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah. Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured."
trans-unit.target: Qui he cregut i cors del qual s'asseguren pel record d'al·là. Sens dubte, en el record d'al·là cors són segur."

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and done righteous deeds - a good state is theirs and a good return.
trans-unit.target: Aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos - bon estat ells i un bon retorn.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We sent you to a community before which [other] communities have passed on so you might recite to them that which We revealed to you, while they disbelieve in the Most Merciful. Say, "He is my Lord; there is no deity except Him. Upon Him I rely, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: Així han t'hem enviat a una comunitat abans que [altres] comunitats han passat a perquè vostè podria recitar-los allò que ens va revelar a vostè, mentre que no creuen en el misericordiós. Dir, "és el meu Senyor. no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell. A ell vaig confiar i a ell és el meu retorn."

trans-unit.source: And if there was any qur'an by which the mountains would be removed or the earth would be broken apart or the dead would be made to speak, [it would be this Qur'an], but to Allah belongs the affair entirely. Then have those who believed not accepted that had Allah willed, He would have guided the people, all of them? And those who disbelieve do not cease to be struck, for what they have done, by calamity - or it will descend near their home - until there comes the promise of Allah. Indeed, Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: I si hi havia qualsevol Qur ' an per la qual es retira les muntanyes o la terra es trenca part o morts es faria parlar, [seria aquest Alcorà], però a Allah pertany l'assumpte totalment. Llavors qui considerava no han acceptat que havia al là volgués, que han guiat la gent, tots ells? I els que dubten no deixaran de ser colpejat, per el que han fet, per la calamitat - o va descendir a prop de casa seva - fins que arriba la promesa d'Allah. De fet, Allah no fallar a [seva] promesa.

trans-unit.source: And already were [other] messengers ridiculed before you, and I extended the time of those who disbelieved; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.
trans-unit.target: I ja van ser [altres] missatgers ridiculitzats abans, i que va estendre el temps d'aquells que dubtaven; llavors he agafat i com [terrible] va ser la meva pena.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who is a maintainer of every soul, [knowing] what it has earned, [like any other]? But to Allah they have attributed partners. Say, "Name them. Or do you inform Him of that which He knows not upon the earth or of what is apparent of speech?" Rather, their [own] plan has been made attractive to those who disbelieve, and they have been averted from the way. And whomever Allah leaves astray - there will be for him no guide.
trans-unit.target: Llavors és ell que és un coordinador de cada ànima, [saber] que s'ha guanyat, [com qualsevol altra]? Però a Allah atribueixen socis. Dir, "anomenar-los. O informar-lo del que sap no en la terra o de l'aparent del discurs? Més aviat, [propi] el seu pla s'ha fet atractiva per als que no creuen, i s'ha apartat de la forma. I qui sigui Allah deixa per mal camí - hi serà per a ell cap guia.

trans-unit.source: For them will be punishment in the life of [this] world, and the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe. And they will not have from Allah any protector.
trans-unit.target: Per a ells serà càstig en la vida del món [aquesta], i el càstig de la d'ara endavant és més greu. I no tindran des d'Allah qualsevol protector.

trans-unit.source: The example of Paradise, which the righteous have been promised, is [that] beneath it rivers flow. Its fruit is lasting, and its shade. That is the consequence for the righteous, and the consequence for the disbelievers is the Fire.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple del paradís, que els justos han estat prometia, [que] està sota flux de rius. El fruit és durador i la seva ombra. Que és la conseqüència per al recte, i la conseqüència per disbelievers és el foc.

trans-unit.source: And [the believers among] those to whom We have given the [previous] Scripture rejoice at what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], but among the [opposing] factions are those who deny part of it. Say, "I have only been commanded to worship Allah and not associate [anything] with Him. To Him I invite, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: I [els creients entre] aquells a qui hem donat l'escriptura [anterior] s'alegren en què ha estat revelat a vostè, [O Muhammad], però entre les faccions [oposats] són aquells que neguen la part d'ella. Dir, "vaig tenir només estat manat veneren Allah i no [quelcom] associar amb ell. Li vaig convidar i a ell és el meu retorn."

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed it as an Arabic legislation. And if you should follow their inclinations after what has come to you of knowledge, you would not have against Allah any ally or any protector.
trans-unit.target: I així ens han mostrat com una legislació àrab. I si vostè ha de seguir d'inclinacions després que vostè de coneixement, no tindria contra Allah cap aliat o qualsevol protector.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you and assigned to them wives and descendants. And it was not for a messenger to come with a sign except by permission of Allah. For every term is a decree.
trans-unit.target: I ja tenim enviar missatgers abans i assignat a les mullers i descendents. I no era un Missatger d'aconseguir amb un senyal excepte permís d'Allah. Per a cada terme és un decret.

trans-unit.source: Allah eliminates what He wills or confirms, and with Him is the Mother of the Book.
trans-unit.target: Allah elimina el que vol o confirma i amb ell és la mare del llibre.

trans-unit.source: And whether We show you part of what We promise them or take you in death, upon you is only the [duty of] notification, and upon Us is the account.
trans-unit.target: I si us mostrem part del que prometen-los o portarà a la mort, a vostè és només la notificació [deure de] i sobre nosaltres és el compte.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? And Allah decides; there is no adjuster of His decision. And He is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: No tenen que vist que hem situat sobre la terra, reduint-lo de les seves fronteres? I Allah decideix; no hi ha cap perit de la seva decisió. I ràpida en compte.

trans-unit.source: And those before them had plotted, but to Allah belongs the plan entirely. He knows what every soul earns, and the disbelievers will know for whom is the final home.
trans-unit.target: I aquells abans d'ells havia intrigat, però a Allah pertany el pla totalment. Sap el que guanya cada ànima, i els disbelievers saber per a qui és la casa final.

trans-unit.source: And those who have disbelieved say, "You are not a messenger." Say, [O Muhammad], "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you, and [the witness of] whoever has knowledge of the Scripture."
trans-unit.target: I els que tenen dubtaven dir: "Vostè no és un Missatger." Dir, [O Muhammad], "Sufficient és Allah com a testimoni entre jo i vosaltres i [el testimoni de] qui tingui coneixement de l'escriptura."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that you might bring mankind out of darknesses into the light by permission of their Lord - to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy -
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, ra. [és] un llibre que ens ha revelat a vostè, [O Muhammad], que podria portar la humanitat de darknesses a la llum amb permís del seu Senyor - al camí de l'exaltat en el poder, la Praiseworthy -

trans-unit.source: Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers from a severe punishment
trans-unit.target: Allah, a qui pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra. I Ai disbelievers des d'un càstig sever

trans-unit.source: The ones who prefer the worldly life over the Hereafter and avert [people] from the way of Allah, seeking to make it (seem) deviant. Those are in extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Els que prefereixen la vida mundana sobre el més enllà i evitar [persones] de la manera d'Allah, tractant de fer que (sembla) anormals. Aquests són en l'error extrema.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send any messenger except [speaking] in the language of his people to state clearly for them, and Allah sends astray [thereby] whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: I no ens va enviar un Missatger excepte [parlar] en la llengua del seu poble a estat clarament per a ells, i Allah envia per mal camí [que] qui va testaments i guies qui ell voluntats. I l'exaltat en forces, el savi.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent Moses with Our signs, [saying], "Bring out your people from darknesses into the light and remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: I certament enviem Moses amb rètols, [dir], "Bring fora la gent de darknesses a la llum i recordar-los dels dies de Allah." Fet que són signes per a tots els pacients i agraït.

trans-unit.source: And [recall, O Children of Israel], when Moses said to His people, "Remember the favor of Allah upon you when He saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who were afflicting you with the worst torment and were slaughtering your [newborn] sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.
trans-unit.target: I [desvetllen, O fills d'Israel], quan Moses va dir a la seva gent, "recordar el favor d'Allah a vostè quan vostè va salvar de la gent del faraó, que vostè afebliren amb la pitjor turment i eren sacrifici el seu [del nadó] fills i mantenir viva la seva femelles. I el que va ser un gran judici del seu Senyor.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe.' "
trans-unit.target: I [recorda] Quan va proclamar el seu Senyor, "si estàs agraït, segurament augmentarà li [a favor]; però si li neguem, de fet, el meu càstig és greu. " "

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "If you should disbelieve, you and whoever is on the earth entirely - indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy."
trans-unit.target: I Moses va dir: "si vostè ha dubten, sou i qui és a la terra completament - de fet, Allah és lliure de necessitat i Praiseworthy".

trans-unit.source: Has there not reached you the news of those before you - the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud and those after them? No one knows them but Allah. Their messengers brought them clear proofs, but they returned their hands to their mouths and said, "Indeed, we disbelieve in that with which you have been sent, and indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
trans-unit.target: Allà no ha arribat a vostè les notícies dels abans - el poble de Noè i ' Aad i Thamud i aquells després d'ells? Ningú coneix però Allah. Els seus missatgers portat proves clares, però va tornar a les seves mans a la boca i va dir, "De fet, no creuen en allò que li ha enviat, i de fet som, sobre allò que vostè, ens conviden a dubte inquietant".

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said, "Can there be doubt about Allah, Creator of the heavens and earth? He invites you that He may forgive you of your sins, and He delays your death for a specified term." They said, "You are not but men like us who wish to avert us from what our fathers were worshipping. So bring us a clear authority."
trans-unit.target: Els seus missatgers, va dir, "hi pot haver dubte sobre Allah, creador del cel i la terra? Va convida que ell pot perdonarà vostres pecats, i es retarda la mort d'un terme especificat." Deien, "no són sinó homes com nosaltres que volen evitar nosaltres de què estaven venerant nostres pares. Així que ens porten una autoritat clar."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said to them, "We are only men like you, but Allah confers favor upon whom He wills of His servants. It has never been for us to bring you evidence except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Els seus missatgers els va dir: "estem sols homes com tu, però Allah confereix favor a qui ell voluntats dels seus servents. Mai ha estat per a nosaltres portar que vostè excepte la prova amb permís d'Allah. I en Allah deixar que els creients es basen.

trans-unit.source: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our [good] ways. And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely."
trans-unit.target: I per què ens no hauria de confiar en Allah mentre que ell ens ha guiat a les nostres maneres [bo]. I segurament estarem pacient contra qualsevol dany deu portar-nos. I a deixar que Allah qui podria invocar [fet] confiar."

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, "We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our religion." So their Lord inspired to them, "We will surely destroy the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven diu que els seus missatgers, "segurament li portarem fora de la nostra terra, o hem de tornar a la nostra religió". Així seu Senyor inspirat a ells, "nosaltres segurament destruirà els malfactors.

trans-unit.source: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat."
trans-unit.target: I segurament farà que habiten a la terra després d'ells. Això és per a qui tem la meva posició i tem meu amenaça."

trans-unit.source: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, [therefore], was every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: I demanen que la victòria d'Allah, i decebut, [doncs], era cada tirà obstinada.

trans-unit.source: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.
trans-unit.target: Abans que ell és l'infern, i ell li donarà un got d'aigua purulentes.

trans-unit.source: He will gulp it but will hardly [be able to] swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: Va empassar-lo però difícilment es [poder] s'empassa. I mort vindrà a ell de tot arreu, però ell és no morir. I abans que ell és un càstig massiva.

trans-unit.source: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is [that] their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable [to keep] from what they earned a [single] thing. That is what is extreme error.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple d'aquells que no creuen en el seu senyor és [que] els seus actes com les cendres que el vent bufa amb força un dia tempestuós; són incapaços [fer] des que es va obtenir una [sola] cosa. Això és què és error extrema.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He wills, He can do away with you and produce a new creation.
trans-unit.target: No has vist que Allah creava els cels i la terra en veritat? Si es vol, pot acabar amb vostè i produir una nova creació.

trans-unit.source: And that is not difficult for Allah.
trans-unit.target: I això no és difícil d'Allah.

trans-unit.source: And they will come out [for judgement] before Allah all together, and the weak will say to those who were arrogant, "Indeed, we were your followers, so can you avail us anything against the punishment of Allah?" They will say, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is all the same for us whether we show intolerance or are patient: there is for us no place of escape."
trans-unit.target: Sortiran [per sentència] abans d'Allah tots junt i els febles dirà a aquells que van ser arrogants, "de fet, estàvem els seus seguidors, així pot vostè aprofitar nosaltres res contra el càstig d'Allah?" Diran, "si Allah ens havia guiat, ens vols tenir el guiava. És tot el mateix per a nosaltres si ens Mostra la intolerància o són pacients: hi ha per a nosaltres no hi ha lloc d'escapament. "

trans-unit.source: And Satan will say when the matter has been concluded, "Indeed, Allah had promised you the promise of truth. And I promised you, but I betrayed you. But I had no authority over you except that I invited you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; but blame yourselves. I cannot be called to your aid, nor can you be called to my aid. Indeed, I deny your association of me [with Allah] before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: I Satanàs dirà quan s'ha celebrat l'assumpte, "de fet, Allah havia promès la promesa de veritat. I jo et vaig prometre, però jo li traït. Però tenia cap autoritat sobre vosaltres excepte que he convidat, i vostè va respondre a mi. Així que no em culpen; però vosaltres mateixos la culpa. No es pot cridar el seu ajut, ni es pot trucar al meu ajut. De fet, em nego a la Associació de mi [amb Allah] abans. De fet, per als malfactors és un dolor càstig."

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace!"
trans-unit.target: I aquells que creien i feien justos fets seran admesos a jardins sota quin cabal rius, romandre eternament en el mateix amb permís del seu Senyor; i la felicitació aquí serà, "La Pau"!

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, [making] a good word like a good tree, whose root is firmly fixed and its branches [high] in the sky?
trans-unit.target: No considera com Allah presenta un exemple, [fer] una paraula com un bon arbre, arrel del qual és fixa i les seves branques [Alt] en el cel?

trans-unit.source: It produces its fruit all the time, by permission of its Lord. And Allah presents examples for the people that perhaps they will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Es produeix el seu fruit tot el temps, amb permís del seu Senyor. I Allah presenta exemples per a la gent que potser ells es recordar.

trans-unit.source: And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability.
trans-unit.target: I l'exemple d'una mala paraula és com un arbre dolent, a causa de la superfície de la terra, no tenint cap estabilitat.

trans-unit.source: Allah keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word, in worldly life and in the Hereafter. And Allah sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Allah manté ferms aquells que creuen, amb la paraula ferm, en la vida mundana i en el futur. I els malfactors Allah envia per mal camí. I Allah fa el que vol.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
trans-unit.target: Ha no considerat qui intercanviar el favor d'Allah de la incredulitat i es va establir la seva gent [a] la casa de ruïna?

trans-unit.source: [It is] Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the settlement.
trans-unit.target: [És] L'infern, que van [entrarà] cremada i roí és l'assentament.

trans-unit.source: And they have attributed to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for indeed, your destination is the Fire."
trans-unit.target: I tenen atribuït a iguals d'Allah a enganyar [persones] del seu camí. Dir, "Gaudir de vosaltres, de fet, el seu destí és el foc."

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], tell My servants who have believed to establish prayer and spend from what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, before a Day comes in which there will be no exchange, nor any friendships.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], explicar els meus servents que he cregut establir pregària i passar des que ens han proporcionat, secretament i públicament, abans que arribi un dia en el qual hi haurà cap canvi ni cap amistats.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky and produced thereby some fruits as provision for you and subjected for you the ships to sail through the sea by His command and subjected for you the rivers.
trans-unit.target: Es tracta d'Allah que crear el cel i la terra i enviat pluja des del cel i així produït algunes fruites com a prestació per a vostè i sotmesos per a vostè els vaixells a vela al mar pel seu comandament i sotmesos per tu rius.

trans-unit.source: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous [in orbit], and subjected for you the night and the day.
trans-unit.target: I sotmesos per a vostè el sol i la Lluna, contínua [en òrbita] i sotmès per tu el dia i la nit.

trans-unit.source: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is [generally] most unjust and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: I ell li va donar de tot que li demana d'ell. I si t'hauria de comptar el favor d'Allah, no podria enumerar-los. De fet, la humanitat [generalment] és més injust i ingrat.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit, O Muhammad], quan Abraham va dir, "el meu Senyor, fer aquesta ciutat [Makkah] segura i mantenir mi i els meus fills de venerant ídols.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Senyor meu, fet ha portar per mal camí molts entre la gent. Així que qui em - segueix a continuació és de mi; i qui em - disobeys fet, ets [encara] indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Nostre Senyor, que han es va establir alguns dels meus descendents en una vall a prop de casa teva sagrat, nostre Senyor, que es pot establir la pregària no cultivats. Així fer cors entre la gent d'inclinació cap a ells i proporcionar-los de les fruites que podrien ser agraïts.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven.
trans-unit.target: Nostre Senyor, fet ja saps el que ens amaguen i què declarem, i hi ha res ocult des d'Allah en la terra o en el cel.

trans-unit.source: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
trans-unit.target: Lloem a Allah, que ha concedit a mi en la vellesa Ishmael i Isaac. De fet, el Senyor és l'oient de súplica.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
trans-unit.target: Senyor meu, em fan un fundadora de pregària i [molts] des meu descendents. Nostre Senyor i acceptar la meva súplica.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established."
trans-unit.target: Nostre Senyor, perdonar a mi i els meus pares i els creients el dia s'estableix el compte."

trans-unit.source: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare [in horror].
trans-unit.target: I mai pensen que Allah és conscient de què fer els malfactors. Només ells es retarda per un dia quan es miren els ulls [en terror].

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void.
trans-unit.target: Curses, seus caps aixecats, seu cop d'ull no torna a ells, i els cors són vàlides.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], warn the people of a Day when the punishment will come to them and those who did wrong will say, "Our Lord, delay us for a short term; we will answer Your call and follow the messengers." [But it will be said], "Had you not sworn, before, that for you there would be no cessation?
trans-unit.target: I, [O Muhammad], advertir les persones d'un dia quan el càstig vindrà a ells i els que s'equivocava dir, "nostre Senyor, retardar ens per un curt termini; Anem contestarà la seva crida i seguir els missatgers." [Però es diu], "havia vostè no jurat, abans, que per tu no hi hauria cap cessament?

trans-unit.source: And you lived among the dwellings of those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them. And We presented for you [many] examples."
trans-unit.target: I va viure entre les vivendes dels que injustament-se, i havia quedat clar a vostè com hem tractat amb ells. I hem presentat per a vostè [molts] exemples."

trans-unit.source: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains.
trans-unit.target: I havia planejat el seu pla, però amb Allah és [gravat] seu pla, fins i tot si el seu pla havia estat [prou] acabar amb les muntanyes.

trans-unit.source: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: Tan mai no pensen que Allah fallarà a la seva promesa de seus missatgers. De fet, Allah és sublim en la força i el propietari de retribució.

trans-unit.source: [It will be] on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens [as well], and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: [Es] el dia la terra serà substituïda per una altra terra i el cel [també] i totes les criatures sortirà abans d'Allah, l'un, la Prevailing.

trans-unit.source: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
trans-unit.target: I podràs veure els criminals que dia lligats en grillons,

trans-unit.source: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Els vestits de camp líquid i els rostres coberts per l'incendi.

trans-unit.source: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Així que Allah recompensa cada ànima pel que li va valer. De fet, Allah és ràpida en compte.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Aquest [Qur ' an] és notificació per a les persones que poden ser advertit així i que ells poden saber que és però un Déu i que aquells de la comprensió es recordà.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, ra. Aquests són els versos del llibre i un clar Qur ' an.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Potser els que dubten desitgem que havien estat musulmans.

trans-unit.source: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Deixar-los menjar i divertir-se i ser desviat per esperança [falsa], que ja van saber.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
trans-unit.target: I ens no destruir qualsevol ciutat però que perquè era un decret conegut.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Cap nació precedirà el seu terme, ni es mantindrà a partir de llavors.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
trans-unit.target: I diuen, "O a qui s'ha enviat el missatge cap avall, fet ets boig.

trans-unit.source: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Per què que no ens porten els àngels, si hauria de ser entre el veraç?"

trans-unit.source: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: No enviem avall els àngels excepte amb veritat; i els disbelievers vols no llavors es reprieved.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
trans-unit.target: De fet, és que enviat pel Qur ' an i de fet, serem seu guardià.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: I certament havia enviat [missatgers] davant de vostè, [O Muhammad], entre les sectes dels pobles antics.

trans-unit.source: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
trans-unit.target: I no Missatger vindria a ells excepte que ell ridiculitzat.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Així podem inserir denegació en els cors dels criminals.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: No creuran en ell, mentre que ja s'ha produït el precedent dels pobles antics.

trans-unit.source: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
trans-unit.target: I [encara] vam obrir a ells una porta del cel i van continuar aquí a pujar,

trans-unit.source: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Que diria, "els nostres ulls tenen només ha enlluernat. Més aviat, som un poble afectat per art de màgia."

trans-unit.source: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
trans-unit.target: I hem posat dins de les grans estrelles de cel i tenen embellint-lo pels observadors.

trans-unit.source: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
trans-unit.target: I s'han protegit des de cada diable expulsat [de la pietat d'Allah]

trans-unit.source: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
trans-unit.target: Excepte un que roba una audiència i és perseguit per una flama que crema clar.

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
trans-unit.target: I la terra - ens han estès i elenc fermament en el mateix conjunt de muntanyes i causada per créixer aquí [quelcom] de totes les coses ben equilibrat.

trans-unit.source: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
trans-unit.target: I hem fet per a vostè en el mateix mitjà de viure i [per a] aquells per als quals no esteu proveïdors.

trans-unit.source: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
trans-unit.target: I no hi ha una cosa però que amb nosaltres són seus dipòsits, i no enviem excepte una mesura conegut.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
trans-unit.target: I hem enviat els vents fecundant i enviat aigua del cel i tenint en compte la beguda d'ella. I no són seus criats.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, som nosaltres els que donen vida i provocar la mort, i som l'hereu.

trans-unit.source: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
trans-unit.target: I ja sabem les [generacions] precedents entre vosaltres, i ja hem conegut els posteriors [que vingui].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu Senyor reunirà de fet, és savi i saber.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: I certament ens va crear home argila des d'un fang negre alterat.

trans-unit.source: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
trans-unit.target: I foc jinn que hem creat abans de abrasador.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit, O Muhammad], quan el Senyor va dir als àngels, "vaig a crear un ésser humà argila des d'un fang negre alterat.

trans-unit.source: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: I quan li han proporcionat i respira a ell de la meva ànima [crear], llavors caure a ell en la prostració."
