trans-unit.source: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful.
trans-unit.target: És el seu Senyor que condueix la nau per a vostè a través de la mar que vostè pot buscar de la seva generositat. De fet, ell és mai, Clement.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are [all] those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away [from Him]. And ever is man ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: I quan l'adversitat et toca al mar, són perdut [tots els] aquells vostè invocar excepte per ell. Però quan va es lliura a la terra, s'allunyen [d'ell]. I mai és home ingrat.

trans-unit.source: Then do you feel secure that [instead] He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate.
trans-unit.target: Llavors et sents segur que [en] va no farà que una part de la terra empassar o enviar contra una tempesta de pedres? Llavors vostè no trobaria per vosaltres mateixos un defensor.

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger.
trans-unit.target: O et sents segur que ell no enviarà còpia al mar una altra vegada i enviar a vostè un huracà de vent i s'ofeguen per a què es va negar? Llavors vostè no trobaria per a si mateixos contra nosaltres un venjador.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.
trans-unit.target: I tenim sens dubte els fills d'Adam l'honor i van portar a la terra i el mar i proporcionada per a ells de les coses bones i preferit-los sobre gran part del que hem creat, amb preferència [definitiva].

trans-unit.source: [Mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will call forth every people with their record [of deeds]. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed].
trans-unit.target: [Esmentar, O Muhammad], el dia et trucarem successivament cada persones amb el seu disc [dels actes]. Llavors qui es dóna el seu disc a la mà dreta - aquells llegirà que els discos i la injustícia no es farà, [encara] tant com un fil [dins la llavor data].

trans-unit.source: And whoever is blind in this [life] will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way.
trans-unit.target: I qui és cec en aquesta [vida] serà cega en el futur i més per mal camí a camí.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to [make] you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, eren uns a temptar-lo de la que li revelàvem per tal [que] inventar nosaltres altra cosa; i llavors haurien pres vostè com un amic.

trans-unit.source: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little.
trans-unit.target: I si no ens havien enfortit vostè, vols tenir gairebé-los una mica.

trans-unit.source: Then [if you had], We would have made you taste double [punishment in] life and double [after] death. Then you would not find for yourself against Us a helper.
trans-unit.target: Llavors [si tenia], ens hauria fet gust [càstig en] doble vida i doble [després] mort. Llavors vostè no trobaria per si mateix contra nosaltres un ajudant.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then [when they do], they will not remain [there] after you, except for a little.
trans-unit.target: I efectivament, estaven a punt de des de la terra per expulsar dels mateixos. I llavors [quan fan], no romandran [hi] després que, excepte una mica.

trans-unit.source: [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration.
trans-unit.target: [Que és nostra] estableix la forma per a aquells que havia enviat abans dels nostres missatgers; i vostè no trobarà en el nostre camí cap alteració.

trans-unit.source: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night and [also] the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed.
trans-unit.target: Establir l'oració a la disminució del sol [des seu meridià] fins a la foscor de la nit i [també] el Qur ' an d'Alba. De fet, és presenciat mai la recitació d'Alba.

trans-unit.source: And from [part of] the night, pray with it as additional [worship] for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station.
trans-unit.target: I [part de] la nit, pregar amb ella com [culte] addicional per a vostè; s'espera que el seu senyor es ressuscitar a una estació lloat.

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority."
trans-unit.target: I dir, "El meu Senyor, causa m per entrar en una entrada de so i sortir una sortida sòlida i concedir-me de tu mateix una autoritat suport."

trans-unit.source: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart."
trans-unit.target: I dir, "ha arribat la veritat i falsedat ha marxat. De fet està falsedat, [per naturalesa], mai obligat a apartar-se."

trans-unit.source: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.
trans-unit.target: I li enviarem del Qur ' an que és la curació i Misericòrdia per als creients, però que no incrementa la malfactors excepte en pèrdua.

trans-unit.source: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing.
trans-unit.target: I quan podem atorgar a favor a la disbeliever, s'allunya i distàncies d'ell mateix; i quan mal li toca, mai està desesperat.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "cada treballa en la seva manera, però el seu senyor és saber més del que és millor guiar de manera."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little."
trans-unit.target: I demanen que, [O Muhammad], sobre l'ànima. Dir, "és l'ànima de l'afer del meu Senyor. I la humanitat no ha donat coneixement excepte una mica."

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us.
trans-unit.target: I si hem volgut, segurament podríem fer distància amb allò que li revelàvem. Llavors no trobareu per si mateix referent un advocat contra nosaltres.

trans-unit.source: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great.
trans-unit.target: Excepte [ens han deixat amb vostè] com una pietat del seu Senyor. De fet, favor a vostè mai ha estat gran.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like of it, even if they were to each other assistants."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Si la humanitat i jinn es van reunir per tal de produir similars d'aquest Qur ' an, podria no produeixen similars, fins i tot si fossin a l'altre ajudants."

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind] of example, but most of the people refused [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: I sens dubte han diversificat per al poble aquest Qur ' an de cada [tipus] d'exemple, però la majoria de la gent es va negar [quelcom] excepte incredulitat.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring.
trans-unit.target: I diuen, "no creurà vostè fins que es trenquen obert per a nosaltres des del camp a la primavera.

trans-unit.source: Or [until] you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force [and abundance]
trans-unit.target: O [fins] té un jardí de palmeres arbres i raïm i fer brollen rius endavant dins d'ells en vigor [i abundància]

trans-unit.source: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before [us]
trans-unit.target: O fer el cel cauen sobre nosaltres en fragments com s'han cobrat o portar Allah i àngels abans [nosaltres]

trans-unit.source: Or you have a house of gold or you ascend into the sky. And [even then], we will not believe in your ascension until you bring down to us a book we may read." Say, "Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: O té una casa d'or o es puja al cel. I [fins i tot llavors], ens va a no creure en la seva ascensió fins que baixar-nos un llibre que es pot llegir." Dir, "exaltat és meu Senyor! Era jo alguna vegada, però un Missatger humana?"

trans-unit.source: And what prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah sent a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: I què va impedir la gent quan orientació va venir a ells excepte que deien, "té Allah va enviar un Missatger humana?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "If there were upon the earth angels walking securely, We would have sent down to them from the heaven an angel [as a] messenger."
trans-unit.target: Dir: "si hi havia en els àngels terra caminar de manera segura, ens haguessin enviat cap avall a ells del cel un àngel [com a] Missatger."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Sufficient és Allah com testimoni entre tu i jo. De fet ell és mai, sobre els seus servents, conèixer i veure".

trans-unit.source: And whoever Allah guides - he is the [rightly] guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire.
trans-unit.target: I qui Allah guia - és el [raó] guiada; i qui va envia per mal camí - mai trobaràs per ells protectores a més d'ell, i ells reunirà el dia de resurrecció [caigut] en els seus rostres - cecs, muts i sords. Seva refugi és l'infern; cada vegada es subvencionaran podem augmentar-los en flames de foc.

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected [in] a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: Que és la seva recompensa ja que dubtaven del nostres versos i va dir, "Quan els ossos i es va ensorrar les partícules, la voluntat [veritablement] ser ressuscitat [a] una nova creació?"

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is [the one] Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: No veuen que al là, que va crear el cel i la terra, és [la] capaç de crear l'agrada d'ells? I ha nomenat per a ells un terme, sobre els quals no hi ha dubte. Però els malfactors nego [quelcom] excepte incredulitat.

trans-unit.source: Say [to them], "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy.
trans-unit.target: Dir [amb ells], "si vostè posseïa els dipòsits de la misericòrdia del Senyor, llavors que vols retenir per por de passar." I mai ha home estat garrepa.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: I certament havia donat Moses nou signes evidents, demanar tan nens d'Israel [sobre] Quan arribava a ells i faraó va dir a ell, "Fet que crec, O Moses, que es veuen afectades per art de màgia".

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You have already known that none has sent down these [signs] except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "Ja coneix que cap ha enviat aquestes [signes] excepte el Senyor del cel i la terra com a prova, i de fet crec, O faraó, que són destruïts."

trans-unit.source: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together.
trans-unit.target: Així que va destinat a conduir-los des de la terra, però ens ofegat ell i amb ell tots junts.

trans-unit.source: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in [one] gathering."
trans-unit.target: I vam dir després faraó a nens d'Israel, "habitar a la terra, i quan arriba la promesa de la d'ara endavant, ens portarà endavant en [un] recopilació".

trans-unit.source: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: I amb la veritat hem enviat el Qur ' an, i amb la veritat ha baixat. I ens han no enviat, [O Muhammad], excepte com a portador de la bona nova i un Avisador.

trans-unit.source: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively.
trans-unit.target: I [és] un Qur ' an que hem separat [per intervals] que podria recitar-lo a les persones durant un període prolongat. I ens han enviat-lo progressivament.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration,
trans-unit.target: Dir, "hi creuen o no creuen. De fet, els que van rebre el coneixement abans que - quan això es recita'ls, cauen els rostres en la prostració,

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."
trans-unit.target: I diuen, "exaltat de és el nostre Senyor! De fet, la promesa de nostre Senyor s'ha complert."

trans-unit.source: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission.
trans-unit.target: I cauen en els seus rostres, plorant, i el Qur ' an ells augmenta en el submissió humil.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever [name] you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite [too] loudly in your prayer or [too] quietly but seek between that an [intermediate] way.
trans-unit.target: Dir, "crida a Allah o crida a més Clement. Qualsevol [nom] trucar - li pertanyen els noms millors. " I que no recitar en veu alta [també] en la seva pregària o [també] en silenci però busquen entre que una manera [intermedi].

trans-unit.source: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion and has no [need of a] protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with [great] glorification."
trans-unit.target: I dir, "elogi a Allah, que no ha tingut un fill i ha tingut cap soci en la [seua] domini i té no [necessita d'un] protector per de debilitat; i glorificar a ell amb la glorificació [gran]."

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
trans-unit.target: Elogi [all] és [deu] a Allah, que ha empresonat a criat seu el llibre i no ha fet aquí qualsevol desviació.

trans-unit.source: [He has made it] straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward
trans-unit.target: [Ell ha fet] recta, per advertir de greu càstig d'ell i donar la bona nova als creients que fer els justos fets que tindran una bona recompensa

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain forever
trans-unit.target: En el qual romandran per sempre

trans-unit.source: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son."
trans-unit.target: I per advertir als que diuen, "Allah ha tingut un fill."

trans-unit.source: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie.
trans-unit.target: No tenen cap coneixement d'això, ni tenia els seus pares. Tomba és la paraula que surt de la boca; parlen no excepte una mentida.

trans-unit.source: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, [O Muhammad], if they do not believe in this message, [and] out of sorrow.
trans-unit.target: Llavors potser vols matar-vos a través del dolor sobre ells, [O Muhammad], si no creuen en aquest missatge, [i] de tristesa.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them [as to] which of them is best in deed.
trans-unit.target: De fet, hem fet el que és en l'adornament terra per a que ens puguin provar-los [sobre] quin d'ells és el millor a l'escriptura.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it [into] a barren ground.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, farem el que és sobre ella [a] una terra erma.

trans-unit.source: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?
trans-unit.target: O has pensat que els companys de la cova i la inscripció eren, entre nostres signes, una meravella?

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when the youths retreated to the cave and said, "Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance."
trans-unit.target: [Accèsit] Quan els joves es va retirar a la cova i va dir, "Nostre Senyor, concedir-nos de tu mateix Mercè i preparar per a nosaltres des de la nostra orientació correcta assumpte."

trans-unit.source: So We cast [a cover of sleep] over their ears within the cave for a number of years.
trans-unit.target: Així podem emetre [una portada de son] sobre les orelles dins la cova durant diversos anys.

trans-unit.source: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens va despertar-los que ens podrien mostrar quina de les dues faccions era més precís a calcular quin [punt] havia quedat en el temps.

trans-unit.source: It is We who relate to you, [O Muhammad], their story in truth. Indeed, they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance.
trans-unit.target: És que es refereixen a tu, [O Muhammad], d'història en veritat. De fet, eren joves que creia en el seu Senyor, i ells hem augmentat en orientació.

trans-unit.source: And We made firm their hearts when they stood up and said, "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. Never will we invoke besides Him any deity. We would have certainly spoken, then, an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: I hem fet ferm el cor quan es va aixecar i va dir, "nostre Senyor és Senyor dels cels i la terra. Mai ens cridarà a més ell qualsevol deïtat. Ens vols certament parlat, llavors, una transgressió excessiva.

trans-unit.source: These, our people, have taken besides Him deities. Why do they not bring for [worship of] them a clear authority? And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie?"
trans-unit.target: Aquests, el nostre poble, han pres a més ell deïtats. Per què no porten per [culte]-los una autoritat clar? I que és més injust que el qui inventa Allah a una mentida"?

trans-unit.source: [The youths said to one another], "And when you have withdrawn from them and that which they worship other than Allah, retreat to the cave. Your Lord will spread out for you of His mercy and will prepare for you from your affair facility."
trans-unit.target: [Les Joventuts va dir entre ells], "i quan li han retirat d'ells i que més que veneren Allah, retirada a la cova. El Senyor s'estendrà per a vostè de la seva misericòrdia i prepararà per a vostè de la seva facilitat d'assumpte."

trans-unit.source: And [had you been present], you would see the sun when it rose, inclining away from their cave on the right, and when it set, passing away from them on the left, while they were [laying] within an open space thereof. That was from the signs of Allah. He whom Allah guides is the [rightly] guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a protecting guide.
trans-unit.target: I [vostè havia actual], es vols veure el sol quan es va aixecar, inclinant-se de la seva cova a la dreta, i quan es troba, passa lluny d'ells a l'esquerra mentre que eren [posar] dins un espai obert del mateix. Que era de les senyals d'Allah. Qui Allah guia és la [raó] guiada, però qui se n va per mal camí - mai es trobarà per a ell una guia protectores.

trans-unit.source: And you would think them awake, while they were asleep. And We turned them to the right and to the left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. If you had looked at them, you would have turned from them in flight and been filled by them with terror.
trans-unit.target: I vostè podria pensar-los despert, mentre que estaven adormits. I es va convertir-los a la dreta i a l'esquerra, mentre que el seu gos s'estenia la seva potes davanteres de l'entrada. Si que havia mirat a ells, que han convertit d'ells en vol i ha omplert per ells amb el terror.

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another. Said a speaker from among them, "How long have you remained [here]?" They said, "We have remained a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord is most knowing of how long you remained. So send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city and let him look to which is the best of food and bring you provision from it and let him be cautious. And let no one be aware of you.
trans-unit.target: I de la mateixa manera, ens va despertar-los que podria qüestionar un altre. Va dir un orador entre ells, "quant de temps li quedaren [aquí]?" Deien, "Ens quedem un dia o una part d'un dia." Deien, "el seu senyor és saber la majoria de quant de temps va romandre. Així enviï'n un de vostès amb aquesta moneda de plata de la teva a la ciutat i deixava veure que és el millor d'aliments i portar la provisió d'ella i deixar-lo a ser cautelós. I que ningú de vostès conscient.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if they come to know of you, they will stone you or return you to their religion. And never would you succeed, then - ever."
trans-unit.target: De fet, si vénen a conèixer-lo, es la pedra o retornar-vos a la seva religió. I mai no vols tenir èxit, llavors - mai."

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they [who found them] would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. [That was] when they disputed among themselves about their affair and [then] said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take [for ourselves] over them a masjid."
trans-unit.target: I de la mateixa manera, ens va portar a trobar que [que ells] sabria que la promesa d'Allah és veritat i que de l'hora no hi ha dubte. [Que era] Quan es discuteix entre ells sobre la seva relació i [llavors] deia, "construir sobre ells una estructura. Seu senyor és saber més sobre ells." Va dir que va prevaler en l'assumpte, "Segurament prendrem [per nosaltres mateixos] sobre ells una masjid."

trans-unit.source: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few. So do not argue about them except with an obvious argument and do not inquire about them among [the speculators] from anyone."
trans-unit.target: Diran que hi havia tres, el quart d'ells seu gos; i diran que hi havia cinc, la sisena d'elles sent el seu gos - endevinar a invisibles; i diran que hi havia set, i el vuitè d'ells era el seu gos. Dir, [O Muhammad], "Senyor és saber la majoria dels seus membres. Cap coneix excepte algun. Així no discutir sobre ells excepte amb un argument evident i no informar-los entre [els especuladors] d'algú".

trans-unit.source: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,"
trans-unit.target: I mai no diuen res, "de fet, jo faré que demà"

trans-unit.source: Except [when adding], "If Allah wills." And remember your Lord when you forget [it] and say, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to what is nearer than this to right conduct."
trans-unit.target: Excepte [en afegir], "Si Allah testaments." I recordar el seu Senyor quan oblida [-] i dir, "potser el meu Senyor es guiï'm per què és més a prop que això a la conducta correcte."

trans-unit.source: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine.
trans-unit.target: I va romandre a la seva cova durant tres-cents anys i superat per nou.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah is most knowing of how long they remained. He has [knowledge of] the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He and how Hearing! They have not besides Him any protector, and He shares not His legislation with anyone."
trans-unit.target: Dir: "Allah és saber la majoria de quant van romandre. Ell ha [coneixement] [aspectes] invisibles dels cels i la terra. És veure com va i com! Tenen no a més ell qualsevol protector i ell comparteix no la seva legislació amb qualsevol. "

trans-unit.source: And recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no changer of His words, and never will you find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: I recitar, [O Muhammad], el que ha estat revelat a vostè del llibre del seu Senyor. Hi ha cap canviador de les seves paraules, i mai es trobarà en que no sigui ell un refugi.

trans-unit.source: And keep yourself patient [by being] with those who call upon their Lord in the morning and the evening, seeking His countenance. And let not your eyes pass beyond them, desiring adornments of the worldly life, and do not obey one whose heart We have made heedless of Our remembrance and who follows his desire and whose affair is ever [in] neglect.
trans-unit.target: I mantenir-se pacient [per ser] amb qui crida a seu Senyor al matí i vespre, buscant el seu rostre. I que no els ulls passar més enllà d'ells, desitjant guarniments de la vida mundana i no obeir un el cor hem fet sense fer cas del nostre record i que segueix el seu desig i l'assumpte és mai [oblit a].

trans-unit.source: And say, "The truth is from your Lord, so whoever wills - let him believe; and whoever wills - let him disbelieve." Indeed, We have prepared for the wrongdoers a fire whose walls will surround them. And if they call for relief, they will be relieved with water like murky oil, which scalds [their] faces. Wretched is the drink, and evil is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: I dir, "la veritat és del seu Senyor, així qui vol - deixava creure; i qui vol - li permetrà dubten." De fet, hem preparat pels malfactors un incendi amb parets envoltaran-los. I si diuen per a alleujament, serà rellevat amb aigua com oli tèrbola, que abrusa [el seu] cares. La beguda és miserable, i mal és el lloc.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of any who did well in deeds.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos - de fet, no permetrem que es perd la recompensa de qualsevol que ho va fer bé en els fets.

trans-unit.source: Those will have gardens of perpetual residence; beneath them rivers will flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade, reclining therein on adorned couches. Excellent is the reward, and good is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Aquells tindran jardins de domicili perpetu; sota ells rius correrà. Que es sigui guarnit aquí amb braçalets d'or i es gastarà verds peces de seda fina i brocat, recolzat en això en sofàs adornaven. La recompensa és excel·lent i bo és el lloc.

trans-unit.source: And present to them an example of two men: We granted to one of them two gardens of grapevines, and We bordered them with palm trees and placed between them [fields of] crops.
trans-unit.target: I presentar-hi un exemple de dos homes: hem concedit a un d'ells dos jardins de Parres, i ells limita amb palmeres i situada entre ells [camps de] cultius.

trans-unit.source: Each of the two gardens produced its fruit and did not fall short thereof in anything. And We caused to gush forth within them a river.
trans-unit.target: Cada un dels dos jardins produeix els seus fruits i no queia curt del mateix en res. I hem provocat a raig endavant dins d'ells un riu.

trans-unit.source: And he had fruit, so he said to his companion while he was conversing with him, "I am greater than you in wealth and mightier in [numbers of] men."
trans-unit.target: I tenia el fruit, així deia al seu company mentre ell va conversar amb ell, "jo sóc més gran que tu en riquesa i més poderós en homes [números de]."

trans-unit.source: And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself. He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever.
trans-unit.target: I va entrar el seu jardí mentre era injust per a si mateix. Va dir: "no crec que aquest morirà - mai.

trans-unit.source: And I do not think the Hour will occur. And even if I should be brought back to my Lord, I will surely find better than this as a return."
trans-unit.target: I no crec que es produirà l'hora. I fins i tot si jo hauria portat retrocedir al meu Senyor, segurament trobarà millor que això com un retorn.

trans-unit.source: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust and then from a sperm-drop and then proportioned you [as] a man?
trans-unit.target: El seu company va dir-li mentre ell va conversar amb ell, "tenen que dubtaven del qui t'ha creat des de pols i després d'una gota d'esperma i llavors vostè proporcionada [com] un home?

trans-unit.source: But as for me, He is Allah, my Lord, and I do not associate with my Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a mi, ell és al là, Senyor meu, i jo no associar amb el meu Senyor ningú.

trans-unit.source: And why did you, when you entered your garden, not say, 'What Allah willed [has occurred]; there is no power except in Allah '? Although you see me less than you in wealth and children,
trans-unit.target: I per què vostè, quan vostè introdueix el seu jardí, no dir, "què Allah voluntat [ha produït]; hi ha cap poder excepte Allah "? Encara que em vegis menys que tu en riquesa i nens,

trans-unit.source: It may be that my Lord will give me [something] better than your garden and will send upon it a calamity from the sky, and it will become a smooth, dusty ground,
trans-unit.target: Pot ser que el meu Senyor em [quelcom] donarà millor que el seu jardí i enviarà a això una calamitat des del cel, i es convertirà en un terreny de llis, pols,

trans-unit.source: Or its water will become sunken [into the earth], so you would never be able to seek it."
trans-unit.target: O l'aigua es convertirà en baix relleu [a la terra], així que mai seria capaç de buscar-lo."

trans-unit.source: And his fruits were encompassed [by ruin], so he began to turn his hands about [in dismay] over what he had spent on it, while it had collapsed upon its trellises, and said, "Oh, I wish I had not associated with my Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: I el seus fruits van ser integrades [ruïna], per la qual cosa va començar a girar les mans sobre [amb desànim] sobre el que havia passat, mentre que tenia es va enfonsar a la seva enreixats i va dir: "Oh, m'agradaria que havia no associada amb el meu Senyor ningú."

trans-unit.source: And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself.
trans-unit.target: I allà va ser per a ell cap empresa per ajudar-li que no sigui Allah, ni es podria defensar-se.

trans-unit.source: There the authority is [completely] for Allah, the Truth. He is best in reward and best in outcome.
trans-unit.target: L'autoritat hi [totalment] per Allah, la veritat. És millor en recompensa i millor resultat.

trans-unit.source: And present to them the example of the life of this world, [its being] like rain which We send down from the sky, and the vegetation of the earth mingles with it and [then] it becomes dry remnants, scattered by the winds. And Allah is ever, over all things, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: I presentar-hi l'exemple de la vida d'aquest món, [seu ésser] plouria que enviem des del cel, i la vegetació de la terra es barreja amb ell i [llavors] es converteix en restes secs, escampades pels vents. I Allah és mai, sobre totes les coses, perfecte en la capacitat.

trans-unit.source: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for [one's] hope.
trans-unit.target: Riquesa i els nens són [però] guarniment de la vida mundana. Però les bones obres perdurables millors recompensa i esperança millor per [un] el seu Senyor.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when We will remove the mountains and you will see the earth prominent, and We will gather them and not leave behind from them anyone.
trans-unit.target: I [adverteixi de] el dia quan anem a treure les muntanyes podràs veure la terra prominent i anem a recollir-los i no deixar d'ells ningú.

trans-unit.source: And they will be presented before your Lord in rows, [and He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time. But you claimed that We would never make for you an appointment."
trans-unit.target: I es presentaran abans del seu senyor a files i va dir, "de veritat ha arribat a nosaltres hem creat la primera vegada. Però vostè afirma que mai seria per a vostè una cita".

trans-unit.source: And the record [of deeds] will be placed [open], and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it, and they will say, "Oh, woe to us! What is this book that leaves nothing small or great except that it has enumerated it?" And they will find what they did present [before them]. And your Lord does injustice to no one.
trans-unit.target: I el registre [fets] aniran [obert] i podràs veure els criminals temerós de que dins d'ella, i es dirà, "Oh, Ai nosaltres! Què és aquest llibre que deixa res petita o gran excepte que ho ha enumerats es?" I trobarà el que presenten [abans d'ells]. I el seu Senyor fa injustícia a ningú.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was of the jinn and departed from the command of his Lord. Then will you take him and his descendants as allies other than Me while they are enemies to you? Wretched it is for the wrongdoers as an exchange.
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit] Quan ens diu que els àngels, "Postrar a Adam," i postrava, excepte Iblees. Va ser del jinn i es va apartar de l'ordre del seu Senyor. Llavors vostè tindrà ell i els seus descendents com a aliats que em mentre són enemics per a vostè? Condemnats que és pels malfactors d'intercanvi.

trans-unit.source: I did not make them witness to the creation of the heavens and the earth or to the creation of themselves, and I would not have taken the misguiders as assistants.
trans-unit.target: No va fer-los testimonis a la creació dels cels i la terra o a la creació de si mateixos, i que no hagués pres la misguiders com a ajudants.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when He will say, "Call 'My partners' whom you claimed," and they will invoke them, but they will not respond to them. And We will put between them [a valley of] destruction.
trans-unit.target: I [adverteixi de] el dia quan va dir, "Call"Meus socis"qui va afirmar," i s'invoca-los, però no respondran per ells. I ens posarem entre ells [vall de] destrucció.

trans-unit.source: And the criminals will see the Fire and will be certain that they are to fall therein. And they will not find from it a way elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: I els criminals veurà el foc i serà certs que estan caient en això. I no es troba d'ella una manera en altres llocs.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified in this Qur'an for the people from every [kind of] example; but man has ever been, most of anything, [prone to] dispute.
trans-unit.target: I certament han diversificat aquest Qur ' an per a les persones de cada [mena de] exemple; però l'home ha estat, la majoria de qualsevol cosa, [propens a] disputa.

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them and from asking forgiveness of their Lord except that there [must] befall them the [accustomed] precedent of the former peoples or that the punishment should come [directly] before them.
trans-unit.target: I res ha impedit que la gent creient quan orientació arribar a ells i de demanar el perdó del seu Senyor excepte que hi [ha] succeir-los el [acostumat] precedent dels pobles antics o que el càstig hauria de venir [directament] abans d'ells.

trans-unit.source: And We send not the messengers except as bringers of good tidings and warners. And those who disbelieve dispute by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth and have taken My verses, and that of which they are warned, in ridicule.
trans-unit.target: I enviar missatgers no excepte com a missatgers de la bona nova i última. I els que dubten disputa mitjançant [] falsedat per a [tractar] invalidar així la veritat i han pres els meus versos i allò que ells se'ls adverteix, en ridícul.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord but turns away from them and forgets what his hands have put forth? Indeed, We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And if you invite them to guidance - they will never be guided, then - ever.
trans-unit.target: I qui és més injust que un que és va recordar els versos del seu Senyor però allunya d'ells i s'oblida que les mans han posat endavant? De fet, hem posat sobre els seus revestiments de cors, perquè no entenen que i en la seva sordesa d'orelles. I si et convidi a una orientació - mai guiarà, llavors - mai.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is the Forgiving, full of mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. Rather, for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape.
trans-unit.target: I el seu senyor és l'indulgent, ple de Misericòrdia. Si havia d'imposar la culpa sobre ells per a què es va obtenir, va vols accelerar per a ells el càstig. Més aviat, per a ells és una cita de que mai trobaran una fuita.

trans-unit.source: And those cities - We destroyed them when they wronged, and We made for their destruction an appointed time.
trans-unit.target: I aquelles ciutats - podem destruir-los quan van injustament, i hem fet per la seva destrucció un temps assenyalat.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when Moses said to his servant, "I will not cease [traveling] until I reach the junction of the two seas or continue for a long period."
trans-unit.target: I [parlar] Quan Moses va dir al seu servent, "jo no deixarà [viatge] fins que vaig arribar a la cruïlla dels dos mars o continuar per un període llarg."

trans-unit.source: But when they reached the junction between them, they forgot their fish, and it took its course into the sea, slipping away.
trans-unit.target: Però quan van arribar a la cruïlla entre ells, es van oblidar els peixos, i va prendre el seu curs al mar, relliscant away.

trans-unit.source: So when they had passed beyond it, [Moses] said to his boy, "Bring us our morning meal. We have certainly suffered in this, our journey, [much] fatigue."
trans-unit.target: Així quan tenia passaven més enllà d'això, [Moses] deia al seu noi, "porta'ns nostre dinar del matí. Han certament patit en aquesta, nostre viatge, [molt] fatiga."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Did you see when we retired to the rock? Indeed, I forgot [there] the fish. And none made me forget it except Satan - that I should mention it. And it took its course into the sea amazingly".
trans-unit.target: Va dir: "has vist quan vam retirar a la roca? De fet, m'oblidava [hi] els peixos. I no em va fer oblidar-lo excepte Satanàs - que hauria d'esmentar-ho. I va prendre el seu curs al mar sorprenentment".

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "That is what we were seeking." So they returned, following their footprints.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir: "Això és el estaven buscant." Així van tornar, seguint les seves petjades.

trans-unit.source: And they found a servant from among Our servants to whom we had given mercy from us and had taught him from Us a [certain] knowledge.
trans-unit.target: I es van trobar un criat entre nostres servents a qui havia donat misericòrdia de nosaltres i li havia ensenyat de nosaltres una [certa] coneixement.

trans-unit.source: Moses said to him, "May I follow you on [the condition] that you teach me from what you have been taught of sound judgement?"
trans-unit.target: Moses va dir a ell, "pot seguir que [la condició] que ensenyar-me de què li han ensenyat de so sentència?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, with me you will never be able to have patience.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "de fet, amb mi vostè mai serà capaç de tenir paciència.

trans-unit.source: And how can you have patience for what you do not encompass in knowledge?"
trans-unit.target: I com vostè pot tenir paciència per què que abasta no en coneixement?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You will find me, if Allah wills, patient, and I will not disobey you in [any] order."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir: "Vostè em trobarà, si Allah testaments, pacient i es no desobeir vostè en [qualsevol] ordre."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then if you follow me, do not ask me about anything until I make to you about it mention."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "llavors si em segueixen, no em preguntin sobre qualsevol cosa fins que vaig fer a vostè sobre això parlar."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they had embarked on the ship, al-Khidh r tore it open. [Moses] said, "Have you torn it open to drown its people? You have certainly done a grave thing."
trans-unit.target: Així van posar, fins que quan tenia es va embarcar en la nau, al-Khidh r va obrir. [Moses] va dir, "té vostè esquinçada oberta a ofegar les persones? Han certament ja una cosa greu."

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not say that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] va dir, "Jo no deia que amb mi que mai seria capaç de tenir paciència?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Do not blame me for what I forgot and do not cover me in my matter with difficulty."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "no em culpen per que va oblidar i no em cobreix el meu assumpte amb dificultat."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they met a boy, al-Khidh r killed him. [Moses] said, "Have you killed a pure soul for other than [having killed] a soul? You have certainly done a deplorable thing."
trans-unit.target: Així van posar, fins a reunir un nen, al-Khidh r matat. [Moses] va dir, "vostè haver matat una ànima pura per diferents [haver matat] una ànima? Vostè té certament fet una cosa deplorable.

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not tell you that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] va dir, "Feia no et dic que amb mi que mai seria capaç de tenir paciència?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "If I should ask you about anything after this, then do not keep me as a companion. You have obtained from me an excuse."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "si ha demano que per res després d'això, llavors no mantenir-me com a company. Heu Obtingut de mi excusa."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they came to the people of a town, they asked its people for food, but they refused to offer them hospitality. And they found therein a wall about to collapse, so al-Khidh r restored it. [Moses] said, "If you wished, you could have taken for it a payment."
trans-unit.target: Així que es proposen, fins que quan van arribar al poble d'un poble, demanaven la seva gent per menjar, però es van negar a oferir-los l'hospitalitat. I es van trobar aquí una paret punt de col. lapse, així restaurava r al-Khidh. [Moses] va dir: "Si vostè ho desitja, podria haver agafat per a això un pagament."

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "This is parting between me and you. I will inform you of the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience.
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] va dir: "això és sortir entre tu i jo. Jo us informarà de la interpretació d'allò que no podia tenir paciència.

trans-unit.source: As for the ship, it belonged to poor people working at sea. So I intended to cause defect in it as there was after them a king who seized every [good] ship by force.
trans-unit.target: Pel que fa a la nau, que pertanyia als pobres treballant al mar. Així que la intenció de causar defectes en ell ja hi va haver després d'ells un rei que es va apoderar de cada vaixell [bon] per força.

trans-unit.source: And as for the boy, his parents were believers, and we feared that he would overburden them by transgression and disbelief.
trans-unit.target: Pel que fa al nen, els seus pares eren creients i temia que va vols sobrecarregar-los per la transgressió i la incredulitat.

trans-unit.source: So we intended that their Lord should substitute for them one better than him in purity and nearer to mercy.
trans-unit.target: Així que hem pensat que seu Senyor ha de substituir per a ells un millor que ell en puresa i més a prop a pietat.

trans-unit.source: And as for the wall, it belonged to two orphan boys in the city, and there was beneath it a treasure for them, and their father had been righteous. So your Lord intended that they reach maturity and extract their treasure, as a mercy from your Lord. And I did it not of my own accord. That is the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience."
trans-unit.target: I pel que fa a la muralla, que pertanyia a dos orfes nois a la ciutat i hi havia sota un tresor per a ells, i seu pare havia estat just. Així que el seu Senyor pretén que assoleixen la maduresa i extreure el seu tresor, com una pietat del seu Senyor. I feia que no de la meva pròpia voluntat. Això és la interpretació d'allò que no podia tenir paciència".

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say, "I will recite to you about him a report."
trans-unit.target: I demanen que, [O Muhammad], sobre Dhul-Qarnayn. Dir, "Jo recitarà a vostè sobre ell un informe."

trans-unit.source: Indeed We established him upon the earth, and We gave him to everything a way.
trans-unit.target: De fet hem consagrat a la terra, i li donàvem a tot una manera.

trans-unit.source: So he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Així va seguir una forma

trans-unit.source: Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it [as if] setting in a spring of dark mud, and he found near it a people. Allah said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, either you punish [them] or else adopt among them [a way of] goodness."
trans-unit.target: Fins que, quan va arribar a l'entorn del sol, va trobar [com si] posant en una font de fang fosc, i va trobar a prop un poble. Allah deia, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, o bé castigar [] o bé adoptar entre ells [una forma de] bondat."

trans-unit.source: He said, "As for one who wrongs, we will punish him. Then he will be returned to his Lord, and He will punish him with a terrible punishment.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "pel que fa a aquell que agravis, ens castigarà ell. Llavors ell es retornarà al seu Senyor, i ell li castigarà amb un càstig terrible.

trans-unit.source: But as for one who believes and does righteousness, he will have a reward of Paradise, and we will speak to him from our command with ease."
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a un que creu i fa justícia, ell tindrà una recompensa de paradís, i ens parlarà amb ell del nostre comandament amb facilitat."

trans-unit.source: Then he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Llavors va seguit d'una manera

trans-unit.source: Until, when he came to the rising of the sun, he found it rising on a people for whom We had not made against it any shield.
trans-unit.target: Fins que, quan va arribar a la sortida del sol, va trobar que l'augment en un poble a qui ens no havia fet contra qualsevol escut.

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We had encompassed [all] that he had in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: D'aquesta manera. I hem tingut englobats [tots] que tenia en el coneixement.

trans-unit.source: Then he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Llavors va seguit d'una manera

trans-unit.source: Until, when he reached [a pass] between two mountains, he found beside them a people who could hardly understand [his] speech.
trans-unit.target: Fins que, quan va arribar a [un pas] entre dues muntanyes, va trobar al costat d'ells un poble que a penes podia entendre [el seu] discurs.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, indeed Gog and Magog are [great] corrupters in the land. So may we assign for you an expenditure that you might make between us and them a barrier?"
trans-unit.target: Deien, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, fet de Gog i Magog són [gran] corrupters a la terra. Així pot assignem per a vostè una despesa que es podria fer entre nosaltres i ells una barrera? "

trans-unit.source: He said, "That in which my Lord has established me is better [than what you offer], but assist me with strength; I will make between you and them a dam.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "que en la qual ha establert el meu Senyor em val [que el que ofereixes], però que m'ajudi amb força; Farà que entre vostè i ells una presa.

trans-unit.source: Bring me sheets of iron" - until, when he had leveled [them] between the two mountain walls, he said, "Blow [with bellows]," until when he had made it [like] fire, he said, "Bring me, that I may pour over it molten copper."
trans-unit.target: Em porten làmines de ferro"- fins que, quan ell havia anivellat [ells] entre les parets de la muntanya de dos, va dir,"cop [amb la Manxa], «fins a quan ell havia fet [com] el foc, va dir, "portar-me, que em pot abocar sobre ella fos coure."

trans-unit.source: So Gog and Magog were unable to pass over it, nor were they able [to effect] in it any penetration.
trans-unit.target: Tan Gog i Magog van ser incapaços de passen per sobre, tampoc se'ls capaç [efecte]-hi qualsevol penetració.

trans-unit.source: [Dhul-Qarnayn] said, "This is a mercy from my Lord; but when the promise of my Lord comes, He will make it level, and ever is the promise of my Lord true."
trans-unit.target: [Dhul-Qarnayn] va dir: "això és una misericòrdia del Senyor. però quan tracta la promesa del meu Senyor, ell farà nivell i mai és la promesa de la meva veritable Senyor."

trans-unit.source: And We will leave them that day surging over each other, and [then] the Horn will be blown, and We will assemble them in [one] assembly.
trans-unit.target: I ens deixaran aquell dia creixent sobre l'altre i [llavors] lacustres el Corn, i et muntem les en Assemblea [un].

trans-unit.source: And We will present Hell that Day to the Disbelievers, on display -
trans-unit.target: I presentarem l'infern que dia pels Disbelievers, en l'exhibició -

trans-unit.source: Those whose eyes had been within a cover [removed] from My remembrance, and they were not able to hear.
trans-unit.target: Aquells amb ulls havia estat dins d'una coberta [suprimit] del meu record i no van ser capaços d'escoltar.

trans-unit.source: Then do those who disbelieve think that they can take My servants instead of Me as allies? Indeed, We have prepared Hell for the disbelievers as a lodging.
trans-unit.target: Llavors els que dubten pensa que els puguis fer meves serventes en comptes de mi com aliats? De fet, hem preparat l'infern per disbelievers com un allotjament.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Shall we [believers] inform you of the greatest losers as to [their] deeds?
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "[creients] ens informarem dels grans perdedors com a [el seu] fets?

trans-unit.source: [They are] those whose effort is lost in worldly life, while they think that they are doing well in work."
trans-unit.target: [Són] aquells l'esforç es perd en la vida mundana, mentre pensen que estan fent bé en el treball. "

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord and in [their] meeting Him, so their deeds have become worthless; and We will not assign to them on the Day of Resurrection any importance.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els que no creuen en els versos del seu Senyor i [el seu] conèixer-se, perquè els seus actes s'han convertit en inútils; i no assignarem a ells el dia de resurrecció cap importància.

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense - Hell - for what they denied and [because] they took My signs and My messengers in ridicule.
trans-unit.target: És a dir la recompensa - infern - per què es va negar i [perquè] prenien meu signes i meu missatgers en ridícul.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise as a lodging,
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos - tindran els jardins del paradís com un allotjament,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer.
trans-unit.target: En què van complir eternament. No voldran que qualsevol transferència.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If the sea were ink for [writing] the words of my Lord, the sea would be exhausted before the words of my Lord were exhausted, even if We brought the like of it as a supplement."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "si la mar fos tinta per [escriptura] les paraules del Senyor, el mar esgotarien abans les paraules del Senyor es van esgotar, fins i tot si hem portat la resta d'ella com a suplement."

trans-unit.source: Say, "I am only a man like you, to whom has been revealed that your god is one God. So whoever would hope for the meeting with his Lord - let him do righteous work and not associate in the worship of his Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "jo sóc només un home com tu, a qui ha estat revelat que el seu Déu és un Déu. Així que qui hi hauria esperança per a la reunió amb el seu Senyor - que ho faci justos treballar i no socis en la veneració del seu Senyor ningú."

trans-unit.source: Kaf, Ha, Ya, 'Ayn, Sad.
trans-unit.target: Kaf, ja, ja, ' Ayn, trist.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
trans-unit.target: [És] una menció de la misericòrdia del seu Senyor al seu servent Zechariah

trans-unit.source: When he called to his Lord a private supplication.
trans-unit.target: Quan va cridar al seu senyor una súplica privat.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened, and my head has filled with white, and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "el meu Senyor, de fet han afeblit els meus ossos, meu cap ha omplert amb blanc i mai he estat en la meva súplica a vostè, Senyor, infeliç.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, I fear the successors after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir
trans-unit.target: I de fet, em temo que els successors després de mi i la meva dona ha estat estèril, així donar-me de tu mateix un hereu

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit me and inherit from the family of Jacob. And make him, my Lord, pleasing [to You]."
trans-unit.target: Que s'hereten m i hereta de la família de Jacob. I fer-li, Senyor, agradable [te]."

trans-unit.source: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. We have not assigned to any before [this] name."
trans-unit.target: [Li van dir], "O Zacaries, de fet li donem bona nova d'un nen el nom serà John. Ens han no assignats a cap abans de [aquesta] nom."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when my wife has been barren and I have reached extreme old age?"
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "El meu Senyor, com tindré un nen quan la meva dona ha estat estèril i he arribat a extrema vellesa?"

trans-unit.source: [An angel] said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, for I created you before, while you were nothing.' "
trans-unit.target: [Un àngel] va dir, "per tant [es]; el Senyor diu, 'Que és fàcil per a mi, per abans, he creat mentre treballàveu res.' "

trans-unit.source: [Zechariah] said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three nights, [being] sound."
trans-unit.target: [Zechariah], va dir, "El meu Senyor, fan per a mi un signe." Va dir, "el seu senyal és que vostè no parlar amb la gent per tres nits, [s] so".

trans-unit.source: So he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and signaled to them to exalt [Allah] in the morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Així va sortir al seu poble de la cambra d'oració i marcar-los per exaltar [Allah] al matí i tarda.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy
trans-unit.target: [Allah] deia, "O John, prendre l'escriptura amb determinació". I li donàvem judici [mentre encara] un noi

trans-unit.source: And affection from Us and purity, and he was fearing of Allah
trans-unit.target: I l'afecte de nosaltres i puresa, i ell tenia por d'Allah

trans-unit.source: And dutiful to his parents, and he was not a disobedient tyrant.
trans-unit.target: I obedient als seus pares i ell no és un tirà desobedient.

trans-unit.source: And peace be upon him the day he was born and the day he dies and the day he is raised alive.
trans-unit.target: I pau ser a ell el dia que havia nascut i el dia que mor i el dia que és criat Vivament.

trans-unit.source: And mention, [O Muhammad], in the Book [the story of] Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place toward the east.
trans-unit.target: I menció, [O Muhammad], en el llibre [la història de] Maria, quan ella es va retirar de la seva família a un lloc cap a l'est.

trans-unit.source: And she took, in seclusion from them, a screen. Then We sent to her Our Angel, and he represented himself to her as a well-proportioned man.
trans-unit.target: I ella va prendre, en reclusió d'ells, una pantalla. Llavors hem enviat a seu àngel nostre, i va representar-se a ella com un home meticulosament.

trans-unit.source: She said, "Indeed, I seek refuge in the Most Merciful from you, [so leave me], if you should be fearing of Allah."
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, "de fet, he buscar refugi en el més Clement de vostè, [així deixar-me], si vostè ha per por d'Allah."

trans-unit.source: He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "jo sóc només el Missatger del seu Senyor per donar-li [Notícies de] un noi pur."

trans-unit.source: She said, "How can I have a boy while no man has touched me and I have not been unchaste?"
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, "Com puc tenir un nen mentre que ningú m'ha tocat i no han estat impúdica?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, and We will make him a sign to the people and a mercy from Us. And it is a matter [already] decreed.' "
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "per tant [es]; el Senyor diu, "és fàcil per a mi, i li farà un senyal a la gent i una pietat de nosaltres. I és una qüestió decreta [ja]. " "

trans-unit.source: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.
trans-unit.target: Així que ella concebut ell i ella es va retirar amb ell a un lloc remot.

trans-unit.source: And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She said, "Oh, I wish I had died before this and was in oblivion, forgotten."
trans-unit.target: I els dolors del part li va conduir a la soca d'una palmera. Ella va dir, "Oh, m'agradaria que havia mort abans d'això i va ser en l'oblit, oblidat."

trans-unit.source: But he called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream.
trans-unit.target: Però ell la va cridar des de baix ella, "no plorar; el Senyor ha proporcionat sota un rierol.

trans-unit.source: And shake toward you the trunk of the palm tree; it will drop upon you ripe, fresh dates.
trans-unit.target: I agitar cap el tronc de la palmera; baixarà a vostè dates madur, fresc.

trans-unit.source: So eat and drink and be contented. And if you see from among humanity anyone, say, 'Indeed, I have vowed to the Most Merciful abstention, so I will not speak today to [any] man.' "
trans-unit.target: Així que menjar i beure i estar content. I si vostè veure entre la humanitat ningú, diuen, 'De fet, que han es va comprometre a la abstenció misericordiós, així que no parlarà avui per [qualsevol] home.' "

trans-unit.source: Then she brought him to her people, carrying him. They said, "O Mary, you have certainly done a thing unprecedented.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ella li va portar a la seva gent, portant-lo. Deien, "O Mary, que sens dubte fet una cosa sense precedents.

trans-unit.source: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste."
trans-unit.target: O germana de Aaron, el seu pare no era un home del mal, ni era la seva mare impúdica."

trans-unit.source: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child?"
trans-unit.target: Així va assenyalar a ell. Deien, "Com pot parlar a algú que és al bressol d'un nen?"

trans-unit.source: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.
trans-unit.target: [Jesús] deia, "de fet, sóc criat d'Allah. Ha donat a mi l'escriptura i em va fer un profeta.

trans-unit.source: And He has made me blessed wherever I am and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I remain alive
trans-unit.target: I que ha fet em beneït allà on sóc i ha demanat a mi pregària i zakah mentre romandre viva

trans-unit.source: And [made me] dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me a wretched tyrant.
trans-unit.target: I [mi] obedient a la meva mare, i ell no em fet un tirà miserable.

trans-unit.source: And peace is on me the day I was born and the day I will die and the day I am raised alive."
trans-unit.target: I la pau és en mi el dia que vaig néixer i el dia que morirà i el dia que sóc criat Vivament.

trans-unit.source: That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute.
trans-unit.target: És Jesús, el fill de Mary - la paraula de veritat sobre què estan en controvèrsia.

trans-unit.source: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: No és [corresponent] per a Allah anar un fill; exaltat és ell! Quan va decrets un afer, només diu, "Ser" i és.

trans-unit.source: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path."
trans-unit.target: [Jesús deia], "i de fet, Allah és el meu Senyor i el seu Senyor, tan adorar-lo. Això és un camí recte".

trans-unit.source: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.
trans-unit.target: A continuació, les faccions diferia [pel que fa a Jesús] entre ells, així aflicció als que dubtaven - de l'escena d'un gran dia.

trans-unit.source: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Com [clarament] van a sentir i veure el dia que vénen a nosaltres, però els malfactors avui estan en clar error.

trans-unit.source: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: I advertir-los, [O Muhammad], de la dia de lamentar, quan la matèria es falli; i [encara], estan en [estat de] heedlessness i no creuen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: De fet, és que heretaran la terra i qui és en això i a nosaltres seran retornats.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: I la menció en el llibre [la història de] Abraham. De fet, era un home de veritat i un profeta.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all?
trans-unit.target: [Accèsit] Quan va dir al seu pare, "O el meu pare, per què vostè adorar el que no sentir i veure com no beneficiarà a tots?

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path.
trans-unit.target: O el meu pare, de fet hi ha arribat a mi de coneixement que no ha arribat a vostè, així que segueix-me; Vaig a guiar a un camí fins i tot.

trans-unit.source: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Oh el meu pare, no Satanàs culte. Fet Satanàs ha estat, a més compassius, desobedient.

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]."
trans-unit.target: O el meu pare, de fet em temo que allà li toqui un càstig de la misericordiós perquè es podria a Satan un company [en Hellfire]."

trans-unit.source: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time."
trans-unit.target: [Pare] va dir: "has cap desig de meu déus, O Abraham? Si vostè no desistir, I es segurament de pedra, per evitar un temps prolongat."

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.
trans-unit.target: [Abraham], va dir, "la Pau serà sobre tu. Demanaré perdó per a tu del meu Senyor. De fet, és sempre amable amb mi.

trans-unit.source: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy."
trans-unit.target: I deixarà vostè i aquells vostè invocar altre que Allah i cridarà el meu Senyor. Espero que no seré a la invocació al meu Senyor infeliç."

trans-unit.source: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet.
trans-unit.target: Així quan havia deixar-los i aquells que Allah adoraven, li donàvem Isaac i Jacob i cadascuna [] fem un profeta.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor.
trans-unit.target: I vam donar-los de la nostra Mercè, i hem fet per a ells una reputació d'alt honor.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: I la menció en el llibre, Moses. De fet, va ser elegit, i era un Missatger i profeta.

trans-unit.source: And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him].
trans-unit.target: I l'anomenaven des del costat de la muntanya a [seva] dret i portar a prop, segon [a ell].

trans-unit.source: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet.
trans-unit.target: I li donàvem de nostre Misericòrdia el seu germà Aaron com un profeta.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: I la menció en el llibre, Ishmael. De fet, va ser fidel a la seva promesa, i era un Missatger i profeta.

trans-unit.source: And he used to enjoin on his people prayer and zakah and was to his Lord pleasing.
trans-unit.target: I s'utilitzen per prohibir la seva pregària de persones i zakah i va ser al seu Senyor agradable.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: I la menció en el llibre, Idrees. De fet, era un home de veritat i un profeta.

trans-unit.source: And We raised him to a high station.
trans-unit.target: I el va a una estació d'alta.

trans-unit.source: Those were the ones upon whom Allah bestowed favor from among the prophets of the descendants of Adam and of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose. When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they fell in prostration and weeping.
trans-unit.target: Eren aquells a qui atorgaven Allah favor entre els profetes dels descendents d'Adam i d'aquells que porten a [en el vaixell] amb Noah i dels descendents d'Abraham i Israel i d'aquells qui hem guiat i triar. Quan els versos de més compassius van ser recitats per ells, que va caure en la prostració i plorant.

trans-unit.source: But there came after them successors who neglected prayer and pursued desires; so they are going to meet evil -
trans-unit.target: Però va venir després d'ells successores que descuidat pregària i perseguit desitjos; Així que van conèixer els mal-

trans-unit.source: Except those who repent, believe and do righteousness; for those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged at all.
trans-unit.target: Excepte aquells que es penedeixin, creure i fer justícia; per a aquells ingressarà a paradís i no ser injustament en absolut.

trans-unit.source: [Therein are] gardens of perpetual residence which the Most Merciful has promised His servants in the unseen. Indeed, His promise has ever been coming.
trans-unit.target: [Aquí són] jardins de residència perpètua que més compassius ha promès seus servents a invisibles. De fet, la seva promesa ha estat arribar mai.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein any ill speech - only [greetings of] peace - and they will have their provision therein, morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: No es reproduirà en qualsevol discurs malalt - només la Pau [salutacions de] - i tindran seu acompliment, matí i tarda.

trans-unit.source: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Que és el paradís, que donem com a herència als nostres servidors que eren per por d'Allah.

trans-unit.source: [Gabriel said], "And we [angels] descend not except by the order of your Lord. To Him belongs that before us and that behind us and what is in between. And never is your Lord forgetful -
trans-unit.target: [Gabriel dir], "i que [àngels] descendim no excepte per ordre del seu Senyor. A ell pertany que abans de nosaltres i que darrere de nosaltres i què hi ha al mig. I mai no és el seu Senyor oblidosos-

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him?"
trans-unit.target: Senyor dels cels i la terra i sigui entre ells - tan veneren i tenen paciència per a la seva adoració. Vostè sap de qualsevol semblança amb ell?"

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"
trans-unit.target: I la disbeliever diu: "Quan haig de morir, vaig ser portats endavant viu?"

trans-unit.source: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing?
trans-unit.target: No home recorda que hem creat abans, mentre era res?

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.
trans-unit.target: Tan pel seu Senyor, hem segurament reunir-se ells i els diables; llavors arribarà a ser presents al voltant de l'infern amb els genolls.

trans-unit.source: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens segurament extraurà de cada secta aquells d'ells que eren pitjors contra el misericordiós en insolència.

trans-unit.source: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.
trans-unit.target: Llavors, segurament és nosaltres som majoria sabent d'aquells més digna de la que crema en ell.

trans-unit.source: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
trans-unit.target: I no hi ha cap de vosaltres excepte que vindrà a ell. Això és sobre el seu Senyor decretava inevitable.

trans-unit.source: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
trans-unit.target: Llavors anem a estalviar aquells que temia Allah i deixar els malfactors dins d'ella, sobre els seus genolls.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association?"
trans-unit.target: I quan nostres versos són recita'ls evidències clares, els que dubten diuen a aquells que creuen, "Que de [nostra] dues parts és millor de posició i millor en associació?"

trans-unit.source: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance?
trans-unit.target: I quants una generació han hem destruït abans d'ells que eren millor en les possessions i [fisonomia]?

trans-unit.source: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "qui és en l'error - deixar més Clement estendre per a ell una extensió [en riquesa i temps] fins que, quan van veure el que es va prometre - càstig [en aquest món] o [de resurrecció] l'hora - vindrà a saber qui és més feble en soldats i en posició pitjor."

trans-unit.source: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.
trans-unit.target: I Allah augmenta aquells que eren guiades, en orientació, i les bones obres perdurables són millor per a premiar el seu Senyor i millor per recórrer.

trans-unit.source: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]?"
trans-unit.target: Llavors, has vist el que dubtaven del nostres versos i va dir: "Jo segurament donaran riquesa i nens [en la propera vida]?"

trans-unit.source: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?
trans-unit.target: Ha mirat en invisibles, o ha va portat des de la més misericordiós una promesa?

trans-unit.source: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively.
trans-unit.target: No! Registrarem el que diu i estendre per a ell el càstig extensament.

trans-unit.source: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.
trans-unit.target: I ell heretaran [a] que esmenta, i que vindrà a nosaltres sols.

trans-unit.source: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
trans-unit.target: I s'han pres a més deïtats Allah [false] que seria per a ells [font de] honor.

trans-unit.source: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].
trans-unit.target: No! Els "déus" podrà negar el seu culte d'ells i estarà contra els opositors [en el dia del judici].

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement?
trans-unit.target: No veus que ens han enviat els diables en disbelievers, incitar-los a la incitació [mal] amb [constant]?

trans-unit.source: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.
trans-unit.target: Així no que impacient sobre ells. Només comptem a ells un nombre [limitat].

trans-unit.source: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation
trans-unit.target: El dia que es reuneixen els justos per la misericordiós com una delegació

trans-unit.source: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst
trans-unit.target: I es empenta els criminals a l'infern en set

trans-unit.source: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.
trans-unit.target: Cap tindrà intercessió [poder de] excepte el que havia arrabassat el misericordiós un pacte.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."
trans-unit.target: I van dir, "més Clements ha pres [per si mateix] fill."

trans-unit.source: You have done an atrocious thing.
trans-unit.target: Vostè ha fet una cosa atroç.

trans-unit.source: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation
trans-unit.target: El cel gairebé ruptura dels mateixos i la terra es divideix obert i les muntanyes col·lapse a la devastació

trans-unit.source: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.
trans-unit.target: Que van atribuir el misericordiós un fill.

trans-unit.source: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.
trans-unit.target: I no és adequat per a la més misericordiós que ell ha de tenir un fill.

trans-unit.source: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha un en el cel i la terra sinó que arriba a més compassius com un criat.

trans-unit.source: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.
trans-unit.target: Ha enumerar-los i comptar-los un [completa] comptant.

trans-unit.source: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
trans-unit.target: I tots ells vénen a ell el dia de resurrecció sol.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos - la voluntat misericordiós nomenar-los afecte.
