Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: I camells i bovins que ens han nomenat per a vostè com entre els símbols d'Allah; per a vostè en això és bo. Tan esmentar el nom d'Allah sobre ells en fila [per sacrifici]; i quan són [sense vida] en els seus costats, llavors menjar d'ells i menjar als necessitats i el captaire. Així que vostè que pot ser agraït vam sotmetre.

trans-unit.source: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Seva carn es no arribar a Allah, ni tampoc la seva sang, però el que arriba a ell és la Pietat de tu. Així han podem sotmetre a vostè que vostè pot glorificar Allah per que [a] que ell ha guiat; i donar la bona nova als autors de bo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: De fet, Allah defensa qui he cregut. De fet, Allah no agrada tothom ingrat i traïdor.

trans-unit.source: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.
trans-unit.target: Permís [a combatre] s'ha donat a qui els es combat, ja que van ser injustament. I de fet, Allah és competent donar-los la victòria.

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: [Són] aquells que han estat desallotjat de casa seva sense dret - només perquè diuen, "nostre Senyor és Allah". I si no fos que Allah comprova la gent, alguns amb d'altres, hi hauria estat enderrocades monestirs, esglésies, sinagogues i mesquites en què el nom d'Allah és molt esmentat. I Allah segurament donarà suport a qui donar-li suport. En efecte, Allah és abast i exaltat en podria.

trans-unit.source: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: [I] aquells que, si donem autoritat a la terra, establir l'oració i donar zakah i demanen el que està bé i prohibeixen el que està malament. I per Allah pertany el resultat de matèries [tots els].

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],
trans-unit.target: I si el neguen, [O Muhammad] - per tant, davant d'ells, feia la gent de Noè i ' Aad i Thamud negar [els profetes],

trans-unit.source: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot
trans-unit.target: I la gent d'Abraham i la gent del Lot

trans-unit.source: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: I els habitants de Madyan. I Moses va ser negada, perquè els prolonguen gaudi per disbelievers; llavors he agafat i com era [terrible] meu retret.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.
trans-unit.target: I quants una ciutat podem destruir mentre que estava cometent mal - així que [ara] ha caigut en ruïna - i [quants] un abandonat bé i [quants] un palau elevat.

trans-unit.source: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Així no viatjat a través de la terra i tenen cors per la qual raó i orelles per tal d'escoltar? Perquè de fet, no és els ulls que estan encegats, però encegat són els cors que es troben els pits.

trans-unit.source: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: I van instar a accelerar el càstig. Però Allah mai va a fallar en la seva promesa. I de fet, un dia amb el seu senyor és com mil anys d'aquells que que compti.

trans-unit.source: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: I per a quants una ciutat jo prolongar gaudi mentre que estava cometent malament. Llavors s'apoderaren i per a mi és la destinació [final].

trans-unit.source: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "gent O, jo sóc només per a vostè un Avisador clar."

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: I aquells que han cregut i fet escriptures justos - per a ells és el perdó i la prestació noble.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Però els que lluitava contra la nostra versos, [buscar] a causa de fracàs - són companys de Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I no enviem abans qualsevol Missatger o un profeta excepte que quan ell va parlar [o recitat], Satan va llançar en ell [algunes malentès]. Però Allah aboleix que Satan llança llavors Allah fa precís seus versos. I Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.
trans-unit.target: [Això és] per la qual cosa pot fer el que Satan llança en un judici per als cors del qual és la malaltia i els durs de cor. I de fet, són els malfactors de dissensió extrema.

trans-unit.source: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: I així que aquells que tenien coneixement pot saber que és la veritat del seu Senyor i [per això] hi creuen, i seus cors humilment presentar a ella. I de fet és Allah el guia d'aquells que han cregut per un camí dret.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.
trans-unit.target: Però els que dubten no deixaran de ser en dubte d'això fins que arriba l'hora imposin inesperadament o arriba a ells el càstig d'un dia estèril.

trans-unit.source: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Sobirania [all] que el dia és per a Allah; Considerarà entre ells. Així que creien i feien justos fets estaran en el jardins de plaer.

trans-unit.source: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven i negaven les nostres signes - per aquells hi haurà un càstig humiliant.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: I qui va emigrar per la causa d'Allah i van matar o morir - Allah sens dubte proporcionarà per a ells una bona disposició. De fet, és a Allah qui és el millor dels proveïdors.

trans-unit.source: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Segurament va causar d'introduir una entrada amb què estaran contents, i de fet, Allah està saber i Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Que [es-ho]. I qui respon [a injustícia] amb l'equivalent que amb que va ser perjudicat i llavors és tiranitzada - Allah sens dubte ajuda ell. En efecte, Allah és Pardoning i indulgent.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Això és perquè Allah provoca la nit entrar el dia i provoca el dia entrar a la nit i perquè Allah és escoltar i veure.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: Això és perquè Allah és la veritat, i això que anomenen a altre que ell és falsedat i perquè Allah és el més alt, el gran.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: No veus que Allah ha empresonat pluja des del cel i la terra es converteix en verd? En efecte, Allah és Subtle i Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: A ell pertany el que està en el cel i què hi ha a la terra. I de fet, Allah és el lliure de necessitat, la Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: No veus que Allah ha sotmès a vostè el que està en la terra i els vaixells que corren a través del mar pel seu comandament? I frena el cel caiguin en la terra, llevat que amb el seu permís. Fet Allah, al poble, és amable i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: I ell és el que li va donar vida; llavors va a morir fa i després tornarà [] donar-li vida. De fet, la humanitat és ingrat.

trans-unit.source: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance.
trans-unit.target: Per a totes les religions ens han nomenat ritus que realitzen. Així [O Muhammad], que els disbelievers no lidiar amb vostè sobre la matèria però convidar-los al seu Senyor. De fet, ets en orientació recta.

trans-unit.source: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: I si es disputaria amb vostè, llavors diuen, "Allah és saber més del que fas.

trans-unit.source: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Allah considerarà entre que el dia de resurrecció sobre que sobre les quals solia diferir."

trans-unit.source: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
trans-unit.target: No saps que Allah sap el que està en el cel i la terra? De fet, això és en un registre. Fet que, per Allah, és fàcil.

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper.
trans-unit.target: I culte a més que per a la qual ell ha no empresonat autoritat i que que tenen cap coneixement d'Allah. I no hi haurà per malfactors el cap d'ajuda.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination."
trans-unit.target: I quan els nostres versos són recita'ls evidències clares, reconeix a les persones que dubten de desaprovació. Que estan gairebé a punt d'agredir qui recitar-los nostres versos. Dir, "llavors jo informarem de [és] pitjor que això? [És] el foc que Allah ha promès els que dubten i roí és el destí. "

trans-unit.source: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.
trans-unit.target: O persones, es presenta un exemple, així que escolteu-lo. De fet, aquells invocar a més crearà mai Allah [com] una mosca, fins i tot si es va reunir a l'efecte. I si la mosca ha robar lluny d'ells una cosa [minúscula], no es podria recobrar d'ell. Feble són el perseguidor i el perseguit.

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Ells no tenen valorada Allah amb veritable avaluació. En efecte, Allah és abast i exaltat en podria.

trans-unit.source: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Allah escull els missatgers d'àngels i de les persones. De fet, Allah és escoltar i veure.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Sap què és [actualment] abans d'ells i el que serà després d'ells. I per Allah es retornarà [tots] importa.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: O es que he cregut, arc i postrar i venerar el seu Senyor i fer el bé - que vostè pot tenir èxit.

trans-unit.source: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
trans-unit.target: I s'esforcen per Allah amb la lluita per ell. Ell ha escollit i ha no posa a vostè en la religió cap dificultat. [És] la religió del seu pare Abraham. Allah li anomenat "Musulmans" abans [en escriptures ex] i en aquesta [revelació] que el Missatger pot ser un testimoni sobre vostè i vostè pot ser testimonis sobre la gent. Així establir pregària i donar zakah i mantenir ràpid d'Allah. Ell és el seu protector; excel·lent és el protector i excel·lent és l'ajudant.

trans-unit.source: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte haurà aconseguit els creients:

trans-unit.source: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
trans-unit.target: Que durant la seva pregària humilment submisa

trans-unit.source: And they who turn away from ill speech
trans-unit.target: I es que al seu torn del discurs malalt

trans-unit.source: And they who are observant of zakah
trans-unit.target: I ells que és observador dels zakah

trans-unit.source: And they who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: I ells que custodien la seves parts privades

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
trans-unit.target: Llevat de les seves dones o els posseeixen les mans de la dreta, per fet, es no responsabilitzarà-

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Però qui busca més enllà que, a continuació us detallem els transgressors-

trans-unit.source: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
trans-unit.target: I que són els fideïcomisos i les seves promeses atents

trans-unit.source: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
trans-unit.target: I ells que mantenen amb cura les seves oracions-

trans-unit.source: Those are the inheritors
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els hereus

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Que heretaran al-Firdaus. Es queda aquí eternament.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
trans-unit.target: I certament creava home d'un extracte d'argila.

trans-unit.source: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
trans-unit.target: Llavors hem situat com una gota d'esperma en un allotjament ferm.

trans-unit.source: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
trans-unit.target: Llavors vam fer la gota d'esperma en un coàgul interessant i vam fer el coàgul en un tros [de carn] i vam fer [el nus, ossos, de] i cobríem els ossos amb carn; Llavors vam desenvolupar-lo en una altra creació. Beneït és Allah, el millor dels creadors.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
trans-unit.target: Llavors, en efecte, després de que ets a morir.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Llavors, en efecte, el dia de resurrecció, serà ressuscitat.

trans-unit.source: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
trans-unit.target: I hem creat anteriorment set cels per capes, i mai no hem hagut de [nostra] creació conscient.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
trans-unit.target: I hem enviat pluja des del cel en una quantitat mesurada i es va establir a la terra. I de fet, som capaç de prendre distància.

trans-unit.source: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
trans-unit.target: I hem portat endavant per a vostè així jardins de palmeres i vinyes en que per tu són fruits abundants i des que vostè menja.

trans-unit.source: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
trans-unit.target: I [portem endavant] un arbre emissió del Mont Sinaí, que produeix oli i aliments per a aquells que mengen.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, per a vostè en el bestiar és una lliçó. Donem que beu de la qual és en els seus ventres, i per a ells són nombrosos beneficis i d'ells mengeu.

trans-unit.source: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: I a ells i en els vaixells es realitzen.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: I certament havia enviat Noah al seu poble, i va dir, "O poble meu, venerar Allah; teniu cap deïtat que no sigui ell; llavors es vostè no li tinc por?"

trans-unit.source: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
trans-unit.target: Però la eminents entre els que dubtaven del seu poble, va dir, "això no és un home com vosaltres qui vulgui prevalen sobre tu; i si Allah tenia willed [per enviar un Missatger], han enviat per Àngels. No hem sentit això entre els nostres avantpassats.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
trans-unit.target: No és però un home posseït amb bogeria, així que esperar pel que fa a ell per un temps."

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: [Noah], va dir, "El meu Senyor, suport mi perquè ells m'han negat".

trans-unit.source: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
trans-unit.target: Així ens va inspirar a ell, "la construcció de la nau a la nostra observació i la nostra inspiració i hora nostra comanda i desbordaments del forn, posar en vaixell des de cada dos companys de [criatura] i la seva família, excepte aquells per a qui ha procedit el decret [de la destrucció]. I no s'ocupen mi sobre qui han tractat injustament; de fet, són va ofegar.

trans-unit.source: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
trans-unit.target: I quan vostè que van abordar el vaixell, vostè i aquells amb vostè, llavors diuen, 'Lloar a Allah qui ens ha salvat de la gent d'irregularitats'.

trans-unit.source: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
trans-unit.target: I diu: "Senyor meu, deixa que me la terra a un lloc d'aterratge beneït, i són els millors per acollir [nosaltres]." "

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
trans-unit.target: Fet que els signes, i de fet, sempre que aquestes proves [nostres funcionaris].

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
trans-unit.target: Després es va produir després d'ells una generació d'altres.

trans-unit.source: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: I hem enviat entre ells un Missatger de si mateixos, [dir], "culte Allah; teniu cap deïtat que no sigui ell; llavors es vostè no li tinc por?"

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
trans-unit.target: I la seva gent que dubtaven i negaven la reunió de la d'ara endavant mentre ens havia donat luxe en la vida mundana eminents deia, "això no és sinó un home com vosaltres. Menja d'allò que vostè menja i beu de què vostè beu.

trans-unit.source: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
trans-unit.target: I si vostè ha d'obeir un home com vosaltres, de fet, llavors seria perdedors.

trans-unit.source: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?
trans-unit.target: Va prometre que quan han mort i convertir-se en pols i ossos que serà portat endavant [una vegada més]?

trans-unit.source: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Fins a quin punt, com ara, és el que es prometia.

trans-unit.source: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Vida no és sinó la nostra vida mundana - morim i viure, però no ens seran ressuscitats.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
trans-unit.target: No és però un home que ha inventat una mentida Allah, i nosaltres no creurà ell."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "El meu Senyor, suport mi perquè ells m'han negat".

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] deia, "després d'una mica, segurament serà es penedeix."

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Així que el sortir aprofitat en veritat, i vam fer les com rostolls [planta]. Llavors fora amb la gent d'irregularitats.

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them other generations.
trans-unit.target: Llavors hem produït després d'ells altres generacions.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].
trans-unit.target: Cap nació precedirà seu temps [de terminació], ni romanen [posteriorment].

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Llavors enviem les nostres missatgers en la successió. Cada vegada hi venia a una nació seu Missatger, ells li va negar, perquè hem feien succeïxen [a la destrucció], i vam fer les narracions. Així que amb un poble que no creuen.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: Llavors enviàvem Moses i el seu germà Aaron amb rètols i una autoritat clar

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
trans-unit.target: Faraó i el seu establiment, però van ser arrogants i eren un poble altiu.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Hem de creure dos homes com nosaltres mateixos mentre que la seva gent són per a nosaltres en la servitud?"

trans-unit.source: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Així es negava i eren d'aquells destruït.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
trans-unit.target: I sens dubte hem donat Moses l'escriptura que potser ells es guiaria.

trans-unit.source: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.
trans-unit.target: I vam fer el fill de Mary i la seva mare un senyal i protegit-los dins una terra alta tenir nivell [àrees] i corrents d'aigua.

trans-unit.source: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
trans-unit.target: [Allah deia], "O missatgers, menjar dels aliments bons i righteousness de treball. De fet, jo, del que fas, sóc saber.

trans-unit.source: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: I de fet això, la seva religió, és una religió, i jo sóc el teu Senyor, així tingui por de mi."

trans-unit.source: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Però la gent divideix la seva religió entre ells en sectes - cada facció, en el que té, alegrant.

trans-unit.source: So leave them in their confusion for a time.
trans-unit.target: Així, deixar-los en la seva confusió per un temps.

trans-unit.source: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
trans-unit.target: Creuen que el que podem estendre a ells de la riquesa i els nens

trans-unit.source: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
trans-unit.target: És [perquè] ens accelerar-los coses bones? Més aviat, no perceben.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
trans-unit.target: De fet, ells que són aprensius de por al seu Senyor

trans-unit.source: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
trans-unit.target: I es que creuen en els senyals del seu Senyor

trans-unit.source: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
trans-unit.target: I que no res associar amb el seu Senyor

trans-unit.source: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -
trans-unit.target: I els que donen el donen mentre els seus cors tenen por perquè retornaran al seu Senyor-

trans-unit.source: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
trans-unit.target: És qui afanyo a bones accions, i aquí [altres] superant.

trans-unit.source: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: I cobrem cap ànima excepte [amb això dins] la seva capacitat, i amb nosaltres és un disc que parla amb veritat; i no ser injustament.

trans-unit.source: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,
trans-unit.target: Però els seus cors estan cobertes amb confusió sobre això, i que tenen fets [mals] a més d'incredulitat que estan fent,

trans-unit.source: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.
trans-unit.target: Fins quan Aprofitem els més rics amb càstig, a la vegada van els demana que la canviïn [a Allah].

trans-unit.source: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: No plorar avui. De fet, per nosaltres vostè estarà no acompanyada.

trans-unit.source: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
trans-unit.target: Meus versos ja havia estat recitat a vostè, però vostè es van tornant enrere damunt els talons

trans-unit.source: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.
trans-unit.target: En l'arrogància en relació amb això, conversant de nit, parlant de mal.

trans-unit.source: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Llavors es no reflectit en el Qur ' an, o ha arribat allà a ells que no havia arribat als seus avantpassats?

trans-unit.source: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
trans-unit.target: O no sabia de Messenger, així són cap a ell disacknowledging?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.
trans-unit.target: O fer diuen, "en ell és bogeria?" Més aviat, va portar la veritat, però la majoria d'ells, la veritat, són aversió al risc.

trans-unit.source: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Però si la veritat havia seguit d'inclinacions, els cels i la terra i qui hi ha en ells vols han estat arruïnades. Més aviat, hem portat els seu missatge, però, del seu missatge, estan convertint fora.

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: O, [O Muhammad], demanar-los de pagament? Però el millor és la recompensa del seu Senyor, i ell és el millor dels proveïdors.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, convidar-los a un camí dret.

trans-unit.source: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
trans-unit.target: Però de fet, els que no creuen en el futur es desvien del camí.

trans-unit.source: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: I encara ens va donar la misericòrdia i eliminat el que era en ells de aflicció, vols persisteixen en la seva transgressió, vagant cegament.

trans-unit.source: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
trans-unit.target: I ens havia apoderat-los amb el patiment [com una advertència], però no va cedir al seu Senyor, ni feia humilment suplicar, [i seguirà així]

trans-unit.source: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.
trans-unit.target: Fins quan hem obert davant d'ells una porta de greu càstig, immediatament estaran aquí en la desesperació.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: I és el que produeix que audició i visió i cors; mica estàs agraït.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: I és el que vostè ha multiplicat per la terra, i a ell es reuniran.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: I és qui dóna vida i causa la mort, i la seva és l'alternança de la nit i el dia. Llavors es vostè raó no?

trans-unit.source: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.
trans-unit.target: Més aviat, diuen com el que va dir els pobles antics.

trans-unit.source: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Deien, "quan hem va morir i convertir-se en pols i ossos, som de fet per ser ressuscitat?

trans-unit.source: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Ens ha promès això, nosaltres i els nostres avantpassats, abans; això no és sinó llegendes dels antics pobles."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "a qui pertany la terra i qui és en això, si vostè ha de saber?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
trans-unit.target: Es a dir, "A Allah." Dir, "Llavors vostè no recordi?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Que és Senyor dels set cels i senyor del gran tron?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Diuen, "[pertanyen] a Allah." Dir, "llavors vostè por no es ell?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, "a la mà és l'àmbit de totes les coses - i ell protegeix mentre que cap pot protegir contra ell - si vostè ha de saber?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
trans-unit.target: Diuen, "[tot pertany] a Allah." Dir, "llavors com estàs equivocat?"

trans-unit.source: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Més aviat, ens han portat la veritat, i de fet són mentiders.

trans-unit.source: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].
trans-unit.target: Allah no ha tingut cap fill, ni ha hi ha estat amb ell qualsevol deïtat. [Si hi ha hagut], llavors cada divinitat hauria pres el que és creat, i alguns d'ells vols han tractat de superar altres. Exaltat és Allah sobre què descriuen [sobre ell].

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].
trans-unit.target: [És] Coneixedor del invisibles i va ser testimoni, tan alt és sobre què estan associats [amb ell].

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], «Senyor meu, si em cal mostrar el que prometien,

trans-unit.source: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Senyor meu, llavors no situar-me entre la gent d'irregularitats."

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, som capaços de mostrar el que ens hem compromès a ells.

trans-unit.source: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Rebutjar, mitjançant [de] Què és millor, [el seu] mal. Som majoria saber de què van descriure.

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
trans-unit.target: I dir, "el meu Senyor, vaig buscar refugi en tu de la incitació dels diables,

trans-unit.source: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
trans-unit.target: I vaig buscar refugi en tu, Senyor, perquè no van ser presents amb mi."

trans-unit.source: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
trans-unit.target: [Per tal és l'estat dels disbelievers], fins que, quan la mort arriba a un d'ells, diu, "el meu Senyor, envieu-me nou

trans-unit.source: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Que jo podria fer justícia en la qual he deixat enrere". No! És només una paraula que està dient; i darrere d'ells és una barrera fins al dia que els ressuscitat.

trans-unit.source: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
trans-unit.target: Així quan es bufa el Corn, hi haurà cap relació entre ells aquell dia, ni es preguntaran sobre un altre.

trans-unit.source: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: I les escales són pesats [amb bones obres] - són ells els que tenen l'èxit.

trans-unit.source: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Però aquells les escales són llum - aquests són els que han perdut l'ànima, [s] a l'infern, romandre eternament.

trans-unit.source: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
trans-unit.target: El foc es sear els rostres, i en el mateix tindran tensos somriures.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
trans-unit.target: [Es diu]. "Van ser no meu versos recitats a vostè i solia negar-los?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
trans-unit.target: Es a dir, "nostre Senyor, nostra misèria ens va superar, i eren un poble per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Nostre Senyor, ens treu d'ella, i si anéssim a tornar [al mal], de fet estaríem malfactors."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "continuen sent menyspreat en això i no parlar amb mi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
trans-unit.target: De fet, hi va haver una festa dels meus servents que va dir, "Senyor, ens han cregut, així perdonar-nos i tenir pietat sobre nosaltres, i ets la millor de les almoines.

trans-unit.source: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
trans-unit.target: Però es va portar a burla fins al punt que feien oblidar el meu record i solia riuen d'ells.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
trans-unit.target: De fet, ho han recompensat aquest dia per la seva resistència pacient - que són els attainers [d'èxit]."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] dirà, "quant de temps que es mantenen a la terra en nombre d'anys?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
trans-unit.target: Es a dir, "es va quedar un dia o una part d'un dia; preguntar qui enumerar."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "es va quedar a no però una mica - si només vostè hagués sabut.

trans-unit.source: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
trans-unit.target: Llavors penses que creem inútilment i que a nosaltres no es tornaria?"

trans-unit.source: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
trans-unit.target: És tan alta Allah, el sobirà, la veritat; no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell, senyor del tron Noble.

trans-unit.source: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: I qui invoca a Allah més d'una altra divinitat que ell té cap prova - llavors seu compte és només amb el seu Senyor. De fet, els disbelievers no tindrà èxit.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: I, [O Muhammad], diuen, "el meu Senyor, perdonar i tenir pietat i ets la millor de les almoines."

trans-unit.source: [This is] a surah which We have sent down and made [that within it] obligatory and revealed therein verses of clear evidence that you might remember.
trans-unit.target: [És] un que hem enviat i [que dins d'ell] va fer obligatòries i s'hi revelava versos de surah clara evidència que vostè podria recordar.

trans-unit.source: The [unmarried] woman or [unmarried] man found guilty of sexual intercourse - lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not be taken by pity for them in the religion of Allah, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a group of the believers witness their punishment.
trans-unit.target: La dona [soltera] o [soltera] home trobat culpable de tenir relacions sexuals - fuetejar cadascun d'ells amb cent pestanyes i no ser presa per llàstima per ells en la religió d'Allah, si vostè ha de creure en Allah i el darrer dia. I deixar que un grup de creients presenciar el seu càstig.

trans-unit.source: The fornicator does not marry except a [female] fornicator or polytheist, and none marries her except a fornicator or a polytheist, and that has been made unlawful to the believers.
trans-unit.target: La fornicator no casar-se excepte un fornicator [femení] o dirigí i cap es casa amb ella excepte un fornicator o un dirigí, i que s'ha fet il·legal que els creients.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses - lash them with eighty lashes and do not accept from them testimony ever after. And those are the defiantly disobedient,
trans-unit.target: I aquells que acusen dones castes i llavors produeix quatre testimonis - atacar-los amb les vuitanta pestanyes i des d'ells no s'accepten sempre testimoni. I aquestes són desafiant desobedients,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Excepte per a aquells que penedir-se després i reforma, perquè de fet, Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves - then the witness of one of them [shall be] four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: I aquells que acusen seves esposes [d'adulteri] i tenir cap testimonis excepte si mateixos - llavors el testimoni d'un d'ells [es] quatre testimonis [paraulotes] per Allah que de fet, ell és de la veritat.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the curse of Allah be upon him if he should be among the liars.
trans-unit.target: I el cinquè [jurament serà] que la maledicció d'Allah ser a ell, si ha de ser entre els mentiders.

trans-unit.source: But it will prevent punishment from her if she gives four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the liars.
trans-unit.target: Però això evitarà càstig d'ella si ella dóna quatre testimonis [paraulotes] per Allah que de fet, ell és de mentiders.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: I el cinquè [jurament serà] que la ira d'Allah ser a seu si ell era de la veritat.

trans-unit.source: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Accepting of repentance and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I si no fos pel favor d'Allah i la seva misericòrdia... i perquè Allah és Accepting de penediment i savi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who came with falsehood are a group among you. Do not think it bad for you; rather it is good for you. For every person among them is what [punishment] he has earned from the sin, and he who took upon himself the greater portion thereof - for him is a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: De fet, qui venia amb falsedat són un grup entre vosaltres. No crec que sigui dolent per a vostè; més aviat és bo per a vostè. Per cada persona entre ells és quin [càstig] s'ha guanyat de pecat, i el que va prendre sobre si mateix la major part del mateix - per a ell és un gran càstig.

trans-unit.source: Why, when you heard it, did not the believing men and believing women think good of one another and say, "This is an obvious falsehood"?
trans-unit.target: Per què, quan vostè escoltat, feia no els homes creients i creure dones Penseu bé de l'altra i dir: "Això és una falsedat evident"?

trans-unit.source: Why did they [who slandered] not produce for it four witnesses? And when they do not produce the witnesses, then it is they, in the sight of Allah, who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Per què [qui calumnià] no produeixen doncs quatre testimonis? I quan no produeixen els testimonis, llavors és que, a la vista d'Allah, que són mentiders.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have been touched for that [lie] in which you were involved by a great punishment
trans-unit.target: I si no hagués estat pel favor d'Allah i la seva misericòrdia en aquest món i el més enllà, hauria estat tocat per aquell [mentida] en que li estaven implicats per un gran càstig

trans-unit.source: When you received it with your tongues and said with your mouths that of which you had no knowledge and thought it was insignificant while it was, in the sight of Allah, tremendous.
trans-unit.target: Quan s'han rebut amb les seves llengües i dir amb la boca que de la qual no tenia coneixement i va pensar que era insignificants mentre estava, a la vista d'Allah, tremenda.

trans-unit.source: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, "It is not for us to speak of this. Exalted are You, [O Allah]; this is a great slander"?
trans-unit.target: I per què, quan has sentit, vostè no va dir, "no és per a nosaltres parlar d'això. Exaltat és vostè, [O Allah]; Aquesta és una calúmnia gran"?

trans-unit.source: Allah warns you against returning to the likes of this [conduct], ever, if you should be believers.
trans-unit.target: Allah l'adverteix contra tornar als gustos d'aquest [conducta], mai, si hauria de ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I Allah deixa clar a vostè els versos, i Allah està saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread [or publicized] among those who have believed will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: De fet, els que com aquella immoralitat han de ser difondre [o publicitat] entre els qui han cregut es tenir un dolor càstig en aquest món i el més enllà. I Allah sap i no saps.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I si no hagués estat pel favor d'Allah i la seva misericòrdia... i perquè Allah és amable i Clement.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not follow the footsteps of Satan. And whoever follows the footsteps of Satan - indeed, he enjoins immorality and wrongdoing. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever, but Allah purifies whom He wills, and Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, no segueix els passos de Satanàs. I qui segueix l'estela de Satanàs - de fet, va enjoins immoralitat i irregularitats. I si no pel favor d'Allah i la seva misericòrdia, no un de vosaltres hauria estat pur, mai, però Allah purifica qui ell voluntats i Allah és sentir i saber.

trans-unit.source: And let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I no les de virtut entre vosaltres i riquesa jurar no donar [ajuda] els seus parents i els necessitats i els emigrants per la causa d'Allah i deixar-los perdó i passar per alt. No voleu que Allah ha et perdoni? I Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who [falsely] accuse chaste, unaware and believing women are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and they will have a great punishment
trans-unit.target: De fet, els que acusen [falsament] dones castes, inconscients i creient que estan maleïts en aquest món i el més enllà; i tindran un càstig gran

trans-unit.source: On a Day when their tongues, their hands and their feet will bear witness against them as to what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Un dia quan la seves llengües, les mans i els peus es donar testimoni contra ells com a el que acostumaven a fer.

trans-unit.source: That Day, Allah will pay them in full their deserved recompense, and they will know that it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.
trans-unit.target: Que dia, Allah haurà de pagar-los en la seva totalitat la recompensa merescuda i sabran que és Allah qui és el perfecte en justícia.

trans-unit.source: Evil words are for evil men, and evil men are [subjected] to evil words. And good words are for good men, and good men are [an object] of good words. Those [good people] are declared innocent of what the slanderers say. For them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: Paraules mals són per a homes mals i mals homes [sotmesos] paraules mal. Bones paraules els bons homes i bons homes són [objecte] bones paraules. [Bons aquells] són declarats innocents de què diuen els slanderers. Per a ells és el perdó i la prestació noble.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not enter houses other than your own houses until you ascertain welcome and greet their inhabitants. That is best for you; perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, no entren a les cases que no sigui el seu propi cases fins que determinar benvinguda i saludar els seus habitants. Que és millor per a vostè; Potser vostè es recordar.

trans-unit.source: And if you do not find anyone therein, do not enter them until permission has been given you. And if it is said to you, "Go back," then go back; it is purer for you. And Allah is Knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: I si no trobes ningú, no introduir-los fins que s'ha donat permís vostè. I si es diu a vostè, "Tornar enrere," llavors tornar; és més pur per a vostè. I Allah està saber del que fas.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you for entering houses not inhabited in which there is convenience for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: No hi ha cap culpa de d'entrada a cases no habitades on hi conveniència per a vostè. I Allah sap què oculta i què li ocultar.

trans-unit.source: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what they do.
trans-unit.target: Dir-li als homes que creien que reduir [alguns] de la seva visió i Guàrdia seves parts privades. Que és més pura per a ells. De fet, Allah estigui familiaritzat amb el que fan.

trans-unit.source: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts and not expose their adornment except that which [necessarily] appears thereof and to wrap [a portion of] their headcovers over their chests and not expose their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed.
trans-unit.target: I diuen les dones per reduir [alguns] de la seva visió i Guàrdia seva privat de peces i no exposar d adorn excepte allò que apareix [necessàriament] del mateix i embolicar [una porció de] seu headcovers sobre el seu pit i no exposar d adorn excepte pels seus marits, els pares, pares dels seus marits, els fills, fills dels seus marits, els germans, fills dels seus germans , fills dels seus germanes, les seves dones, el que el seu dret les mans posseeixen, o tenir cap desig físic, o nens que encara no són conscients dels aspectes particulars de les dones assistents masculins. I deixar-los no segellar els peus per donar a conèixer què amaguen del seu guarniment. I al seu torn a Allah en penediment, tots vosaltres, creients O, que podria tenir èxit.

trans-unit.source: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they should be poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I casar-se amb els solters entre vosaltres i justos entre els seus homes esclaus i esclaus femenins. Si haurien de ser pobres, Allah enriquir-los des de la seva generositat, i Allah és que abasta i saber.

trans-unit.source: But let them who find not [the means for] marriage abstain [from sexual relations] until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek a contract [for eventual emancipation] from among whom your right hands possess - then make a contract with them if you know there is within them goodness and give them from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life. And if someone should compel them, then indeed, Allah is [to them], after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Però deixar-los que no troben [mitjans de] matrimoni abstenir [relacions sexuals] fins que Allah enriqueix-los des de la seva generositat. I aquells que busquen un contracte [per l'emancipació eventual] entre els qui tenen les mans dreta - després de fer un contracte amb ells si saps que hi ha dins d'ells bondat i donar-los de la riquesa d'Allah que li ha donat. I obliga el seu esclaves a la prostitució, si desitgen castedat, buscar [que] els temporals interessos de vida mundana. I si algú hauria d'obligar-los, de fet, llavors Allah és [ells], després de la seva obligació, indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly sent down to you distinct verses and examples from those who passed on before you and an admonition for those who fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: I tenen sens dubte enviàvem als versos diferents exemples d'aquells que va passar abans que i una advertència per a aquells que temen Allah.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star lit from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Allah és la llum dels cels i la terra. L'exemple de la seva llum és com un nínxol en el qual és un llum, la llum és dins de vidre, el vidre com si fos una estrella [blanc] nacrat il·luminat des de [l'oli de] un beneït l'olivera, de l'Orient ni de l'oest, el oli vols brillen gairebé fins i tot si tocat pel foc. Llum en llum. Guies d'Allah a la seva llum qui ell voluntats. I Allah presenta exemples per a la gent, i Allah està saber de totes les coses.

trans-unit.source: [Such niches are] in mosques which Allah has ordered to be raised and that His name be mentioned therein; exalting Him within them in the morning and the evenings
trans-unit.target: [Aquests nínxols són] en mesquites que Allah ha ordenat a elevar-se i que el seu nom cal esmentar aquí; Ell exalta dins d'ells al matí i al vespre

trans-unit.source: [Are] men whom neither commerce nor sale distracts from the remembrance of Allah and performance of prayer and giving of zakah. They fear a Day in which the hearts and eyes will [fearfully] turn about -
trans-unit.target: [Són] els homes a qui comerç ni venda distreu el record d'al·là i actuació de l'oració i lliurament de zakah. Tenen por d'un dia en el qual el cor i els ulls [una criatura] al seu torn, sobre-

trans-unit.source: That Allah may reward them [according to] the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.
trans-unit.target: Aquell Allah pot recompensar-los [segons] el millor de què feien i augmentar-los des de la seva generositat. I Allah dóna disposició a qui ell voluntats sense compte.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieved - their deeds are like a mirage in a lowland which a thirsty one thinks is water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing but finds Allah before Him, and He will pay him in full his due; and Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Però els que dubtaven - seus actes són com un miratge en un terres baixes que pensa un set és l'aigua fins que, quan ell vingui a això, troba és res però troba Allah abans que ell, i ell-ho en la seva totalitat seu venciment; i Allah és ràpida en compte.

trans-unit.source: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves, over which are clouds - darknesses, some of them upon others. When one puts out his hand [therein], he can hardly see it. And he to whom Allah has not granted light - for him there is no light.
trans-unit.target: O [són] com darknesses dins un mar insondable cobert per les ones, que són ones, més que els núvols - darknesses, alguns d'ells a altres. Quan un posa la seva mà [aquí], va penes pot veure-ho. I ell qui Allah ha no atorgar-li llum - per a ell hi ha llum.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah is exalted by whomever is within the heavens and the earth and [by] the birds with wings spread [in flight]? Each [of them] has known his [means of] prayer and exalting [Him], and Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: No veus que Allah és exaltat per qui és en els cels i la terra i [els ocells per] amb les ales esteses [en vol]? Cadascuna [] ha conegut la seva pregària [mitjà d] i [li] exalta, i Allah està saber de què fan.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.
trans-unit.target: I per Allah pertany el dominion dels cels i la terra, i a Allah és el destí.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah drives clouds? Then He brings them together, then He makes them into a mass, and you see the rain emerge from within it. And He sends down from the sky, mountains [of clouds] within which is hail, and He strikes with it whom He wills and averts it from whom He wills. The flash of its lightening almost takes away the eyesight.
trans-unit.target: No veus que Allah empentes núvols? Llavors uneix-los, llavors es fa en una massa, i de veure la pluja emergeixen dins d'ella. I va envia des del cel, les muntanyes [de núvols] dins de la qual és calamarsa, i vagues amb ell qui testaments d'ell i s'evita la de qui ell voluntats. L'espurneig dels seus alleugerint gairebé treu la vista.

trans-unit.source: Allah alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision.
trans-unit.target: Allah alterna el dia i la nit. Fet que és una lliçó per a aquells que tenen visió.

trans-unit.source: Allah has created every [living] creature from water. And of them are those that move on their bellies, and of them are those that walk on two legs, and of them are those that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Allah ha creat cada [criatura] des de l'aigua. D'ells són aquells que es mouen sobre el seu ventre i d'ells són aquells que caminar sobre dues potes i d'ells són aquells que caminar sobre quatre. Allah crea el que ell vol. De fet, Allah és sobre totes les coses competents.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down distinct verses. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte hem enviat per diferents versos. I Allah guia qui ell voluntats a un camí dret.

trans-unit.source: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers.
trans-unit.target: Però dir que els hipòcrites, "hem cregut en Allah i el Missatger, i que obeir"; llavors una festa d'ells allunya després d'això. I aquestes no són creients.

trans-unit.source: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].
trans-unit.target: I quan se ls anomena [les paraules de] Allah i el seu Missatger per jutjar entre ells, a la vegada una festa d'ells gira banda [en negativa].

trans-unit.source: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.
trans-unit.target: Però si el dret és d'ells, que vénen a ell en l'obediència immediata.

trans-unit.source: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha la malaltia als seus cors? O han dubtat? O tenen por que Allah serà injust per a ells, o el seu Missatger? Més aviat, és que són els malfactors.

trans-unit.source: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful.
trans-unit.target: La declaració única dels creients [veritables] Quan s'anomenen a Allah i el seu Missatger per jutjar entre ells és que ells diuen, "escoltem i que obeir". I aquestes són l'èxit.

trans-unit.source: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger and fears Allah and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers.
trans-unit.target: I qui obeeix a Allah i el seu Missatger i tem Allah i és conscient d'ell - és qui són els attainers.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in Allah 's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with that which you do."
trans-unit.target: I juren per Allah seus juraments més fort que si vostè va ordenar-los, anirien endavant [a causa d'Allah]. Dir, "no t'ho juro. [Com] l'obediència és conegut. De fet, Allah estigui familiaritzat amb el que fas.»

trans-unit.source: Say, "Obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification."
trans-unit.target: Dir: "Allah obeeix i obeir el Missatger; però si que allunyen - llavors a ell és només que [dret] amb que ell ha estat acusat i a vostè és que amb el que vostè ha acusat. I si vostè obeeix, serà [raó] guiat. I no en el Missatger excepte la notificació clar [responsable]."

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Allah ha promès a aquells que han cregut entre vosaltres i fer els justos fets que ell segurament concedirà ells successió [a l'autoritat] sobre la terra igual que ell atorgava a aquells abans d'ells i que ell segurament estableix que per a ells [en això] seva religió que ell ha preferit per a ells i que segurament es substitueix per a ells, després de la seva por , seguretat, [per] mi veneren, no associar res amb mi. Però qui disbelieves després d'això - llavors aquells són desobedients desafiant.

trans-unit.source: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.
trans-unit.target: I establir l'oració i donar zakah i obeir el Missatger - que vostè pot rebre misericòrdia.

trans-unit.source: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to Allah] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination.
trans-unit.target: Mai pensen que els disbelievers estan causant insuficiència [a Allah] sobre la terra. Seva refugi serà el foc - i miserable com la destinació.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O que han cregut, deixa que els qui tenen les mans dreta i aquells que encara no tinc [] arribat pubertat entre vosaltres demaneu permís vostès [abans d'entrar] en tres moments: abans de l'oració Alba i quan vostè deixar de banda la seva roba [per resta] al migdia i després de la nit de pregària. [Són] tres vegades d'intimitat per a vostè. No hi ha cap culpa a vostè ni a ells més enllà d'aquests [períodes], perquè contínuament circulen entre vostè - alguns de vostès, entre d'altres. Així Allah fa clar a vostè els versos; i Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I quan els nens entre vostè arribar a la pubertat, deixar-los de demanar permís [en tot moment] que abans que ells han fet. Així Allah fa clar per a vostè, els seus versos; i Allah és saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I les dones d'edat post-menstrual que tenen cap desig de matrimoni - no hi ha cap culpa en ells deixant de banda les seves peces exteriors [però] no mostrant adorn. Però a modestament abstenir-se [de la] és millor per a ells. I Allah és sentir i saber.

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha no en la restricció d'invidents [qualsevol] ni a la coacció coix ni a la restricció d'emmalaltir ni sobre vosaltres mateixos quan vostè menja de seus [propi] cases o les cases dels seus pares o les cases de les seves mares o les cases dels teus germans o les cases de les seves germanes o les cases dels germans del seu pare o les cases de les germanes del seu pare o les cases dels germans de la seva mare o les cases de les germanes de la seva mare o [de cases] les claus que posseeixin o [de la casa] del seu amic. No hi ha cap culpa a vostè si vostè menja junts o per separat. Però quan entreu cases, donen salutacions de Pau sobre l'altre - una salutació des d'Allah, el beneït i bo. Així Allah fa clar a vostè els versos [de l'Ordenança] que vostè pot entendre.

trans-unit.source: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muhammad] - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Els creients són només aquells que creuen en Allah i el seu Missatger i, quan ells [reunió] amb ell per una qüestió d'interès comú, no surten fins que han demanat el seu permís. De fet, aquells que demanar permís, [O Muhammad] - Aquests són els que creuen en Allah i el seu Missatger. Així que quan li pregunten el seu permís per a alguna cosa dels seus assumptes, llavors donar permís a qui es entre ells i demanar perdó per ells d'Allah. En efecte, Allah és indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: No fan [el seu] crida del Missatger entre vosaltres com la convocatòria d'un de vosaltres a un altre. Ja Allah sap aquells de vostès que relliscada, oculta per altres. Així que aquells compte amb que la dissidència de l'ordre del Profeta, perquè no fitnah atacar-los o un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte, a Allah pertany el que està en el cel i la terra. Ja sap que en què vostè [suport] i [sap] el dia quan li serà retornada a ell i ell els informarem de el que han fet. I Allah està saber de totes les coses.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -
trans-unit.target: Benaurat qui enviat el criteri al seu servent que pot ser els móns un Avisador-

trans-unit.source: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.
trans-unit.target: A qui pertany el dominion dels cels i la terra i que no ha tingut un fill i no ha tingut un soci de domini i ha creat cada cosa i determinat amb determinació [precisa].

trans-unit.source: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Però s'han pres a més ell déus que crear res, mentre que es creen i posseeixen no per si mateixos cap mal o beneficiar i no posseeixen [poder provocar] mort o vida o resurrecció.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubten diuen, "aquest [Qur ' an] no és excepte una falsedat va inventar, i una altra gent assistit en ella". Però que han comès una injustícia i una mentida.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."
trans-unit.target: I van dir, "llegendes dels pobles antics que ell ha escrit, i són manats per a ell al matí i tarda."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "ha estat revelat per qui coneix [cada] secret dins els cels i la terra. De fet, ell és alguna vegada Clement i perdonant".

trans-unit.source: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?
trans-unit.target: Diuen, "What ' s aquest missatger que menja aliments i camina en els mercats? Per què va ser allà no enviat a ell un àngel així seria amb ell un Avisador?

trans-unit.source: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: O [per què no és] un tresor presentat a ell [del cel] o [no] té un jardí que menja? " I els malfactors diuen, "vostè seguir no però un home afectat per art de màgia."

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Mira com ells la vaga per a vostè comparacions; però ells han allunyat, així que no es [cerca] una manera.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.
trans-unit.target: Beneït és el que, si ell willed, podria haver fet per a vostè [una mica] millor que que - jardins sota quin cabal de rius - i podria fer per vostè palaus.

trans-unit.source: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Però han negat l'hora, i hem preparat per a aquells que neguen l'hora un incendi.

trans-unit.source: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.
trans-unit.target: Quan el Hellfire veu d'un lloc llunyà, van a sentir la seva fúria i rugeix.

trans-unit.source: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.
trans-unit.target: I quan ells són llançats a un lloc estret en això lligat amb cadenes, clamen tot seguit per la destrucció.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
trans-unit.target: [Que s'especificarà], "no plorar, però aquest dia per la destrucció d'un crit per molta destrucció."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.
trans-unit.target: Dir, "és el millor o el jardí de l'eternitat que es va prometre als justos? Serà per a ells una recompensa i destinació.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.
trans-unit.target: Per a ells en això és el que vulguin, [mentre] romandre eternament. És sempre en el seu senyor una promesa [digne de ser] sol·licitat.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"
trans-unit.target: I [parlar] el dia va reunir-se ells i la que es veneren a més d'Allah i dirà, "Aquests, meves serventes, va enganyar o fer ells [mateixos] s'aparten de la manera?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."
trans-unit.target: Diran, "exaltat és vostè! No era per a nosaltres prendre a més qualsevol aliats. Però vostè sempre comoditats per a ells i els seus pares fins que oblidava el missatge i es va convertir en un poble en ruïnes."

trans-unit.source: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Així es podrà negar que, [disbelievers], en el que dius, i no pot evitar [càstig] o [trobar] ajuda. I qui comet la injustícia entre vosaltres - li farà degustar un gran càstig.
