trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: I no enviar abans, [O Muhammad], qualsevol dels missatgers excepte que es menjaven aliments i entrar en els mercats. I hem fet alguns de vostès [persones] com a prova per altres - tindrà paciència? I mai és el seu Senyor, veient.

trans-unit.source: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.
trans-unit.target: I aquells que no esperen l'encontre ens diuen, "per què no àngels enviaven a nosaltres, o [perquè] [no] veiem nostre Senyor?" Certament han esdevingut arrogants dins de si mateixos i [ser] insolent amb gran insolència.

trans-unit.source: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."
trans-unit.target: El dia que veuen els àngels - cap bona nova hi haurà aquell dia als criminals, i [àngels] dirà, "Impedia i inaccessible".

trans-unit.source: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.
trans-unit.target: I anem a considerar el que han fet de fets i fer-los com pols dispersos.

trans-unit.source: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.
trans-unit.target: Els companys del paradís, que dia, són [a] un assentament millor i millor lloc de descans.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.
trans-unit.target: I [parlar] el dia quan el cel es trencarà obert amb núvols [emergents], i els àngels s'enviarà cap avall en descens successives.

trans-unit.source: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.
trans-unit.target: Veritable sobirania, que és de dia, pel misericordiós. I serà en un dia difícil disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.
trans-unit.target: I el dia del infractor et mossegarà a les seves mans [a pesar] dirà, "Oh, m'agradaria que havia pres amb el Missatger una manera.

trans-unit.source: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.
trans-unit.target: Ah, Ai a mi! M'agradaria que no havia pres aquell com a amic.

trans-unit.source: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."
trans-unit.target: Ell em va portar de record després que havia arribat a mi. I mai és Satan, a l'home, un desertor".

trans-unit.source: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."
trans-unit.target: I el Missatger ha dit, "O el meu Senyor, fet meu persones han pres aquest Alcorà com [una cosa] abandonat."

trans-unit.source: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.
trans-unit.target: I així hem fet per a tots els profetes un enemic entre els criminals. Però suficient és el seu Senyor com una guia i un ajudant.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubten diuen, "Per què l'Alcorà no revelava a ell tots alhora?" Així [és] que pot reforçar així el seu cor. I podem tenir espaiats clarament.

trans-unit.source: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.
trans-unit.target: I no vénen a tu amb un argument excepte que us portem la veritat i la millor explicació.

trans-unit.source: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Els que es recullen en els seus rostres a l'infern - aquells són els en posició pitjor i més lluny per mal camí a [el seu] camí.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
trans-unit.target: I certament ens havia donat Moses l'escriptura i nomenat amb ell el seu germà Aaron com a ajudant.

trans-unit.source: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: I ens va dir, "Anar tots dos a les persones que han negat els nostres signes." Llavors hem destruït amb [completa] destrucció.

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: I la gent de Noè - quan van negar els missatgers, ens va ofegar-los, i hem fet per a la humanitat un senyal. I hem preparat pels malfactors un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.
trans-unit.target: I [hem destruït] ' Aad i Thamud i companys del pou i moltes generacions entre ells.

trans-unit.source: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: Per a cada ens presenta exemples [com a advertiment] i cada hem destruït amb destrucció [total].

trans-unit.source: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.
trans-unit.target: I ja han arribat a la ciutat que va rebre una pluja de mal. Així ho van no vist? Però que no estan esperant la resurrecció.

trans-unit.source: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?
trans-unit.target: I quan veuen que, [O Muhammad], que no excepte prenen en ridícul, [dir], "és això una quals Allah ha enviat com a Missatger?

trans-unit.source: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.
trans-unit.target: Ell gairebé vols han enganyat a nosaltres els nostres déus no havia estat ferm en [culte] ells. " Però van saber, quan veuen el càstig, que és més lluny per mal camí a [el seu] camí.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?
trans-unit.target: Has vist qui pren com a seu Déu el seu propi desig? Llavors seria responsable d'ell?

trans-unit.source: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: O creus que la majoria d'ells escoltar o raó? No són excepció com bestiar. Més aviat, són [encara] més per mal camí a [el seu] camí.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.
trans-unit.target: Has no considera el seu Senyor - com ell s'estén l'ombra, i si ell willed, podria haver fet això immòbil? Llavors vam fer el sol per a això una indicació.

trans-unit.source: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens manteniu agafat a la mà un pom breu.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.
trans-unit.target: I és ell qui ha fet la nit per a vostè com la roba i la resta son [un mitjà per] i ha fet el dia a la resurrecció.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water
trans-unit.target: I és el que envia els vents com bona nova abans de la seva misericòrdia, i li enviarem de l'aigua pura de cel

trans-unit.source: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.
trans-unit.target: Que ens pot portar a la vida per tant una terra morta i donar-li com beguda als hem creat de nombrosos homes i bestiar.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: I sens dubte hem distribuït entre ells que es podria tenir en compte, però la majoria de la gent es neguen excepte incredulitat.

trans-unit.source: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.
trans-unit.target: I si ens tenia willed, hem pogut enviat a cada ciutat un Avisador.

trans-unit.source: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.
trans-unit.target: Així no obeir els disbelievers, i lluitar contra ells amb el Qur ' an un gran esforç.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.
trans-unit.target: I és ell qui ha llançat [simultàniament] dos mars, un fresc i dolç i salat i amarg, i classificà entre ells una barrera i prohibició de partició.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
trans-unit.target: I és ell qui ha creat a partir de l'aigua un ésser humà i el feia [un parent per] llinatge i el matrimoni. I mai és el seu Senyor competent [pel que fa a creació].

trans-unit.source: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].
trans-unit.target: Però veneren més que Allah, que que no beneficiar-los o danyar-los i la disbeliever es mai, contra el seu Senyor, assistant [Satanàs].

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: I ens han no enviat, [O Muhammad], excepte com a portador de la bona nova i un Avisador.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "no ho vostès qualsevol pagament - només que qui vol podria portar al seu Senyor forma."

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted -
trans-unit.target: I confiar en la vida mai-que no moren i exaltar [Allah] amb l'elogi. I és suficient va ser, amb els pecats dels seus servents, familiaritzeu -

trans-unit.source: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed.
trans-unit.target: Ell que ha creat el cel i la terra i el que és entre ells en sis dies i després s'establí per sobre el tron - més compassius, tan preguntar sobre ell un ben informat.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.
trans-unit.target: I quan es diu que ells, "Postrar a the misericordiós," diuen, "i el que és el més Clement? Ha ens postrar al que ens demana?" I ells augmenta en aversió.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
trans-unit.target: Beneït és el que ha posat en les grans estrelles de cel i posat en ell una làmpada [ardor] i Lluna lluminosa.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.
trans-unit.target: I és ell qui ha fet la nit i el dia en una successió per a qui vol recordar o desitjos de gratitud.

trans-unit.source: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,
trans-unit.target: I els criats de la misericordiós són aquells que caminar a la terra, i quan els ignorants-los front [difícilment], dir Pau [paraules de],

trans-unit.source: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]
trans-unit.target: I els que passen [part de] la nit al seu Senyor postrant i de peu [en l'oració]

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;
trans-unit.target: I qui diu, "nostre Senyor, evitar de nosaltres el càstig de l'infern. De fet, mai és adherir seu càstig;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."
trans-unit.target: De fet, és mal com a assentament i residència."

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate
trans-unit.target: I [són] aquells que, quan van passar, fer-ho no excessivament o amb moderació, però són mai, entre que, [justament] moderada

trans-unit.source: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.
trans-unit.target: I qui no invocar amb Allah una altra divinitat o matar l'ànima que Allah ha prohibit [mort], excepte per la dreta i fer no cometre il·legal sexuals. I qui ha de fer que es reunirà una sanció.

trans-unit.source: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -
trans-unit.target: Multiplicat per a ell és el càstig el dia de resurrecció, i es respectarà aquí humiliat-

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A excepció d'aquells que es penedeixin, creure i fer treballs justos. Per a ells Allah reemplaçarà seus actes mals amb el bé. I mai és perdonar a Allah i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.
trans-unit.target: I ell que es penedeix i fa justícia fet tornar a Allah amb penediment [acceptat].

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.
trans-unit.target: I [són] qui no testificar a falsedat, i quan passen a prop discurs malalt, passar amb dignitat.

trans-unit.source: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.
trans-unit.target: I aquells que, quan va recordar els versos del seu Senyor, no caure sobre ells sords i cecs.

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."
trans-unit.target: I qui diu, "nostre Senyor, concedir-nos entre les nostres dones i descendència comoditat als nostres ulls i ens fan un exemple per al recte".

trans-unit.source: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.
trans-unit.target: Aquells s'atorgarà la Cambra per a què ells suportat pacientment, i seran rebuts en el mateix amb les salutacions i [paraules de] la pau.

trans-unit.source: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.
trans-unit.target: Romandre eternament en el mateix. Bona és la liquidació i residència.

trans-unit.source: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Què vols Senyor cura per a vostè si no fos per la seva súplica?" Per a vostè [disbelievers] han negat, així que la denegació ha de ser partidari.

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ta, vist, Meem.

trans-unit.source: These are the verses of the clear Book.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els versos del llibre clar.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
trans-unit.target: Potser, [O Muhammad], vols matar-se amb dolor que no siguin creients.

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
trans-unit.target: Si ens willed, ens podria enviar cap avall a ells des del cel un signe que arrisquen seguiria sent humil.

trans-unit.source: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
trans-unit.target: I no revelació ve a ells nou de més compassius excepte que van allunyar-lo.

trans-unit.source: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Per a ells ja han negat, però arribarà a ells la notícia de la que van utilitzar el ridícul.

trans-unit.source: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
trans-unit.target: No van mirar a la terra - quant hem produït en el mateix de cada classe noble?

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit] Quan el seu Senyor anomenat Moses, [dir], "anar a la gent d'irregularitats-

trans-unit.source: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
trans-unit.target: La gent del faraó. Es no temen Allah?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "el meu Senyor, de fet em temo que podrà negar m

trans-unit.source: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.
trans-unit.target: I que es premi la meva mama i la meva llengua no serà fluid, així enviar per Aaron.

trans-unit.source: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
trans-unit.target: I em [demanda degut a] pecats, perquè em temo que em mataran."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] deia, "No. Anar tots dos amb rètols; de fet, estem amb tu, escolta.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Aneu al faraó i dir: "som els missatgers del Senyor dels mons,

trans-unit.source: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
trans-unit.target: [Comandat per dir], "Envia amb nosaltres els nens d'Israel." ""

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit, "no plantegen entre nosaltres com un nen, i va romandre entre nosaltres per anys de la seva vida?

trans-unit.source: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
trans-unit.target: I [llavors] feia l'escriptura que feia, i que eren de l'ingrat."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir: "ho vaig fer, llavors, mentre jo estava d'aquells per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Per fugir de tu quan es temia. Llavors el meu Senyor em concedeix saviesa i prophethood i nomenat em [com] dels missatgers.

trans-unit.source: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
trans-unit.target: I és això que un favor de la qual vostè recordar-me - que han esclavitzat nens d'Israel?"

trans-unit.source: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"
trans-unit.target: Faraó, va dir, "i el que és el Senyor dels mons?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "El Senyor dels cels i la terra i que entre ells, si hauria de ser convençut."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit per aquells al seu voltant, "no sents?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "El seu Senyor i el Senyor dels seus avantpassats primers."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit, "De fet, el seu 'missatgers' que s'ha enviat a vostè és boig".

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "Senyor de l'Orient i Occident i que entre ells, si fos per la raó."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit, "Si vostè pren un Déu diferent de mi, jo segurament posarà vostè entre els empresonats."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "Fins i tot si et portat prova manifest?"

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit, "llavors portar-lo, si hauria de ser de la veritat."

trans-unit.source: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.
trans-unit.target: Així [Moses] va llançar el seu personal, i de sobte va ser un manifest de serp.

trans-unit.source: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.
trans-unit.target: I dibuixà amb la mà; llavors era blanc per als observadors.

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit d els eminents al seu voltant, "de fet, aquest és un mag apresos.

trans-unit.source: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"
trans-unit.target: Que vol tornar-lo fora de la seva terra per la seva màgia, així que què assessorament? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Deien, "ajornar [la qüestió de] ell i el seu germà i enviar entre els recol·lectors de ciutats

trans-unit.source: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
trans-unit.target: Que portarà cada apresa, qualificat mag."

trans-unit.source: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.
trans-unit.target: Així, els mags s'havien reunit el nomenament d'un dia ben coneguda.

trans-unit.source: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
trans-unit.target: I es va dir a la gent, "es que es congreguen

trans-unit.source: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
trans-unit.target: Que ens puguin seguir els mags si són les predominants?"

trans-unit.source: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
trans-unit.target: I quan van arribar els mags, deien faraó, "hi ha fet per a nosaltres una recompensa si som la principal?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
trans-unit.target: Va dir: "Sí i de fet, llavors seràs d'aquells a prop [per mi]."

trans-unit.source: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
trans-unit.target: Moses va dir, "llençar tot el llançarà."

trans-unit.source: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
trans-unit.target: Així que va llançar la seva cordes i el seu personal i va dir, "Per la influència del faraó, de fet és que són dominants."

trans-unit.source: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.
trans-unit.target: Llavors Moses va llançar el seu personal i a la vegada es devorat què falsificaven.

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Així els mags va caure en la prostració [a Allah].

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Deien, "hem cregut en el Senyor dels mons,

trans-unit.source: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
trans-unit.target: El Senyor de Moses i Aaron".

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."
trans-unit.target: [Faraó] dit, "vostè creu Moses abans que li va donar el permís. De fet, és el seu líder que li ha ensenyat màgia, però vas a saber. Segurament va tallar les mans i els peus en costats oposats, i segurament es Crucifiqui tots."

trans-unit.source: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
trans-unit.target: Deien, "cap dany. De fet, a nostre Senyor tornarem.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."
trans-unit.target: De fet, aspirem que nostre Senyor perdona'ns nostres pecats perquè érem la primera dels creients."

trans-unit.source: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."
trans-unit.target: I ens va inspirar a Moses, "viatge de nit amb els meus servents; de fet, vostè serà perseguida."

trans-unit.source: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Llavors faraó enviat entre les ciutats de recol·lectors

trans-unit.source: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,
trans-unit.target: [I dir], "de fet, aquells són però un petit grup,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they are enraging us,
trans-unit.target: I de fet, els seus ens,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "
trans-unit.target: I de fet, som una societat prudent... "

trans-unit.source: So We removed them from gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: Així ens tragués de jardins i fonts

trans-unit.source: And treasures and honorable station -
trans-unit.target: I tresors i honorable estació-

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.
trans-unit.target: D'aquesta manera. I hem provocat heretaran nens d'Israel.

trans-unit.source: So they pursued them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Així que ells perseguit a l'Alba.

trans-unit.source: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"
trans-unit.target: I quan els dos empreses veure a un altre, els companys de Moses va dir, "De fet, estem a ser superat!"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] va dir, "No! De fet, amb mi, és meu Senyor; Va el guiarà m."

trans-unit.source: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens va inspirar a Moses, "Vaga amb el seu personal del mar" i es van separar, i cada porció era com una gran muntanya imponent.

trans-unit.source: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.
trans-unit.target: I hem avançat encomani assetjadors.

trans-unit.source: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
trans-unit.target: I hem salvat Moses i aquells amb ell, tots junts.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned the others.
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens va ofegar els altres.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the news of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: I recitar-los la notícia d'Abraham,

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"
trans-unit.target: Quan va dir al seu pare i la seva gent, "què et veneren?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Adorar ídols i romandre a ells dedicats."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "fer que s'escolta quan li suplicar?

trans-unit.source: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"
trans-unit.target: Se n beneficien vostè o mal?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "però hem trobat nostres pares fent així".

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "llavors veus que li han estat venerant,

trans-unit.source: You and your ancient forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Vostè i el seu antics avantpassats?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: De fet, ells són enemics per a mi, excepte el Senyor dels mons,

trans-unit.source: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.
trans-unit.target: Naixement de mi i ell [és qui] em guia.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
trans-unit.target: I és el que alimenta a mi i em dóna la beguda.

trans-unit.source: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
trans-unit.target: I quan estic malalt, és ell qui em cures

trans-unit.source: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
trans-unit.target: I que farà que em a morir i llavors portar-me a la vida

trans-unit.source: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: I que jo aspiren que ell em perdonin meu pecat en el dia de recompensa".

trans-unit.source: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
trans-unit.target: [I va dir], "el meu Senyor, concedir-me autoritat i uniu a mi amb els justos.

trans-unit.source: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
trans-unit.target: I que em concediu una reputació d'honor entre les generacions posteriors.

trans-unit.source: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: I situar-me entre els hereus del jardí de plaer.

trans-unit.source: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
trans-unit.target: I perdona el meu pare. De fet, ha estat d'aquells per mal camí.

trans-unit.source: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
trans-unit.target: I no em vergonya en el dia que [tots] ressuscitat-

trans-unit.source: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children
trans-unit.target: El dia quan hi haurà no prestació [algú] riquesa o nens

trans-unit.source: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
trans-unit.target: Però només un que ve a Allah amb un so cor".

trans-unit.source: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
trans-unit.target: I paradís serà portat a prop [aquell dia] als justos.

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
trans-unit.target: I Hellfire serà portat endavant per el deviators,

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship
trans-unit.target: I es diu d'ells, "on són els que solia culte

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"
trans-unit.target: Altre que Allah? Pot que ajudarà o ajudar a si mateixos?"

trans-unit.source: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
trans-unit.target: Així es ser anul·lat en infern, ells i els deviators

trans-unit.source: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.
trans-unit.target: I els soldats de Iblees, tots junts.

trans-unit.source: They will say while they dispute therein,
trans-unit.target: Diran mentre es disputaria en ell,

trans-unit.source: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
trans-unit.target: "Per Allah, estàvem realment en l'error es manifesten

trans-unit.source: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Quan podem equiparar amb el Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: And no one misguided us except the criminals.
trans-unit.target: I ningú ens equivocada excepte els criminals.

trans-unit.source: So now we have no intercessors
trans-unit.target: Així que ara no tenim desvirtuïn

trans-unit.source: And not a devoted friend.
trans-unit.target: I no un devot amic.

trans-unit.source: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "
trans-unit.target: Llavors si que només teníem un retorn [al món] i podria ser dels creients. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: La gent de Noè va negar els missatgers

trans-unit.source: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Quan el seu germà Noah deia, "es que no tinguis por Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: De fet, jo sóc per a tu un Missatger de confiança.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no li demano això cap pagament. El meu pagament és només des del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me."
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir-me."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Hem de creure mentre es segueixen la menor [classe de persones]?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "i què és el meu coneixement del solia fer?

trans-unit.source: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.
trans-unit.target: Seu compte és només al meu Senyor, si perceben de [podria].

trans-unit.source: And I am not one to drive away the believers.
trans-unit.target: I jo no sóc un d'allunyar els creients.

trans-unit.source: I am only a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Sóc només un Avisador clar."

trans-unit.source: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Si vostè no desistir, O Noah, que segurament serà d'aquells que lapida."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "el meu Senyor, fet meu poble m'han negat.

trans-unit.source: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
trans-unit.target: Després jutjar entre mi i ells amb criteri decisiu i guardar mi i aquells amb mi dels creients".

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
trans-unit.target: Així que ens guarden ell i aquells amb ell en el vaixell carregat.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.
trans-unit.target: Llavors hem ofegat a partir de llavors els restants.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: ' Aad negat els missatgers

trans-unit.source: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Quan el seu germà Hud dir a ells, "es que no tinguis por Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: De fet, jo sóc per a tu un Missatger de confiança.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no li demano això cap pagament. El meu pagament és només des del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,
trans-unit.target: Vostè construir en cada elevació un signe, vosaltres, divertits

trans-unit.source: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?
trans-unit.target: I prendre per a si mateixos palaus i fortaleses que vostè podria complir eternament?

trans-unit.source: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.
trans-unit.target: I quan pega, pega com tirans.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,
trans-unit.target: I el que sempre amb la que coneixes, por

trans-unit.source: Provided you with grazing livestock and children
trans-unit.target: Sempre amb el pasturatge de bestiar i nens

trans-unit.source: And gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: I jardins i fonts.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
trans-unit.target: De fet, em temo que el càstig d'un terrible dia."

trans-unit.source: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
trans-unit.target: Deien, "és el mateix per a nosaltres si assessorar o no són dels assessors.

trans-unit.source: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: Això no és sinó el costum dels pobles antics,

trans-unit.source: And we are not to be punished."
trans-unit.target: I no han de ser castigats.

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: I ell, va negar perquè hem destruït. Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Thamud negat els missatgers

trans-unit.source: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Quan seu germà Salih va dir, "es que no tinguis por Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: De fet, jo sóc per a tu un Missatger de confiança.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no li demano això cap pagament. El meu pagament és només des del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],
trans-unit.target: Serà esquerra en el que és aquí, [de la mort], segur

trans-unit.source: Within gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: En jardins i fonts

trans-unit.source: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?
trans-unit.target: I camps de conreus i palmeres amb suavitzat fruita?

trans-unit.source: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.
trans-unit.target: I es fan de les muntanyes, cases, amb habilitat.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
trans-unit.target: I no obeir l'ordre dels transgressors,

trans-unit.source: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
trans-unit.target: Que causen la corrupció en la terra i no modificar."

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
trans-unit.target: Deien, "que són només de les persones afectades per art de màgia.

trans-unit.source: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Ets però un home com nosaltres mateixos, així que portar una senyal, si hauria de ser de la veritat".

trans-unit.source: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "aquest és un camell. Per a ella és una beguda [temps de], i per a tu és un [temps de] beu, [cada] un dia coneguts.

trans-unit.source: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
trans-unit.target: I no tocar-la amb mal, perquè no et ser aprofitades pel càstig d'un terrible dia."

trans-unit.source: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
trans-unit.target: Però ella hamstrung i així es tornaven es penedeix.

trans-unit.source: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: I agafat el càstig. Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: La gent de molt negat els missatgers

trans-unit.source: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Quan seu germà Lot va dir, "es que no tinguis por Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: De fet, jo sóc per a tu un Missatger de confiança.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no li demano això cap pagament. El meu pagament és només des del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: Do you approach males among the worlds
trans-unit.target: T'acostes els mascles entre els mons

trans-unit.source: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."
trans-unit.target: I deixar el teu Senyor ha creat per tu com companys? Però són un poble més transgressora."

trans-unit.source: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Si vostè no desistir, O molts, que segurament serà dels expulsats".

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "de fet, estic, cap a la seva escriptura, d'aquells que detesten [es].

trans-unit.source: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
trans-unit.target: Senyor meu, salvar mi i la meva família de [la conseqüència de] el que fan. "

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and his family, all,
trans-unit.target: Així hem salvat, ell i la seva família, tots,

trans-unit.source: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.
trans-unit.target: Excepte una dona vella entre aquells que van quedar.

trans-unit.source: Then We destroyed the others.
trans-unit.target: Llavors hem destruït els altres.

trans-unit.source: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: I ens ha plogut sobre ells una pluja [de pedres], i mal era la pluja d'aquells que eren avisats.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Els companys del matoll negat els missatgers

trans-unit.source: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Quan Shu'ayb va dir, "es que no tinguis por Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: De fet, jo sóc per a tu un Missatger de confiança.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Així por d'Allah i obeir.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no li demano això cap pagament. El meu pagament és només des del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Donar mesura completa i no ser d'aquells que provoquen la pèrdua.

trans-unit.source: And weigh with an even balance.
trans-unit.target: I pesen amb un balanç fins i tot.

trans-unit.source: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
trans-unit.target: I no privar a la gent de la seva causa i no cometre abusos a la terra, divulgació corrupció.

trans-unit.source: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
trans-unit.target: I por qui creada a vostè i la creació ex."

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
trans-unit.target: Deien, "que són només de les persones afectades per art de màgia.

trans-unit.source: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
trans-unit.target: Ets un home com nosaltres mateixos, i de fet, pensem que es troben entre els mentiders.

trans-unit.source: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: De manera que causen a caure sobre nosaltres fragments del cel, si hauria de ser de la veritat."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "El meu Senyor és saber més del que fas".

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
trans-unit.target: I ell, va negar perquè el càstig del dia del núvol negre agafat. De fet, era el càstig d'un dia terrible.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un senyal, però la majoria d'ells no van ser creients.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor - és l'exaltat en forces, el Clement.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I en efecte, el Qur ' an és la revelació del Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
trans-unit.target: L'esperit de confiança ha portat

trans-unit.source: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -
trans-unit.target: Sobre el teu cor, [O Muhammad] - que pot ser de l'última-

trans-unit.source: In a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: En llengua àrab.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, això és [esmentat] en les escriptures dels pobles antics.

trans-unit.source: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?
trans-unit.target: I no ha estat un senyal per a ells que és reconegut pels erudits de nens d'Israel?

trans-unit.source: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners
trans-unit.target: I fins i tot si ens havia revelat a un entre els estrangers

trans-unit.source: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
trans-unit.target: I ell havia recitat a ells [perfectament], [encara] no haurien estat creients en ell.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Així ens han inserit incredulitat en els cors dels criminals.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: No creuran en ell fins que veuen el dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
trans-unit.target: I vindrà a ells de sobte mentre ho perceben [] no.

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"
trans-unit.target: I diran, "Pot ser reprieved?"

trans-unit.source: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
trans-unit.target: Així que per a un càstig són impacient?

trans-unit.source: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
trans-unit.target: Llavors has pensat si vam donar gaudi durant anys

trans-unit.source: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
trans-unit.target: I llavors va venir a ells que es va prometre?

trans-unit.source: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
trans-unit.target: No vols ser aprofitat per gaudir amb els quals se ls proveí.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
trans-unit.target: I no ens va fer destruir qualsevol ciutat excepte que tenia lesprimeres

trans-unit.source: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.
trans-unit.target: Com a recordatori; i mai ens han estat d'injustes.

trans-unit.source: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
trans-unit.target: I els diables no han portat la revelació.

trans-unit.source: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
trans-unit.target: No és admissible per a ells, ni ells seria capaços.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
trans-unit.target: Fet que, des [seva] audiència, se suprimeixin.

trans-unit.source: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
trans-unit.target: Així no invocar amb Allah una altra divinitat i [] que entre el castigava.

trans-unit.source: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
trans-unit.target: I advertir, [O Muhammad], el seu més proper parentela.

trans-unit.source: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
trans-unit.target: I reduir la seva ala a qui seguir dels creients.

trans-unit.source: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
trans-unit.target: I si van desobeir, llavors diuen, "De fet, jo sóc dissociades de què està fent."

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: I confiar en poder, el Clement, l'exaltat

trans-unit.source: Who sees you when you arise
trans-unit.target: Que et veu quan vostè sorgeixen

trans-unit.source: And your movement among those who prostrate.
trans-unit.target: I el seu moviment entre aquells que postrar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: De fet, ell és l'audiència, el saber.

trans-unit.source: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
trans-unit.target: Jo informarem a qui diables baixar?

trans-unit.source: They descend upon every sinful liar.
trans-unit.target: Van descendir sobre cada mentider pecaminós.

trans-unit.source: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.
trans-unit.target: Passen en què s'escolta, i la majoria són mentiders.

trans-unit.source: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
trans-unit.target: I els poetes - [només] el deviators seguir-los;

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
trans-unit.target: No veus que en cada vall es recorren

trans-unit.source: And that they say what they do not do? -
trans-unit.target: I que diuen que no ho fan? -

trans-unit.source: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Excepte aquelles [poetes] que creure i fer els justos fets i recordar Allah sovint i defensar [els musulmans] després que van ser injustament. I aquells que han tractat injustament vas a saber per què [mena de] retorn li serà retornada.

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a clear Book
trans-unit.target: Ta, vist. Aquests són els versos del Qur ' an i un llibre clar

trans-unit.source: As guidance and good tidings for the believers
trans-unit.target: Com a orientació i la bona nova per als creients

trans-unit.source: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Que s'estableixen pregària i donar zakah, i de la d'ara endavant són certs [en fe].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly.
trans-unit.target: De fet, per a aquells que no creuen en el futur, hem fet complaure'ls seus actes, així que vaguen cegament.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els que per a qui hi haurà el pitjor càstig, i en el futur són els grans perdedors.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [O Muhammad], you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I en efecte, [O Muhammad], rebeu el Qur ' an un savi i saber.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when Moses said to his family, "Indeed, I have perceived a fire. I will bring you from there information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves."
trans-unit.target: [Accèsit] Quan Moses va dir a la família, "de fet, jo han percebut un incendi. Em portarà des d'allà informació o portarà una llanterna que crema que vostè pot escalfar a vosaltres mateixos."

trans-unit.source: But when he came to it, he was called, "Blessed is whoever is at the fire and whoever is around it. And exalted is Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Però quan va arribar-hi, va ser anomenat, "beneït és qui està en el foc i qui està al seu voltant. I exaltat és Allah, Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: O Moses, indeed it is I - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: O Moses, de fet és jo - Allah, l'exaltat en forces, el savi".

trans-unit.source: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear.
trans-unit.target: I [li van dir], "tira avall el seu personal." Però quan va veure que retorçant-se com si fos una serp, va tornar al vol i no va tornar. [Allah deia], "O Moses, no tinguis por. De fet, en la meva presència els missatgers no tinguis por.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, he who wrongs, then substitutes good after evil - indeed, I am Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: En cas contrari, mals, qui llavors substituts bo després de mal - de fet, estic indulgent i Clement.

trans-unit.source: And put your hand into the opening of your garment [at the breast]; it will come out white without disease. [These are] among the nine signs [you will take] to Pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."
trans-unit.target: I posar la mà a l'obertura de la seva confecció [al pit]; es sortirà de blanc sense malaltia. [Són] entre els nou signes [fareu] al faraó i la seva gent. De fet, han estat un poble desafiant desobedient."

trans-unit.source: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Però quan va venir a ells nostres signes visibles, deien, "això és obvi màgia".

trans-unit.source: And they rejected them, while their [inner] selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters.
trans-unit.target: I va rebutjar-los, mentre seu ésser [interior] estaven convençuts, injustícia i arrogància. Així que veure com era el final de la corrupters.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."
trans-unit.target: I certament ens havia donat al coneixement de David i Salomó, i van dir, "elogi [es deu] a Allah, que ha afavorit nos sobre molts dels seus criats que creien."

trans-unit.source: And Solomon inherited David. He said, "O people, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given from all things. Indeed, this is evident bounty."
trans-unit.target: I Salomó va heretar de David. Va dir: «O gent, que ens han ensenyat el llenguatge dels ocells, i ens ha donat des de totes les coses. De fet, aquest és recompenses evidents".

trans-unit.source: And gathered for Solomon were his soldiers of the jinn and men and birds, and they were [marching] in rows.
trans-unit.target: I es van reunir per Solomon eren seus soldats de la jinn i homes i ocells, i ells [va] en files.

trans-unit.source: Until, when they came upon the valley of the ants, an ant said, "O ants, enter your dwellings that you not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers while they perceive not."
trans-unit.target: Fins que, quan van arribar a la vall de les formigues, una formiga va dir, "les formigues O, introdueixi el seu habitatges que vostè no aixafats per Solomon i el seus soldats mentre no perceben."

trans-unit.source: So [Solomon] smiled, amused at her speech, and said, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants."
trans-unit.target: Així [Solomon] va somriure, divertit al seu discurs i va dir: "Senyor, permetre'm ser agraït per favor que hagi atorgat mi i els meus pares i fer justícia que aprovar. I admetre m els teu Mercè a [les files de] teus servents justos. "

trans-unit.source: And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent?
trans-unit.target: I ell va tenir presència de les aus i va dir: "per què jo no veig la puput - o és ell entre els absents?

trans-unit.source: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization."
trans-unit.target: Em segurament castigar amb un càstig sever o massacre d'ell llevat que em porta autorització clar."

trans-unit.source: But the hoopoe stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed [in knowledge] that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news.
trans-unit.target: Però la puput es va quedar no llarg i va dir: "vaig tenir conformin [coneixement] allò que no es tenen integrades, i he vingut a vostè des Sheba amb certes notícies.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne.
trans-unit.target: De fet, trobava [hi] una dona governant i ha rebut de totes les coses, i ella té un gran tron.

trans-unit.source: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from [His] way, so they are not guided,
trans-unit.target: He trobat a ella i la seva gent postrant al sol en comptes d'Allah, i Satanàs ha fet seus actes agradable a ells i evitar-los de manera [seu], perquè no estan guiats,

trans-unit.source: [And] so they do not prostrate to Allah, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare -
trans-unit.target: [I] així que no es postren a Allah, qui porta què s'amaga dins els cels i la terra i sap què li amaguen i què vostè declara-

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."
trans-unit.target: Allah - hi ha cap Déu excepte ell, senyor del gran tron.

trans-unit.source: [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars.
trans-unit.target: [Solomon] va dir, "anem a veure si van ser veraç o van ser de mentiders.

trans-unit.source: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return."
trans-unit.target: Prendre aquesta carta de la mina i el lliurin a ells. Llavors deixar-los i veure què [resposta] retornaran. "

trans-unit.source: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter.
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, "O més eminents, de fet, a mi s'ha lliurat una carta noble.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
trans-unit.target: De fet, és de Solomon, i de fet, diu així: "en el nom d'Allah, totalment compassius, especialment misericordiós,

trans-unit.source: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims].' "
trans-unit.target: No ser altiva amb mi però Vine a mi en el submissió [com musulmans]. " "

trans-unit.source: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness [for] me."
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, "O els eminents, aconselli'm al meu assumpte. Vols no decideixo qüestió fins que presenciar [per] mi."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Som homes de força i de gran poder militar, però l'ordre és teu, així que veure què vostè comanda."

trans-unit.source: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do.
trans-unit.target: Ella va dir, "fet Reis - entren a una ciutat, van arruïnar i fan l'honor de la seva gent humil. I així ho fan.

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what [reply] the messengers will return."
trans-unit.target: Però de fet, vaig a enviar-los un regal i veure amb quina [respon] missatgers tornarà".

trans-unit.source: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift.
trans-unit.target: Així quan venien a Salomó, va dir, "u em proporcionen amb riquesa? Però què Allah m'ha donat és millor que el que ha donat. Més aviat, és el que s'alegren en el seu regal.

trans-unit.source: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased."
trans-unit.target: Tornar a ells, sens dubte vindrà per ells amb soldats que seran incapaços de trobar i es segurament expulsem derivar d'humiliació i que es ser degradat. "

trans-unit.source: [Solomon] said, "O assembly [of jinn], which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"
trans-unit.target: [Solomon] va dir, "O Assemblea [de jinn], qui de vosaltres em portarà el seu tron abans de que vénen a mi en el submissió?"

trans-unit.source: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this [task] strong and trustworthy."
trans-unit.target: Un potent un entre jinn va dir, "jo et portarà això abans que s'aixequen del seu lloc, i de fet, estic per aquesta [tasca] fort i fiable."

trans-unit.source: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous."
trans-unit.target: Va dir que tingués coneixement de l'escriptura, "que et portarà abans la mirada torna a tu." I quan [Solomon] veure que es posa davant d'ell, va dir, "és la desgràcia del meu Senyor em comprovar si vaig a estar agraït o ingrat. I qui està agraït - l'agraïment és només per [el benefici de] ell mateix. I qui és ingrat - després de fet, el Senyor és lliure de necessitat i Generous."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided [to truth] or will be of those who is not guided."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "disfressar per a ella el seu tron; veurem si serà guiat [a veritat] o ella serà d'aquells que no és guiada."

trans-unit.source: So when she arrived, it was said [to her], "Is your throne like this?" She said, "[It is] as though it was it." [Solomon said], "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims [in submission to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Així que quan va arribar, es va dir [a ella], "És el teu tron com aquesta?" Ella va dir, "[és] com si fos això." [Solomon va dir], "i ens van donar coneixement abans que ella, i hem estat musulmans [en el submissió a Allah].

trans-unit.source: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: I que el que era venerant altre que Allah havia evitat ella [de submissió a ell]. De fet, va ser d'un poble incrèdul."

trans-unit.source: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins [to wade through]. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace [whose floor is] made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah, Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Li van dir, "Introduïu el Palau". Però quan va veure, ella va pensar que era un cos de l'aigua i descobert els seus barbs [per travessar a través de]. Va dir, "de fet, és un palau [el pis és] fet llisa amb vidre." Ella va dir, "El meu Senyor, en efecte tenir injustament-me, i presento amb Solomon a Allah, Senyor dels mons."

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent to Thamud their brother Salih, [saying], "Worship Allah," and at once they were two parties conflicting.
trans-unit.target: I certament havia enviat a Thamud seu germà Salih, [dir], "Allah de culte" i al mateix temps que eren dues parts en conflicte.

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil instead of good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of Allah that you may receive mercy?"
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "O poble meu, per què estàs impacient per mal en comptes de bo? Per què vostè no busques el perdó d'Allah que vostè pot rebre Misericòrdia?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We consider you a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen is with Allah. Rather, you are a people being tested."
trans-unit.target: Deien, "Considerem un mal presagi, vostè i aquells amb vostè." Va dir, "és el seu auguri amb Allah. Més aviat, és un poble s'està provant."

trans-unit.source: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending [its affairs].
trans-unit.target: I hi havia a la ciutat nou caps de família provocant la corrupció de la terra i no modifiquen [el assumptes].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Take a mutual oath by Allah that we will kill him by night, he and his family. Then we will say to his executor, 'We did not witness the destruction of his family, and indeed, we are truthful.' "
trans-unit.target: Deien, "prendre un jurament mutu per Allah que ens mataran per la nit, ell i la seva família. Llavors ens diran al seu executor, 'no contemplem la destrucció de la seva família, i de fet, estem veraces'. "

trans-unit.source: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.
trans-unit.target: I planificar un pla, i es va planificar un pla, mentre no es percep.

trans-unit.source: Then look how was the outcome of their plan - that We destroyed them and their people, all.
trans-unit.target: Llavors aspecte com va ser el resultat del seu pla - que hem destruït i les seves gents, tots.

trans-unit.source: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they had done. Indeed in that is a sign for people who know.
trans-unit.target: Perquè aquestes són les seves cases, desolat pel mal que havien fet. Fet que és un senyal per a persones que saben.

trans-unit.source: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: I hem salvat els que creien i utilitzat per por d'Allah.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing?
trans-unit.target: I [parlar] munt, quan va dir a la seva gent, "es la immoralitat mentre veieu?

trans-unit.source: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly."
trans-unit.target: De fet acostar els homes amb desig en lloc de les dones? Més aviat, ets un poble comportant ignorància."

trans-unit.source: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure."
trans-unit.target: Però la resposta del seu poble era no excepte que deien, "expulsar la família del Lot de la seva ciutat. De fet, són persones que mantenir-se pur. "

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We destined her to be of those who remained behind.
trans-unit.target: Així que som estalvis ell i la seva família, excepte la seva dona; Hem destinat a ella per ser d'aquells que es van quedar.

trans-unit.source: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: I ens ha plogut sobre ells una pluja [de pedres], i mal era la pluja d'aquells que eren avisats.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Praise be to Allah, and peace upon His servants whom He has chosen. Is Allah better or what they associate with Him?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "¡ Lloat sigui Allah i la pau en els seus servents qui ell ha escollit. És millor Allah o què van associar amb ell?"

trans-unit.source: [More precisely], is He [not best] who created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you rain from the sky, causing to grow thereby gardens of joyful beauty which you could not [otherwise] have grown the trees thereof? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but they are a people who ascribe equals [to Him].
trans-unit.target: [Més precisament], el [no millor] que crear el cel i la terra i empresonat per la pluja des del cel, provocant així créixer jardins de bellesa alegre que vostè podria no és [altrament] han crescut arbres del mateix? Hi ha un Déu amb Allah? [No], però són un poble que atribueixen iguals [a ell].

trans-unit.source: Is He [not best] who made the earth a stable ground and placed within it rivers and made for it firmly set mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: És ell [no millor] que va fer la terra un estable de terra i posat dins d'ella rius i fer-lo fermament conjunt de muntanyes i situada entre dos mars una barrera? Hi ha un Déu amb Allah? [No], però la majoria d'ells no saben.

trans-unit.source: Is He [not best] who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him and removes evil and makes you inheritors of the earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: És ell [no millor] que respon a la desesperada, quan anomena a ell i treu el mal i et fa hereus de la terra? Hi ha un Déu amb Allah? Mica et recordes.

trans-unit.source: Is He [not best] who guides you through the darknesses of the land and sea and who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy? Is there a deity with Allah? High is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: [No conegut] és que us guiarà a través de la darknesses de la terra i el mar i que envia els vents com bona nova abans de la seva misericòrdia? Hi ha un Déu amb Allah? Alta és Allah sobre qualsevol cosa que es relacionen amb ell.

trans-unit.source: Is He [not best] who begins creation and then repeats it and who provides for you from the heaven and earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: És ell [no millor] que comença la creació i després repeteix-lo i que proporciona per a vostè des del cel i la terra? Hi ha un Déu amb Allah? Dir: "Produeixi la seva prova, si vostè ha de ser veraç."

trans-unit.source: Say, "None in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "cap al cel i terra sap invisibles excepte Allah, i no perceben que quan es serà ressuscitat".

trans-unit.source: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind.
trans-unit.target: Més aviat, el coneixement és detingut sobre el més enllà. Més aviat, estan en dubte. Més aviat, que són, pel que fa a ella, cega.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "When we have become dust as well as our forefathers, will we indeed be brought out [of the graves]?
trans-unit.target: I els que dubten diuen, "quan ens hem convertit en pols, així com els nostres avantpassats, hem fet difondrà [de les tombes]?

trans-unit.source: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before. This is not but legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Ens ha promès això, nosaltres i els nostres avantpassats, abans. Això no és sinó llegendes dels antics pobles."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals."
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "Viatge a través de la terra i observar com era el final dels criminals".

trans-unit.source: And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire.
trans-unit.target: I tristos no per ells, o estar en perill de què van conspirar.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: I van dir: "quan és [el compliment de] Aquesta promesa, si vostè ha de ser veraç?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient.
trans-unit.target: Dir, "potser és tancar darrere de vostè - alguns dels que per a la qual està impacient.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord is full of bounty for the people, but most of them do not show gratitude."
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu senyor és ple de generositat per a les persones, però la majoria d'ells no mostrar gratitud."

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el seu Senyor sap què amaguen els seus pits i el que manifesten.

trans-unit.source: And there is nothing concealed within the heaven and the earth except that it is in a clear Register.
trans-unit.target: I no hi ha que res amagat dins el cel i la terra, excepte que és en un registre clar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this Qur'an relates to the Children of Israel most of that over which they disagree.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquest Qur ' an es relaciona amb nens d'Israel la majoria dels que més que ells.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is guidance and mercy for the believers.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, és d'orientació i Misericòrdia per als creients.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them by His [wise] judgement. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: De fet, el seu Senyor considerarà entre ells per la seva sentència [savi]. I l'exaltat en forces, el saber.

trans-unit.source: So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth.
trans-unit.target: Així que confiar en Allah; fet, que es troben en la veritat clara.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they have turned their backs retreating.
trans-unit.target: De fet, no es farà la mort sentir, ni et farà sentir la crida quan ells han donat l'esquena es retirava sords.

trans-unit.source: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [submitting to Allah].
trans-unit.target: I vostè no pot guiar els cecs del seu error. Només et farà sentir aquells que creuen en nostres versos així són musulmans [submissió a Allah].

trans-unit.source: And when the word befalls them, We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them, [saying] that the people were, of Our verses, not certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: I quan la paraula passa, ens portarà endavant per a ells una criatura de la terra parlar-los, [dir] que les persones van ser, de nostres versos, no certs [en fe].

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when We will gather from every nation a company of those who deny Our signs, and they will be [driven] in rows
trans-unit.target: I [adverteixi de] el dia quan ens recollirà de totes les Nacions una empresa d'aquells que neguen rètols i que serà [impulsat] en files

trans-unit.source: Until, when they arrive [at the place of Judgement], He will say, "Did you deny My signs while you encompassed them not in knowledge, or what [was it that] you were doing?"
trans-unit.target: Fins que, quan arriben [al lloc del judici], va dir, "negaven u el meu signes mentre que ells abasta no en el coneixement, o què [era que] que estàveu fent?"

trans-unit.source: And the decree will befall them for the wrong they did, and they will not [be able to] speak.
trans-unit.target: I el decret caurà sobre ells pel mal que van fer, i no ho faran [poder] parlar.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that We made the night that they may rest therein and the day giving sight? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Ells no veuen que hem fet la nit que es pot descansar en això i el dia donant la vista? Fet que són signes per persones que creuen.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will be terrified except whom Allah wills. And all will come to Him humbled.
trans-unit.target: I [adverteixi de] el dia la banya lacustres i qui és en els cels i qui és a la terra es estar aterrit excepte qui vol Allah. I tot vindrà a ell humil.

trans-unit.source: And you see the mountains, thinking them rigid, while they will pass as the passing of clouds. [It is] the work of Allah, who perfected all things. Indeed, He is Acquainted with that which you do.
