trans-unit.target: Si vostè no creuen - en efecte, Allah és lliure de necessitat de vosaltres. I no va aprovar per la seva incredulitat servents. I si estàs agraït, que s'aprova per a vostè; i no portador de càrregues portarà la càrrega d'un altre. Després el seu senyor és el seu retorn, i ell us informaran sobre què solia fer. De fet, és saber que dins els pits.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."
trans-unit.target: I quan l'adversitat toca home, ell fa una crida als seu Senyor, convertint a ell [sol]; llavors quan ell dóna-li un favor de si mateix, oblida qui va cridat abans, i atribueix a iguals d'Allah a enganyar [persones] del seu camí. Dir, "gaudir la seva incredulitat per un poc; de fet, ets dels companys del foc."

trans-unit.source: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.
trans-unit.target: És un que és devotament obedients durant els períodes de la nit, postrant i peu [en l'oració], tement el més enllà i esperant la misericòrdia del seu Senyor, [com el que fa no]? Dir, "Són aquells que saben igual a aquells que no ho sé?" Només es recorden [que són] persones de comprensió.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."
trans-unit.target: Dir: "Oh meus servents que han cregut, por el seu Senyor. Per als que fan bé en aquest món és bo, i la terra d'Allah és ampli. De fet, el pacient es donarà seva recompensa sense compte."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "de fet, han estat manat per venerar Allah, [sent] sincer a ell en la religió.

trans-unit.source: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: I jo he estat manat per ser el primer [entre vosaltres] dels musulmans.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "Fet que por, si jo hauria desobeir el meu Senyor, el càstig d'un gran dia."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
trans-unit.target: Dir: "Allah [sol] fer adoro, sincer a ell en la meva religió,

trans-unit.source: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."
trans-unit.target: Tan veneren què fareu a més ell." Dir, "de fet, els perdedors són els que perdran ells mateixos i les seves famílies en el dia de resurrecció. Sens dubte, això és la pèrdua manifesta".

trans-unit.source: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.
trans-unit.target: Tindran marquesines de foc sobre ells i sota ells, marquesines. Per que Allah amenaça seus servents. Oh meu servents, llavors por mi.

trans-unit.source: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants
trans-unit.target: Però aquells que han evitat Taghut, perquè no van adorar-lo i va tornar a Allah - per a ells són la bona nova. Així que donar la bona nova als meus servents

trans-unit.source: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Que escoltar discurs i seguir el millor d'ella. Aquests són els que Allah ha guiat, i els són gent de comprensió.

trans-unit.source: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?
trans-unit.target: Llavors, és que ha merescut el decret de càstig [a regir]? Llavors, qui és en l'incendi pot estalviar?

trans-unit.source: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: Però qui haver temut el seu Senyor - per a ells són cambres, per sobre de les cambres alta, construïdes sota quin cabal de rius. [És] la promesa d'Allah. Allah no fallar a [seva] promesa.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: No veus que Allah envia cap avall la pluja des del cel i fa rius de cabal com fonts [i] a la terra; llavors així produeix collites de diferents colors; llavors s'assequin i veure ells convertit groc; llavors ell fa [dispersos] runa. Fet que és un recordatori per a aquells de la comprensió.

trans-unit.source: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to [accept] Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah. Those are in manifest error.
trans-unit.target: Així és una quals mama Allah ha ampliat per [Acceptar] l'Islam i va és en una llum del seu Senyor [com rebutja el cor]? Llavors aflicció als cors del qual s'endureixen contra el record d'al·là. Aquests són en l'error es manifesten.

trans-unit.source: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah. That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
trans-unit.target: Allah ha enviat la millor declaració: un llibre coherent en el qual és la reiteració. Les pells tremolar derivar dels qui temen el seu Senyor; llavors seves pells i els seus cors relaxar al record d'al·là. Que és l'orientació d'Allah pel qual ell qui guies testaments d'ell. I una quals fulles Allah per mal camí - per a ell no hi és cap guia.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection [like one secure from it]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn."
trans-unit.target: Llavors és ell que protegiran amb la cara a la pitjor del càstig el dia de resurrecció [com un segur d'ell]? I es diu pels malfactors, "tastar què vas guanyar."

trans-unit.source: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Aquells abans d'ells va negar i va arribar a càstig imposin des d'on ells no perceben.

trans-unit.source: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
trans-unit.target: Així Allah feien degustar desgràcia en vida mundana. Però el càstig de la d'ara endavant és més gran, si només sabia.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
trans-unit.target: I sens dubte hem presentat per a la gent en aquest Alcorà de cada [mena de] exemple - que es recordi.

trans-unit.source: [It is] an Arabic Qur'an, without any deviance that they might become righteous.
trans-unit.target: [És] un Alcorà àrab, sense qualsevol desviació que esdevinguin justos.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example: a slave owned by quarreling partners and another belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Allah presenta un exemple: un esclau de titularitat barallats socis i una altra que pertany exclusivament a un home - són iguals en comparació? Elogi ser a Allah! Però la majoria d'ells no saben.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die.
trans-unit.target: De fet, són a morir, i de fet, són a morir.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute.
trans-unit.target: Llavors, en efecte, el dia de resurrecció, abans del seu Senyor, es disputa.

trans-unit.source: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers?
trans-unit.target: Així que és més injust que un que es troba sobre Allah i nega la veritat quan ha arribat a ell? És que allà no en infern a residència pels disbelievers?

trans-unit.source: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.
trans-unit.target: I el que ha portat la veritat i [qui] creu en ella - els són justos.

trans-unit.source: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good -
trans-unit.target: Tindran tot el que desitgen amb el seu Senyor. Aquesta és la recompensa dels autors de bo-

trans-unit.source: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Que Allah pot retirar-los el pitjor de què feien i premiar-los seu a causa del millor del solia fer.

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant [Prophet Muhammad]? And [yet], they threaten you with those [they worship] other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
trans-unit.target: No és Allah suficient pel seu servent [Profeta Muhammad]? I [encara], amenacen amb aquells [veneren] altre que ell. I qui les fulles d'Allah per mal camí - per a ell no hi és cap guia.

trans-unit.source: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?
trans-unit.target: I qui guies Allah - per a ell no hi no és misleader. No és Allah exaltat en força i el propietari de retribució?

trans-unit.source: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; upon Him [alone] rely the [wise] reliers."
trans-unit.target: I si li vaig preguntar, "Que va crear els cels i la terra?" que segurament diria, "Allah". Dir, "llavors has pensat que vostè invoca a més d'Allah? Si Allah em pensat mal, són transportistes del seu mal; o si em pretenia Misericòrdia, són withholders de la seva misericòrdia?" Dir, "Sufficient per a mi és Allah; a ell [sol] confiar la reliers [savis]."

trans-unit.source: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know
trans-unit.target: Dir, "O poble meu, funcionen segons la seva posició, [per] de fet, estic treballant; i vas a saber

trans-unit.source: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment."
trans-unit.target: A qui arribarà un turment ell disgracing i sobre qui baixar una duradora càstig".

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent down to you the Book for the people in truth. So whoever is guided - it is for [the benefit of] his soul; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And you are not a manager over them.
trans-unit.target: De fet, enviàvem a vostè el llibre per a la gent de veritat. Així qui està guiat - és per [el benefici de] la seva ànima; i només qui es perd es perd al seu perjudici. I no és un gestor sobre ells.

trans-unit.source: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die [He takes] during their sleep. Then He keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others for a specified term. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Allah pren les ànimes en el moment de la seva mort i els que no morir [que ho dugui] durant el seu son. Llavors ell manté que ha decretat la mort i els altres d'Alleujaments per a un termini especificat. Fet que els signes per a un poble que dóna pensar.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken other than Allah as intercessors? Say, "Even though they do not possess [power over] anything, nor do they reason?"
trans-unit.target: O tenen diferents Allah com desvirtuïn? Dir, "tot i que no posseeixen [poder sobre] res, ni fer raó?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "To Allah belongs [the right to allow] intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "a Allah pertany [el dret de permetre] intercessió totalment. A ell pertany el dominion dels cels i la terra. Llavors li tornareu."

trans-unit.source: And when Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when those [worshipped] other than Him are mentioned, immediately they rejoice.
trans-unit.target: I quan Allah s'esmenta soles, els cors d'aquells que no creuen en el futur disminueixi amb aversió, però quan aquells [adorat] altre que ell s'esmenten, immediatament van alegrar-se.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, You will judge between your servants concerning that over which they used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "O Allah, creador del cel i la terra, coneixedor del invisibles i va ser testimoni, es considerarà entre teus servents que sobre les quals solien difereixen sobre."

trans-unit.source: And if those who did wrong had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby from the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection. And there will appear to them from Allah that which they had not taken into account.
trans-unit.target: I si els que s'equivocava tenia tot el que és a la terra totalment i similars que amb ell, que [intentaria] rescatar-se així de la pitjor del càstig el dia de resurrecció. I hi apareixerà a ells des d'Allah, el que no s'havia pres en compte.

trans-unit.source: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Hi apareixerà a ells els mals que havia guanyat i es veurà embolicat per què van utilitzar el ridícul.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of [my] knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: I quan l'adversitat toca home, ell anomena sobre nosaltres; llavors quan podem atorgar-li un favor de nosaltres, diu, "he només estat donat a causa de [meu] coneixement." Més aviat, és un judici, però la majoria d'ells no saben.

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Aquells abans d'ells ja havien dit, però no van ser aprofitat per què utilitzaven per guanyar.

trans-unit.source: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these [people] will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure.
trans-unit.target: I les conseqüències mals de què es va obtenir va colpejar-los. I aquells que han tractat injustament d'aquestes [persones] es ser afectat per les conseqüències de mals de què es guanyat; i no farà falta.

trans-unit.source: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: No saben que Allah s'estén a disposició per a qui ell voluntats i restringeix [que]? Fet que són signes per persones que creuen.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Dir: "Oh meus servents que han transgredien contra si mateixos [per pecar], no desespereu de la pietat d'Allah. De fet, Allah perdona tots els pecats. De fet, és el que és l'indulgent, el Clement."

trans-unit.source: And return [in repentance] to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: I tornar [al penediment] al seu Senyor i sotmetre's a ell abans que vingui el càstig a vostè; llavors vostè estarà no acompanyada.

trans-unit.source: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive,
trans-unit.target: I seguir el millor de què va revelar a vostè del seu Senyor abans el càstig ve a vostè de sobte mentre no perceben,

trans-unit.source: Lest a soul should say, "Oh [how great is] my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers."
trans-unit.target: Perquè no hauria de dir una ànima, "Oh [com de gran és] meu pesar sobre el que he descuidat pel que fa a Allah i que estava entre la mockers."

trans-unit.source: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: O [no] deia, "si només Allah va guiant-me, hauria estat entre el just."

trans-unit.source: Or [lest] it say when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another turn so I could be among the doers of good."
trans-unit.target: O [no] diu quan es veu el càstig, "Si només tenia un altre torn així podria estar entre els autors de bo."

trans-unit.source: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Però sí, hi havia arribat a vostè els meus versos, però vostè negant-los i van ser arrogants, i es trobaven entre els disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And on the Day of Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah [with] their faces blackened. Is there not in Hell a residence for the arrogant?
trans-unit.target: I el dia de resurrecció veurà qui mentit sobre Allah [amb] els rostres ennegrit. És que allà no en infern d'una residència per a l'arrogància?

trans-unit.source: And Allah will save those who feared Him by their attainment; no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: I Allah salvarà qui li va témer per la seva consecució; gens de mal ells tocarà, ni es ells grieve.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: Allah és el creador de totes les coses, i és, sobre totes les coses, triturador d'Afers.

trans-unit.source: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And they who disbelieve in the verses of Allah - it is those who are the losers.
trans-unit.target: Li pertanyen les claus dels cels i la terra. I els que no creuen en els versos d'Allah - és qui són els perdedors.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Is it other than Allah that you order me to worship, O ignorant ones?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "és que no sigui que em a adorar, O demanar ignorants Allah?"

trans-unit.source: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate [anything] with Allah, your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers."
trans-unit.target: I ja es va revelar a vostè i als abans que si [quelcom] s'ha associat amb Allah, el seu treball segurament seria inútil, i que segurament seria entre els perdedors.

trans-unit.source: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.
trans-unit.target: Més aviat, veneren Allah [només] i entre el agraït.

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal, while the earth entirely will be [within] His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Ells no han valorat Allah amb veritable avaluació, mentre que la terra completament serà [dins] deixar el dia de resurrecció, i el cel es ser plegat a la mà dreta. Exaltat és ell i alta sobre el que van associar amb ell.

trans-unit.source: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on.
trans-unit.target: I lacustres el Corn i qui és en els cels i qui és a la terra cauen morts excepte qui vol Allah. Llavors es lacustres nou i a la vegada serà de peu, mirant.

trans-unit.source: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the record [of deeds] will be placed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be judged between them in truth, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: La terra a brillar amb la llum del seu Senyor i el registre [fets] aniran i serà portat els profetes i els testimonis i seran jutjats entre ells en veritat i no ser injustament.

trans-unit.source: And every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it did; and He is most knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: I cada ànima seran compensats totalment [per] el que va fer; i més sabent el que fan.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in groups until, when they reach it, its gates are opened and its keepers will say, "Did there not come to you messengers from yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the word of punishment has come into effect upon the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven serà impulsat a l'infern en grups fins que, quan van arribar-hi, s'obren les portes i dels seus habitants dirà, "Allà no venia a vostè missatgers de vosaltres, recitant a vostè del seu Senyor i advertint de la reunió d'aquest dia de la teva?" Es a dir, "Sí, però la paraula de càstig ha arribat en vigor en els disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: [To them] it will be said, "Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."
trans-unit.target: [A] es diu, "Introduïu les portes del infern respectar eternament en el mateix i miserable és la residència de l'arrogància".

trans-unit.source: But those who feared their Lord will be driven to Paradise in groups until, when they reach it while its gates have been opened and its keepers say, "Peace be upon you; you have become pure; so enter it to abide eternally therein," [they will enter].
trans-unit.target: Però aquells que temia el seu Senyor serà impulsat al paradís en grups fins que, quan van arribar-hi mentre s'han obert les portes i dels seus habitants diuen, "la pau sigui amb tu; has arribat a ser pur; així introduir-lo a complir eternament en el mateix,"[entrarà].

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth [so] we may settle in Paradise wherever we will. And excellent is the reward of [righteous] workers."
trans-unit.target: I diuen, "lloar a Allah, que ha complert per a nosaltres la seva promesa i ens heretar la terra [perquè] ens podrà resoldre en paradís, allà on anem a fer. I la retribució dels treballadors [rectes] és excel·lent."

trans-unit.source: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting [Allah] with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "[All] praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: I podràs veure els àngels que envolten el tron, exaltant [Allah] amb l'elogi del seu Senyor. I seran jutjats entre ells en veritat, i es diu, "[All] lloança a Allah, Senyor dels mons".

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ja, Meem.

trans-unit.source: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: La revelació del llibre és d'Allah, l'exaltat en forces, el saber.

trans-unit.source: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. There is no deity except Him; to Him is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Al que perdona del pecat, acceptor d'electrons de penediment, greu en càstig, propietari de l'abundància. No hi ha cap Déu excepte ell; a ell és el destí.

trans-unit.source: No one disputes concerning the signs of Allah except those who disbelieve, so be not deceived by their [uninhibited] movement throughout the land.
trans-unit.target: Ningú les controvèrsies relatives a les senyals d'Allah, excepte els que dubten, així que no es deixi enganyar pel seu moviment [desinhibida] per tota la terra.

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them and the [disbelieving] factions after them, and every nation intended [a plot] for their messenger to seize him, and they disputed by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth. So I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.
trans-unit.target: La gent de Noè negat davant ells i les faccions [incrèdules] després d'ells i cada nació destinat [una trama] per seu Missatger aprofitar-lo i disputa mitjançant [] falsedat per a [tractar] invalidar així la veritat. Així que he agafat i com [terrible] va ser la meva pena.

trans-unit.source: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: I així, té la paraula el Senyor entra en efecte en els que dubtaven que són companys del foc.

trans-unit.source: Those [angels] who carry the Throne and those around it exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who have believed, [saying], "Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Aquells [àngels] que portar al tron i als voltants exaltar [Allah] amb elogis del seu Senyor i creuen en ell i demanar perdó per a aquells que han cregut, [dir], "nostre Senyor, vostè té comprenia totes les coses a la misericòrdia i el coneixement, així que perdonin els que s'han penedit i va seguir el seu camí i protegir-los del càstig de Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Nostre Senyor i reconèixer-los jardins de residència perpètua que té prometre i qui era justa entre els seus pares, els seus cònjuges i els seus fills. De fet, és el que és l'exaltat en forces, el savi.

trans-unit.source: And protect them from the evil consequences [of their deeds]. And he whom You protect from evil consequences that Day - You will have given him mercy. And that is the great attainment."
trans-unit.target: I protegir-los de les conseqüències mals [dels seus actes]. I ell qui protegir mal conseqüències aquell dia - li es donat ell misericòrdia. I això és la gran consecució."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve will be addressed, "The hatred of Allah for you was [even] greater than your hatred of yourselves [this Day in Hell] when you were invited to faith, but you refused."
trans-unit.target: De fet, els que dubten s'abordaran, "l'odi d'Allah que va [] major que el seu odi vosaltres [aquest dia a l'infern] Quan us van convidar a la fe, però es va negar."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, You made us lifeless twice and gave us life twice, and we have confessed our sins. So is there to an exit any way?"
trans-unit.target: Es a dir, "nostre Senyor, ens va fer sense vida dues vegades i ens donava vida dues vegades, i ens han confessar els nostres pecats. Així és allà una sortida cap manera?"

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "That is because, when Allah was called upon alone, you disbelieved; but if others were associated with Him, you believed. So the judgement is with Allah, the Most High, the Grand."
trans-unit.target: [S'especificarà], "que és perquè, quan Allah va ser comminat a sol, dubtaven; però si els altres es van associats amb ell, vostè creu. Així que la sentència és amb Allah, el més alt, el gran".

trans-unit.source: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].
trans-unit.target: És el que Mostra la seva signes i envia cap avall per a vostè des del cel, prestació. Però cap s'acordarà excepte qui es torna [de penediment].

trans-unit.source: So invoke Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, although the disbelievers dislike it.
trans-unit.target: Tan invocar Allah, [sent] sincer a ell en la religió, encara que els disbelievers no els agrada.

trans-unit.source: [He is] the Exalted above [all] degrees, Owner of the Throne; He places the inspiration of His command upon whom He wills of His servants to warn of the Day of Meeting.
trans-unit.target: [És] l'exaltat anteriorment [tots els] graus, propietari del tron; Posa la inspiració del seu comandament en qui ell voluntats dels seus servents per advertir de la dia de reunió.

trans-unit.source: The Day they come forth nothing concerning them will be concealed from Allah. To whom belongs [all] sovereignty this Day? To Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: El dia que surt a fora res sobre ells es pot amagar des d'Allah. A qui pertany la sobirania [tots els] aquest dia? A Allah, el que, la que preval.

trans-unit.source: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Aquest dia es es recompensava cada ànima pel que li va valer. No hi ha injustícia avui! De fet, Allah és ràpida en compte.

trans-unit.source: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Approaching Day, when hearts are at the throats, filled [with distress]. For the wrongdoers there will be no devoted friend and no intercessor [who is] obeyed.
trans-unit.target: I advertir-los, [O Muhammad], del dia s'acosta, quan els cors són a les gorges, omplia [amb angoixa]. Pels malfactors hi haurà cap devot amic i no intercesor [qui és] obeir.

trans-unit.source: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal.
trans-unit.target: Ell sap que que enganya els ulls i que amaguen els pits.

trans-unit.source: And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything. Indeed, Allah - He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: I Allah jutges amb la veritat, mentre que aquells que invocar a més ell jutge no amb qualsevol cosa. De fet, Allah - és l'audiència, el Seeing.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those who were before them? They were greater than them in strength and in impression on the land, but Allah seized them for their sins. And they had not from Allah any protector.
trans-unit.target: Ells no va viatjar a través de la terra i observar com era el final d'aquells que estaven davant d'ells? Van ser més gran que ells en força i en impressió a la terra, però Allah agafat pels seus pecats. I tenien no des d'Allah qualsevol protector.

trans-unit.source: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment.
trans-unit.target: Això va ser perquè els seus missatgers venien a ells amb proves clares, però els dubtaven, perquè Allah agafat. De fet, és potent i greu en el càstig.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: I certament ens va enviar Moses amb rètols i una autoritat clar

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."
trans-unit.target: Faraó, Amman i Qarun; però va dir, "[és] un mag i un mentider."

trans-unit.source: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and keep their women alive." But the plan of the disbelievers is not except in error.
trans-unit.target: I quan els va portar la veritat de nosaltres, van dir, "Matar els fills d'aquells que han cregut amb ell i mantenir viva les seves dones." Però el pla dels disbelievers no és excepte en l'error.

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses and let him call upon his Lord. Indeed, I fear that he will change your religion or that he will cause corruption in the land."
trans-unit.target: I el Faraó va dir, "anem a matar Moses i li permetrà trucar al seu Senyor. De fet, em temo que que canviarà la seva religió o que va causar la corrupció a la terra."

trans-unit.source: But Moses said, "Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."
trans-unit.target: Però Moses va dir, "de fet, he buscat refugi en meu Senyor i el Senyor de cada un d'arrogant que no creu en el dia del compte."

trans-unit.source: And a believing man from the family of Pharaoh who concealed his faith said, "Do you kill a man [merely] because he says, 'My Lord is Allah' while he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord? And if he should be lying, then upon him is [the consequence of] his lie; but if he should be truthful, there will strike you some of what he promises you. Indeed, Allah does not guide one who is a transgressor and a liar.
trans-unit.target: I un home creient que la família del faraó que amagava la seva fe, va dir, "fer matar un home [només] perquè diu,"el meu Senyor és Allah"mentre que ell ha portat clares proves del seu Senyor? I si ell ha estar mentint, llavors a ell és [la conseqüència de] la seva mentida; però si ha de ser veraç, allà t'atacarà en alguns dels que li augura a vostè. De fet, Allah no guia de qui és un transgressor i un mentider.

trans-unit.source: O my people, sovereignty is yours today, [your being] dominant in the land. But who would protect us from the punishment of Allah if it came to us?" Pharaoh said, "I do not show you except what I see, and I do not guide you except to the way of right conduct."
trans-unit.target: Oh poble meu, sobirania és teu avui, [el seu ésser] dominant en la terra. Però que vols ens protegeixi del càstig d'Allah si vingués amb nosaltres?" Faraó va dir, "no us mostro excepte el que veig i no guiar a vostè, excepte a la forma de conducta correcta".

trans-unit.source: And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the companies -
trans-unit.target: I el que es creu va dir: «O meva gent, de fet em temo que [un destí] com el dia de les empreses-

trans-unit.source: Like the custom of the people of Noah and of 'Aad and Thamud and those after them. And Allah wants no injustice for [His] servants.
trans-unit.target: Com el costum de la gent de Noè i d ' Aad i Thamud i aquells després d'ells. I Allah vol cap injustícia per a [seva] servents.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, indeed I fear for you the Day of Calling -
trans-unit.target: I O la meva gent, de fet, em temo que el dia de trucades-

trans-unit.source: The Day you will turn your backs fleeing; there is not for you from Allah any protector. And whoever Allah leaves astray - there is not for him any guide.
trans-unit.target: El dia que al seu torn el seu esquena fugint; no hi ha per a vostè des d'Allah qualsevol protector. I qui Allah deixa per mal camí - no hi ha per a ell cap guia.

trans-unit.source: And Joseph had already come to you before with clear proofs, but you remained in doubt of that which he brought to you, until when he died, you said, 'Never will Allah send a messenger after him.' Thus does Allah leave astray he who is a transgressor and skeptic."
trans-unit.target: I Joseph ja havia arribat a vostè abans amb proves clares, però es va quedar en dubte d'això que donava a vostè, fins quan va morir, va dir, "mai Allah enviarà un Missatger després d'ell." Així Allah deixa per mal camí qui és un transgressor i escèptic."

trans-unit.source: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred [of them] in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart [belonging to] an arrogant tyrant.
trans-unit.target: Qui disputa sobre els senyals d'Allah sense una autoritat que havent arribat a ells - gran és l'odi [de] a la vista d'Allah i als ulls de qui he cregut. Així fa segell d'Allah sobre cada cor [de] un tirà arrogant.

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -
trans-unit.target: I el Faraó va dir, "O Amman, construir per a mi una torre que jo podria arribar a les formes-

trans-unit.source: The ways into the heavens - so that I may look at the deity of Moses; but indeed, I think he is a liar." And thus was made attractive to Pharaoh the evil of his deed, and he was averted from the [right] way. And the plan of Pharaoh was not except in ruin.
trans-unit.target: Les formes en el cel - manera que pot mirar la divinitat de Moses; però de fet, crec que és un mentider". I així es va fer atractiu faraó el mal de la seva escriptura, i ell es va evitar de la forma [dreta]. I el pla del faraó no era excepte en ruïna.

trans-unit.source: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct.
trans-unit.target: I el que creu va dir: "Oh poble meu, segueix-me, vaig a guiar a la forma de conducta correcta.

trans-unit.source: O my people, this worldly life is only [temporary] enjoyment, and indeed, the Hereafter - that is the home of [permanent] settlement.
trans-unit.target: Oh poble meu, aquesta vida mundana és només [temporal] gaudi i fet, el futur - que és la llar de l'assentament [permanent].

trans-unit.source: Whoever does an evil deed will not be recompensed except by the like thereof; but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, being given provision therein without account.
trans-unit.target: Qui fa un mal escriptura es no es recompensava excepte per similars però qui fa justícia, sigui home o dona, mentre que ell és un creient - aquells ingressarà a paradís, sent donat disposició aquí sense compte.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire?
trans-unit.target: I O poble meu, com és que us convido a salvació mentre que convidar-me a l'incendi?

trans-unit.source: You invite me to disbelieve in Allah and associate with Him that of which I have no knowledge, and I invite you to the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: Us convida'm a no creuen en Allah i associar amb ell que que tinc cap coneixement, i us invito a l'exaltat en el poder, el que perdona perpetu.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, that to which you invite me has no [response to a] supplication in this world or in the Hereafter; and indeed, our return is to Allah, and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: De cert, que a la qual vostè convidar-me ha no [resposta a un] súplica en aquest món o en el futur; i de fet, de tornada és a Allah, i de fet, els transgressors serà companys del foc.

trans-unit.source: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah. Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: I et recordaràs que [ara] us dic, i vaig confiar el meu assumpte a Allah. De fet, Allah és veure de la [seua] servents."

trans-unit.source: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -
trans-unit.target: Així Allah el protegia dels mals van conspirar, i la gent del faraó eren embolicada pel pitjor càstig-

trans-unit.source: The Fire, they are exposed to it morning and evening. And the Day the Hour appears [it will be said], "Make the people of Pharaoh enter the severest punishment."
trans-unit.target: El foc, s'exposen al matí i vespre. I el dia de l'hora apareix [es diu], "Fer la gent del faraó introduir el càstig més greu".

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when they will argue within the Fire, and the weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Indeed, we were [only] your followers, so will you relieve us of a share of the Fire?"
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit] Quan argumenten dins el foc, i els febles dirà a qui havia estat arrogants, "de fet, estàvem [només] seus seguidors, així alleujar nosaltres d'una porció del foc?"

trans-unit.source: Those who had been arrogant will say, "Indeed, all [of us] are in it. Indeed, Allah has judged between the servants."
trans-unit.target: Aquells que havien estat arrogants dirà, "de fet, tots [nosaltres] són en ella. De fet, Allah ha jutjat entre servidors."

trans-unit.source: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell, "Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us a day from the punishment."
trans-unit.target: I els de l'incendi dirà als guardians de l'infern, "Supplicate seu senyor a alleugerir per a nosaltres un dia de la pena."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves], but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error."
trans-unit.target: Diran, "Allà no venia a vostè el seu missatgers amb proves clares?" Es a dir, "Sí". Es respondrà: "llavors suplicar [vosaltres], però la súplica dels disbelievers no és excepte en l'error."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -
trans-unit.target: De fet, ens donarà suport a nostres missatgers i els que creuen en la vida d'aquest món i en el dia quan es mantindrà els testimonis-

trans-unit.source: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home.
trans-unit.target: El dia de la seva excusa no beneficiarà els malfactors i tindran la maledicció, i tindran la llar pitjor.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture
trans-unit.target: Certament ens havia donat orientació Moses i hem provocat nens d'Israel d'heretar l'escriptura

trans-unit.source: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Com a orientació i un recordatori per a aquells de la comprensió.

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning.
trans-unit.target: Així sigui pacient, [O Muhammad]. De fet, la promesa d'Allah és veritat. I demana perdó pel seu pecat i exaltar [Allah] amb l'elogi del seu senyor a la nit i el matí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without [any] authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, [the extent of] which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: De fet, qui disputa pel que fa a les senyals d'Allah sense [cap] autoritat havent arribat a ells - no hi ha dins els seus pits excepte orgull, [l'extensió de] que no pot arribar. Així que busquen refugi en Allah. De fet, és el que està en l'audiència, el Seeing.

trans-unit.source: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: La creació del cel i la terra és més gran que la creació de la humanitat, però la majoria de la gent no sap.

trans-unit.source: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: I no és igual els cecs i el veure, ni els qui creure i fer els justos fets i el convide. Mica et recordes.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: De fet, l'hora és arribada - sens dubte sobre això - però no crec que la majoria de les persones.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord says, "Call upon Me; I will respond to you." Indeed, those who disdain My worship will enter Hell [rendered] contemptible.
trans-unit.target: I el Senyor diu, "crida a mi; Vaig a respondre a vostè." De fet, qui menyspreu meva adoració entrarà l'infern [prestat] menyspreable.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the night that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful.
trans-unit.target: És Allah que va fer que la nit que vostè pot estar en el mateix i el dia donant la vista. De fet, Allah és plena de generositat a les persones, però la majoria de les persones no estem agraït.

trans-unit.source: That is Allah, your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?
trans-unit.target: Que és d'Allah, el seu Senyor, creador de totes les coses; no hi ha cap Déu excepte ell, així com els que enganyat?

trans-unit.source: Thus were those [before you] deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Així eren els [abans] il. lus òria que van rebutjar els senyals d'Allah.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a ceiling and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah, your Lord; then blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: És Allah fet per a tu la terra un lloc d'assentament i el cel un sostre i formant vostè i perfeccionat la seva forma i condició que amb les coses bones. Que és d'Allah, el seu Senyor; llavors beneït és al là, Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him, [being] sincere to Him in religion. [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Ell és el estar mai; hi ha cap Déu excepte ell, tan trucar a ell, [sent] sincer a ell en la religió. Elogi [all] és [deu] a Allah, Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you call upon besides Allah once the clear proofs have come to me from my Lord, and I have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Dir, [O Muhammad], "de fet, jo estan prohibits a adorar aquells que invocarà a més d'Allah un cop les proves clars vingut a mi del meu Senyor, i jo he estat manat a sotmetre's al Senyor dels mons."

trans-unit.source: It is He who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.
trans-unit.target: És ell que ha creat des de pols, i des d'una gota de semen, i des d'un coàgul interessant; llavors ell et porta a terme com un nen; llavors [desenvolupa li] que assoleixen la seva maduresa [temps de], llavors [més] que et converteixes en ancians. I entre vosaltres és el que es pren en mort abans [que], per a que vostè arribar a un terme especificat; i potser us raó.

trans-unit.source: He it is who gives life and causes death; and when He decrees a matter, He but says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Ell és qui dóna vida i causa la mort; i quan va decrets un assumpte, però diu, "Ser" i és.

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah - how are they averted?
trans-unit.target: No considereu qui disputa pel que fa a les senyals d'Allah - com són evitats?

trans-unit.source: Those who deny the Book and that with which We sent Our messengers - they are going to know,
trans-unit.target: Els que neguen el llibre i que amb la qual hem enviat nostres missatgers - van saber,

trans-unit.source: When the shackles are around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged
trans-unit.target: Quan estan els grillons coll i a les cadenes; ells es ser arrossegats

trans-unit.source: In boiling water; then in the Fire they will be filled [with flame].
trans-unit.target: En bullir l'aigua; llavors en el foc van s'omplirà [amb flama].

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate [with Him in worship]
trans-unit.target: Llavors es diu d'ells, "on és el que solia associar [amb ell en la veneració]

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us; rather, we did not used to invoke previously anything." Thus does Allah put astray the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Altre que Allah?" Es dirà, "que han sortit de nosaltres; més aviat, no solien invocar prèviament res." Així Allah el posa per mal camí disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: [The angels will say], "That was because you used to exult upon the earth without right and you used to behave insolently.
trans-unit.target: [Els àngels a dir], "que era perquè solia gaudirà sobre la terra sense dret i solia comportar-se amb insolència.

trans-unit.source: Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."
trans-unit.target: Introduïu les portes del infern respectar eternament en el mateix i miserable és la residència de l'arrogància."

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad]; indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We take you in death, it is to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Així sigui pacient, [O Muhammad]; de fet, la promesa d'Allah és veritat. I si et mostrem algunes de què ens hem compromès a ells o ens portarà a la mort, és per a nosaltres seran retornats.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those [whose stories] We have related to you, and among them are those [whose stories] We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign [or verse] except by permission of Allah. So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose [all].
trans-unit.target: I ja hem enviat missatgers abans. Entre ells hi ha els [les històries] vam tenir relacionades amb vostè, i entre ells hi ha els [les històries] no explico a vostè. I no era un Missatger portar un signe [o vers] excepte pel permís d'Allah. Així que quan arribi l'ordre d'Allah, es falli en veritat, i el llibre llavors perdrà [tots].

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.
trans-unit.target: És Allah que va fer que els animals que pasturen en què que puja i alguns d'ells que mengeu.

trans-unit.source: And for you therein are [other] benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: I per a vostè aquí és [altres] beneficis i que es pot adonar sobre ells una necessitat que és en els seus pits; i ells i vaixells es realitzen.

trans-unit.source: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny?
trans-unit.target: I ell li Mostra la seva signes. Així que de les senyals d'Allah es negar?

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Ells no va viatjar a través de la terra i observar com era el final d'aquestes davant d'ells? Eren més nombrosos que ells mateixos i una major força i impressió de la terra, però no van ser aprofitat per què utilitzaven per guanyar.

trans-unit.source: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they [merely] rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: I quan els seus missatgers venien a ells amb proves clares, [només] s'alegraven en què van tenir coneixement, però van ser embolicada per què van utilitzar el ridícul.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him."
trans-unit.target: I quan van veure el nostre càstig, deien,"Creiem en Allah sols i no creuen en la que estem acostumats a associar amb ell."

trans-unit.source: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. [It is] the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost [all].
trans-unit.target: Però mai seva fe beneficiar-los un cop veien un càstig. [És] la forma establerta d'Allah que ha precedit entre els seus servents. I els disbelievers llavors va perdre [tots].

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ja, Meem.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a revelation from the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful -
trans-unit.target: [És] una revelació de totalment compassius, especialment compassius -

trans-unit.source: A Book whose verses have been detailed, an Arabic Qur'an for a people who know,
trans-unit.target: Un llibre de versos del qual han estat detallada, un Alcorà àrab per a un poble que sap,

trans-unit.source: As a giver of good tidings and a warner; but most of them turn away, so they do not hear.
trans-unit.target: Com un donador de bona nova i un Avisador; però la majoria d'ells s'allunyen, així que no senten.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working."
trans-unit.target: I diuen, "els nostres cors en revestiments de que al qual conviden i en els nostres oïdes és la sordesa i entre nosaltres i és una partició, així treballar; de fet, estem treballant."

trans-unit.source: Say, O [Muhammad], "I am only a man like you to whom it has been revealed that your god is but one God; so take a straight course to Him and seek His forgiveness." And woe to those who associate others with Allah -
trans-unit.target: Dir, O [Muhammad], "jo sóc només un home com tu a qui s'ha revelat que el seu Déu és però un Déu; així fer un curs de recta li i buscar el seu perdó." I aflicció als que altres associar Allah-

trans-unit.source: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Aquells que no donen zakah, i en el futur són disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: De fet, qui creure i fer els justos fets - per a ells és una recompensa ininterrompuda.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Do you indeed disbelieve in He who created the earth in two days and attribute to Him equals? That is the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Dir, "fer fet dubtar a qui creava la terra en dos dies i atribut li és igual? Que és el Senyor dels mons".

trans-unit.source: And He placed on the earth firmly set mountains over its surface, and He blessed it and determined therein its [creatures'] sustenance in four days without distinction - for [the information] of those who ask.
trans-unit.target: I posava a les muntanyes de terra fermament establert sobre la seva superfície, i beneïa i va determinar sustentar els seus [criatures] aquí en quatre dies sense distinció - [les informacions] de aquells qui ho demanen.

trans-unit.source: Then He directed Himself to the heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the earth, "Come [into being], willingly or by compulsion." They said, "We have come willingly."
trans-unit.target: A continuació va dirigir ell mateix en el cel mentre era fum i els deia a això i a la terra, "Entrar [s], voluntàriament o per obligació." Deien, "Hem vingut voluntàriament."

trans-unit.source: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I va acabar com set cels en dos dies i inspirat en cada cel la seva comanda. I hem adornat el cel més propera amb llums i com a protecció. Que és la determinació de l'exaltat en forces, el saber.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt [that struck] 'Aad and Thamud.
trans-unit.target: Però si que al seu torn fora, llavors diuen, "m'he advertit d'un llamp com el llamp [que] ' Aad i Thamud.

trans-unit.source: [That occurred] when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, [saying], "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: [Que s'ha produït] Quan els missatgers havia arribat a ells abans d'ells i després d'ells, [dir], "Veneren no excepte Allah". Deien, "si nostre Senyor tenia willed, haguessin enviat per Àngels, així que de fet nosaltres, que amb el que li ha enviat, són disbelievers."

trans-unit.source: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs.
trans-unit.target: Com per ' Aad, eren arrogants sobre la terra sense dret i va dir: "Qui és més gran que nosaltres en força?" No que consideri que Allah que els va crear era més gran que ells força? Però ells van rebutjar rètols.

trans-unit.source: So We sent upon them a screaming wind during days of misfortune to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in the worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is more disgracing, and they will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: Així que hem enviat a ells un vent crit durant els dies de la desgràcia de fer-los tastar el càstig de desgràcia a la vida mundana; però el càstig de la d'ara endavant és més disgracing, i no ser ajudat.

trans-unit.source: And as for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them for what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: I pel que fa a Thamud, guiàvem, sinó que preferien ceguesa sobre l'orientació, així el llamp de humiliant càstig agafat per què utilitzaven per guanyar.

trans-unit.source: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: I hem salvat els que creien i utilitzat per por d'Allah.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are [driven] assembled in rows,
trans-unit.target: I [accèsit, O Muhammad], el dia que quan els enemics d'Allah es recolliran al foc mentre ells són [impulsats] agrupats en files,

trans-unit.source: Until, when they reach it, their hearing and their eyes and their skins will testify against them of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Fins que, quan arriben, auditius i els ulls i la seva pell es testificar contra ells del solia fer.

trans-unit.source: And they will say to their skins, "Why have you testified against us?" They will say, "We were made to speak by Allah, who has made everything speak; and He created you the first time, and to Him you are returned.
trans-unit.target: I diran a la seva pell, "per què tenen que va declarar contra nosaltres?" Es a dir, "es van fer parlar per Allah, que ha fet tot el parlar; i es va crear la primera vegada, i a ell es retornen.

trans-unit.source: And you were not covering yourselves, lest your hearing testify against you or your sight or your skins, but you assumed that Allah does not know much of what you do.
trans-unit.target: I no estaven cobrint vosaltres, no sigui que la seva audiència testificar contra vostè o la vista o la pell, però va assumir que Allah no sap gaire del que fas.

trans-unit.source: And that was your assumption which you assumed about your Lord. It has brought you to ruin, and you have become among the losers."
trans-unit.target: I allò era el supòsit que vostè va assumir sobre el seu Senyor. S'ha portat a la ruïna, i s'han convertit en entre els perdedors".

trans-unit.source: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease [Allah], they will not be of those who are allowed to appease.
trans-unit.target: Així [encara] si són pacient, el foc és una residència per a ells; i si el que demanen apaivagar [Allah], no seran d'aquells que se'ls permet apaivagar.

trans-unit.source: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them [of sin], and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.
trans-unit.target: I hem nomenat per a ells, els companys que van fer atractiu per a ells el que era abans d'ells i el que va quedar després ells [del pecat], i la paraula ha entrat en efecte a ells entre les nacions que havia passat davant d'ells de jinn i homes. En efecte, [tots] eren perdedors.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur'an and speak noisily during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."
trans-unit.target: I els que dubten diuen, "no escoltar aquest Alcorà i parlar sorollosament durant [la recitació de] que potser es superarà."

trans-unit.source: But We will surely cause those who disbelieve to taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them for the worst of what they had been doing.
trans-unit.target: Però segurament ens farà que els que dubten a degustar un càstig sever, i segurament es recompensa-los per al pitjor del que havia estat fent.

trans-unit.source: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting.
trans-unit.target: Aquesta és la recompensa dels enemics d'Allah - el foc. Per a ells en el mateix és la llar de l'eternitat com a recompensa per què ells, dels nostres versos, es van rebutjar.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved will [then] say, "Our Lord, show us those who misled us of the jinn and men [so] we may put them under our feet that they will be among the lowest."
trans-unit.target: I els que dubtaven [llavors] dirà, "Nostre Senyor, mostrar-nos qui ens la jinn i homes enganyats [perquè] ens pot posar-los sota els nostres peus que estaran entre les més baixes."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah " and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them, [saying], "Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han dit, "Nostre Senyor és Allah" i es va mantenir en un curs adequat - àngels descendir sobre ells, [dir], "no tinguis por i no plorar però rebre bona nova del paradís, que es va prometre.

trans-unit.source: We [angels] were your allies in worldly life and [are so] in the Hereafter. And you will have therein whatever your souls desire, and you will have therein whatever you request [or wish]
trans-unit.target: [Àngels] estàvem els seus aliats en la vida mundana i [són] en el futur. I vostè tindrà aquí qualsevol desig seves ànimes, i vostè tindrà aquí qualsevol petició [o desig]

trans-unit.source: As accommodation from a [Lord who is] Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Allotjaments d'una [Senyor qui és] indulgent i Clement. "

trans-unit.source: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: I qui és millor en el discurs que una que convida a Allah i fa justícia i diu, "De fet, jo sóc dels musulmans."

trans-unit.source: And not equal are the good deed and the bad. Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity [will become] as though he was a devoted friend.
trans-unit.target: I no igual són l'escriptura bo i el dolent. Rebutjar [mal] per aquell [escriptura] que és el millor; i llavors aquell que entre vostè i ell és enemistat [esdevindrà] que va ser un devot amic.

trans-unit.source: But none is granted it except those who are patient, and none is granted it except one having a great portion [of good].
trans-unit.target: Però cap es concedeix això excepte els que són pacients, i cap es concedeix això excepte un en tingui una porció gran [de bo].

trans-unit.source: And if there comes to you from Satan an evil suggestion, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I si arriba a vostè de Satan un suggeriment mal, llavors buscar refugi en Allah. De fet, ell és l'audiència, el saber.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs are the night and day and the sun and moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah, who created them, if it should be Him that you worship.
trans-unit.target: I dels seus signes són la nit i el dia i el sol i la lluna. No postrar al sol o a la Lluna, però pròstata a Allah, que crear-los, si cal ell que adoren.

trans-unit.source: But if they are arrogant - then those who are near your Lord exalt Him by night and by day, and they do not become weary.
trans-unit.target: Però si són arrogants - llavors aquells que estan a prop teu Senyor Canteu-li lloances de nit i de dia, i no es cansa.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that you see the earth stilled, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and grows. Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: I dels seus signes és que veus la terra es va calmar, però quan enviem en aquest pluja, s'estremeix i creix. De fet, el que li ha donat vida és el donador de vida als morts. De fet, és sobre totes les coses competents.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who inject deviation into Our verses are not concealed from Us. So, is he who is cast into the Fire better or he who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will; indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que s'injecten desviació en nostres versos no quedin ocults de nosaltres. Així, és el que es projecta al foc millor o el que ve segur el dia de resurrecció? Fer qualsevol cosa que vostè; de fet, està veient del que fas.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message after it has come to them... And indeed, it is a mighty Book.
trans-unit.target: De fet, els que no creuen en el missatge després que ha arribat a ells... I de fet, és un llibre poderós.

trans-unit.source: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it; [it is] a revelation from a [Lord who is] Wise and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Falsedat no podem abordar-lo des d'abans d'això o darrere [és] una revelació d'una [Senyor qui és] savi i Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Nothing is said to you, [O Muhammad], except what was already said to the messengers before you. Indeed, your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness and a possessor of painful penalty.
trans-unit.target: Res es diu que vostè, [O Muhammad], excepte el que ja deia que els missatgers abans. De fet, el seu senyor és un posseïdor de perdó i un posseïdor de dolorosa pena.

trans-unit.source: And if We had made it a non-Arabic Qur'an, they would have said, "Why are its verses not explained in detail [in our language]? Is it a foreign [recitation] and an Arab [messenger]?" Say, "It is, for those who believe, a guidance and cure." And those who do not believe - in their ears is deafness, and it is upon them blindness. Those are being called from a distant place.
trans-unit.target: I si ens havia fet un no - àrab Qur ' an, hauria dit, "per què els seus versos no explica amb detall [en el nostre idioma]? És un estranger [recitació] i un àrab [Missatger]?" Dir, "És, per a aquells que creuen, una orientació i cura." I els que no creuen - en les orelles és la sordesa, i és sobre ells ceguesa. Els cridats d'un lloc llunyà.

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.
trans-unit.target: I ja havia donat Moses l'escriptura, però es tractava en desacord. Si no fos per una paraula que precedida del seu Senyor, vols s'han celebrat entre ells. I el fet són, pel que fa a l'Alcorà, en dubte inquietant.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does righteousness - it is for his [own] soul; and whoever does evil [does so] against it. And your Lord is not ever unjust to [His] servants.
trans-unit.target: Qui fa justícia - és per la seva [propi] ànima; i qui fa mal [fa] contra d'ella. I el seu Senyor no és mai injust [seva] servents.

trans-unit.source: To him [alone] is attributed knowledge of the Hour. And fruits emerge not from their coverings nor does a female conceive or give birth except with His knowledge. And the Day He will call to them, "Where are My 'partners'?" they will say, "We announce to You that there is [no longer] among us any witness [to that]."
trans-unit.target: Ell [sol] és atribuït coneixement de l'hora. I fruites emergeixen no seus revestiments ni fa un conceive femení o parir excepte amb el seu coneixement. I el dia va a trucar a ells, "On són els meus"socis"?" es diuen, "Us anunciem que no hi ha [ja] entre nosaltres algun testimoni [que]."

trans-unit.source: And lost from them will be those they were invoking before, and they will be certain that they have no place of escape.
trans-unit.target: I perdut d'ells seran els que eren invocant abans, i serà cert que tenen lloc d'escapament.

trans-unit.source: Man is not weary of supplication for good [things], but if evil touches him, he is hopeless and despairing.
trans-unit.target: Home no està cansat de rogacions per sempre [coses], però si mal li toca, és inútil i desesperats.

trans-unit.source: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after an adversity which has touched him, he will surely say, "This is [due] to me, and I do not think the Hour will occur; and [even] if I should be returned to my Lord, indeed, for me there will be with Him the best." But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did, and We will surely make them taste a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: I si ens va deixar tastar misericòrdia de nosaltres després d'una adversitat que ha tocat ell, ell segurament dirà "això és [deu] a mi i no crec que es produirà l'hora; i [encara] haurien de ser retornats al meu Senyor, de fet, per a mi hi haurà amb ell el millor." Però segurament els que dubtaven informarem sobre el que van fer, i segurament farem-los tastar un càstig massiva.

trans-unit.source: And when We bestow favor upon man, he turns away and distances himself; but when evil touches him, then he is full of extensive supplication.
trans-unit.target: I quan podem atorgar a favor a home, ell s'allunya i distàncies d'ell mateix; però quan mal li toca, llavors està ple de súplica extensa.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an is from Allah and you disbelieved in it, who would be more astray than one who is in extreme dissension?"
trans-unit.target: Dir, "has considerat: si el Qur ' an és d'Allah i dubtaven en ella, que seria més per mal camí d'un que està en extrema dissensió?"

trans-unit.source: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness?
trans-unit.target: Mostrem les nostres signes en els horitzons i dins de si mateixos fins que es fa clar per a ells que és la veritat. Però no és suficient sobre el seu Senyor, que és, sobre totes les coses, un testimoni?

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, they are in doubt about the meeting with their Lord. Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing.
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte, són de dubte sobre la reunió amb el seu Senyor. Sens dubte és, de totes les coses, que abasta.

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ja, Meem.

trans-unit.source: 'Ayn, Seen, Qaf.
trans-unit.target: ' Ayn, vist, Qaf.

trans-unit.source: Thus has He revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and to those before you - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Així ha va revelar a vostè, [O Muhammad] i a aquells abans - Allah, l'exaltat en forces, el savi.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: A ell pertany el que està en el cel i el que està en la terra, i és la més alta, la més gran.

trans-unit.source: The heavens almost break from above them, and the angels exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Unquestionably, it is Allah who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: El cel gairebé trencar damunt d'ells, i els àngels exaltar [Allah] amb l'elogi del seu Senyor i demanar perdó per a aquells a la terra. Sens dubte, és que és l'indulgent, el Clement Allah.

trans-unit.source: And those who take as allies other than Him - Allah is [yet] Guardian over them; and you, [O Muhammad], are not over them a manager.
trans-unit.target: I aquells que prenen com a aliats que no sigui ell - Allah és [encara] Guardian sobre ells; i tu, [O Muhammad], no són sobre ells un director.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur'an that you may warn the Mother of Cities [Makkah] and those around it and warn of the Day of Assembly, about which there is no doubt. A party will be in Paradise and a party in the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: I així ens han revelat un Alcorà àrab que pot advertir la mare de les ciutats [Makkah] i aquells al seu voltant i alerten sobre el dia de l'Assemblea, que no hi ha dubte. Una festa estarà en paradís i una festa a l'incendi.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah willed, He could have made them [of] one religion, but He admits whom He wills into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have not any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: I si al là volgués, podria haver fet ells [de] una religió, però admet que Ell voluntats en la seva misericòrdia. I els malfactors tenen no qualsevol protector o ajudant.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken protectors [or allies] besides him? But Allah - He is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: O pres protectores [o aliats] a més d'ell? Però Allah - és el Protector i es dóna vida a la mort, i és sobre totes les coses competents.

trans-unit.source: And in anything over which you disagree - its ruling is [to be referred] to Allah. [Say], "That is Allah, my Lord; upon Him I have relied, and to Him I turn back."
trans-unit.target: I en res més que està en desacord - seva decisió [a anomenar] a Allah. [Dir], "és Allah, Senyor. li han confiat, i li vaig tornar enrere."

trans-unit.source: [He is] Creator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you from yourselves, mates, and among the cattle, mates; He multiplies you thereby. There is nothing like unto Him, and He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: [És] Creador del cel i la terra. Ell ha fet per a vostè de vosaltres, cònjuges i entre el bestiar, cònjuges; Ell es multiplica així. Hi ha res com a ell, i ell és l'audiència, el Seeing.

trans-unit.source: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Li pertanyen les claus dels cels i la terra. Ell s'estén disposició per a qui ell voluntats i restringeix [es]. De fet ell és, de totes les coses, saber.

trans-unit.source: He has ordained for you of religion what He enjoined upon Noah and that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what We enjoined upon Abraham and Moses and Jesus - to establish the religion and not be divided therein. Difficult for those who associate others with Allah is that to which you invite them. Allah chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Ha ordenat per a vostè de la religió que demanava a Noah i que ens ha revelat a vostè, [O Muhammad], i el que demanàvem a Abraham i Moses i Jesús - establir la religió i no ser dividit therein. Difícil per a aquells que associen altres amb Allah és que a la qual vostè convidar-los. Allah opta per si mateix qui ell voluntats i guies a ell mateix qui fa la volta [a ell].

trans-unit.source: And they did not become divided until after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord [postponing the penalty] until a specified time, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, those who were granted inheritance of the Scripture after them are, concerning it, in disquieting doubt.
trans-unit.target: I no es dividien fins després coneixement havia sortit a ells - gelós animositat entre ells. Si no fos per una paraula que precedida del seu Senyor [posposar la pena] fins una hora determinada, vols s'han celebrat entre ells. I de fet, aquells que es van concedir l'herència de l'escriptura després d'ells són, pel que fa a, en dubte inquietant.

trans-unit.source: So to that [religion of Allah] invite, [O Muhammad], and remain on a right course as you are commanded and do not follow their inclinations but say, "I have believed in what Allah has revealed of the Qur'an, and I have been commanded to do justice among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. For us are our deeds, and for you your deeds. There is no [need for] argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is the [final] destination."
trans-unit.target: Tan de que [religió d'Allah] conviden, [O Muhammad] i romanen en un curs adequat com estan comandades i no segueixen d'inclinacions però dir, "he cregut en què Allah ha revelat del Qur ' an, i jo he estat manat fer justícia entre vosaltres. Allah és nostre Senyor i el seu Senyor. Per a nosaltres els nostres actes i per a vostè, els seus actes. Hi ha cap argument [necessitat] entre nosaltres i vostè. Allah ens portarà junts i a ell és la destinació [final]."

trans-unit.source: And those who argue concerning Allah after He has been responded to - their argument is invalid with their Lord, and upon them is [His] wrath, and for them is a severe punishment.
