trans-unit.target: Ai de vosaltres i Ai!

trans-unit.source: Then woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: A continuació, Ai de vosaltres i Ai!

trans-unit.source: Does man think that he will be left neglected?
trans-unit.target: Home que que ell es esquerra descuidar?

trans-unit.source: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
trans-unit.target: Si no hagués estat un espermatozoide d'esperma emesa?

trans-unit.source: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
trans-unit.target: Llavors era un coàgul interessant, i [Allah] creat [seva forma] i proporcionat [li]

trans-unit.source: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
trans-unit.target: I va fer d'ell, dos companys, el mascle i la femella.

trans-unit.source: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?
trans-unit.target: No és que és capaç [creador] a donar vida als morts?

trans-unit.source: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
trans-unit.target: Ha hi [no] arribat a home un període de temps quan ell no era una cosa [encara] esmentat?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
trans-unit.target: De fet, vam crear l'home d'una barreja d'esperma-gota que pot tractar ell; i ens feia escoltar i veure.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: De fet, ens va guiar-lo a la forma, va ser agraït o va ser ingrat.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
trans-unit.target: De fet, hem preparat per a les disbelievers cadenes i grillons i un incendi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
trans-unit.target: De fet, els justos beuran des d'una tassa [de vi] és la barreja de Kafur,

trans-unit.source: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
trans-unit.target: Una primavera que criats de Allah [justos] beuran; es farà força endavant a brollen [i abundància].

trans-unit.source: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
trans-unit.target: Ells [són aquells que] complir [el seu] vots i por un dia es difondrà el mal.

trans-unit.source: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
trans-unit.target: I donen menjar tot i amor per a els més necessitats, l'orfe i el captiu,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
trans-unit.target: [Dir], "us donem de menjar només pel rostre d'Allah. Desitgem no de vostè recompensa o gratitud.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
trans-unit.target: De fet, tenim por de nostre Senyor dia auster i angoixant. "

trans-unit.source: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
trans-unit.target: Així Allah es protegeixen de la maldat d'aquest dia i donar-los la resplendor i la felicitat

trans-unit.source: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
trans-unit.target: I es recompensa'l pel què pacientment patit [amb] un jardí [en paradís] i [roba] de seda.

trans-unit.source: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
trans-unit.target: [Ls] recolzat en això en adornada sofàs. No veuran aquí qualsevol sol [ardor] o [congelació] fred.

trans-unit.source: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
trans-unit.target: A prop sobre d'ells els seus tons i serà baixa seu [fruit] es burlen en compliment.

trans-unit.source: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
trans-unit.target: I allà es pot repartir entre els vasos de plata i copes després d'haver estat [crear] clar [com vidre],

trans-unit.source: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.
trans-unit.target: Ulleres clars [fets] d'argent dels quals que han determinat la mesura.

trans-unit.source: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
trans-unit.target: I es dóna a beure una tassa [de vi] és la barreja de gingebre

trans-unit.source: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
trans-unit.target: [Des] una font dins paradís anomenat Salsabeel.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
trans-unit.target: Hi circularà entre ells nois joves va fer eterns. Quan vostè veu, vostè pensaria que ells [tan bonic com] dispersos perles.

trans-unit.source: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
trans-unit.target: I quan vostè mira allà [en paradís], veurà plaer i gran domini.

trans-unit.source: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
trans-unit.target: Sobre els habitants serà verds peces de seda fina i brocat. I es ser adornades amb braçalets de plata, i seu Senyor els donarà una beguda depuratiu.

trans-unit.source: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
trans-unit.target: [I es diu], "De fet, això és per a tu una recompensa, i el seu esforç ha estat apreciat".

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
trans-unit.target: De fet, és que han enviat a vostè, [O Muhammad], el Qur ' an progressivament.

trans-unit.source: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
trans-unit.target: Així sigui pacient de la decisió del seu Senyor i no obeir entre ells un pecador o ingrat [disbeliever].

trans-unit.source: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
trans-unit.target: I esmentar el nom del seu Senyor [en oració] matí i tarda

trans-unit.source: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
trans-unit.target: I durant la nit postrar li i Canteu-li lloances un llarg [de la] nit.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquestes [disbelievers] estimen l'immediat i deixar darrere d'ells un dia de greu.

trans-unit.source: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
trans-unit.target: Hem creat-los i reforçar la seva forma, i quan ho farem, podem canviar el seu fidelment amb alteració [completa].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: De fet, això és un recordatori, perquè el que vol pot tenir al seu senyor una manera.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I no es llevat que Allah testaments. En efecte, Allah és mai saber i savi.

trans-unit.source: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ell admet que Ell voluntats en la seva misericòrdia; però els malfactors - ha preparat per a ells un dolor càstig.

trans-unit.source: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
trans-unit.target: Per aquells [vent] enviats en ràfegues

trans-unit.source: And the winds that blow violently
trans-unit.target: I els vents que bufen violentament

trans-unit.source: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]
trans-unit.target: I [] els vents que estès [núvols]

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who bring criterion
trans-unit.target: I aquestes [àngels] que portar el criteri

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who deliver a message
trans-unit.target: I aquestes [àngels] que lliurar un missatge

trans-unit.source: As justification or warning,
trans-unit.target: Com a justificació o avís,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
trans-unit.target: De fet, el que es prometia és que es produeixi.

trans-unit.source: So when the stars are obliterated
trans-unit.target: Així que quan s'esborren les estrelles

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is opened
trans-unit.target: I quan s'obre el cel

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are blown away
trans-unit.target: I quan les muntanyes són arrossegats

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers' time has come...
trans-unit.target: I quan ha arribat l'hora dels missatgers...

trans-unit.source: For what Day was it postponed?
trans-unit.target: Per a quin dia es es APLAZA?

trans-unit.source: For the Day of Judgement.
trans-unit.target: Per al dia del judici.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer-te saber quin és el dia del judici?

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
trans-unit.target: No podem destruir els pobles antics?

trans-unit.source: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
trans-unit.target: A continuació, anem a seguir-los amb els posteriors.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Així ens front als criminals.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
trans-unit.target: No creem des d'un líquid desdenyar?

trans-unit.source: And We placed it in a firm lodging
trans-unit.target: I ens va posar en un allotjament ferm

trans-unit.source: For a known extent.
trans-unit.target: Per a punt conegut.

trans-unit.source: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
trans-unit.target: I hem decidit [es] i [estem] per determinar.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a container
trans-unit.target: Nosaltres no han fet la terra un recipient

trans-unit.source: Of the living and the dead?
trans-unit.target: De la seva vida i la mort?

trans-unit.source: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
trans-unit.target: I hem posat aquí elevats, fermament establert muntanyes i he donat a beure l'aigua dolça.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
trans-unit.target: [S'especificarà], "procedir a la que solia negar.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
trans-unit.target: Procedir a una ombra [de fum] tenir tres columnes

trans-unit.source: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."
trans-unit.target: [Però tenint] sense ombra fresca i fer ús no contra la flama. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
trans-unit.target: De fet, es tira espurnes [com enorme] com a fortalesa,

trans-unit.source: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.
trans-unit.target: Com si fossin groguenques camells [negres].

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: This is a Day they will not speak,
trans-unit.target: Aquest és un dia no parlen,

trans-unit.source: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.
trans-unit.target: Ni es permetrà per poder fer una excusa.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Aquest és el dia del judici; Hem es reunit vostè i els pobles antics.

trans-unit.source: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
trans-unit.target: Així que si vostè té un pla, llavors pla contra mi.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
trans-unit.target: De fet, els justos seran entre tons i springs

trans-unit.source: And fruits from whatever they desire,
trans-unit.target: I fruits de tot el que desitgen,

trans-unit.source: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Sent dir], "Menjar i beure a la satisfacció de què solia fer."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: De fet, així premiem els autors de bo.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [O disbelievers], menjar i gaudeix-ne una mica; de fet, li són delinqüents.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
trans-unit.target: I quan es diu a ells, "Arc [en oració]," no es inclinen.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros.

trans-unit.source: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Llavors en què declaració després de l'Alcorà es creurà?

trans-unit.source: About what are they asking one another?
trans-unit.target: Sobre el que estan demanant a un altre?

trans-unit.source: About the great news -
trans-unit.target: Sobre la gran notícia-

trans-unit.source: That over which they are in disagreement.
trans-unit.target: Que sobre el qual estan en desacord.

trans-unit.source: No! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: No! Van conèixer.

trans-unit.source: Then, no! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Llavors, no! Van conèixer.

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
trans-unit.target: Nosaltres no han fet la terra un lloc de repòs?

trans-unit.source: And the mountains as stakes?
trans-unit.target: I les muntanyes com estaques?

trans-unit.source: And We created you in pairs
trans-unit.target: I creem en parelles

trans-unit.source: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
trans-unit.target: I va fer la resta son [un mitjà per a]

trans-unit.source: And made the night as clothing
trans-unit.target: I va fer la nit com a roba

trans-unit.source: And made the day for livelihood
trans-unit.target: I va fer el dia per a la subsistència

trans-unit.source: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
trans-unit.target: I construïda damunt vostè set forts [cel]

trans-unit.source: And made [therein] a burning lamp
trans-unit.target: I [en això] va fer una làmpada que crema

trans-unit.source: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
trans-unit.target: I enviat cap avall, des dels núvols de pluja, abocant aigua

trans-unit.source: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
trans-unit.target: Que ens pot portar endavant així gra i vegetació

trans-unit.source: And gardens of entwined growth.
trans-unit.target: I jardins de creixement entrellaçades.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
trans-unit.target: De fet, el dia del judici és un temps assenyalat-

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
trans-unit.target: El dia es bufa la Banya i vindrà endavant en multituds

trans-unit.source: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
trans-unit.target: I el cel s'obre i es convertirà en passarel·les

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
trans-unit.target: I les muntanyes s'eliminen i serà [un miratge però].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
trans-unit.target: De fet, l'infern ha estat vigila

trans-unit.source: For the transgressors, a place of return,
trans-unit.target: Pels transgressors, un lloc de retorn,

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
trans-unit.target: On romandran durant molt de temps [interminables].

trans-unit.source: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
trans-unit.target: No saben en ell [qualsevol] fredor o beguda

trans-unit.source: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
trans-unit.target: Excepte aigua escaldada i [malament] purulence -

trans-unit.source: An appropriate recompense.
trans-unit.target: Una recompensa apropiat.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
trans-unit.target: De fet, no estaven esperant un compte

trans-unit.source: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
trans-unit.target: I negar la nostra versos amb negació [emfàtic].

trans-unit.source: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
trans-unit.target: Però totes les coses ens han enumerats en l'escriptura.

trans-unit.source: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
trans-unit.target: "Sabor tan [la pena], i mai hem augmentarà vostè, excepte en turment".

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
trans-unit.target: De fet, per al recte és l'assoliment-

trans-unit.source: Gardens and grapevines
trans-unit.target: Jardins i vinyes

trans-unit.source: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
trans-unit.target: I pit ple [companys] d'igual edat

trans-unit.source: And a full cup.
trans-unit.target: I una copa plena.

trans-unit.source: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
trans-unit.target: Cap discurs malalt escoltarem en el mateix o qualsevol falsedat -

trans-unit.source: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
trans-unit.target: [Com] recompensa del seu Senyor, [un generós] compte regal [fet venciment],

trans-unit.source: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
trans-unit.target: [Des] el Senyor dels cels i la terra i el que és entre ells, el misericordiós. Posseeixen no d'ell veu [autoritat per].

trans-unit.source: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
trans-unit.target: El dia que l'esperit i els àngels es mantindrà en files, no parlen excepte una quals les autoritzacions misericordiós i dirà què és correcte.

trans-unit.source: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
trans-unit.target: Que és el dia veritable; perquè el que vol pot tenir al seu Senyor [forma de] tornar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
trans-unit.target: De fet, ens han advertit d'un càstig a prop en el dia quan un home estudiarà que les mans han posat cap endavant i el disbeliever a dir, "Oh, m'agradaria que ser pols!"

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] who extract with violence
trans-unit.target: Per aquells [àngels] que extreure amb violència

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who remove with ease
trans-unit.target: I [per] aquells que eliminar amb facilitat

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
trans-unit.target: I [per] aquells que llisquen [com si] natació

trans-unit.source: And those who race each other in a race
trans-unit.target: I aquells que cursa l'altre en una cursa

trans-unit.source: And those who arrange [each] matter,
trans-unit.target: I aquells que organitzar [cada] matèria,

trans-unit.source: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
trans-unit.target: El dia l'explosió [de la botzina] es convulse [creació],

trans-unit.source: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
trans-unit.target: Hi seguirà això la posterior [que].

trans-unit.source: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
trans-unit.target: Cors, que dia, va a tremolar,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled.
trans-unit.target: Seus ulls humiliat.

trans-unit.source: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
trans-unit.target: [Actualment] estan dient, "hem fet regressareu a [nostre] estat antiga [de la vida]?

trans-unit.source: Even if we should be decayed bones?
trans-unit.target: Fins i tot si hem de ser erosionats ossos?

trans-unit.source: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
trans-unit.target: Diuen, "Que, llavors, seria un retorn perdent."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
trans-unit.target: De fet, seria però un crit,

trans-unit.source: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
trans-unit.target: I de sobte seran [avís] sobre la superfície terrestre.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
trans-unit.target: Ha hi ha arribat a vostè la història de Moses? -

trans-unit.source: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
trans-unit.target: Quan el seu Senyor anomenat li a la Vall Sagrada de Tuwa,

trans-unit.source: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: "Anar a faraó. De fet, ell ha transgredida.

trans-unit.source: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
trans-unit.target: I dir-li, "vols [estar disposat a] purificar-se

trans-unit.source: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
trans-unit.target: I deixar-me guiar al seu Senyor perquè vols por [li]?'"

trans-unit.source: And he showed him the greatest sign,
trans-unit.target: I li va ensenyar el major signe,

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
trans-unit.target: Però el Faraó va negar i desobeir.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned his back, striving.
trans-unit.target: Llavors es convertia l'esquena, s'esforça.

trans-unit.source: And he gathered [his people] and called out
trans-unit.target: I va reunir [la gent] i cridar

trans-unit.source: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
trans-unit.target: I va dir: "jo sóc el teu Senyor més exaltat."

trans-unit.source: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
trans-unit.target: Així Allah li requisa a càstig exemplar per a l'última i la primera [transgressió].

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Fet que és un avís per a qui vols por [Allah].

trans-unit.source: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
trans-unit.target: És vostè una creació més difícil o és el cel? Allah construit.

trans-unit.source: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
trans-unit.target: Va criar el seu sostre i proporcionat això.

trans-unit.source: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
trans-unit.target: I ell va enfosquir la nit i extreu la seva Claror.

trans-unit.source: And after that He spread the earth.
trans-unit.target: I després d'això va difondre la terra.

trans-unit.source: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
trans-unit.target: Li van extreure'n l'aigua i les pastures,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains He set firmly
trans-unit.target: I les muntanyes va establir fermament

trans-unit.source: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: Com a prestació per a vostè i el seu bestiar pastura.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Però quan arriba la gran calamitat aclaparadora-

trans-unit.source: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
trans-unit.target: El dia quan home recordarà que per a les quals es lluitava,

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
trans-unit.target: I serà exposada Hellfire de [tots] aquells que veure-

trans-unit.source: So as for he who transgressed
trans-unit.target: Així que per a ell que transgredien

trans-unit.source: And preferred the life of the world,
trans-unit.target: I preferia la vida del món,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: De fet, llavors Hellfire serà [seva] refugi.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a ell que temia la posició del seu Senyor i prevenir l'ànima d'inclinació [il·legal],

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: De fet, llavors Paradise serà [seva] refugi.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
trans-unit.target: Demanen que, [O Muhammad], sobre l'hora: quan és la seva arribada?

trans-unit.source: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
trans-unit.target: En quina [posició] són que vostè ha esmentat-lo?

trans-unit.source: To your Lord is its finality.
trans-unit.target: El seu senyor és la seva finalitat.

trans-unit.source: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
trans-unit.target: Soc només un avisador per a aquells que tinc por.

trans-unit.source: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
trans-unit.target: Serà, el van veure, com si no havia quedat [en el món] una tarda o un matí del mateix dia.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet frowned and turned away
trans-unit.target: El Profeta mal i s'allunyava

trans-unit.source: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
trans-unit.target: Perquè hi va venir a ell el cec, [interrompre].

trans-unit.source: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
trans-unit.target: Però què faria que perceben, [O Muhammad], que potser ell pot ser purificada

trans-unit.source: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
trans-unit.target: O recordar i el record es beneficiarien ell?

trans-unit.source: As for he who thinks himself without need,
trans-unit.target: Pel que fa a qui pensa ell mateix sense necessitat,

trans-unit.source: To him you give attention.
trans-unit.target: A ell li donen atenció.

trans-unit.source: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
trans-unit.target: I no a vostè [és qualsevol culpa] si ell no es purifiqui.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a ell que va arribar a vostè buscar [coneixement]

trans-unit.source: While he fears [Allah],
trans-unit.target: Mentre ell tem [Allah],

trans-unit.source: From him you are distracted.
trans-unit.target: D'ell està distret.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
trans-unit.target: No! De fet, aquests versos són un record;

trans-unit.source: So whoever wills may remember it.
trans-unit.target: Així qui vol pot recordar.

trans-unit.source: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
trans-unit.target: [És registrat] en fulls honrats,

trans-unit.source: Exalted and purified,
trans-unit.target: Exaltat i purificada,

trans-unit.source: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
trans-unit.target: [Fa] per les mans de Missatger-Àngels,

trans-unit.source: Noble and dutiful.
trans-unit.target: Noble i obedient.

trans-unit.source: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
trans-unit.target: Maleït és l'home; incrèdula com és ell.

trans-unit.source: From what substance did He create him?
trans-unit.target: De quina substància va crear-lo?

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
trans-unit.target: Des d'un esperma-gota va crear ell i destinada a ell;

trans-unit.source: Then He eased the way for him;
trans-unit.target: Llavors va alleujar el camí per a ell;

trans-unit.source: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
trans-unit.target: Llavors va brivall i proporciona una tomba per a ell.

trans-unit.source: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
trans-unit.target: Llavors quan Ell voluntats, va ressuscitar-lo.

trans-unit.source: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
trans-unit.target: No! Home ha no encara aconseguit el que va ordenar.

trans-unit.source: Then let mankind look at his food -
trans-unit.target: Després deixar que la humanitat mirar el seu menjar-

trans-unit.source: How We poured down water in torrents,
trans-unit.target: Com ens aboca aigua torrents,

trans-unit.source: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
trans-unit.target: Llavors ens va obrir la terra, divisió [-ho amb brots],

trans-unit.source: And caused to grow within it grain
trans-unit.target: I provocat per créixer en el seu gra

trans-unit.source: And grapes and herbage
trans-unit.target: I raïm i herbage

trans-unit.source: And olive and palm trees
trans-unit.target: I oliveres i palmeres

trans-unit.source: And gardens of dense shrubbery
trans-unit.target: I jardins de densos arbustos

trans-unit.source: And fruit and grass -
trans-unit.target: I fruites i herba-

trans-unit.source: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: [Com] gaudi per a vostè i el seu bestiar pastura.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
trans-unit.target: Però quan arriba l'ensordidor explosió

trans-unit.source: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
trans-unit.target: El dia un home fugir del seu germà

trans-unit.source: And his mother and his father
trans-unit.target: I la seva mare i el seu pare

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his children,
trans-unit.target: I la seva esposa i els seus fills,

trans-unit.source: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
trans-unit.target: Per cada home, aquell dia, serà una qüestió adequada per a ell.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
trans-unit.target: [Alguns] cares, que dia, serà brillant-

trans-unit.source: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
trans-unit.target: Rient, alegrant a bones notícies.

trans-unit.source: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
trans-unit.target: I pols [altres] cares, que dia, tindrà sobre ells.

trans-unit.source: Blackness will cover them.
trans-unit.target: Negror cobrir-los.

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
trans-unit.target: Aquests són els disbelievers, malvats.

trans-unit.source: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
trans-unit.target: Quan el sol s'embolica [en la foscor]

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
trans-unit.target: I quan cauen les estrelles, dispersió,

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are removed
trans-unit.target: I quan es retiren les muntanyes

trans-unit.source: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
trans-unit.target: I quan ella termini ple-camells són oblidades

trans-unit.source: And when the wild beasts are gathered
trans-unit.target: I quan les bèsties es recullen

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are filled with flame
trans-unit.target: I quan s'omplen els mars de flama

trans-unit.source: And when the souls are paired
trans-unit.target: I quan s'aparellen les ànimes

trans-unit.source: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
trans-unit.target: I quan la noia [qui era] enterrat viu es demana

trans-unit.source: For what sin she was killed
trans-unit.target: Per què pecat va ser assassinat

trans-unit.source: And when the pages are made public
trans-unit.target: I quan les pàgines es fan públiques

trans-unit.source: And when the sky is stripped away
trans-unit.target: I quan el cel és despullats

trans-unit.source: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
trans-unit.target: I quan Hellfire és encendrà

trans-unit.source: And when Paradise is brought near,
trans-unit.target: I quan el paradís és portat a prop,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
trans-unit.target: Una ànima [llavors] saber què ha portat [amb això].

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the retreating stars -
trans-unit.target: Així ho juro per la retirada estrelles-

trans-unit.source: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
trans-unit.target: Aquells que funcionen [els seus cursos] i desaparèixer-

trans-unit.source: And by the night as it closes in
trans-unit.target: I per la nit com es tanca

trans-unit.source: And by the dawn when it breathes
trans-unit.target: I per l'Alba quan es respira

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
trans-unit.target: [Que] en efecte, el Qur ' an és una paraula [transmesa per] un Missatger noble

trans-unit.source: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
trans-unit.target: [Qui és] va posseir el poder i amb el propietari del tron, segura [en posició],

trans-unit.source: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
trans-unit.target: Obeir allà [en el cel] i confiança.

trans-unit.source: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
trans-unit.target: I el seu company no és boig [gens].

trans-unit.source: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
trans-unit.target: I que ja ha vist Gabriel en l'horitzó clar.

trans-unit.source: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
trans-unit.target: I Muhammad no és una withholder d [coneixement] invisibles.

trans-unit.source: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
trans-unit.target: I l'Alcorà és la paraula del dimoni, expulsió [dels cels].

trans-unit.source: So where are you going?
trans-unit.target: Així on vas?

trans-unit.source: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
trans-unit.target: No és excepte un recordatori als mons

trans-unit.source: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
trans-unit.target: Per a qui vol entre a prendre un curs adequat.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: I no es llevat que Allah testaments - Senyor dels mons.

trans-unit.source: When the sky breaks apart
trans-unit.target: Quan es trenca el cel

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, scattering,
trans-unit.target: I quan cauen les estrelles, dispersió,

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are erupted
trans-unit.target: I quan va esclatar els mars

trans-unit.source: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
trans-unit.target: I quan s'escampen les tombes [continguts],

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Una ànima [llavors] saber què té posar endavant i mantinguts.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
trans-unit.target: O la humanitat, el que ha enganyat sobre el seu Senyor, el Generous,

trans-unit.source: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
trans-unit.target: Que t'ha creat, vostè proporcionat i equilibrat?

trans-unit.source: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
trans-unit.target: En qualsevol forma va voluntat que us ha reunit.

trans-unit.source: No! But you deny the Recompense.
trans-unit.target: No! Però negar la recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
trans-unit.target: I en efecte, [nomenat] sobre vostè són guardians,

trans-unit.source: Noble and recording;
trans-unit.target: Noble i enregistrament;

trans-unit.source: They know whatever you do.
trans-unit.target: Saben que facis el que facis.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
trans-unit.target: De fet, els justos seran en plaer,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, el malvat serà en Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
trans-unit.target: Ells [entrarà] cremada en això en el dia de pagament,

trans-unit.source: And never therefrom will they be absent.
trans-unit.target: I mai dels mateixos seran absents.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer-te saber quin és el dia de recompensa?

trans-unit.source: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Llavors, què pot fer vostè sap què és el dia de recompensa?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
trans-unit.target: És el dia quan una ànima no es posseeixen per una altra ànima [poder fer] una cosa; i l'ordre, que dia, està [totalment] amb Allah.

trans-unit.source: Woe to those who give less [than due],
trans-unit.target: Aflicció als que donen menys [de venciment],

trans-unit.source: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
trans-unit.target: Que, quan es pren una mesura de persones, prendre en la seva totalitat.

trans-unit.source: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Però si donen a mesura o pes a ells, que causen pèrdua.

trans-unit.source: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
trans-unit.target: No creuen que es serà ressuscitat

trans-unit.source: For a tremendous Day -
trans-unit.target: Per a un gran dia-

trans-unit.source: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
trans-unit.target: El dia quan la humanitat es mantindrà davant el Senyor dels mons?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
trans-unit.target: No! De fet, el registre dels impius és en sijjeen.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer vostè sap què és sijjeen?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: [Destinació gravat a] és un registre inscrit.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Ai, aquell dia, a l'Oros,

trans-unit.source: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Que neguen el dia de recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
trans-unit.target: I cap negar excepte cada transgressor pecaminós.

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Quan nostres versos els recitats per ell, diu, "Llegendes dels antics pobles."

trans-unit.source: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
trans-unit.target: No! Més aviat, la taca ha cobert els cors dels que ells van guanyar.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
trans-unit.target: No! De fet, del seu Senyor, aquell dia, es divideix.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Llavors, de fet ho faran [entrar i] estar encès en Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Llavors es diu [amb ells], "Això és el que solia negar."

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
trans-unit.target: No! De fet, és el registre dels justos de ' illiyyun.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer vostè sap el que és ' illiyyun?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
trans-unit.target: [Destinació gravat a] és un registre inscrit

trans-unit.source: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Que és presenciat per aquells portat a prop [a Allah].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
trans-unit.target: De fet, els justos seran de plaer

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: En sofàs adornaven, observant.

trans-unit.source: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Es reconeix en els seus rostres la resplendor del plaer.

trans-unit.source: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
trans-unit.target: Es dóna a beure vi [pura] [que] segellat.

trans-unit.source: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
trans-unit.target: L'últim d'això és mesquer. Així que per aquest deixi els competidors competeixen.

trans-unit.source: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
trans-unit.target: I la seva barreja de Tasneem,

trans-unit.source: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
trans-unit.target: Una primavera que aquells a prop [a Allah] beure.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que van cometre crims solia riure a qui creu.

trans-unit.source: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
trans-unit.target: I quan van passar per ells, vols intercanviar mirades burleta.

trans-unit.source: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
trans-unit.target: I quan van tornar al seu poble, tornaria a jesting.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
trans-unit.target: I quan veien ells, es diria, "De fet, aquells són veritablement perduts".

trans-unit.source: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
trans-unit.target: Però no havien estat enviats com a tutors sobre ells.

trans-unit.source: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Així que avui qui considerava els rient disbelievers,

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: En sofàs adornaven, observant.

trans-unit.source: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: [Els disbelievers no] han recompensat [aquest dia] per el que acostumaven a fer?

trans-unit.source: When the sky has split [open]
trans-unit.target: Quan el cel ha partit [obert]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
trans-unit.target: I ha respost al seu Senyor i va ser obligat [-ho]

trans-unit.source: And when the earth has been extended
trans-unit.target: I quan la terra s'ha estès

trans-unit.source: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
trans-unit.target: I ha colat que dins d'ella i el seu mandat [es]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
trans-unit.target: I ha respost al seu Senyor i va ser obligat [-ho]-

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
trans-unit.target: O la humanitat, fet que estem treballant cap al seu Senyor amb esforç [gran] i es reuneixen.

trans-unit.source: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
trans-unit.target: Llavors que per a ell que li han donat el seu registre a la mà dreta,

trans-unit.source: He will be judged with an easy account
trans-unit.target: Es valorarà amb un compte de fàcil

trans-unit.source: And return to his people in happiness.
trans-unit.target: I tornar al seu poble a la felicitat.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a ell que es dóna el seu registre l'esquena,

trans-unit.source: He will cry out for destruction
trans-unit.target: Va clamen per la destrucció

trans-unit.source: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: I [intro a] cremar en flames.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
trans-unit.target: De fet, havia estat [una vegada] entre la seva gent en la felicitat;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: De fet, ell havia pensat que mai tornaria [a Allah].

trans-unit.source: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Però sí! De fet, seu Senyor era mai d'ell, veient.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the twilight glow
trans-unit.target: Així ho juro per la resplendor del crepuscle

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night and what it envelops
trans-unit.target: I [per] la nit i què s'embolica

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
trans-unit.target: I [per] la lluna quan estigui plena

trans-unit.source: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
trans-unit.target: [Que] segurament vostè experimentarà estat després estat.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
trans-unit.target: Així què és [la matèria] amb ells [que] ja no es creu,

trans-unit.source: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: I quan el Qur ' an es recita'ls, no van postrar [a Allah]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have disbelieved deny,
trans-unit.target: Però els que tenen dubtaven negar,

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
trans-unit.target: I Allah és saber la majoria de què es mantenen dins de si mateixos.

trans-unit.source: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Així donem noticia de un dolor càstig,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: A excepció d'aquells que creuen i fer els justos fets. Per a ells és una recompensa ininterrompuda.

trans-unit.source: By the sky containing great stars
trans-unit.target: Pel cel que contenen grans estrelles

trans-unit.source: And [by] the promised Day
trans-unit.target: I [el dia prometia per]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
trans-unit.target: I [per] el testimoni i el que és vist,

trans-unit.source: Cursed were the companions of the trench
trans-unit.target: Maleït eren els companys de la trinxera

trans-unit.source: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
trans-unit.target: [Que] el foc ple de combustible,

trans-unit.source: When they were sitting near it
trans-unit.target: Quan estaven estant a prop

trans-unit.source: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
trans-unit.target: I, per el que estaven fent contra els creients, van ser testimonis.

trans-unit.source: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
trans-unit.target: Ells no excepte molestava perquè creien en Allah, l'exaltat en el poder, la Praiseworthy,

trans-unit.source: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
trans-unit.target: A qui pertany el dominion dels cels i la terra. I Allah, sobre totes les coses, és testimoni.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han torturat el creient homes i dones de creure i llavors no han penedit tindran el càstig de l'infern, i tindran el càstig del foc que crema.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: De fet, aquells que han cregut i han fet escriptures justos tindran jardins sota quin cabal de rius. Aquesta és la gran consecució.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
trans-unit.target: De fet, la venjança del seu senyor és greu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
trans-unit.target: De fet, és el que s'origina [creació] i repeteix.

trans-unit.source: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
trans-unit.target: I ell és l'indulgent, la Affectionate,

trans-unit.source: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
trans-unit.target: Honorable titular del tron,

trans-unit.source: Effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Effecter de què pensa.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
trans-unit.target: Hi ha assolit la història dels soldats-

trans-unit.source: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
trans-unit.target: [Els de] Faraó i Thamud?

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
trans-unit.target: Però que dubten són a la negació [persistent],

trans-unit.source: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
trans-unit.target: Mentre Allah ells abasta des del darrere.

trans-unit.source: But this is an honored Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Però això és un honrat Qur ' an

trans-unit.source: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
trans-unit.target: [S] en una pissarra conservat.

trans-unit.source: By the sky and the night comer -
trans-unit.target: El cel i el nouvingut nit-

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer-te saber quin és el menjar de la nit?

trans-unit.source: It is the piercing star -
trans-unit.target: És l'estrella penetrant-

trans-unit.source: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
trans-unit.target: Hi ha cap ànima, però que té sobre ell un protector.

trans-unit.source: So let man observe from what he was created.
trans-unit.target: Així deixi home observar des de què ell va ser creat.

trans-unit.source: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
trans-unit.target: Va ser creat a partir un fluid, expulsat,

trans-unit.source: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
trans-unit.target: Emergint entre la columna vertebral i les costelles.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
trans-unit.target: De fet, al là, tornar-li [a vida], és capaç.

trans-unit.source: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
trans-unit.target: El dia quan secrets de es posarà a prova,

trans-unit.source: Then man will have no power or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Home llavors tindrà cap poder o cap d'ajuda.

trans-unit.source: By the sky which returns [rain]
trans-unit.target: Pel cel que retorna [pluja]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
trans-unit.target: I [per] la terra que esquerdes s'obren,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
trans-unit.target: En efecte, el Qur ' an és una declaració decisiu,

trans-unit.source: And it is not amusement.
trans-unit.target: I no és diversió.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
trans-unit.target: De fet, estan planejant un pla,

trans-unit.source: But I am planning a plan.
trans-unit.target: Però estic planejant un pla.

trans-unit.source: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
trans-unit.target: Així permetre temps disbelievers. Deixar-los una estona.

trans-unit.source: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
trans-unit.target: Exaltar el nom del seu Senyor, el més alt,

trans-unit.source: Who created and proportioned
trans-unit.target: Qui creada i proporcionat

trans-unit.source: And who destined and [then] guided
trans-unit.target: I que destina i guiat [llavors]

trans-unit.source: And who brings out the pasture
trans-unit.target: I que porta a terme la pastura

trans-unit.source: And [then] makes it black stubble.
trans-unit.target: I [llavors] fa rostolls és negre.

trans-unit.source: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
trans-unit.target: Farem que recitin, [O Muhammad], i no et deixarà indiferent,

trans-unit.source: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Excepte el que Allah ha es. De fet, ell sap el que es declara i què s'amaga.

trans-unit.source: And We will ease you toward ease.
trans-unit.target: I us facilitaran cap facilitat.

trans-unit.source: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
trans-unit.target: Així recordar, si la notificació ha de beneficiar;

trans-unit.source: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Qui tem [Allah] es va recordar.

trans-unit.source: But the wretched one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Però aquell miserable a evitar-ho-

trans-unit.source: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
trans-unit.target: [Ell] que es [entrar i] cremar en el foc més gran,

trans-unit.source: Neither dying therein nor living.
trans-unit.target: Morir aquí ni viure.

trans-unit.source: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte que ha aconseguit que purifica a si mateix

trans-unit.source: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
trans-unit.target: Esmenta el nom del seu Senyor i prega.

trans-unit.source: But you prefer the worldly life,
trans-unit.target: Però prefereix la vida mundana,

trans-unit.source: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Mentre que el futur és millor i més duradora.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
trans-unit.target: De fet, això és en les escriptures antigues,

trans-unit.source: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
trans-unit.target: Les escriptures d'Abraham i Moses.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
trans-unit.target: Ha hi que va arribar a l'informe de la Overwhelming [esdeveniment]?

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
trans-unit.target: [Alguns] cares, que dia, serà humiliat,

trans-unit.source: Working [hard] and exhausted.
trans-unit.target: Treballant [] i esgotat.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
trans-unit.target: Ells [entrarà] cremar en un incendi molt calenta.

trans-unit.source: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
trans-unit.target: D'una font bullint tindra beguda.

trans-unit.source: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
trans-unit.target: Per a ells no hi haurà cap aliment llevat d'una planta verinosa, espinós

trans-unit.source: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
trans-unit.target: Que ni nodreix ni compta contra la fam.

trans-unit.source: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Altres] cares, que dia, mostrarà el plaer.

trans-unit.source: With their effort [they are] satisfied
trans-unit.target: Amb el seu esforç [són] satisfet

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: En un jardí elevat,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
trans-unit.target: En què senten cap discurs inadequats.

trans-unit.source: Within it is a flowing spring.
trans-unit.target: A és una font que flueix.

trans-unit.source: Within it are couches raised high
trans-unit.target: Dins són sofàs plantejades alt

trans-unit.source: And cups put in place
trans-unit.target: I tasses de posar en marxa

trans-unit.source: And cushions lined up
trans-unit.target: I coixins alineats

trans-unit.source: And carpets spread around.
trans-unit.target: I catifes repartides.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
trans-unit.target: Llavors fer no miren els camells - com es creen?

trans-unit.source: And at the sky - how it is raised?
trans-unit.target: I al cel - com és en?

trans-unit.source: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
trans-unit.target: I a les muntanyes - com els Erigir?

trans-unit.source: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
trans-unit.target: I a la terra - com s'estén?

trans-unit.source: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
trans-unit.target: Així recordar, [O Muhammad]; és només un recordatori.

trans-unit.source: You are not over them a controller.
trans-unit.target: No ets sobre ells un controlador.

trans-unit.source: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
trans-unit.target: No obstant això, el que allunya i disbelieves -

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
trans-unit.target: Llavors Allah li castigarà amb el càstig més gran.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Us is their return.
trans-unit.target: De fet, ens és seu retorn.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
trans-unit.target: De fet, llavors sobre nosaltres és seu compte.

trans-unit.source: By the dawn
trans-unit.target: Per l'Alba

trans-unit.source: And [by] ten nights
trans-unit.target: I [per] deu nits

trans-unit.source: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
trans-unit.target: I [per] [nombre] fins i tot i l'estrany

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it passes,
trans-unit.target: I [la nit quan això passa, per]

trans-unit.source: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
trans-unit.target: Hi [no] [tots] que un jurament [prou] per a un de percepció?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
trans-unit.target: No considerat com el seu Senyor abordades ' Aad -

trans-unit.source: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
trans-unit.target: [Amb] IRAM - que tenia elevats pilars,

trans-unit.source: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
trans-unit.target: La talla de qui mai no havia estat creat a la terra?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
trans-unit.target: I la [amb] Thamud, que les roques a la vall?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
trans-unit.target: I [amb] faraó, propietari de les participacions? -

trans-unit.source: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
trans-unit.target: [Tots] qui oprimit dins les terres

trans-unit.source: And increased therein the corruption.
trans-unit.target: I en això va augmentar la corrupció.

trans-unit.source: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
trans-unit.target: Així que el seu Senyor aboca sobre ells un flagell de càstig.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
trans-unit.target: De fet, el seu senyor és en observació.

trans-unit.source: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
trans-unit.target: I pel que fa a l'home, quan seu Senyor tracta ell i [que] és generós a ell i afavoreix a ell, diu, "el meu Senyor ha honrat mi."

trans-unit.source: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
trans-unit.target: Però quan es tracta d'ell i restringeix la seva prestació, diu, "el meu Senyor ha humiliat."

trans-unit.source: No! But you do not honor the orphan
trans-unit.target: No! Però no li fan honor a l'orfe

trans-unit.source: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: I no Anima altres per alimentar els pobres.

trans-unit.source: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
trans-unit.target: I consumeixen l'herència, devorar [es] en total,

trans-unit.source: And you love wealth with immense love.
trans-unit.target: I t'encanta riquesa amb amor immens.

trans-unit.source: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
trans-unit.target: No! Quan la terra ha estat arrasades - retornaran i triturat-

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
trans-unit.target: I ha arribat el seu Senyor i els àngels, rang en rang,

trans-unit.source: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
trans-unit.target: I va portar [de vista], recordaran que dia, és l'infern - aquell dia, l'home, però què bo li serà el record?

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
trans-unit.target: Va dir, "Oh, m'agradaria havia enviat endavant [algunes bones] per la meva vida."

trans-unit.source: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
trans-unit.target: Que dia, cap castigarà [com greument] com el seu càstig,

trans-unit.source: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: I cap s'unirà [com greument] com la seva unió [de l'evildoers].

trans-unit.source: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
trans-unit.target: [Als justos que es diu], "O tranquil·litzava ànima,

trans-unit.source: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
trans-unit.target: Tornar al seu Senyor, ben contents i agradable [a ell],

trans-unit.source: And enter among My [righteous] servants
trans-unit.target: I entrar entre els meus servents [rectes]

trans-unit.source: And enter My Paradise."
trans-unit.target: I introduir el meu paradís."

trans-unit.source: I swear by this city, Makkah -
trans-unit.target: Ho juro per aquesta ciutat, Makkah-

trans-unit.source: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
trans-unit.target: I tu, [O Muhammad], ets lliure de restricció en aquesta ciutat-

trans-unit.source: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
trans-unit.target: [Per] el pare i que que naixia [d'ell],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man into hardship.
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte hem creat home en dificultats.

trans-unit.source: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
trans-unit.target: Va pensar que mai ningú superarà ell?

trans-unit.source: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
trans-unit.target: Diu, "He passat riquesa en abundància."

trans-unit.source: Does he think that no one has seen him?
trans-unit.target: Va pensar que ningú ha vist?

trans-unit.source: Have We not made for him two eyes?
trans-unit.target: No han fet per a ell dos ulls?

trans-unit.source: And a tongue and two lips?
trans-unit.target: I una llengua i dos llavis?

trans-unit.source: And have shown him the two ways?
trans-unit.target: I li han demostrat les dues maneres?

trans-unit.source: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
trans-unit.target: Però ell no ha trencat a través del pas difícil.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer saber què és [trencar] el pas difícil?

trans-unit.source: It is the freeing of a slave
trans-unit.target: És l'alliberament d'un esclau

trans-unit.source: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
trans-unit.target: O l'alimentació en un dia de greu fam

trans-unit.source: An orphan of near relationship
trans-unit.target: Orfe de relació a prop

trans-unit.source: Or a needy person in misery
trans-unit.target: O una persona necessitada en la misèria

trans-unit.source: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
trans-unit.target: I llavors la entre els que creien i un altre recomana paciència i va aconsellar un altre a la compassió.

trans-unit.source: Those are the companions of the right.
trans-unit.target: Aquells són els companys de la dreta.

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
trans-unit.target: Però els que dubtaven del nostres signes - aquests són els companys de l'esquerra.

trans-unit.source: Over them will be fire closed in.
trans-unit.target: Sobre ells serà foc tancat.

trans-unit.source: By the sun and its brightness
trans-unit.target: El sol i la seva Claror

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it follows it
trans-unit.target: I [per] la lluna quan es segueix

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it displays it
trans-unit.target: I [per] el dia quan es Mostra

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers it
trans-unit.target: I [de] la nit quan es cobreix

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
trans-unit.target: [Per] el cel i ell que es construeix

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
trans-unit.target: I [per] la terra i ell que difon-

trans-unit.source: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
trans-unit.target: I [per] l'ànima i ell que proporcionat

trans-unit.source: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
trans-unit.target: I van provocar [amb discerniment de] la maldat i la seva rectitud,

trans-unit.source: He has succeeded who purifies it,
trans-unit.target: Que ha aconseguit que purifica

trans-unit.source: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
trans-unit.target: I ha fracassat que inculca [amb corrupció].

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
trans-unit.target: Thamud negat [seu profeta] per raó de la seva transgressió,

trans-unit.source: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
trans-unit.target: Quan la majoria dels condemnats d'ells va ser enviat cap endavant.

trans-unit.source: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
trans-unit.target: I el Missatger d'Allah [Salih] els va dir: "[no fer mal] el camell ell d'Allah o [impedir-li de] beure.»

trans-unit.source: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
trans-unit.target: Però li va negar i hamstrung ella. Així seu Senyor enderrocat imposin destrucció pel seu pecat i fet igual [en tots ells].

trans-unit.source: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
trans-unit.target: I ell no por la conseqüència del mateix.

trans-unit.source: By the night when it covers
trans-unit.target: Per la nit quan abasta

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it appears
trans-unit.target: I [el dia quan apareix per]

trans-unit.source: And [by] He who created the male and female,
trans-unit.target: I [per] ell que ha creat el mascle i femella,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
trans-unit.target: De fet, els seus esforços són diverses.

trans-unit.source: As for he who gives and fears Allah
trans-unit.target: Pel que fa a qui dóna i tem Allah

trans-unit.source: And believes in the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: I creu en la millor [recompensa],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Nosaltres li facilitaran cap facilitat.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa a ell que reté i es considera sense necessitat

trans-unit.source: And denies the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: I nega el millor [recompensa],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward difficulty.
trans-unit.target: Nosaltres li facilitaran cap dificultat.

trans-unit.source: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
trans-unit.target: I el que serà la seva riquesa debades ell quan s'enamora?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
trans-unit.target: De fet, és [incumbeixen] ens guia.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: I de fet, ens pertany el futur i el primer [vida].

trans-unit.source: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
trans-unit.target: Així que he advertit d'un incendi que s'està cremant.

trans-unit.source: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
trans-unit.target: Cap [entrarà] cremar en això excepte la més miserable.

trans-unit.source: Who had denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Que havia negat i s'allunyava.

trans-unit.source: But the righteous one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Però aquell just a evitar-ho-

trans-unit.source: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
trans-unit.target: [Ell] que dóna [de] la seva riquesa per purificar-se

trans-unit.source: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
trans-unit.target: I no [donar] per a qui té [fet ell] un favor a ser recompensats

trans-unit.source: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
trans-unit.target: Però només buscant el rostre del seu Senyor, més alta.

trans-unit.source: And he is going to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: I va a estar satisfets.

trans-unit.source: By the morning brightness
trans-unit.target: Per la brillantor de matí

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
trans-unit.target: I [de] la nit quan es cobreix amb la foscor,

trans-unit.source: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
trans-unit.target: El seu Senyor no ha pres comiat de vós, [O Muhammad], ni ha va fastiguejar [que].

trans-unit.source: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
trans-unit.target: I el més enllà és millor per a vostè que la primera [vida].

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: I va donar-li el seu Senyor, i vostè estarà satisfet.

trans-unit.source: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
trans-unit.target: No li trobava que orfe i donar [que] refugi?

trans-unit.source: And He found you lost and guided [you],
trans-unit.target: I es va trobar perdut i guiat [us],

trans-unit.source: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: I ell li trobava pobre i [t] fet autosuficients.

trans-unit.source: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
trans-unit.target: Tan pel que fa a l'orfe oprimeix [li].

trans-unit.source: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
trans-unit.target: I pel que fa a la peticionària, no rebutjar [li].

trans-unit.source: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
trans-unit.target: Però pel que fa al favor del teu Senyor, informe [es].

trans-unit.source: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
trans-unit.target: No ampliem per a vostè, [O Muhammad], el pit?

trans-unit.source: And We removed from you your burden
trans-unit.target: I retirem de vostè la seva càrrega

trans-unit.source: Which had weighed upon your back
trans-unit.target: Que havia pesava sobre l'esquena

trans-unit.source: And raised high for you your repute.
trans-unit.target: I alt elevada per a que la seva reputació.

trans-unit.source: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: De fet, amb dificultats [es] alleujar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: De fet, amb dificultats [es] alleujar.

trans-unit.source: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
trans-unit.target: Així que quan hagi acabat [seu deures], llavors aixeca [per al culte].

trans-unit.source: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
trans-unit.target: I el seu Senyor directe [seva] anhel.

trans-unit.source: By the fig and the olive
trans-unit.target: De la Figuera i l'oliva

trans-unit.source: And [by] Mount Sinai
trans-unit.target: I [per] Mont Sinaí

trans-unit.source: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],
trans-unit.target: I [per] això segur ciutat [Makkah],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
trans-unit.target: Sens dubte hem creat home en el millor de talla;

trans-unit.source: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
trans-unit.target: Llavors li tornem a la menor de les baixes,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Excepte per a aquells que creuen i fer els justos fets, perquè tindran una recompensa ininterrompuda.

trans-unit.source: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Així què encara li provoca a negar la recompensa?

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
trans-unit.target: No és Allah més dels jutges?

trans-unit.source: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
trans-unit.target: Recitar en el nom del seu Senyor que ha creat-

trans-unit.source: Created man from a clinging substance.
trans-unit.target: Crear home des d'una substància interessant.

trans-unit.source: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
trans-unit.target: Recitar i el seu senyor és més Generous-

trans-unit.source: Who taught by the pen -
trans-unit.target: Que imparteixen la ploma -

trans-unit.source: Taught man that which he knew not.
trans-unit.target: Home autodidacta que que ell no sabia.

trans-unit.source: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses
trans-unit.target: No! [Però] de fet, home transgredeix

trans-unit.source: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Perquè es veu a si mateix autosuficients.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
trans-unit.target: De fet, el seu senyor és el retorn.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who forbids
trans-unit.target: Has vist qui prohibeix

trans-unit.source: A servant when he prays?
trans-unit.target: Un criat quan prega?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
trans-unit.target: Has vist si és a l'orientació

trans-unit.source: Or enjoins righteousness?
trans-unit.target: O enjoins de Justícia?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
trans-unit.target: Has vist si nega i allunya-

trans-unit.source: Does he not know that Allah sees?
trans-unit.target: Ell no sap que Allah veu?

trans-unit.source: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
trans-unit.target: No! Si no va desistir, segurament arrossegarem ell per la forelock-

trans-unit.source: A lying, sinning forelock.
trans-unit.target: Una mentida, fou forelock.

trans-unit.source: Then let him call his associates;
trans-unit.target: Llavors li permetrà trucar seus associats;

trans-unit.source: We will call the angels of Hell.
trans-unit.target: Anem a trucar als àngels de l'infern.

trans-unit.source: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: No! No obeir-lo. Però postrar i acosten [a Allah].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
trans-unit.target: De fet, hem enviat el Qur ' an durant la nit del decret.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer vostè sap què és la nit del decret?

trans-unit.source: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
trans-unit.target: La nit del decret és millor que mil mesos.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
trans-unit.target: L'angels i l'esperit aquí baixem amb permís del seu Senyor per a cada matèria.

trans-unit.source: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
trans-unit.target: Pau que és fins l'aparició de l'Alba.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -
trans-unit.target: Els que dubtaven entre la gent de l'escriptura i la politeistes no van ser separat [misbelief] fins que va venir a ells clara evidència -

trans-unit.source: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
trans-unit.target: Un Missatger d'Allah, recitar les escriptures purificada

trans-unit.source: Within which are correct writings.
trans-unit.target: Dins de la qual són escrits correcta.

trans-unit.source: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.
trans-unit.target: Tampoc va aclarir qui tenint en compte l'escriptura es subdividien fins després hi havia arribat a ells evidència.

trans-unit.source: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.
trans-unit.target: I no eren comandades excepte veneren Allah, [sent] sincer a ell en la religió, inclinant-se a la veritat i establir l'oració i donar zakah. I això és la religió correcta.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.
trans-unit.target: De fet, que dubtaven entre la gent de l'escriptura i la politeistes estaran en el foc d'infern, romandre eternament en el mateix. Aquells són els pitjors de criatures.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
trans-unit.target: De fet, ells que han cregut i han fet escriptures justos - aquestes són les millors criatures.

trans-unit.source: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Seva recompensa amb Allah serà jardins de domicili perpetu sota quin cabal de rius, on es queda per sempre, Allah ser grat i ells amb ell. És a dir per a qui ha temut el seu Senyor.

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
trans-unit.target: Quan la terra s'agita amb seu terratrèmol [final]

trans-unit.source: And the earth discharges its burdens
trans-unit.target: I les seves càrregues d'abocaments de la terra

trans-unit.source: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
trans-unit.target: I home diu: "Què és [malament] amb això?"-

trans-unit.source: That Day, it will report its news
trans-unit.target: Aquell dia, informarà les notícies

trans-unit.source: Because your Lord has commanded it.
trans-unit.target: Perquè el Senyor ha manat.

trans-unit.source: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Aquell dia, la gent surt separats [en categories] que hauran de mostrar [el resultat de] seus actes.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,
trans-unit.target: Així que qui pes d'un Àtom de bona voluntat veure-ho,

trans-unit.source: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
trans-unit.target: I qui fa un Àtom pes del mal ho veurà.

trans-unit.source: By the racers, panting,
trans-unit.target: Pels corredors, panteixant,

trans-unit.source: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
trans-unit.target: I els productors d'espurnes [en] vaga

trans-unit.source: And the chargers at dawn,
trans-unit.target: I els carregadors a l'Alba,

trans-unit.source: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,
trans-unit.target: Remenar i pols [núvols de],

trans-unit.source: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
trans-unit.target: Arribant així al centre col·lectivament,

trans-unit.source: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: De fet la humanitat, al seu Senyor, és ingrat.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, és que un testimoni.

trans-unit.source: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
trans-unit.target: I de fet, en l'amor de la riquesa, intensa.

trans-unit.source: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
trans-unit.target: Però ell no sap que quan el contingut de les sepultures es troben disperses

trans-unit.source: And that within the breasts is obtained,
trans-unit.target: I que en els pits s'obté,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: De fet, seu Senyor amb ells, aquell dia, està [totalment] conèixer.

trans-unit.source: The Striking Calamity -
trans-unit.target: La calamitat vaga-

trans-unit.source: What is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: Què és la calamitat sorprenent?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: I què pot fer vostè sap què és la calamitat sorprenent?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
